name: Andria Chandler
text: This can't be called a skatepark it is far too small and poor quality. This area needs a real skatepark like Linda Vista, Encinitas,  Alex Road Prince or Venice.

name: Hudson Naile
text: This park is great for advanced skaters, but if you don't know how to skate quarter pipes then you should probably avoid this park. The skatepark is hard to get to because they built a creek almost all around it, for the people that live here and thia is there local skatepark, please ask the mayor to build a bridge over the creek.

name: Bob K
text: for a small community park it's surprisingly dope. two small quarters on either side, fun box with duel sided hubba and round rail with a slight decline in the middle, round curved rail and flat decline rail off to the sides, multi level benches, and a little kicker. smooth pave but bring a broom if you're on hard wheels

name: Crystal Cooley
text: Great even in the rain!

name: Jackson Reid
text: It is a decent skate park, no half-pipes or anything crazy, sort of reflective of the town. Do not expect a crowd.

name: Jodie Plato
text: Average skate park. Took my 11 year grandson and his friend to ride skateboards. Didn't stay long, because they got board.

name: Chris Yokley
text: Fun for the kids

name: Marchita McDole
text: Great for the kids

name: Alex Williams
text: Love it 👍🏻 great gym and cool owners 😎

name: florence prickett
text: I love Squad! This facility is setup for bootcamp style workouts. The trainers are amazing. Their Drop 20 Challenge is probably the most popular program. I'm doing the challenge now and I've got a week left! One drawback is there is no heat or air. There are several fans setup, so there is air flowing throughout. I haven't used the facility in the winter. I have seen great results since I've been doing the challenge, which lasts 6 weeks. I would DEFINITELY recommend this challenge! If you need a cooler environment when working out, go to the early morning classes at 5:15am or 9am. If you really want it... you'll make it work! 😉

name: Olivia Parrish
text: I recently completed the Drop 20 challenge at Squad fitness and I must say, by week two, I had completely fallen in love with the place! I successfully completed the challenge (25.6 lbs down) and now I feel like I can’t live without Squad. It’s hard. Very hard. But the trainers do such an awesome job. They push you to your limits but also keep the workouts fun! I feel the best I’ve felt in years and weigh the least I’ve weighed in at least 4 years! And honestly, to me it feels more like a little family than a gym! 😂 the atmosphere is so nice, the other members (and the trainer) are all so encouraging and supportive! I’ve made great progress in my health and also made some great friends along the way! If you’re thinking about stopping by, just do it! You won’t regret it! 😁

name: Wendy Light
text: The drop 20 challenge in Huntsville has been one of the best experiences that I have had in a workout. At first, I wasn’t sure if I could last. But I had lots of help with encouragement from the trainers and other members of the squad. I not only survived, but lost 20.8 lbs and lost several inches in much needed places in the last 6 weeks. The atmosphere is like no other gym. When you walk in, you are always greeted by one of the trainers asking if you are ready to get it done. Squad Fitness has some of the best trainers you can find! They are always pushing you when you think you can’t go any further. If you are not doing one of the exercises correctly, they will get down and show you how to do it the right way. I am so glad that I took the challenge. I would recommend Squad Fitness to anyone that needs a big push like I did. I feel better than I have in a long time. Thanks Squad for helping me get the stubborn pounds off!!!!

name: Joccelyn Coleman
text:
The Squad Fitness Family is truly rooting for you 100%! The trainers make sure to give you the attention you need to ensure you’re doing the workouts correctly and giving it your all! It’s not just about the exercising, they stay on you to make sure your time outside the gym is being occupied correctly and efficiently! The genuine care and Squad Fitness has for you is what brought me back  and I honestly have no regrets! I appreciate everything they have done for me and have already recommended it to ALL of my friends and family in the area, as many have either come to join or visit!

If you need a new gym family or looking to get some REAL results, SQUAD FITNESS IS IT.

name: TP Pyt
text: I absolutely love this place! I have dug deeper and gone harder than I ever have in my life and it is paying off.  This place is more than a gym,  it is a community pushing ourselves and encouraging each other to do one last rep, run one last stride,  go one more inch to reach our goals. The trainers are amazing and have truly perfected their skill. They are there BEFORE the 5:15  class starts and are full of energy as if they've been up for hours. These first six weeks have only been the beginning. I can't wait to see where I go from here with Squad Fitness!

name: Janice Renfroe
text: Squad Fitness Drop 20 Challenge inspired me to lose my weight and also have a healthier lifestyle.  When it comes to working out, you need to be motivated and have a plan for your fitness. Squad Fitness did help me be motivated by the trainers energy at the gym. The trainers inspired me to push myself in ways that I normally would not have done by myself.  They challenged me to lift more weights and exercise more! These last six weeks have really improved my outlook on how I will move forward in what to expect from myself in my new lifestyle. I would like to thank all of the trainers for your push every day because I would have never have lost the 20.5 lbs without you all!

name: Kelly Johnson
text: Squad is awesome y'all!!! The people are amazing, the trainers are amazing, the workouts are amazing!! If you are wanting to see progress, go to SQUAD! They help you meal prep and are AWESOME motivators!! If you have questions with anything, they help you the best way possible! It's challenging in the best way and I've made so many new friends from this program! If you're lost and you don't know what gym to go to or you have a gym but never know what to do once you get there, SQUAD IS FOR YOU! They make working out so fun and easier on the mind! LOVE MY SQUAD!!!

name: Lean Lopez
text: I made the best choice of my life when I decided to join squad fitness. I have NO regrets! This has been a great experience! I'm thankful to the staff that kept me motivated! I meant really awesome people along the way and I'm super excited about the results that I have seen in my body and clothes. Shout out to the crew at squad fitness I'm forever grateful!

name: Martha Holt
text: Squad Fitness is a great gym. The workouts of the day are challenging, but the coaches are right there with you to help push you to improve your performance. The coaches are awesome; they are all very positive and encouraging and they make the workouts fun. Working out at Squad Fitness has made me stronger and healthier. I recommend Squad Fitness to anyone, whether it’s because they want to lose weight or get stronger or even have better stress management.

name: Nicole Coppinger Fisher
text: Doing the Drop 20 Challenge with Squad Fitness was the best thing I could have ever done for myself! Now that I have completed the challenge I have lost inches, I am wearing some of my old clothes and I have so much more energy! Before the challenge I was always looking for the best way to lose weight. Well, with Squad Fitness I found it! The workouts are so much fun and the coaches are always pushing you to reach your fitness goals! Even though the challenge is over, I am continuing my fitness journey with Squad Fitness!

name: Maria Lopez
text: I have fallen in love with squad fitness. The trainers are awesome. The workouts are awesome. I come out of there sweaty and gross. This place really know how to push you so you can become the best version of yourself. Their easy meal plan was so simple to follow, that you literally had no way to mess up. They explained week to week what exactly we had to so we could be able to reach our goals. I’m so glad I found this place because without them I would have not know how find a better lifestyle. Not only has my body improved, but my mind as well. I feel 10x better after joining Squad Fitness.

name: Olivia Parrish
text: I recently completed the Drop 20 challenge at Squad fitness and I must say, by week two, I had completely fallen in love with the place! I successfully completed the challenge (25.6 lbs down) and now I feel like I can’t live without this place. It’s hard. Very hard. But the trainers do such an awesome job of keeping the workouts fun as well! If you’re thinking about stopping by, just do it! You won’t regret it! 😁

name: casey hopkins
text: I'm so glad that I decided to do the 6 week challenge! I would have never made the progress I did in the 6 weeks I worked out at squad fitness by myself or at another gym. All of the trainers are awesome! I had never been to a gym before going to squad fitness but the trainers explain every workout to you and make sure that you are doing the exercise correctly. I actually looked forward to going to the gym everyday! They give you all the tools to achieve your goals, all you have to do is show up and follow the instructions!

name: Tommy Guzowski
text: This is a great program for anyone looking to lose some weight! The trainers are all very positive and motivating, and want to help you meet your fitness goals. All the workouts were challenging and also fun. Every time I went into the gym I felt myself getting stronger and stronger. All the workouts are done in a group setting with trainers who will not let you slack off. I may not have lost all the weight, but I lost inches off my waist and stomach. My clothes are fitting better and I am feeling much better. This program gave me the accountability I needed to get into shape!

name: Stephanie S
text: Final weigh in and I have lost 21.8 pounds in the 6 week challenge! What a wonderful experience I have had at SQUAD FITNESS HUNTSVILLE and I will continue to workout with the SQUAD! The trainers have been phenomenal! Such a supportive and encouraging team. The trainers were also great at ensuring proper form and providing alternatives when needed. I have to give a big shout out to Tanisha who made the workouts fun, entertaining and worth every second! I loved how each workout was different and the boot camp and cardio mix ups each day. The facility is nice and the location is spot on and super convenient. SQUAD FITNESS HUNTSVILLE is the place to be!!! I recommend everyone to try them out and see how awesome it is to be apart of the best SQUAD!!!!!

name: Lisa Holman
text: I just completed my 6 week drop 20 challenge, I have had such a great experience! I have adapted a healthy lifestyle that will remain a constant in my life! I am very pleased with how great I feel and overall changed in my body!  The trainers make the workouts so fun and each one is different. If you are looking to get fit and eat healthy this is the place to get started! I will continue my workouts at Squad! I have also made some great new friends! Thanks Squad for making me accountable and changing my life!

name: Erica Richardson
text: Awesome trainers, flexible class times, easy to follow meal plan, and a list of supplements to help you succeed (if you choose to use them). I initially thought it was a scam. I sat in the nutrition seminar waiting to hear "the catch"......it never came-there wasn't one! This is a group of trainers that sincerely want you to succeed. They recognize your ability and push you to meet your goal. They are available to modify the workout or answer  nutrition questions you may have. Most important to me is the atmosphere and attitude of the other challengers. The trainers created such a supportive, judgement free environment. We are a team with one goal- healthier lifestyles!!! I am SO much better than when I started day 1. I'm not out of breath after WALKING up the stairs. I have more energy; I feel better. I had some difficulty keeping up with meal prep- which plays into how successful you are with sticking to the meal plan- but I am THRILLED with my results! I can now fit into clothes I couldn't wear. Those clothes I was wearing are a little too big!! I will be looking into a membership!

name: Lara Lay
text: I started the Drop 20 Challenge 6 weeks ago, completely out of shape after not working out for 20 years (!). I had already lost a significant amount of weight and was looking to get past my plateau. The squad fitness training crew were tough, but fun and supportive. The workouts were grueling, but they modified them as needed so everyone could do it successfully, no matter the age, no matter the physical limitations or injury, and we were all in it together. The workouts seemed to get easier, not in actuality, but because I was becoming stronger and more fit. Don't get me wrong - they're still a challenge! The program works because it is so supportive and encouraging - and the personal trainers care and keep you accountable. On my own or at a traditional gym, I would not have stuck with it or seen the results I got. I am excited about my progress in a mere 6 weeks, and will continue beyond the challenge. Many thanks to Tina, who has an infectious smile and energy that she shares with everyone; Tanisha, who is fierce and strong and pushes us to do more; Brent, who never failed to notice when I needed personal encouragement and would stay with me when I didn't think I could continue; Lonnie, who is ridiculously upbeat and makes every workout so much fun; and Justin, for pushing us to try harder. I wholeheartedly recommend Squad Fitness.

name: Kristen Marquardt
text: I just completes the Drop 20 challenge at Squad Fitness. Let me just say when I started I was overweight, tired, and hated the way my body looked. I went the orientation and thought there is no way I can work this program into my life. I work twelve hour shift in a busy WE, and thought I wouldn't be able to stick to my diet. I sat in that orientation and cried because I thought I would never be able to lose the weight. Then I thought to myself if you want it that much you have to take the first step. Let me tell you it's the best thing I have done for myself in a long while. The trainers kept me.motivated and gave me good advice. The support from friends, family, and coworkers has been amazing! I lost 20.6 lbs in just under 6 weeks! I feel amazing!! People seriously either don't recognize me when they see me or are amazed at my progress. Everyone wants to know how I did it. I did it with my squad! I'm staying at this gym, I love the energy and the family atmosphere. It's not easy, but it's so worth it and Tina Wicker and the staff are there every step of the way!

name: sekia nurse
text: Taking the drop 20 challenge at squad fitness has been a blessing to me.  The trainers pushed me to a place I have not seen myself in years! Yes! It was hard, but the trainers never gave up on me, and helped me to realize I could accomplish my weight loss goals.  Every time I left the gym, I felt more encouraged and motivated because of the support I received from the trainers.  If you are looking to make a lifestyle change and need better direction with a great program with positive, knowledgeable, involved trainers in your corner, I definitely would recommend you join Squad Fitness! You will not be disappointed with the results!

name: Susanna Dunlap
text: Squad Fitness has changed my life! I knew I needed to be exercising and implementing healthy eating habits to optimize my overall health but I kept giving myself excuse after excuse after excuse (time, money, school work, household responsibilities, family crises). I was depressed, anxious, overweight and stressed. Thank God a friend introduced me to Squad Fitness! I received the positive reinforcement, nutrition & fitness coaching and motivation I needed to get my health into order! After several weeks of routine working out, I was able to collaborate with my family doctor to discontinue an antidepressant I had been on for 3 years. Not only have I lost weight, but I've built muscle, improved my metabolism, found a non-pharmaceutical way to manage my anxiety and depression and to top it all off---I have made wonderful friends in the process. If you have the opportunity to join Squad Fitness, do it. No more excuses. Find a way to make the change! The workouts are upbeat, challenging and different each day! You will love yourself for it! Squad Strong!

name: Donna Cooper
text: 6 weeks ago I signed up for "The Drop 20 Challenge".  I was scared I wouldn't be able to do it, but I DID!!! I am so very happy with the results!  The trainers are ALL amazing!!  They are so supportive, full of energy, they get right in there with you and help push you that extra mile. They are so knowledgeable and they have become a special part of my life.  I feel so good and have so much more energy! I Remember when I started I couldn't hardly do the warm up exercises and now I can without struggling.  If you you are worried about not being able to do this because you have neck, knee or any other trouble, don't.  I have neck problems and they have modified the exercises so I was able to do them and now my neck is stronger and I no longer have to modify them.  This has been such an accomplishment for me and how I feel about myself.  I am so proud  that I did this!!  Thank you Squad Fitness!!!

name: Arkeylah Hardy
text: The level of professionalism and expertise was totally refreshing. All the trainers were very positive and motivating.  The workout was very challenging but the trainers at Squad Fitness helped me get through them and monitored everyone to make sure they were doing them properly.  Squad Fitness also provides nutrition guidance to help with my healthy lifestyle change. The way the trainers interact with their clients, you can tell they really truly cared about your progress and they push you in a good way.  They were their when I had a questions or problems. I highly recommend Squad Fitness because they are the complete package. Thank You Squad Fitness!!!!

name: Ehrrensmommy
text: Started out with the 6 week challenge and now very excited to see what the next chapter at Squad Fitness holds.  The work outs are very intense but no day is ever the same.  Unlike most gyms you have to figure out what to do today.  What to work out on and how much or how many reps.  Not here!!  Show up and show out is all you need to do!!  The staff inspire you the members work hand in hand pushing each other to a successful work out. All of the coaches have pushed me to a better me.  Brent, Justin, Marie, Lonnie and holding it all together Ms. Tina.

name: Ashley Wilson
text: When I signed up for the drop 20 challenge I was tired of not fitting in my clothes lacked the energy and motivation to do anything about it. Doing the drop 20 challenge was one of the best decisions I have made in a long time. No, it wasn’t easy, especially when there are all types of sweets and taco mama night at work, but it was doable. The trainers are amazing, encouraging, and will push you to do your best. They want to see you succeed. I may not have lost the 20 pounds, but I can tell such a difference in my body and energy level and can actually climb a flight of stairs and not be out of breath when I get to the top. This program has given me a great foundation and I will continue to live a healthy lifestyle from here on. I will be going back to Squad Fitness to workout in the near future. Thank you Squad Fitness!!

name: Brittany Jacobs
text: This place is not your ordinary gym. The exercises aren’t the typical routines you’d do at the gym. The trainers really care about you reaching your fitness goals and they learn your name fast. They push us and even if we dread getting to the facility, every workout becomes my favorite one after we finish it. I highly recommend doing the challenge or joining this gym. The trainers know how to help you get where you want to be.

name: Salena Gibbs
text: Squad Fitness has been transformational in getting my life and it’s choices back on track. Often times, we get comfortable in life and the pounds start packing on. This challenge was just what I needed to get back on the bandwagon of a healthier lifestyle. The trainers are encouraging and participate in helping you to meet your goals. The workouts are always changing, giving you a wide variety of exercises. I have met several great people at the squad, in Huntsville, Alabama. It’s comforting to know there are many of us with common goals. I also appreciated that this wasn’t a bunch of “skinny” people, but one of “Normal” people....so it is easy to feel at home. If I can do it, so can you!! -22.2lbs in 6 weeks

name: Marie Broussard
text: I cannot say enough good things about Squad Fitness Huntsville! It gave me a new desire to be a better version of myself when I needed it the most! The trainers, management, workouts, meal plan and especially the new friends and sense of community are more than I could have ever imagined. I have never been a member of any gym before, and have always worked out at home, so this was so far outside of my comfort zone, but that’s where life happens and I knew that it was going to be an amazing experience.  If you feel like you need just a positive change in your life this is definitely the place to go. This is only the beginning of my journey with Squad and I am so excited about what the future holds. LOVE my SQUAD. #squadstrong

name: Mallory Dotson
text: After completing the Drop 20 challenge, all I can say is wow! I wasn't seeing the big difference that others were telling me they saw, until I actually saw my before and after pictures. This is a great place to go to get fit. I need that push and someone there to tell me to go harder when I want to stop. They make it fun and even though I didn't want to go some days, I'm always happy I did after a good workout. The trainers are great! The atmosphere is great and I know I'm going to look even better in the coming months! So glad I took a chance on this and I am on my way to getting my body back.

name: Jessica Foster
text: I could not be more thankful for the experience I have had with Squad Fitness and the drop 20 challenge. Six weeks ago I had no idea how much your life could change in just a month and a half  and now I am blown away. Squad fitness was so much more than a gym it became a lifestyle and the amazing trainers became my fitness family. They were encouraging but demanding and always pushed me to give just a little more than I thought could. Armed with the knowledge, tools and leadership I not only met my challenge but surpassed it and now I know that I can continue on this path to a healthier, stronger me! Thank you Squad Fitness for helping me learn to be the best version of myself.

name: Candace Campbell
text: Went in as a drop in. The class was a good balance for a boot camp feel. Only reason it's not 5 stars is because I felt the coaches could have been a little more hands on. I come from the CrossFit world so I'm use to coaches helping you the entire workout and cheering you on

name: Mendy Pierce
text:
I participated in the Drop 20 challenge through Squad Fitness, and people keep asking me about my experience, well here it is.
I seriously LOVED it!  The difference for me between this time trying to lose my weight (Yes, I lost 23.6 pounds) and previous attempts was the people. First, the trainers are incredible!  They are always there to encourage you, to help you get the most out of your workout by making certain you are doing the exercises correctly, to offer diet advice, or whatever else you can think of. Second, you build relationships with other Squad members. I may only see these people at the gym, but they were all a part of me reaching my goal. I never thought that exercise could be an experience like this, and am 100% glad that I did it.

name: Kelly McClurg
text: I love squad fitness! It's a boot camp style workout with great coaches. As other posters have mentioned it is not an HVAC facility, as most of these types of gyms. They do try to keep their clients happy and comfortable in the summer heat and have just installed misting fans. I was never a challenger, so this review was not required or endorsed by squad fitness. They offer a wider variety of class times than some other similar gyms in the area, and do not require a contract. If you do the workouts and eat right you will see results!

name: Bill Baird
text: As a very shy and introverted person I was very hesitant to join the Drop 20 Challenge.After six weeks I feel I have really come out of my shell and I am now able to handle myself in social situations. I am stronger mentally and physically, more confident and a healthier, happier person all around since I started. Being here with my coaches and friends is the best part of my day. I'm always looking forward to the next WOD and enjoy looking back to see how far I’ve come. I would highly recommend the program to anyone wishing to lose weight or just hang around with other sweaty people

name: Susan Jackson
text:
I participated in a 6 WEEK challenge call Drop 20 at Squad Fitness
Was it hard? Yes
Was it worth it? Yes Yes YES!!!!
I was having so much trouble losing any weight using more traditional diet plans. This really worked for me. The first week I had to practically crawl out of the gym but by the second week I could already tell a huge difference in my abilities. By week 6 I felt amazed at how much I had grown in strength and endurance.
The trainers are a huge asset!!  They push when you want to give up and they celebrate ALL your victories- not just your weight loss.

This program gave me the incentive I needed to commit, get serious, and get active as well as a guided plan that maximized my success.

name: Erin Rassier
text: I just completed the 6 Week Drop 20 Challenge. I did not expect working out to be so much fun. The trainers are great and there to help you through the workouts whether they are pushing you, helping you modify moves, or helping you with motivation. The group environment is great, I loved being with a group of people all working toward the same goal. And I got results! I am sticking with Romen, Tina and the trainers at Squad Fitness to help me reach my fitness goals.

name: mikestanley Stanley
text: The drop 20 challenge is worth all of the hard work. It is not easy but nothing worth doing ever is. It is very team oriented, you work out with other challengers and the trainers are there for encouragement and to make sure you pushing yourself. Other challengers will encourage and push you too and will push them. You will be sore the first week but it gets better as your body gets use to working out. The diet is not bad. I never got hungry. It is well worth the time and money invested even if you don't lose the whole 20 pounds. You will still feel great because you will have at least gone down a couple of pants sizes and made it 6 weeks of working out. I would highly recommend it to any wanting to make themself healthier whether you need to lose weight or not.

name: Tracy Balke
text: This was the most amazing experience! The trainers were so helpful and by your side the whole time. I found my love of fitness again and I would highly recommend this for anyone regardless of your fitness level.

name: Donia Booth
text: Squad Fitness Drop 20 Challenge was just the thing I needed to jump start my weight loss journey.  The first workout was so hard and it hurt but I got stronger everyday.  The trainers are great!!!!!  They support you and help you achieve your goals.  All the challengers encouraged and celebrated with each other.  I feel so much better and I know that I will be all that I can be with Squad Fitness help.  If you want to make a change in you body and life then come and join us in our journey......We can do this!!!!!!!!!

name: Stevie Saccuzzo
text:
When I showed up for my Drop 20 Challenge Orientation, I was desperate. I had such a drive to lose weight, but wasn't quite sure where to start. 20 minutes into the orientation I knew that this is what I needed to get my life back in order.

I signed up for the challenge that very  night. After leaving orientation, I drove over to my old gym and cancelled my membership.

I haven't looked back since.

If you are ready to shred inches, lose pounds, gain friends and even a few muscles, then squad fitness is for you! Come join our squad! You won’t be disappointed!

name: Adana Wilson
text: This experience has taught me a lot about myself and my new found commitment to a healthier lifestyle. Often times, challenges/stress have both been my downfall. I realized that if I commit to a healthier lifestyle, even though I may be stressed, I know that my physical body is being nourished back to normal. Squad fitness encouraged me to have an optimistic point of view and provided an atmosphere of inspiration for working out my total body. The workout plan and the diet plan helped me choose the healthier foods and portions for my food. Although I did not lose 20lbs, I immediately see results especially in inches. This experience will never be forgotten, and I encourage anyone who needs a boost to a healthier lifestyle, should most definitely consider Squad Fitness as their place of choice.

name: Josh Sons
text: This is really a great program!  The atmosphere is very positive and you can have fun while also getting in work!  It is nice to have trainers on hand that are very helpful in making sure you are doing the exercises correctly!  It doesn’t matter if you are a novice or a seasoned professional in terms of fitness, this program is something that can appeal to and benefit everyone!  It is very convenient as there are many times throughout the day to accommodate most anyone’s schedule!  They give you the blueprint for success, all you have to do is be committed and follow it!  If you are tired of saying I need to get in shape, loose weight, etc., then you might want to get in touch with Roman or Tina and get your spot reserved now!!

name: Shay
text: When I first started the challenge I wanted a jump start in working out and on a healthier eating plan. A year ago I had a abdominal hernia surgery and u was scared to get back into working out without  straining my body. I expressed my concerns to my big sister and she told me about a the drop 20 challenge. Once I did my research and went to the orientation I was sold. I was entering the Drop  20 challenge. Now, being an on-track  runner I know different routines but working out with Squad fitness took me back to those glory days. They taught me how to control what I eat and how to properly workout using heavy weights. The family we have become is not like another. We depended on each other, cry together, laugh together and lift together! There is no other way to go! So I’m proud to say that I am sticking with Squad fitness to continue to fit journey.

name: Stephanie Marlar
text: When I started this journey with Squad Fitness I had no idea where it would end. Well let me tell you something this journey is not going to end. I have never gotten this kind of results from any other gym or exercise group that I have ever been a member of. I have not only lost 17.2 pounds but I have gained self confidence in myself. With the guidance of all of the coaches I have pushed myself further than ever before. I have built muscle in places that I didn’t even know that I had muscles. The friendships that I have formed during this challenge are amazing. These friends have encouraged me to keep going and to push through my walls.

name: Wilson Sullivan
text: They said "you will lose 25 lbs in 6 weeks if you do what we tell you". I lost 28.3. They said "we have exercises for people with health problems, don't worry you will still lose weight". I have disc and knee problems and if I knew about a different way, their way to exercise when I was younger I wouldn't walk around all broken down now. They provide the instruction, you just have to show up. Its serious exercise with a social aspect. They provide accountability, unlike all those big gyms that just want your money (the big gym never cared if you slept in or ate your feelings). Pass on this and you might still change your health or fitness. Get up and go down there and you definitely will.

name: cr reid
text: I decided to join my wife in the drop 20 challenge so we could push each other and make it a competition between the two of us. Before the challenge, it had been several years since I exercised/worked out. I must say the first week kicked my butt. Now, 6 weeks later (and 31 pounds lighter) I can tell a major difference in my stamina. The trainers are incredible and definitely pushed me to my max. This challenge gave me a great foundation and tools to start a new healthy lifestyle. Thank you to all the trainers and I will be working out at Squad Fitness again.

name: Candye Reid
text: If you are serious about getting healthy and in shape this is the place for you! I just finished the drop 20 challenge and it was the best experience I have ever had with any gym I have been to! The instructors are amazing as is the owner! If you get the chance to participate in their challenge please do it!! You will not be sorry!

name: Jeremy Self
text: These folks are top notch. I was so out of shape when I started it was embarrassing. I desperately needed help and Squad was the help I needed. The workouts are designed to fit everyone’s abilities. If you’re reading this and looking for help with your fitness or weight loss I urge you to show up and work out with us. Every single person I’ve met in this program has transformed their bodies. The weight loss is just the beginning. My testosterone levels are through the roof. I caught my self growling at the TV the other day. My wife couldn’t be happier with my new lifestyle. Squad was an answered prayer. God bless these folks.

name: Shean Polony
text: I recently completed the drop 20 challenge at Squad Fitness Huntsville. I lost more than the 20 and could not be more pleased with the results. I am very pleased with their services and it was nothing short of amazing being able to see myself as well as other participants being physically morphed. The trainers are very supportive and it made all the difference. They were also able to provide dietary assistance. The things I learned with squad fitness are things that I will take with me forever. This was my first experience with this type of gym and it far exceeded my expectations. Give these guys a try, you won’t regret it!

name: Mark Jackson
text: Years ago, I was physically active, but in the last ten or so years, I had allowed myself to become inactive. As a result, my weight jumped up and I was out of shape. I joined the Drop 20 challenge in hopes of getting both of these under control. It was more successful than I could have imagined. I am down to a weight that I have not seen in over 20 years, and I feel in better physical shape than I have felt in a long time. The trainers for each of the workouts seemed to really care about our overall well-being, pushing us hard but modifying the workout for any physical problems that someone may have. But always to get the most out of it. After I almost had to crawl to my car following the second workout, by the end of the six weeks, I felt really good:  exhausted but good. Thanks Squad Fitness.

name: Brandie Moore
text: Awesome, personable attentive and motivated trainers. They actually listen to you and help you instead of get in your face for no reason. They are good support and great with pushing you to your goals.

name: Soujanya Thummathati
text: Great place to begin your transformation. Amazing trainers who know you well, and never give up on you. Best trainers I had ever!!

name: Alex Aparicio
text: The drop 20 challenge is a really great program with incredible trainers that know how to push you and give you the motivation you need. They always made sure we were doing the workouts correctly and helped us when we needed it. The atmosphere is really positive and the workouts are always fun and challenging. We were also giving insructions with a meal plan, that was really simple to follow. With the right dedication anyone can be successful and complete the challenge. The classes are available throughout the day to fit anyone's busy schedule. I'm so happy that I made the decision to do the challenge because it gave me the right tools to be successful and lose 26 lbs in the 6 weeks. I recommend this program to Everyone. Thanks Squad fitness!

name: J Rizo
text: Let me start off by saying, I was very skeptical in the meal plan and workout in this program. I ended up diving in because I was ready to make a change in my life and plus a friend from work was ready also. He was signing up and so was I. I am so glad I did, the workouts are tough but fun and energizing. Reminded me of football two a days in high school. The coach's were always excited to be here and train us to our greatest potential. They are all friendly, and even if asked the same question multiple times, they are more than glad to answer. Squad is the place to be if you want to get you health, fitness, and life on track. Just Follow the Damn Instructions and you will see results! If you ever want to know more details just ask me about it, I could go on for hours!

name: Nathan Cooper
text:
An amazing experience!!
If you are stuck in the day to day rut of life and need a change I highly recommend Squad Fitness!  Step out of your comfort zone and do something for yourself! Something to better yourself! This is not your normal gym.  This is a place of motivated people, working hard to achieve goals! No excuses, complaining or whining, show up and work your hardest at every excercise they ask you to do!  The results will speak for themselves!
Romen, Tina and the rest of the Squad Fitness Huntsville trainers will support, motivate and most importantly hold you accountable for everything you do!
10/10 I would recommend this to anyone that would listen!

name: Jennifer Anderson
text: I did not like the way I felt (no energy) or the way I looked (no curves left, double chin, heavy face, thighs practically pushing against each other ;( ). I knew I needed to work out & eat better but I knew I couldn't just "go workout", I had not idea what I was doing. Then I saw the ad on facebook about the Drop 20 Challenge & it was an answered prayer. THIS is what I needed, motivation, knowledgeable trainers, & good complete body workouts! 6 weeks later I'm fitting into jeans I haven't worn in years, wearing slim fitting shirts, I"VE GOT MY CURVES BACK :)! My face is slimmed down again & I only have 1 chin; WIN! This challenge isn't the end of my working out, I'll be back at Squad Fitness to continue to maintain what I've gained!

name: Mary Duskin
text: I first learned about Squad Fitness from an advertisement I saw on Facebook. It was for a 6 week 20 lb. challenge. I went to the orientation, not expecting to join that day, but I signed up. I went by myself and wanted to see if I could do this without having to get someone I know to do it with me. After the 1st week. I literally could barely walk on that Saturday. I was ready to quit, but I didn't. The coaches were all very motivating and pushed me to do my best. This challenge was exactly what I needed to get me started on my journey to being "Fit by Fifty". If you are ready to get fit and have fun at the same time, I highly recommend Squad Fitness to get you going!

name: Ashley Mcclendon
text: This program was nothing but amazing the trainers keep u on track n motivated.6 weeks ago i decided to take this challenge and i must say i never felt better i make better eating choices,i have lots of energy now ,and feel great 👍🏽.

name: Oppa 1004
text:
It's really fun and all the trainers are really nice
They got really unique work outs I really enjoyed my time there and i met a lot of new friends I really recommend this gym to other

name: Vince Hines
text: What a difference 6 weeks makes! Squad Fitness' Drop 20 challenge is no joke. Having gone into the program cold and not knowing anyone who had tried it before, I had my doubts about how it would work for me. I’ve been a pretty big guy for most of my life and have gone through a lot of the typical ups and downs that most people go through when trying to hit and maintain a healthy weight. Fortunately, any doubts I had were crushed due to the excellent Squad Fitness Trainers and a group of fellow challengers (of all different walks of life and levels of fitness mind you) who are right there doing the work, sweating, getting stronger, and losing weight with you! By challenge end, I had met my goal and I plan to lose even more and keep it off. The Drop 20 challenge is no joke. HOWEVER,  if you follow the instructions, listen to the trainers, and bring yourself into it with a positive mental attitude, there is no reason you won’t succeed!

name: Jeri Barnes
text:
I had kept telling myself I needed to do something. I was continuing to gaining weight. I was actually paying for a gym membership, but I wasn’t going. I was just making excuses. For example, I need a trainer to work with me and someone/something to keep me motivated. I guess God got tired of hearing my excuses because I saw the Facebook post for the DROP 20 CHALLENGE. I signed up for it. SQUAD FITNESS and the DROP 20 CHALLENGE was a godsend.

On the first day, I realized what I had in store for the next 6 weeks. I was up for the challenge. During the Challenge, there were people at all fitness levels. But, I can honestly say, this was a No Judgement Zone. The TRAINERS and Participants were always there and kept everyone motivated.

Each day, the Work Out of the Day, was something different. You never did the same daily routine twice. I really looked forward to them each workout. Some of the exercises were difficult. I could barely finish them. Now, I can tell a big difference in my progress. I am so proud of myself. Currently, I have only lost about 17 pounds. I may not meet the 20 pound challenge. If I don't, I can now fit in clothes that I had not worn in a while. I have more confidence in myself. I will continue to use all the training that I received during the challenge.

If you are deciding to take the challenge, I would highly recommend it to anyone.

name: Allison Jackson
text:
Like others have posted I wasn't sure 20#s in 6 weeks was possible..for me. I lost only 5 lbs, however the inches off my waistline, thighs and arms mean more to me than numbers on a scale.. The trainers are dedicated, motivated and truly want to see their SQUAD succeed. If you show up, you will get a work out .. If you FTDI (follow the D@mn Instructions) you will see results. Questions they have the answers. With a class schedule to accommodate any schedule, you wont be disappointed. You will be challenged, and you will find comradery to get you through the workouts.  Meal delivery is also available for those who struggle with meal planning. YOU WONT BE STARVING.. No gimmicks, no shortcuts.. Just great workouts and easy to follow instructions
#drop20challenge #squadfitnessHuntsville

name: Barbara Seavers
text: Squad Fitness, wow I was ready, I mean really ready to do something about my health.  The Drop 20 Challenge popped up on my FB feed. I responded and wow, 6 weeks later I'm done 20 lbs!!!  So super excited.  With the professional trainers beside us every step of the way.  They are there answering all my questions.; Failure is not an option.  A nutrition plan as well; this is an overall healthy plan.  I am excited to continue on with their program.  I have a few more lbs to get me to my ultimate goal.  They have you covered. Thanks Romen for bringing your program to Huntsville!! F.T.D.I.

name: Sharon Gillard
text:
The Drop 20 Challenge  was a true blessing for me. I am going to be a grandmother in less than a month now!! Can't wait😄😄 I plan to take her hiking and camping and all kinds of exploring. So thanks to Squad Fitness I am on my way to being a fit Sha Sha ( my chosen GrandMa name).
This has been the hardest 6 weeks but the most rewarding!!
I plan to continue with Squad Fitness to reach my final goal. I would challenge anyone who wants to get in shape to check it out😊. The trainers are amazing and the workouts are always different.
I exceeded my Challenge goal!!! I lost 24.2 pounds😊😊😊

name: Tammi Cochran
text:
I originally joined as a jump start t losing weight for myself but most importantly because my friend Tonejelynn Baldwin wanted an accountability partner.  That first day was very had and I wondered what I had gotten myself involved in.  To go from a couch potato to full blown cross-fit workout was intense and challenging but I hung in there.  Each day/week, I felt better and stronger.  I really just kept my eyes on the prize and before long on Week 5, I reached the Drop20Challenge goal by losing 21 lbs. The trainers were awesome, Parker, Lonnie, Chris, Justin and Romen.  The workouts are intentional and focused on intense cardio and getting heart rate up.  My final results as of November 12th was 27 lbs weight loss over 6 weeks and I couldn’t be more ecstatic about the results and  Squad Fitness Huntsville!
#KilledTheDrop20Challenge
#SquadFitnessRocks
#ITrustedTheProcess
#CrushedIt

name: Jamia Tyler
text: It’s weigh day!! Final weight loss 27.7 pounds!!! Thank you God!!Starting this challenge, I was overweight, unsatisfied, and slightly depressed. I knew I had to change my eating habits because my life depended on it. Diabetes and hypertension are huge health concerns attached to my bloodline. I refuse to allow those diseases to hinder me in life! I decided to take action! I’m so thankful for Squad Fitness for pushing beyond what I thought I was capable of achieving! The trainers are so awesome and the meal plan works! I didn’t deprive myself of eating, I just learned how to eat healthier. I learned how different foods break down in my digestive system. The owner Romen, has created a family friendly awesome environment to challenge and motivate you to reach your goals! I’m staying on as a member with Squad Fitness because this challenged literally changed my life!!! I recommend this challenge if you are ready to jumpstart your healthy lifestyle journey!

name: Yvonne Harris
text:
My goodness lovely people I'm getting around..So here i am yep a fitness boot camp at my age ok.
I started 3 weeks ago 5 days a week. Do you know what😰 . Where's my mother omg . lol look im 69 and was pleased with doing me you know. Set in your ways no one to complain about anything , you do as you please 24/7. Well i looked in the mirror and all i can say is these Trainer's are killing it over here. Yes im still here and loving the strength training even though every day is something new on the board you get what you put into it. And they see to it for everyone. So lookup Groupon and start saving for a fitter better you . So glad i did for myself👼

name: Mike G.
text:
Back before December, I heard that one of the voice actors I cosplay a character as will be at a convention I attend. Because of this, I had to get back into the shape I was before I .... for a lack of a better word, got lazy. Oh, I still lifted but cardio kinda took a back seat and dieting became just watching calories without caring about what I ate which did hurt me.

I just happened to see this challenge on a FB feed and thought, why not? Maybe, they can start getting my cardio back.

Oh, it came back alright. So much so that I'm ready to start obstacle course racing again and set to be in shape by May for that convention.

Trainers are fun and are willing to help whenever and wherever. They will even taunt YOU into giving it more than 100 percent to get more out of you which in my opinion is the best thing you can do to a person. Being nice does JACK anymore. Get into their face and test their pride. The fact that it was done to me constantly pushed this to a 5 star.

Hint: If you've exercised before... taunt the trainers a little. Like say "this is too easy." You will become their project. *grins* Very confident that added focus allowed for even better results that expected.

name: Felecia Holifield
text:
Drop 20 6 weeks Challenge was amazing. I signed up for this challenge via fb as I needed to get this weight gain under control. I kept saying if I could find some "motivation" or get   a "jumpstart" to get me going. Let me tell you....I am so thankful that I joined. EVERYTHING I needed was there : motivation, accountability, healthy eating plan, and PERSONAL Trainers were all included. I didn't know if I was going to be able to stick to it, as I was already looking for excuses to quit but to my surprise I enjoyed it and looked forward to each WOD. The workouts were different each day. I was challenged and pushed each day but surprisingly it was Fun! I never knew sweating could feel so good and be so energizing. I met some great people of all fitness level who encouraged , motivated and pushed me every week. The training staff is amazing and supportive. I highly recommend Drop 20 Huntsville  😁

I shared all of this to say Drop 20 challenge has been the jumpstart I needed. I am please to say I've completed the challenged and lost 24.6 lbs in 6 weeks🎉🎉🎉🎉 and I look forward to a healthier me in 2018.

name: Kynae Stewart
text: These past six weeks have been the most fun I’ve had in a long time while completing the Drop 20 Challenge Huntsville. When I started this challenge, weight lost wasn’t  my number one goal. I missed being active and being in an athletic environment. However, I am super proud of myself for dropping almost 19 lbs! This program has literally been life changing for me. The fitness aspect of the program challenged me physically motivating me to push my limits. Even though at first it was quite the adjustment, I began to look forward to most of the workouts. I look at what I was able to do compared to now and there is no better feeling! The nutritional portion for me is what was most impactful. You literally are what you eat. When I started following the instructions of the meal plans my body literally transformed inside and out.  I can’t thank all of the awesome trainers (Marie Broussard Justin Cabaniss Lonnie Key Crenshaw Brent) atSquad Fitness Huntsvillee enough for being so awesome in their own unique way.  Tina Wicker is an AMAZING motivator and nutritionist. If you are looking for a fresh start on your fitness journey PLEASE do. If you are afraid or apprehensive about getting back in shape you have found the right team. ALL of the staff are super supportive and helpful. Thanks Roman for bringing this to our area!!

name: Laneka Harris
text: This place and people are great! I lost the weight and feel great! I have learned how to live and eat right in this program. I would recommend squad fitness to anyone looking to improve their way of life. The eating plan is real strick but definitley achievable. The exercises were hard but rewarding. I have more energy now than i have ever had in my life. When i started the program i was prediabetic with high blood pressure which has now all vanished. This program is one i stand by and with to promote. This is a decision that im glad i made and would do all over again. Not only have it transformed my eating habits and body, it has also be mind transforming as well.

name: Levi Macedo
text: Fun love to work out great  awsome trainers

name: stephanie mott
text:
My 6 week challenge with Squad Fitness has come to an end.  This has been the hardest and most challenging, but best, 6 weeks of my life.  During this time I have learned to eat to live  and not live to eat. For the most part, I now measure all my food. Portion control has been the key to my weight loss during this journey. It was vey simple, I didn't have to worry about counting points, calories, nor fat. This challenge has made me realize that I can survive without eating "sweets", who would have known...lol. Overall, I have noticed a difference in how I feel.

Moving on to the second part of the challege... exercise.  The boot camps were awesome.  I actually enjoyed every session,  because each one was different. All the coaches were great motivators.  They were very attentive and encouraged you to push harder,  when they knew you could do more.   Since starting boot camp. I can definitely see a difference in my strength.

Last, the third part of the challenge...adequate intake of water. Prior to the challenge, I was mainly drinking water.  However,  I was not drinking enough.  The challenge has encouraged me to drink more water.  As we know,  adequate fluid intake assists with weight loss.

I say "Thank You" Squad Fitness coaches for believing in us and pushing when we wanted to give up, especially when it came to burpees and snail crawl! I am looking forward to more workouts with the Squad Fitness Coaches.

Stephanie

name: Byron Hughes
text:
Thanks to Squad Fitness I have started a new journey in life. On November 6th I went to the first workout of the Drop 20 Challenge thinking what have I got myself into, it turned out to be one of the best decisions I’ve made in my life. All the trainers are great motivators, they work with you to modify routines if you have trouble doing them. The workouts are challenging and effective,  no workout is the same.  Since starting this challenge I’ve changed my eating habits and I feel better than I have in years.  I’ve lost inches and 25 pounds so far and feel amazing.  I was taking a high dose blood pressure medication and no longer need it or the mouth guard I wore nightly for snoring.  Working out with all the other challengers has been inspirational also, we all push each other to do our best.  If you’re looking to make a positive change in your life, join Squad Fitness today.

Thanks to all these great trainers: Crenshaw Brent, Justin Cabaniss, Lonnie Key, Tanisha DeShay Arseneau & Tina Wicker, also thanks to Roman McDonald for bringing Squad Fitness to Huntsville and getting me started on a healthy new lifestyle.

name: Melanie Carr
text: November 6th 2017 was my first workout in the Drop20 Challenge Huntsville! I realized very quickly how out of shape I was as I struggled through that first workout but I was determined. Four weeks in the program, I injured my ankle / heal during a workout after which I limped out of the gym and could barely walk for several days but as I was leaving that morning I told everyone that was not going to stop me, I was going to meet my goal and continue to workout.  I faced yet another obsticale...Thanksgiving, but I did not let that derail me either...the Squad staff and trainers help me to stay focused and i lost 2 pounds that week. During my last workout of the challenge, I could not help but reflect back to that first workout, a meer 6 weeks ago....the exercises were so hard then but now, they are easier...challenging yes but that's because I am in better shape and stronger so just basic actions like getting up off the floor or climbing steps are much easier. I still have a long way to go but I have learned its a lifestyle not a quick fix or a simple diet. I highly recommend this program for anyone wanting to make a life change! The Squad is very support, no one judges anyone, everyone is on the same mission...to get healthy and loose weight! Definitely no gym lunks here!

name: Keema Dukes
text:
Wow! 6 weeks of the Drop 20 Challenge is over. It was HARD WORK, DEDICATION, NOT QUITTING. I wanted to quit several times, but I perservered through them all the obstacles. The trainers are with you every step of the way. Motivating and pushing you to your goals!! I really needed that. I am used to working out by myself, but having the trainers there, correcting, leading and guiding you along the way has made this challenge bareable.

I will admit, I was skeptical of how I would lose 20 pounds in just  6 weeks. In the past, I had  been consistently working out 4-6 times a week, following a workout plan and eating semi-clean. I felt like the body results I wanted did not match up to my hardwork in the gym. I felt like I could "work off" all the sugar and carbs and be okay. Not true.
SQUAD FITNESS has a meal plan that is strict in what you are allowed to eat for the 6 weeks and it will WORK as long as you Follow The Instructions!! The Workouts were different every day so I was never bored. I got stronger and I started seeing a difference in my body by week 3.
Thank you Squad Fitness Staff and Trainers for making this Bootcamp enjoyable and for helping me get the results I was hoping for!!

Keema

name: Justin Squad Fitness Huntsville
text: Amazing facility knowledgeable staff!!!

name: Myli Kelsey
text: Great atmosphere and amazing coaches.

name: Autumn Valine
text: I absoutly love Squad Fitness Huntsville and the trainers!

name: C Y
text: Get ready for a serious workout!

name: Brent Van Zandbergen
text:
Centerline Fitness is a top-notch personal training and group-class fitness  facility that takes your health and safety seriously.  The coaches are certified experts at helping you meet your fitness goals - whether athletic training, job performance, or overall fitness.  I have personally exceeded all of my expectations and personal goals from when I first walked in the door and am amazed at what I've been able to accomplish from week to week and having fun in the process!

Injury avoidance was a key concern of mine when starting a fitness program "at zero" from years of a sedentary lifestyle.  The coaches have been amazing at demonstrating and reinforcing proper technique and have adjusted exercises and even complete programs to accommodate limitations I had when first walking in the door while also guiding me to overcome those limitations through their programming.

By far the best investment I've ever made in myself that has immediate and long-term benefits for my overall well-being.

resp.text: What a great client to work with! Thanks for the kind words, Brent!

name: Chris Dufrene
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed my experience this far. It's a great workout. The training team are super responsive to your individual needs. When you walk out after your workout, you know you've put in work. Kudos Centerline!

resp.text: You were truly a joy to have in our challenge and inspired everyone else to keep motivated. We're so happy you enjoyed the challenge, and you're welcome here any time, my friend. Thank you for the review, Chris!

name: Benita Palmer
text: The best workouts that I've ever had in my life. I thoroughly enjoyed my six weeks with Centerline and I could see a huge difference in how I felt. Chris and the other coaches will set you up for success but it's up to you to stick to the diet and give your best efforts in the workouts. I love that the workouts were a mix of strength training, HIIT, abs and butt, and boxing (my favorite)...you will never get bored!

resp.text: You are so much fun to have in the gym and you crushed the 6-Week Challenge! You were one of the best in class 💪💥🥊💥 Thank you so much!

resp.text: That muscle tone! 💪💥 Proof that hard work and consistency pays off. We love having you here, Brandy! Thank you for being a part of our gym fam and for the great review!

name: Traci Badertscher

resp.text: She's the one to beat at the gym! Amazing goal-crushing crazy results! You owned this challenge, and we're so happy to have you as a part of our gym fam. Thank you, Traci!

text: Centerline Fitness is what I have been looking for! After my first class I was even more excited than before. Chris, the owner, knows what he's doing. I am stoked to see what all I will accomplish here!

name: Haven Melton
text: Don't believe the advertisement, of no commitment. There is a $25.00 cancellation fee and 30 day written notice. Don't even think about calling the store to cancelling the contract at the store by calling the number at the store. They will never return your call, which at that time you can never contact them over the phone. Not until I did some research through the 3rd party fee collector that I found out about the $25 cancellation fee and the written notice. If you able to contact the manager at this store he states that he has nothing to do with the billing and fees collected. That's between them. The 3rd party fee collector states that's between you and the manager of that business. Basically there is a no commitment, contrary to what they advertise. Read the fine print.

text: This is a great gym! I dropped in from out of town and as soon as I walked in I felt welcomed. Josh was a great coach. He was very patient and explained all of the movements is great detail. The owner Britt made me feel like I was back in my own Box. Next time I am in town I will definitely come back to Mobtown.

resp.text: Thanks John, enjoyed visiting with you. Look forward to seeing you again next time your in Mobile.

name: Sally Lambert
text: I cannot rave about MobTown CrossFit enough. The coaches and the facility are simply amazing. The coaches have worked with me in my efforts to lose weight. In my first year I lost 40lbs! The coaches push you to achieve more than you would ever expect! I joined MobTown to lose weight, but now I have different goals. I learned how exhilarating it is to lift weights, how thrilling it is to hit new PR's and to Rx a workout. This facility is amazing. Definitely give them a try!!

name: Martin Grem
text: Awesome box and great coaches and people. I dropped in here pretty regular thru 2018. Good solid WOD programming, clean gym, well supplied, but the best is the people. Britt is so friendly and most of the other long term members follow suit and go out of their way to help and encourage. I look forward to going to Mobile just so I can visit.

text: Mobtown CrossFit is a fantastic place to work out and meet great people. The coaches at Mobtown are extremely supportive of individual fitness goals and take time to explain new exercises; if you need additional help perfecting a movement, they will not hesitate to make time to assist you outside of class. Mobtown CrossFit is an the best option for fitness in the downtown Mobile area.

The Scrapyard outside is great for fresh air workouts. The best features, however are the people - Nehal and Robbie pay attention to all the details, make sure it stays clean, comfortable and organized and that members have what they need for THEIR workout. They have built a community atmosphere that is unique, authentic and awesome! So many great people workout there. Everybody “plays well together!”  I love it!!

resp.text: You hit the nail on the head. “Everybody plays well together.” It’s something else. Thank you for your kind words. See you at THE RAC.

text:
WOULD NOT recommend. Went to gym maybe three or four times. Was told I could try tanning beds out and see how I liked them before I committed myself. Well apparently the paper I signed, which I thought was a document for tanning / gym liability, was a contract. Gym wasn't clean. I have not been there since February 2020, COVID hit and besides that I wasn't planning to visit again anyways. They have been charging my account every since. I called several times and was told "well pay me for nine more months and you wont have to worry with it anymore"  and "well you wouldn't be paying for nothing if you came in here" Horrible customer service and rude staff. I was not satisfied with COSMOS prior to the charges and rude staff.

COMMENT FOLLOWING... Information comment from gym is inaccurate.

resp.text: Jessie is upset due to being told she still has 9 mo. Remaining on her 24 mo.contract that she signed. She informed us she didn't intend to pay & said to us place her in collections.

name: Daddy Kingslayer
text: When I lift at Cosmos I feel great. Lots of machine variety that supports any type of workout I want to do. I like to mix things up so I never plateau and Cosmos supports that. Plus, it's a friendly place to workout. Sometimes I do heavy bench and I never had a problem getting a spot. The clientele is very good about cleaning the equipment after each use which is nice in these trying times. Plus, they have pro wrestling guys coming in and out which is pretty cool. I love this gym.

name: Karen Harnden
text: I cannot say enough great things about Cosmos.  I love the variety of workout equipment they have to offer.  Its super clean with a positive work atmosphere.  The owner is amazing in helping with transactions, questions, concerns, and they make your fitness needs a priority.

name: Spencer Chisholm
text: Exactly what I expected! Every single piece of equipment you can imagine for every body part. They’ve got EVERYTHING here! Clean, top-notch quality. Anybody who loves fitness needs to be here. Cosmos is my gym for life!

name: Taylor Hendrix
text: I absolutely fell in love with this gym!! So many choices and options for free weights and machines, I ALWAYS have room and choices when I go to work out and lift. I appreciate the clean atmosphere and the respect everyone shows each other. This is definitely MY favorite gym! Please give it a try. 🙏🏼

name: Lynn Brand
text: Alot of equipment..kept very clean and staff are very helpful and kind!

name: bruisers and beasts
text: I've been to numerous gyms over the years.. but Cosmos is among the best!. tons of great equipment & it seems like they get new stuff pretty often.. place is super clean and very appealing to work out in.. wide range of clientele and the owner has personally made sure I have everything I need.. I would recommend it to anyone from the beginner to the most advanced training athlete..

name: Breanne Rodgers
text: There is a great connection between staff and customers! Customers openly talk to and joke with the owner. There is also every piece of equipment you could possibly need! Cosmos has a very friendly and personable environment, which is very important to me.

name: Ethan Hunter
text: I have been going to Cosmo’s for years and it’s the only gym I’ll go to. I’ve never had a problem with anyone here. The owner, Barry is always friendly and willing to help. And the gym is always kept clean. More than enough equipment as I have never had to wait for any machine or cardio equipment.

name: Patricia Kerins
text:
The gym itself is ok (some of the cardio equipment is wore out and some of the tanning beds are cracked or missing bulbs). My problem is I was continued to be charged even after mailing a letter stating I wished to cancel my membership (was told by the owner to do this after confirming that my 2 year contract was satisfied). Now I have to go through the hassle of calling my bank and put in a fraud report and stop payment so I won't be charged again. I'm sad... I really wanted this to be a good experience but other reviewers were right about shady business practices here :(
(Reply) purposefully confusing. I have my contract and don't see this "39 day cancelation clause". Sorry, my review stands. I hope you take my review as useful critique. Thanks

resp.text: Hey Patricia! We hope you are doing Great! Your final day on your Membership is 11/12/2020 as per 30 day cancellation letter that we received . As always have a fantastic day ma'am..looks like you overlooked the 30 day cancellation clause in the contract. It happens please feel free to contact us if any you have any concerns. God bless you ma'am!

text: Isn't it funny how several people have the same complaint about the sleezy business practices of this place,  and yet according to the owner it is always the customer's fault?  Dude if you are going to be a douche own it.  If you publish my son's financial information to a public website, as you have threatened to do,  you will be in violation of the Fair Credit Reporting and several other federal and state laws.   As a business owner I get it,  the customer is not always right,  but they are always the customer.   You should cut your losses, drink water, and drive on.  Btw it's here not hear.

resp.text: I just sent you a pm.Realtor Allen Steinhart @EXP realty ..now this is Sean's dad..feel free to call us @2568285646...as Sean said I'll talk bad about you & he has.

name: Steinhart
text: Signed up for the gym in 2018, and moved 600 miles away in February 2019. Repeatedly attempted to contact the owner via text and phone to no avail. I continued to pay the membership until February of 2020 to avoid collections, as I could not reach the owner. When I finally change my bank card, the owner sends my account to collections. I am a disabled veteran who will now have to deal with a collections agency in the middle of a pandemic.

resp.text: Sean is upset cause he didn't pay his bill & is in collections. He never cancelled nor informed anyone.cmon Sean tell the truth. I'll post your payment history to show nothing to hide here.

text: Love this place!! Lots of equipment and such a friendly staff!! There wasn’t any equipment I needed they didn’t have covered!

text: I rarely do reviews but this establishment has pushed me to the edge. Just dont go here! Not only are the facilities not up to par in comparison to other gyms, but you have to jump through hoops to end your membership even after your 2 yrs are up! He just continues billing you without a renewal. There must be some fine print on that contract!? Then once you jump through his hoops he will make it not effective for 30 days. He will wring every last penny out of you! I think it's terrible to take advantage of people that way especially when they have done what is right and completed their 2 year agreement with no questions asked!

Be careful of what you sign up for and be prepared to issue stop payments with your bank when you are ready to cancel.

text: Great facility. Went for a powerlifting competition with my wife. If we lived closer, I would certainly check them out for a membership. If you live in this area, give them solid consideration for a new stop on your fitness journey.

text: Great gym. Friendly staff and well thought out program. Huge focus on form and training safely. Lots of the best equipment here and overall a good place to train. Really happy I am working out here

name: Melissa Fowler
text: I absolutely love 9Round!  The staff is great and you get an intense workout within 30 minutes.  Everyday is a new circuit.  The trained staff pushes your workouts based on your capabilities. Flexible hours that work around your schedule.  I would strongly recommend!!

name: I. Janeen Taylor
text: I love attending 9Round because of the diverse workouts and the encouraging couching. I have never felt more stronger. Their suggestions regarding, form and posture goes farther than simply working out.  Their positive attitudes carry over patrons. Well worth attending!

name: Shannon Powell Stahl (Shannon)
text: My galpal & I went. We normally workout at home with our business's virtual gym & we coach for a living. This was something new & exciting to get into. Was fast, simple to pick up on & 30 minutes went by faster than we knew! Definitely recommend. Definitely will do it again. Loved the guy who taught us the moves. He was encouraging & loved him!

name: Ashley Huttula
text: So convenient, always a great workout. I love the people who work AND workout there. It feels fantastic, and any workout can be adapted if needed.

name: Tasha Wiley
text: Love the flexibility of class times! The trainers are energetic and the gym is always spotless. Great results very fast from these tough workouts!

name: Marla Lenox
text:
I love hitting and kicking the bags hard and getting out all my stress from the day!  I also really love having no set class times so I can show up whenever I’m ready and get my workout in around my schedule.

I run and do CrossFit and feel like this is an awesome compliment to both. 9Round has different movements and works different muscles and makes me a stronger athlete.

name: Caroline Taylor
text:
Check out JDPI Sports Performance if you're looking to lose, tone and burn.

Johnny and Duffy train high school football players for college teams and college football players for the NFL combine. So they're pretty good and know what they're doing. I'm not training for either, but with their help I've gone from completely inactive and overweight to being in the best shape (physically and mentally) of my life in the past few months. I've lost over 15 pounds and gained some awesome lean muscle mass, as well as stamina, agility, strength and coordination that I never knew I was capable of having.

They offer a free-trial class if you're interested in learning more about their style of training.

Check it out!

text: I was really excited to join F45, starting with signing myself and a friend up for an eight-week challenge. There was no way to sign-up for the challenge, or even a monthly membership, on the website at the time. I’m not sure how I could join/sign-up considering no one ever responded. This was a very disappointing experience and, honestly, turned me off from F45.

text: I have done Iron Tribe and Orange Theory, and this blows them away! Awesome, awesome music selection that is even better than what you get with Les Mills (I have done those classes too). Works out your entire body with movements that anyone can do to start but can still challenge elite athletes. The clientele and the coaches are polite and down to earth. And it is cheaper right now than any other group fitness gym in town. Do yourself a favor and try it!

I highly recommend F45 for a challenging and fun workout all in 45 minutes! No excuses!

name: Brandon Shoupe
text:
Synergy is, by far, the best gym I've ever been a member of. The atmosphere is very friendly and non-intimidating. Hammer and his staff keep the place clean and organized. You never have to ask yourself, "Where are the 25-lb dumbbells?" because they are always in the right place. The locker rooms and showers are also well-kept.

The classes, which are optional, will test you physically and are apparently some of the most intense in the country, as people visiting from out of town comment on how tough they are compared to what they are used to.

One of the reasons I like Synergy so much is because the members are a mix of young, middle-aged, and older people from many different races and walks of life. I've never heard of anyone that felt like they didn't belong.

text: I’ve been a member since they launched this location here in Madison. If you need some structure to your weekly workout routine, accountability, positivity, uplifting trainers, and challenging workouts that can be modified to meet you at any fitness level, this is the place!! What I love even more is how Burn Boot Camp is always connecting with the community and giving back!! This place is full of inspiration to meet your fitness goals, physically and mentally!! It has truly been a game changer for me, and it really is a family! LOVE LOVE LOVE Burn Madison!!! 💙💙💙

text: Not even sure I know where to begin,  but I honestly wish I could rate more than 5 stars! I have been going to BURN Madison since they opened. I look forward to going every day, sometimes twice! The facilities are safe and clean, the workouts are ever changing and each camp can be personally modified by the excellent trainers to accommodate your fitness level. I have met so many great people here. 2020 has been a year, I am glad to have BURN to keep my physical and mental health in check!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jessica Tyler
text: I love working out at Burn! Burn provides high energy workouts for all ability levels. Burn is a special place and you know that from the minute you walk in. Everyone is friendly, supportive, and encouraging. Since starting Burn I have gotten stronger and been able to set a personal record half marathon and 5k time. Burn is more than a gym and I highly recommend you give it a try!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Morgan Thompson
text: This place has changed the way I workout. I was never one to like high intensity workouts but burn boot camp has made it fun. To the trainers and the bonds you create with the others is more then I ever expected. I actually enjoy getting up in the morning and going to my workout and I never miss a day off when I’m not at work. The trainers will take time with you to help you reach your goals and genuinely care about helping you reach them. They are great about modifying something to make it work for if you have any injuries or something isn’t working for you. This is more then a gym it’s a family
