resp.text: thank you so much for the ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ review! We're thrilled you are enjoying our fitness center! We also appreciate you  taking the time to support our gym today.

name: Jereld Casey
text: Never been there

resp.text: Jereld, thank you for your positive review; we work hard to make sure our members are well cared for at our gym, and very much appreciate your 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟  confirmation  of our efforts!
HIGH, thanks so very much for your review!

name: Phy-sique Fitness
text: Great, old school gym.  Steel plates and plate loaded equipment.  Thanks for the great workout while we were in town.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed it! Stop by any time!

name: Ammar Shaqar
text: Hoover Fitness is a great place to workout. They have all the equipment & machines anyone needs for a through workout. Jason is an excellent trainer. He's very  knowledgeable not only in personal training but nutrition & health too.

name: Bill McCarthy
text: Great staff, friendly and quiet atmosphere. Great gym, great people. Some equipment old but most is fine and works great.

name: Herman Mattingly
text: I just joined this gym. I've been living in Hoover for 3 years and never knew this place was here. I've been a member of almost every gym in Hoover but I feel this gym is more to my liking.

resp.text: Thanks Herman! We are glad to have you working out with us. Welcome to the Hoover Fitness family!

name: Anusheel Gandhakwala
text: Nice old school gym . You can workout anytime of the day or night with peace and quiet. The got program for building stamina or strength and loose wait . No hunk alarm or too many distractions. Relax polices for bring you gym partner with you

name: Allison McSwain
text: I’ve never been a gym rat, but after joining Hoover Fitness 2 weeks ago I find myself getting excited about the group work outs. I really love the atmosphere. Every time I’ve ever gone to a gym I’ve always felt so self conscious, but not at hoover fitness. From the moment I step foot in the front door I feel welcomed. I leave my worries at the door and focus on what I’m there to do. The staff is so friendly and the owner, Jason, is more than willingly to do whatever it takes to help you reach your goal. I also love how diverse the members are. I highly recommend Hoover  fitness if you’re looking for a gym to call home.

resp.text: Thank you Allison!  We are so glad you are a part of our family now!

name: Tanya M
text: This is a nice location to go to at night. It's never really over crowded and the equipment is really easy to use and looks to be in good condition. I enjoyed working out there.

name: Herman Mattingly
text: The greatest Hoover fitness LLC on planet Earth!

name: A Levy
text: Was a member of Hoover Fitness for a little over two years and absolutely loved it. Staff were always incredibly friendly, and offered a variety of options. If you wanted to go to guided classes or just lift weights, it was the best option and a bargain.

name: Hopson Nance
text: Great gym

name: crista farley
text: Love the staff. And the group class is well worth taking if your having trouble losing weight. I struggled for years and took the 6 week class and didnt realizw how well i did, at the end once i saw how possible it was to do (and i didnt follow diet completely like i should have would bave been 80 times better!) But he has helped put me on a path i know i can take and ever since then have done nothing but get healthier week after week! I cant thank yall enough!

resp.text: Thanks Crista! You have been a pleasure to work with and your dedication has paid off in results!

name: Brad Demerich
text: A no frills gym for people who want to workout and get on with their day. Staff is friendly, mornings are quiet, and it's locally owned. I've draw back is the condition of the gym. It's in need of renovations and isn't exactly clean. You'll want to be updated on your tetnus shots as a lot of stuff is rusty. I've lovingly began referring to one of the bars as Ol' Brown.

name: James Purcell
text: Great facility, friendly staff. Tied to my country club membership at Hoover country club. Clean, locker room for changing and I love bringing my older kids to work out with me as a family. They keep me motivated.

name: The Carver Family
text: Have been an active member since about 2008.  World class staff, plenty of great equipment, and friendly patrons.  Fat Blast group classes have been great. .

name: James A Froedge
text: akes me happy !

name: J T
text: The best deal going in gym memberships. The gym is well stocked with a range of machines, free weights and cardio equipment. I've never had to wait for a machine. TVs and wifi are nice touches as is 24 hour access. Not a lot of flash or bells and whistles but if you need a good local gym, this is the place.

name: Thia Chambers
text: Nice staff. Clean facility. Not too big. Which is a plus for me

text: This gym is an exceptional hidden gem in Athens! Packed with plenty equipment in different varieties.  Very clean and new looking. TV's covering every wall. With the gym being on the 3rd floor, you've also got a nice little view of highway 72. Clean and well kept showers, changing rooms, and restrooms. All for your choice of several affordable membership offers. Highly recommended.

name: Mike G
text: Excellent gym with 24 hour access, staff was very friendly, gym was very clean and equipment was plentiful.

name: Savannah Blake
text: Friendly and welcoming environment. Clean and updated facilities. Great atmosphere!

name: William Flood

text: This fitness center is top of the line! Always clean, welcoming staff, knowledgeable instructors, large selection of group fitness classes, dressing room/showers are very accommodating. I highly recommend you check out 360 Fitness!

Dat my gym.

name: Ernie Yarbrough
text: I love CrossFit Protocol! It embodies all the best qualities of a community box—challenging, fun, high quality and integrity. The coaches and people are the best. I think this year will be 7 years? It’s been so much fun I’ve lost count!

name: Hunter Hill
text: A very welcoming community with some amazing competitors. I'm happy to have become part of the team/group/and community here at Protocol just a few months ago. If you are looking for a place to bring you in and make you one of their own straight from the jump, look no further. Come join the Protocol family today.

name: Helen Perdue
text: I love this gym and the people. As a new person, I was immediately welcomed and always included. The coaches are awesome, pay close attention during workouts, and regularly provide me with tips on form. On the hard days, the push me to do more than I think I can.

name: Ray Pickering
text: Love this place...the people and the coaches are the best.  Everyone helps you accomplish more than you ever thought you could.  The sense of community gives you the push to try things that you never would have tried on your own.

name: James Perdue
text: Quality instruction.  Attentive staff  that have the ability and knowledge to match a workout to the athlete’s ability.  And know when an athlete has the ability to do more than they think.  A great place for anyone new to CrossFit that has wanted to try it. The CrossFitters at Protocol are awesome and encourage each other constantly.

name: Drew Peele
text: Amazing community! They love people first then help them achieve their fitness goals. Always a new challenge provided in the programming to keep you on your toes!

name: ComicBook Kid
text: Jus recently started at Protocol and I already feel like part of the community. Love the challenge CrossFit brings. The coaches have done an outstanding job teaching me forms and working with me to maximize my results. I’ve got a long road ahead of me but a great support group behind me! Thanks Protocol!

name: Keith Kennedy
text: I just recently joined and it is a great place with an awesome community. Everyone there is welcoming and wants to see you succeed. I highly recommend it!

name: Christina Perez
text: The only box I'll go to when I'm in Decatur! Worked out there for a few days when I was in town for business in the summer and went back last week. Big Red, Adam, and everyone else were so friendly as always and made me feel right at home- they even remembered me from when I was there months ago. Great, awesome people who welcome you and joke around with you like you're a regular. I recommend it all my coworkers who travel routinely to Decatur.

name: Scottie Hubbard
text: Coolest place in town!  Great community.  From beginner to high level athlete, you will feel welcomed and challenged at CFP.

name: griffinc96
text: This place has the best coaches around! I love the atmosphere and fellowship that this box continues to show day in and day out!

name: Nicholas Hillman
text: This place is home! After graduating from Auburn University and progressing into adulthood, this place made me feel like family immediately. They always say that once you leave college you have to try and plug yourself into a place to make friends, and Crossfit Protocol made that possible and beyond easy. Your gym friends truly are your best friends. If you’re looking for a close group of friends, i definitely recommend Crossfit Protocol!

name: Jessica Hickey
text: Best gym. Best people. Best coaches. I love my Protocol family!

name: Brittney Ward
text: Hands down the best CrossFit gym I have ever visited! Awesome class! Adam is a great coach!

name: Jonathan Miller
text: If you want to have fun, be held accountable, build life-long friendships, all while working out, then Protocol is the place for you.

name: Kim Hillman
text: Great way to start the day! CrossFit at 5 am! Great friends, coaches, facilities & workouts😊

name: Tracey Hendrix
text: I’m thankful for people who train you with your long term health in mind and an atmosphere that demands your best!

name: Michelle Darnell
text: I love this place!! Great Coaches and lots of FUN🏋️‍♀️❤️

name: Brandon Smith
text: Prior to Crossfit, I had a preconceived opinion about all the hype. You know, jump roping, climbing ropes, jumping on boxes etc...It’s way more than that, and it’s way more than just a work out of the day! To me Crossfit is about community, and accountability. After coming the first couple of times I was hooked, not just on the workout, but also by the willingness of the coaches to help, and the other members to stand beside you until the very end...no matter if you are the last to finish. Since joining almost 2 years ago I have come to love everything about Crossfit, and I owe that to the wonderful coaches/owners/athletes at Protocol. I look forward to each workout, but more so, I look forward to doing it with a community that is more like a family, than just a gym full of members!

name: Amber Hicks
text: Been training here for almost 2 years and never want to leave. The coaches here are top notch and an awesome environment to push yourself past your limits.

name: Robert LaRue
text: Atmosphere is amazing and the facility is second to none. This is the place to conquer all your physical and mental fears.

name: Michael Mitchell
text: Great gym with a great group of coaches!

name: R C
text: Great coaches and gym!

name: Paige Martin
text: Love this place!

name: Melinda pulliam
text: One word!! #Awesome

name: Steve Garner

name: Charlie Callari
text:
Brand new PF Just opened up the other day. Lots of machines. Hardly anyone there at 6am although that may change in a week or so.

Very clean, in both the exercise room and the men’s locker room. Although they do not have shower curtains yet (am told they will arrive in a few days).

Overall good experience and quality.

name: Christina Beal
text: Friendly,  amazing staff , very knowledgeable.  Love the physical trainer.  New building and lots of equipment

name: Reggie Harris
text: I was visiting my brother in Northport, AL and they were so helpful and knowledgeable.  I didn’t know a couple of things about the original package I signed up for and they assisted me in so many ways and I upgraded .  Phenomenal attitudes and smiles.  Great people!!!  Not my home gym but will forever workout there when I am visiting

name: leslie andress
text: Love love love this gym! Deja the trainer is so nice and friendly! You cannot beat the quality of this gym for the price! It’s brand-new and always super clean!

name: David Smith
text: I really like this planet fitness.  Its brand new, the equipment is nice and everything is well maintained.  And best of all, the staff is great!

name: Anthony Montgomery
text: This is the first time I visited this location. The staff helped at the front with changing my membership from another location. There seemed to be plenty of space. I didn't have to wait on anyone, which is number one for me at any fitness center. Social distance measures were decent, as can be expected. The only real issue that bothered me was that one employee was talking to a customer waiting to go into the spa while I was trying to leave, and he walked in front of me three times going back and forth from the other customer and the counter, as if he couldn't see me. He didn't speak to me at all. I didn't find it very professional to be cutting customers off repeatedly and not saying excuse me or anything, just expecting me to continue to move and go around after already changing directions without even acknowledging me there. It would've been much better if he had the conversation with the customer at the counter, at the table, said "excuse me," or even "sorry about that," anything really to let me know I was valued as much as the person he was talking to and not just in his way. Things like that irk me, especially as a customer. Other than that though, pretty great first-time experience. If it doesn't get too much busier without being expanded, then I'll plan on this being my main gym. Oh, one more thing, I wish they had the treadmills like Midtown. Only having an up and down and not a keypad is annoying when trying to change interval speeds. The other features were nice too, but not a huge problem.

name: Bri Brown
text: Bailee is awesome! Her customer service is amazing. She is an asset to Planet Fitness for sure!

name: Courthney Hall
text: Good place to work out not many people so you can get in and get out.

name: Summer Wise
text: Very clean and has a huge variety of machines! Staff is nice and hydromassage bed is AMAZING 🙂

name: Brian Williams
text:
Edited my review.   Can’t find a mask in my car, they don’t have one I can buy, they do they have any disposable masks on site.   So I’m refused service.  Then to beat it all, hardly anyone in there wears masks, they just walk past the front desk then take off their masks (as I would normally do). Hypocritical feel-goodism.  Good gym overall, just do not like the fact of mandating something but not offering the product mandated.
**and to top it off, I’m currently in the gym staring at a 2 employees with a mask below their nose.  , get you some of that***

New edit:  other than that incident , I love this gym, and with relaxation of masks mandate they have done away with the “hypocritical feel goodism” that had existed.   Great gym.

name: Stephanie Hopkins
text:
Pro: Love how clean the gym is. Deja the trainer is very sweet.
Con: wish they had a trainer for 2nd and 3rd shift.
If you don't have your debit card on file there one employee who will literally worry you to death about.

name: Dewayne Baggett
text: Great workers and clean work out stations

name: Tony ORourke
text: Very relaxed and comfortable work out environment.  Many exercise tools available with proper sanitizer and social distancing requirements.

name: Rachel Nelson
text: So glad they opened this location it’s friendly and convenient and the facility is super nice! I’ve really enjoyed going there the last few days and can’t wait to continue my fitness journey into the new year!

name: Debra Prewitt
text: I love the fact that I can workout any time that I choose. Very convenient because my work schedule fluctuates.

name: Valarie Deloach
text: Such awesome  service.  But I think members should  be reminded  to clean machines  that we use for covid safety purposes  and all safety

name: Edwin Perez

name: Chase Callahan

text: Great place to workout

name: General Rage
text: Best in town!

name: Joseph Jent
text: Clean, friendly, lots of equipment.

name: Connor May
text: Love the gym! Always have the newest equipment (they upgrade twice a year). Gym is the cleanest I have ever experienced. This is a place of making progress. You have goals? You will accomplish them here. Six squat/bench racks throughout the gym so you never have to wait for one which is nice. Classes are advanced enough for experts to get a great sweat but not to complicated so beginners are always welcome.

resp.text: Thank you Connor! We appreciate your kind review!

name: AgoreThe Phobic
text:
When I got an employee recommendation to visit this location I was like, "heck yeah that is conveniently close by and I need a gym to lift heavy at." So I visit in person at 10:15 am (office hours) and no one is there. I was thinking heh maybe they haven't arrived yet! No prob. I call at 11am, nope. noon? Lol nope. 2pm? nah.

I was unpleasantly impressed with how horrible and unprepared this business is. Anywho I'm going to a Gold's that is 2 miles further from my house I don't care.
I don't know why everyone else has a good experience with the staff, maybe it is a racial thing or something? Oh well I'm used to it.

resp.text: Hi Sara, I am sorry we were not there when you stopped by. What day did you stop by? We are always there during our staffed hours! We are a 24/7 facility but our staffed office hours (as posted on our website and on our front door) are Monday-Thursday 10-6 and Friday 10-2 and by appointment on weekends. I’d love to show you around the gym if you are still interested! Call (256) 970-1400 to set up an appointment time. If no one answers just leave a message and we will get back with you as soon as we can. -Lillie

name: Devon Phillips
text:
Oh my gosh, nicest Anytime Fitness I’ve ever been to.
Everything was organized, the weights were in the correct places, and several machines so there was no waiting or crowding. Equipment was new and top notch. I wish my hometown anytime fitness could take notes from this Huntsville location!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review Devon! We are glad you came to visit us. Come back soon!

name: Matthew Anderson
text: Lady at the front desk was really nice.. I love the place ... It's the perfect size not too big nor too small..

name: John Shirley
text: The gym is well managed and very well maintained.  A very broad variety of equipment allows for many change ups in your workout routine.  The only negative, although a very small one, is the background music.  Consists Of a lot of hip-hop and rap, though very low volume.

resp.text: Thank you for your review John! We will try to switch up the music a bit!

name: May Gillespie
text: Have had nothing but great experiences at Anytime Fitness Jones Valley! They provide a safe and clean environment for people to come make healthy happen. The staff is very responsive to the needs of their members and always there for encouragement.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words May! We appreciate you and love to watch you work hard in the gym!

name: Lauren Parker
text: I absolutely love this gym. It always so so clean and the owners are the best. Would recommend for anyone looking for a great place to work out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Lauren! We appreciate having you as a member!

name: Jim Chandler
text: Extremely knowledgeable and friendly staff. Facility is always meticulously cleaned. I love it there 💪🏃🏼

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jim! We enjoy having you as a member!

name: Taylor Biggs
text: Awesome, well-equipped, and clean gym!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor! We appreciate your kind review!

name: Adam Cochrane
text: Great gym! Better people. New and clean.

resp.text: Thank you Adam! We appreciate your kind review and having you as a member!

name: Kevin Smith
text: Great facility, always clean, good management. None better in HSV.

resp.text: Thank you Kevin! We appreciate your review!

name: Lee Thomas
text: This Gym was one of the first ones to reopen safely following the COVID-19 shut down . Happened at good times for me. Doing strengthening exercises following ham string surgery. Staff is professional , knowledgeable , and maintain a clean facility. Equipment was just what the doctor ordered. Got cleated by TOC last week and was able to improve overall fitness thanks to Anytime Fitness!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Lee! We enjoyed having you. Come back and see us soon!

name: Andrew Cooper
text: Very clean and the equipment is in excellent shape.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Andrew! We appreciate you!

name: Valerie Brown
text: Love this gym and the classes! The facility has really nice equipment, is spacious and very clean.

resp.text: Thank you Valerie, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us a kind review!

name: Justin Cobb
text: Best gym in Huntsville. They often have events which are always fun. Gym is clean with all the equipment you could ever need. They have classes that keep things fresh and are helpful for people trying to get healthier! I have tried HIIT, Bootcamp, TRX, and Yoga (All were great). I think they have cycle and others but haven't tried them.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Justin! We love having you as a member!

name: Laura Furnas Cannady
text: Location is convenient, next door to a smoothie bar also.  Staff is very helpful and the entire gym is clean and inviting.

resp.text: Thank you Laura for your kind review!

name: Mike W Johnson
text: People who are good. Lots to do and choose

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Mike! Do you have any suggestions or feedback on what we can do to better your experience

name: Mike Litores
text: Looks like my previous review was removed, sadly. I am there most afternoons, and each time I'm faced with people slamming weights (heavy, mind you, and shakes the entire floor) but the staff seems not to care or is oblivious. It's not MY job to enforce a very simple rule, and Lily (owner) seems not to care as long as Mr Slammer throws the ball to the cute lab that hangs out there. Two stars for staff attitude and laziness.

resp.text: We are sorry you did not have a positive experience at our gym! All of our members workout out in different ways. Some drop the weights more than others, however our members that do drop their weights do so in a controlled way to where they are not harming others nor themselves. Our staff works diligently throughout the day sanitizing the equipment and working in the office. If you would like to email us at jonesvalley.hsv@anytimefitness.com or call us at 256-970-1400 we'd love to further discuss things with you!

name: Core Strength & Performance (Deven & Heidi Dehnel)
text: Wonderful people and great equipment!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: tiannalyn adams
text: Clean and good equipment

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Tiannalyn! We appreciate having you as a member!

name: Fun Dad
text: Smiling faces and warm out of toads always make a pleasant experience when getting any hair jobs done at mood enhancers

name: Lisa Trout
text: When I moved here from Mississippi,  I had no idea where to get my hair cut.  I do admit, I can be picky.( My Mother was also a beautician before she passed away. ) My niece told me to go there and ask for Courtney.  I did,  and I am so happy there. Everyone there is nice and I would trust any of them if Courtney wasn't there.  I am very satisfied with her. She knows what I like, and will tell me what will look better and what won't.  I love her for her honesty, sweetness,  availability.  Love her and love the salon.

name: Marketta Utley
text:
Courtney did a great job coloring and cutting my hair.  I am visiting the area but would definitely go back if I  lived in Red Bay.
Thanks Courtney!

name: Laurie Amundson Amundson
text: My hair cut was on point! Exactly how I wanted it!   My concern was because I'm used to stylists wearing mask for our protection during this pandemic but here no one had them on....but me.

name: Susan Strickland

name: Brittany Hill
text: I like this place!  My little boy gets his hair cut here. Price is just right!

name: Michael Buras
text: Courtney was great cut my hair just the way I asked. Would definitely go again if I am in town.

name: Grace Nelson

name: Nemanja Sunjevaric
text: Passing through town and decided to get a haircut. Megan did a fenomenal job. She was very patient and understanding and made sure I like my new haircut. Thank you Meg 😉

name: Noreen Evans
text: Meghan is a great stylist! Both my husband and I were very pleased with our haircuts. We will return Everytime we are in Red Bay, Alabama.

name: Leslie Rodriguez
text: Best place in redbay to tan

name: Ann Green
text: Got a great perm their

name: Cheryl Reed
text: Great stylist, gym and tanning...

name: Patricia Brown
text: Love that place

name: Sherm 35
text: Can't beat the price

name: Jesica Romano
text:
First time talking with them I ask how far is their gym from Montgomery ? He said not far we are very close . I said great . I ask about the time schedule for the teens, sadly I work those time frames so he offer that maybe the trainer can pick my son from home when he is on his way to the gym . I said. Thanks , give my location I live close to the YMCA bell rd. And he said ' oh no it's too far'  really?   I told him I wouldn't let just a extranger pick my son. But thanks for the offer. I wouldn't do that. I want it to be there when my son will do the training and then  the gym reply '  that it was a miscommunication with them better call the office.... .. ''
I told him no thank you I clearly understood. That when I asked for distance and where I live he said it was close. But when he offer to pick my son even though I wouldn't do that he said. Oh no that's too far ...   😆 clearly he doesn't know Montgomery.. And doesn't know how to chat with a new customer

name: Will Guy
text: I really love going to Rebar. Great people teach the classes. My son also attends the teen class.

name: Taylor Day
text: I have had nothing but positive experiences at Rebar Performance. I’ve taken classes from almost all of the CrossFit Coaches, and each one is just as uplifting as the next! I know that I am getting constructive feedback from the coaches, and it’s always given in a professional manner. The facility is gorgeous and has nice amenities including free childcare. The members are top notch and friendly. When I walk in, I know that this box adheres to their motto of faith, family, and fitness. All in all, it’s a wonderful experience and you should definitely give them a try. Hidden jewel on Chantilly!

name: Ross Davis
text: Here is a military perspective, this place is great and a must try. Family, faith, & fitness says it all. While I may be use to joining new communities, others are not. I was welcomed here with opened arms. This family has made my time in this community unforgettable. I feel blessed to have met this amazing group.

name: govinda mahajan
text: Good place to train. But beware they will continue to charge your account even after you said to stop. Upon asking they will say...you have to give 2 month notice to stop. They ask me to try cross fit, couldn’t continue for injury reason. I said to stop, but the gym owner continue to charge. Later on agreed to refund partial money and said it was not clear that you would not continue.

name: Jennifer LeMaster
text: I am so thankful for Rebar Performance and all the awesome coaches and members. They have become like family to me. Everyone is so welcoming and helpful. The coaches have encouraged me over the last 4 months and I have come a long way since I started. I am excited to see  my improvements at my 1 year mark.  There are people of all ages and fitness level's. I highly recommend Rebar.

name: Lindsay Mosley
text: Everyone at the gym is very professional and approachable. I don't ever feel insecure about my level of strength or knowledge of what I'm doing. The coaches and teachers explain everything so well that even as a beginner, you will be using the correct form to ensure no bodily harm. I love this place! It feels like a family!

name: Glenn Wilson
text: Family atmosphere. Coaches and staff are all amazing and will personally invest in you to ensure you reach your fitness goals. All fitness levels are welcome. If you are looking to lose weight, get stronger, improve your mobility or all of the above, there is no better place in town to achieve your fitness goals than at Rebar Performance.

name: Wendy Reyes Hudson
text: Montgomery -Pike Roads.. Our Happy place! Leave your ego at the door and expect to meet a community of like minded individuals working on themselves while pushing others to do their best!  Best Place Ever!

name: B Redfern
text:
This place is not for me. I'm by no means new to cross fit and have been doing it off and on since 2005. While this gym may appeal to some it does to fit for me. Being stuck too only the run class time and not being able to make up the workout is difficult. The plethora of cross-functional gyms in the area may account for why they can run this way.
While at first it seemed inviting, for me, the ambiance turned sour when I started missing workout due to the primary reason for my actually being in the area.
Finally was the music. The very first day had tracks I found to be motivating. Second trip the music changed but I figured hey, change up is fine. After approx 9 move visits the music remained the same. On my last visit I said something and the response was "we have diverse taste here and can't always accomidate." Snce the music never changes where is the diversity?  Besides I can only listen to music spouting drug use, gratuitous  violence and the subjugation of women for so long.

name: Samantha Shockley
text: Amazing facility, very clean - the people are even better so friendly and helpful. Thank you for a great drop in experience. I recommend this box to anyone.

name: Blane Matisak
text: I've been to a couple of cross fit places before and this one is by far the best experience I've recieved. It's a great atmosphere that offers a plethora of opportunities, not to mention it's unbelievable staff members that are highly trained and educated in their craft. It is hands down the highlight of my week every time I step foot inside its walls.

name: Amy Rawlinson
text: Rebar has been my 2nd home for the last 9 months, and I am hooked. I spent the summer of 2015 here as well. From elite athletes to individuals trying to take their first ever steps toward fitness, this place has it all. I’ve been doing CrossFit now for 6 years, and their class workouts continue to challenge me every day. The coaches are respectful of members’ personal goals, no matter how big or small. Since I’ve been attending, I’ve also had the opportunity to serve members of the community, local churches through food drives, Christmas gift drives, and projects for members within the gym. This place is truly one of a kind.

name: Sheri Rape
text: My experience at Rebar Performance has been great!  I've been going to the "Timpi Yoga" studio on site for a few months & I couldn't be more happy to have a hot yoga studio to lay my mat! The intructors deliver fun classes that appeal to both experienced yogi's and new alike.  I highly recommend this business & personally believe it is the best hot studio in the Montgomery area, hands down!

name: Kacie Baggett
text: Great facility! The coaches are knowledgeable and encouraging. I've attended both Crossfit and Boot Camp, and I've been very pleased with both. I highly recommend it!

name: Jessica Myers
text: My children absolutely love CrossFit Kids! They are learning so much more than physical fitness. I highly recommend it.

name: Natalie Olmstead
text: Great place to workout. Everyone is so friendly. It is not intimidating. They are great at adjusting for any fitness level.

name: Paula Collins
text: Just started Yoga here and love it! They also do CrossFit. The staff is wonderful and very helpful.

name: Austin Clark
text: Crossfit is challenging, yet it is very fun. I enjoy how we do high reps on everything and it is timed workouts, so I can set my goal and reach it.

name: M
text: Best place in Montgomery to get in shape. Something for everyone  and a great family atmosphere.

name: christopher worthington
text: I have to say that my time I spent here was awesome the staff the members everyone just made you feel welcome I cannot wait until after wrestling season is done so I can join back!

name: Kelly Colley
text: Absolutely LOVE Wendy's classes!! When I leave from hot yoga my body feels detoxed and refreshed!!

name: Charles Pirro
text: Great, kind, knowledgeable staff and good equipment.

name: Jonathan Strange
text: Absolutely Amazing! By far the best Cross fit and Yoga Gym in Montgomery, Alabama.

name: RC Rivers
text: Amazing facility, knowledgeable coaches, and incredibly friendly members all making it a great place to be an train!

name: Jackie Ingram
text: Great place, great people and a awesome workout 🏋🏻‍♀️💪🏼

name: Sidney Brown, Ph.D.
text: Great group of people and workout experience for the beginner or advanced athlete!

name: Michael Stroup
text:
From Day 1 I loved it!
Our diverse group of coaching staff ensures all needs can be met while the same coaches share a uniform care and concern about each individual's fitness needs and him/her as a person!
From Crossfit, Crossfit Kids, BootCamp, Yoga - there is something for everyone!
TRY IT!

name: Kwantrice White
text: Such a welcoming environment, focused on strength and wellness all the way around!

name: Russell Myers
text: The coaches are the best ever.

name: Allen Jackson
text: The best gym, and group of people in town.

name: Bo Tucker
text: Beautiful facility with great coaching

name: Dennis Romano
text: This place is awesome!

name: Vishal Sarvaiya
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open 24×7, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing.

name: Brandon Hines
text: This location is more concerned with late fees than keeping a long-term membership active. I haven’t used my membership in 74 days due to an illness, but I wanted to keep my membership active. On the date my membership fees were due, my bank locked my debit card. On the same day, I was charged an extra $20 late fee. Couldn’t get anybody on the phone that evening because the gym was closed. Called the next day to speak with the manager (who was either fired or quit over the weekend). The next person in charge (Oliver) basically stated to me that the fee wasn’t going to be removed, showing no concern to the explanation I was giving. He also seemed to not care about me canceling my membership as well. Funny how they won’t cancel the membership at the gym, as you have to do it through an app. But they love charging unethical late fees, not giving members enough time to correct certain situations or unforeseen circumstances. The monthly fee was also suppose to come out on the first of each month as agreed when I started the membership, but they billed me two days earlierm.

name: karl hare
text: Currently on a 3day pass. Clean and all the machines you could want. Time will tell but so far, I'd recommend if you live  in the area

name: Mallory Flores
text: I've had a membership with a couple other gyms/health clubs and Club4Fitness is by far my favorite! The staff are so friendly, the facility is extremely clean, there is a variety of equipment. Also, there is tanning available, hydro massage, personal trainers, and several different group classes you can join. If you have kids they also offer day care I believe. The prices are great. They don't want an arm and a leg to join. I recommend this gym over any others in the area.

resp.text: We appreciate the 5 star review Mallory! Thanks for choosing Club4 to help you reach your fitness goals!

name: Ronad Mitchell
text:
I love this gym!
And my kids love going to the Kidcare every time.
The staff is so kind and hospitable. I’m so glad I joined.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! We truly appreciate you being a part of the Club4 family!!

name: Tripz XL
text: Great, brand-new gym with a lot of equipment. Masks not required!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you being part of the Club4 family!:)

name: Kay and Dez
text: Best gym ever!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We truly appreciate you:)

name: Chris Butler
text: By far the best gym I've ever joined and had the pleasure of being a member of. They've done an excellent job of navigating the whole covid-19 situation. They were extremely professional and understandable in all aspects of the pandemic. The staff and members do a great job of keeping the place clean and organized. It is never over-crowded and the atmosphere is one of community. There's no room for intimation or competitiveness. Everyone there is there for one common goal so if you're looking for a gym where you can go and get a great workout in without being pressured or harassed, you'd be hard pressed to find one as good as Jason's.

resp.text: Thank You Chris!

name: Lydia Sullivan
text: Clean and not crowded, with an atmosphere of dedication and grit. Friendly patrons and staff, who while nice also respect your need to work and not socialize.

resp.text: Thank You Lydia. Members like you make the past 40-years worth it!

name: Jason Stewart
text:
I swipe my card and open the door.  The lights come on.  The hair bands begin to play.  I step through the entrance, and into another dimension.  Time and space are left behind, as I ascend into a higher domain of reps and kilograms.

Quality equipment surrounds me.  Though I am spoiled for choice, I choose a station.  As I adjust my weights, I feel a gaze upon me.  I turn to meet it.  A wall of champions stare back, with determination and approval.  I add more weight... to remain worthy.

As you hoist here, hoist proudly.  As you exhale, exhale with reverence!  This is no mere 1-on-1 personal training, supplement and exercise equipment selling, 24-hour access fitness center with smoothie cafe.  No.  This is a shrine of greatness!

resp.text: Wow! I just saw this post. I cannot thank you enough. I love it when people actually get it. Welcome home Jason, welcome home!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: I've been training at Jason's for 39 years.  I've visited other clubs to see what they have to offer and none of them have the atmosphere and staff like Jason's.  Jason's also has the best mix of equipment and free weights of any club I have seen. I addition to the staff, the members are great, which adds to the overall atmosphere at Jason's.

resp.text: Thank you. That's high praise coming from you!

name: Jess
text: Best gym in Mobile! Love the atmosphere here. The equipment is clean, it's never crowded, and the staff really goes above and beyond. An added perk - some days you might even be greeted by the gym pups!

resp.text: On behalf of the family, staff and especially the pups Thank You Jessica!

name: Keela Puckett
text:
Jason's Fitness has been great!  Equipment, it's there.....
The staff is excellent - good people, very knowledgeable and helpful!
Jason designed exercise sessions that are specific to my needs.        Along with trainer Daniel Gardner, they continue to adjust and modify my program as needed.                                                                                             These exercise adjustments have been a key element for me.
Also, pleased to say that I'm making new friends at the gym!
Tim Puckett
____________________________________________________________________
At age 65 (and retired) with professions in the freight business and 36 years in the oil field, trauma from accidents outside of work (that included broken legs), along with surgeries on both shoulders, I thought "this is it, live with it". I was wrong.
Needed all the help that I could get, and got it!
Noticing couples of my age group working together, and have hopes that my wife will join in the near future.
Tim Puckett

resp.text: Thank you so much Tim.  People like you are why it has been a joy to come to work every day for the past 38-Years!

name: Lori
text: My job brought me to Foley for a couple of weeks and I was so thankful to find Jason's Fitness so I could continue my training.  Jason took the time to ask about my current training regime and was able to develop a routine specific to my needs and capability.   My trainer Josh, was keen on spotting my areas of weakness and strength and worked with Jason in customizing my workouts further to target the areas needed most.   Thank you Jason and Josh!

resp.text: Lori it was a pleasure having you. Hope to see you again soon!

name: gnimelfemsti
text: This gym is amazing. I spent seven months training here and I wish I could go back. The staff are both knowledge and courteous.  I've been to many gyms in my travels,  Jason's is by far my favorite.  It was never crowded,  the  other members were always friendly and willing to spot.  If I could give more stars I would.

resp.text: Thank you so, so much.  Words like this make coming to work a blast!

name: Shelby Weaver
text: Working out at Jason's is the best part of my week! I love the atmosphere there, everyone feels like family.

resp.text: We are family!

name: Alexandra Butts
text: Hands down the best gym in town! The managment is always available and willing to help. Cleanest gym I’ve ever been in. This place changed my life!

resp.text: It has been our pleasure.  You are a great addition to the family!

name: Alexx Collier
text: Best gym in the area- by far. Love the family oriented atmosphere and the gym itself is superb! 🖤🖤 Jason, Kelly, Daniel and Andrea are all incredible.

resp.text: Thank you Alexx!  It's because of people like you we are still here 39-years later!

name: Kendal Hood
text: Jason's Fitness is awesome! I travel a lot between mobile and Baldwin county, so I workout at both clubs often. Both facility's are great, but they just dumped some serious money into the Foley location. Brand new Indoor basketball court (2015), New equipment, Constantly getting new supplements in the shop. No Doubt, Best gym I've ever been a member off! The staff is always friendly, equipment is always clean, and doors are open rain or shine 365. What more could you ask for?!

name: Alison Bolton
text:
I switched to this gym from another local gym and Jason’s Fitness is 1000000% better than the other gym ever THOUGHT of being. I used to work at my university’s gym, so I have an idea of what I liked in a gym.

The staff is so nice and helpful. They answer any and all questions that I have and make the environment very positive.

The equipment is kept up very well. I never had any trouble using the equipment I wanted. It is not overcrowded with super noisy patrons. There are no ripped pads or broken cords.

It is also CLEAN. This was a huge issue at my last gym. I swear the staff at my old gym never clean; they just sat around on their phones and laptops with their back’s turned to everyone. The locker rooms and bathrooms always look clean and the equipment is clean at Jason’s. There are no  dumbells and plates strewn across the floor. The staff does a wonderful job at making this place neat and clean.

I’m so glad to finally be at a gym that makes me feel comfortable and excited to workout again.

resp.text: Alison, Thank you for the Love and welcome to the club.  We've been getting it done since 1981 and people like you make it all worth while!

name: Jesse Heydorn
text: I travel quite bit for work and it’s hard to find decent gyms to train at. I saw that Jason’s had some of the best reviews in mobile so I decided to check it out yesterday.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and they showed me around the gym and made me feel right at home. The gym itself isn’t huge but they’ve got everything you need and then some.  It has this golden era body building feel to it with all kinds of awesome pics on the walls of competitors that have trained there.  They actually had a few machines that I’ve never even seen before as well. Definitely give this place a try if you live here or just need to get a good workout in!!

resp.text: Thanks Jesse.  Hope you had a blast!

name: Tabitha Knotts
text: I have been going to Jason's for 4 years now & am 100% certain I will never go to any other gym in my life. Everyone there is like family & the atmosphere is very motivating. There's also nothing better than knowing you are breathing clean air while training!

name: Blake Lee
text: Absolutely love this gym!!  It feels like a second home.  The staff and members are highly friendly and feel like a family.  Very nice equipment and a good variety that most gyms don't have (chains, battle ropes, etc).  They have a smoothie bar and small store as well, so you get all your before and after gym needs.  24/7 access so it fits any schedule.  Jason's is by far the best gym I have ever stepped in, with the nicest "gym clique" I could image.  10/10!!

name: Mandie Day
text: I Love this Gym!! I've been here for about a year and a half now and couldn't be happier with it. It is hardly every busy, and it is really  convenient having the 24 hour access. The Boot Camps here are pretty cool too, a cheaper alternative to personal trainers, but all the hard work and accountability of one. The tanning beds here are good too, they just got a 10 minute stand up bed that I'm pretty impressed with. Overall great place to work out.

name: Darrell Taylor
text:
Lets see...24/7 Access, Boot Camps, Basketball Court, Tanning Beds (both lying and standing by the way), Sauna, Team (Group) Training, and One-on-One Personal Training. If that was all it would be enough, but that's not all. A Great Smoothie awaits you for after your workout...my favorite the Chunky Monkey!

This place is great. Its not a large box chain gym with no personality. This is a place to come train and get fit with all the tools to do so. But also a place to come and have a good time while you work out. Tell Kelly at the front desk that Darrell sent you! And I'll see you at Jason's Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you D!

name: Jordan Barbarin
text: I have been a member at Jason's in mobile for almost 2 years. and I absolutely  love it here! The atmosphere here amazing. It isn't intimidating at all like I falsely assumed it would be. It is a pick up weights, not dates sort of place. Its always clean, and has excellent customer service. The boot camp classes make weight loss fun! I would defiantly recommend it to every one.

name: ashley barrameda
text: I absolutely enjoyed my gym experience. The front counter lady Kelly was extremely pleasant and helpful. Then the equipment is a mix of new and old (well maintained ) that all gel well together. I will go again

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Carlysle Salter
text: I can't say enough good things about Jason's! They have great personal trainers who are supportive and will make sure you meet your goal. It doesn't matter if you want to lose a little weight or become a bodybuilder; they will see to it that they meet your individual needs. Hands down the best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: You are family to us Carlysle and always will be!

name: chad raybon
text: Hands down the best gym along the Gulf Coast, been training here since I was 13 and I couldn't imagine being anywhere else. By far the best selection of free weights and top of the line equipment you'll find anywhere. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff and Jason is one of the best people you could ever hope to meet. This is without a doubt the place to be if your serious about your health.

name: annette bucci
text: I have been working out at Jason's for over 10 years now..It is convenient and he has the best staff ever..Bob is the sweetest and most friendliest guy you will ever meet.I love working our here😊

resp.text: You are way beyond member...You are family!

name: Jeremy Day
text: Jason's is awesome!! It has a very wide range of equipment, any where from power lifter, to first time in the gym equipment. Facility is always clean, and the staff here is always friendly. The smoothies are great too. I work shift work and often don't get off until most of the other gyms are closed, so the 24/7 access is a life saver!

name: Lane Pilger
text: I can not say enough great things about Jason's!  Its more than just a gym, its a family.  Great equipment, great trainers, and great products.  I personally have been transformed.  Jason and his team are the best and I would recommend this gym to absolutely anyone, as a matter of fact, I always do.

name: Josh Justice
text: I have been a member of this club for years and have enjoyed every second of it. The trainers are exceedingly friendly and knowledgeable. It is the best fitness club in the city. The 24 hour access is unbeatable.

name: Carena Kiser
text: Love this gym the personal trainers are awesome and it's open 24 hours so I can go any time. The facilitie and equipment  are always clean. They also have a great selection of supplements, along with a smoothie bar for after my workout.

name: Warren Nicholson
text:
Best Gym in Mobile.  I've known Jason for years
and he knows his stuff.  The staff there is great
too, and they treat everyone with respect  The most
important thing is this: YOU GET RESULTS!

name: Joshua Billie
text: Love the gym its very hard to find a gym that actually never crowded Jasons Fitness provides just that along with friendly staff and HIGHLY CLEANED AREA and Equipment. Great GYM and MEMBERS so if your in Foley or Mobile area don't hesitate drop in.

resp.text: Thank you Josh!

name: Bowdoin Atchison
text: Jason's is the best health club in Mobile, AL hands down! It's never crowded so I can easily get a full workout in under an hour. I enjoy the basketball court also.

name: Zach Taylor
text: Steller looking gym. Staff was great. Isnt crowded. Just wish I could afford it.

resp.text: You always get what you pay for and right now you can get the best for only $49 a month!

name: Stephanie M Hughes
text: After many years of being away from lifting weights, I decided to return. Jason's staff is both friendly and helpful. With the help of their Personal Trainer, Craig Barbarin, who gave  me great guidance and encouragement, I am on my way to feeling much healthier. With God's Grace this "grandmom" will not stop. If you are looking for a "good gym" with all the right equipment, come to Jason's.

name: tyler frey
text: Best gym around, awesome people and staff!

resp.text: Thanks Tyler.  It's members like you that make us the club we are today!

name: Aaron Ferguson
text:
Very friendly staff, clean machines and bathroom. Nice variety of gear including sun bed.
Best of all, 24 hour access!

name: Jerry Weaver
text: Great location and with 24 hour access.  Excellent cardio equipment and best overall selection of free-weights and machines I've seen.

name: manking4
text: Best gym in Mobile.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kevin Johnson
text: This is the best fitness gym in the Mobile area.

resp.text: Kevin, people like you make it the best gym!

name: Magdaelizetth Moffett
text: best gym ever!

name: Thomas Anderson
text: Very good Y employees, friendly and treat everyone like friends. Nice, comfortable setup.

name: Epc Maxx
text: 1 star only cause  couldnt give a zero, horrible rude  staff no machines impossible to find

name: Jia Gill
text: Closes before time and the employees are rude. Should be opened now, employee sitting out front once ride pulled up and location closed.

name: Johnny Blackmon
text: Clean, professional and friendly staff

name: Dominic Fresch
text: Just dropped in on my way to Florida, Beau “the owner I believe” was quick to answer an out of the area code phone number. Gym was awesome and has everything you need to get fit and strong. If I’m ever in town again I’ll definitely be coming here!

resp.text: Enjoyed meeting you! Glad you enjoyed it. Thanks for the review.

name: nndnfasn
text: Southern Muscle and Fitness has always been a great gym for my wife and I.  It has a lot of options to help you reach your fitness goals.

name: stephen W
text: Nice gym with plenty of weights and machines as well as trainers. Easy parking and modern building.

name: Ilya Unzhakov
text: Fantastic place! Great members, service staff, and atmosphere for an awesome workout! The trainers know their stuff, whether it be for weight loss or for competition prep, and the gym houses several professional bodybuilders. Check it out if you're looking for a good workout!

name: Yvette Hester
text:
I would highly recommend anyone to become a member at southern muscle under the NEW owner beau. I had a situation where I had canceled my membership and charges continued to come out of my account after I talked to the previous owner about my no longer attending.

Although Beau took over the gym back in July, he was fully understanding of the situation and although he did not HAVE to, he refunded me back a significant portion of the money I had lost with the previous owner due to there lack of communication with the vendor who withdrawals money from the accounts.

This owner genuinely cares about the members, it goes beyond a simple membership and a hello here and there! Charter and professionalism speaks volumes. THANK YOU AGAIN! ❤️

name: REM Sosa
text: I worked out around 6am and i had a great experience. The Owner Beau really made the gym run like a family and make everyone feel welcome. Great equipment for Strength and cardio training. SQUAT racks, barbells, dumbells etc. Will def come back if in the area for work. A+++

name: John Jarrett
text: Awesome gym!!! New management is impeccable and you cannot beat the 24 hour access. Very open and welcoming clientele. Highly recommend this gym to anyone in the area. You won’t regret it!

name: Natalia Gutium
text: Love this gym. The owner is very knowledgeable and helpful. Everyone is friendly. Great environment.

name: Ryan Wade
text:
I was told that I was not locked into a contract when I originally joined. I filled out automatic draft information with no problems. I was told the set-up fees were to be waived and monthly charges were $29.95. The auto draft amounts are different most months ($29.95- $59.95) with absolutely no explanation for the difference. I figured because I cut the owners sons hair I would have been told the truth-Guess not.
So if you are into a gym with dated equipment, management that takes hours (or days to return a call), and inconsistent billing this is the gym for you!!
As for me-I can't wait to transfer my drivers license to PROVE to "Paramount Acceptance" billing company that I no longer live in Montgomery so they will stop drafting my account.

name: Jennifer Biddy
text: Locally owned & operated. By far the best gym in Montgomery! 24 Hour Access

name: Rob Smith
text: Extremely difficult canceling your membership here

name: brandon putman
text: Must go in the front door now, as well as the cardio equipment being inoperable.

name: Michael Isom
text: Great 👌👍😎💪

name: Ricky Stephens
text: Very convenient

name: Mason Causey (Abysmal_Walker)
text: My gym of choice

name: Wes S
text: Good additional workout area.  Not great, but good on the base for making an unused building available for fitness.

name: Love Abrams
text: Went to the women's and men's basketball game against prairie view

name: K.T. Thornton Icons Sport Mobile Region Media
text: First time there and the facility was old but very nice in its own way!

name: Victoria Stanfield
text: Nice atmosphere to enjoy

name: Glenn Turner
text: Need to freshen the bathroom up,otherwise every thing is Alright.

name: Patrick Robinson
text: Nice

name: IAMTHEBEASTKING
text: New gym needed

name: Rita Jones
text: Not for me! To intense was not what I expected I suggest anyone over 50  and up make sure your in good health before trying this work out, If health is not up to park  this may not be the place for you.

name: ronald mcbay
text: Didn’t late cancel. Tried to take a class from out of town. I was more than five minutes late. They turned me away.

name: jo h
text: Been going since they open. Great staff. Convenient location.

name: Marissa E. Young
text:
Worked out in here while I was in Birmingham on travel assignment for work, and absolutely loved this gym and coaches so much! This OTF studio was legit the only reason I was sad this work assignment ended ;)
Coach Ashley and Coach Nigel were amazing, and made sure to get to know me while I was in town for 2+ months. What an awesome way to feel a part of something when you're new! Will miss working out with them, and should I end up in Bham again I know exactly where I'll be going OTF Downtown!
Thanks for the great experience!

name: Michael McGrath
text: Great workout been going there for over 3.5 years. Coaches/ staff and equipment are top class.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review Michael! We appreciate your commitment to our workouts. See you in the studio!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Friendly staff that treats regulars, new comers, and random members from our of town like friends and they'll even remember you. Looking forward to many more workouts with this team.

name: Tracy Streete
text: Love this place

name: Татьяна Яковенко
text:
(Translated by Google) Good coaches

(Original)
Good  coachs

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Brandon Johnson
text: J'Que had a really good workout plan for me. The gym is very clean, covid 19 safe, and a professional atmosphere. I recommend working out with J'Que for anyone who is serious about losing weight.

name: Rheni Prestis
text: Amazing place to workout!!! Great for any body type!!!!

name: Bryant Thomas
text: Very welcoming and accommodating. They help you may not recognize

name: Samantha Tomlin
text: Helpful

name: Aaron Longobardi
text: Quite possibly the easiest hello and definitely one of the hardest goodbyes when it comes to FXT. This place was my gym for 2 years while I was at flight school and I am so blessed to have found it. The community is so welcoming and friendly they ended up becoming family. The athletes are incredible, the programming is top notch, and the coaching is second to none. They are super military friendly and truly care about all their members. I will forever consider FXT my home gym and could not recommend this place enough. Check it out and I promise you’ll be glad you did it. Love my FXT family.

resp.text: You are family to us all at FXT. We will miss you & Lindsay and hope to see you on your next round at Rucker!! Write our name in the sand in Hawaii as we will be with you always ❤️Best wishes

name: Des2BFit
text: So, I had always wanted to get into CrossFit but was too nervous to try. I had known that CrossFit was a community of athletes and I seriously wanted to be apart of something GREAT. Well I decided to google CrossFit in my area and I landed on this location. I was nervous but I decided to give a GO, I called the number above and the reaction and engagement I got was fantastic. The professionalism of their staff had made me feel eager to get down there and begin training. First day I was amazed by the community, I was welcomed with smiles and assistance not just from the coaches but the members as well. I truly felt that I was apart of a Team. The amount of effort you put in you will get the same energy back ! I highly recommend for beginners and for those who are new to the area and want to feel apart of a community. Also for all the athletes you will definitely get a workout and a run for your money. The classes you can schedule at any time to your schedule. I had an phenomenal experience and would definitely recommend! Definitely military friendly! Hooooaaahh !

I have done group classes and barbell training within FXT. The coaches are knowledgeable (before FXT, I had never lifted in my life) and helpful, I have learned so much about how to safely engage in fitness.  I am meeting and beating my fitness goals and I love it! If you are looking for a very supportive and energized atmosphere to pursue your goals and with coaches who are knowledgeable and truly care, COME ON!!!  This is truly a one-of-a-kind place in so many ways. I’m very thankful to be a part of this Fit-Fam-Jam!💪🏼
