text: Triad is one of the best schools to train at in Alabama. Daniel teaches an effortless jiujitsu that is amazing. He displays the true beauty in the art. The people to train here are humble that creates a real environment for learning.

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: CJ Pugh
text: My son has been attending Triad for almost 2 years.  The teachers are awesome with the kids!  Shihan Daniel does a great job teaching the kids self-discipline and respect along with the martial arts instruction.

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Andrew Dutton
text: I’ve lost thirty pounds since joining. As far as American karate dojo’s go, this is the spot. You’ll earn each belt, as well as great friends and a new found confidence. I encourage anybody looking or curious to join to make the jump 100%.

name: Gregory Hickok
text: Daniel is a great teacher.  The rest of the staff is friendly and does a great job with my son.  Brodie loves his class and it has given him discipline and confidence.

name: Melanie Byrd
text: I can't say enough positive words about Triad Martial Arts Academy!  My son has been attending karate classes there for a year and a half now, and he loves every minute of it!  He has learned discipline, the importance of physical activity and healthy eating, as well as valuable karate and self defense skills.  Shihan Daniel O'Brien is lovingly tough with the children, teaching them respect for each other, their parents, teachers, the importance of good grades, and responsibly for their actions.  We signed our son up for karate classes, but he gets so much more than just karate instruction.  If I could give more stars than 5, I certainly would!

name: Josh Jordan
text: A very good leader. I have horrible shoulders and he has showed me things to do to not stress them as much. Highly recommended!! Also loves Police, Military, Fire, and EMS!!

name: Lacey Lynch
text: Very nice and knowledgeable in Martial Arts.

name: Eric Meckl
text: If you have the desire to pursue the martial arts, you won't find a better instructor than Shihan Daniel O'Brien. Whether your goal is to become a professional MMA fighter, or just to make friends & get in shape while learning practical self-defense...Triad has everything you need to be successful. They offer a great family-friendly atmosphere, and world class instruction for all ages.

name: Richard Crabb
text: Kids love it here.  No bologna straight to the point teaching.  Always open for questions and very welcoming!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Devin Henry
text: We have been at Triad for 8 months now. My little boy loves it and has learned so much. I highly recommend this place, we are family!!:)

name: Fabian Siegl
text: Absolutely loving this place. The environment is awesome and the people there are amazing. Very helpful and humble. Would recommend it for anybody.

name: maiko beeson
text: Great place to grow your characters and your martial arts techniques! High quality teachers and detail oriented classes.

name: Leah Miller
text: We love Triad. Sheehan Daniel is such a hard worker and my kids respect him so much. My oldest has grown so much in such a short time with Triad.

name: lynda thornsbury
text: This is one of the best places ever!!!  They are great with children and perfect for adults.   I highly recommend everyone to try this place out!!!!

name: Ezekiel McBrayer
text: Best local dojo to train. Everyone there is very respectful and does everything possible to help you learn and stay on track.

name: Lucy Borja
text:
I have been coming to this place for a long time and have a tremendous amount of respect for everyone here! This place is family to me! Even though I cant be there as much as I want to! Lol
-Tony Phillips

name: jennifer moore
text: Awesome instructor and staff. I felt right at home. I highly recommend Triad!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Beth Carpenter
text: My son has trained at Triad for over a year. The staff are fantastic..the dojo is kept clean and the classes are top notch. He has grown as a student..and as a young man. I can't reccomend Triad enough.

name: Viper Exists
text: My son began his training here in 2013 at the age of four. The only dojo to accept little ones. He completed the Lil’ Dragons class and will be testing for his yellow belt tomorrow. He has learned so much from this amazing group of trainers. I highly recommend Triad Martial Arts in Cullman to anyone seriously seeking to train!

name: Michael Obrien
text:
Great place great people
I highly recommend this place
Become a member of the TRIAD family 😄

name: Dustin Leonard
text: The best thing to ever happen to me! The best teachers. The best jiujitsu. The best attitudes. Just the best! If you have children that need to learn respect or just have energy they need to channel this is the place. Want to get into shape? This is the place! Mma your goal look no further! Anything can be accomplished with the tools you can get here.

name: Jason Pilkington
text: Amazing instructors, great classmates. If you want to better yourself & gain confidence, Triad Martial Arts Academy is the place to train. Jiu Jitsu, Karate, & Vale Tudo classes are all great!

name: Jonathan and April Graves
text:
We as a family have been training at Triad since 2014. The family atmosphere is wonderful. There is a lot of respect trained and shown to all students. You learn quickly that a belt at Triad is truly earned, not just given like many schools. Everyone is willing to help each other learn and grow.
Shihan Daniel O’Brien is one of the most brilliant BJJ practitioners and teachers. His ability to teach and encourage, especially the little ones, is amazing.
Our Kyoshi, Johnny Lee Smith, is also the founder of SSGT (Strategic Self-Defence & Gunfighting Tactics) which is training used my law enforcement throughout the southeast.
If you or your kids are interested in the martial arts, there is no better place!

name: Brigette Jarrett
text: I’ve been training at Triad Martial Arts in Cullman for a total of three years but specifically in jiu jitsu for one year. I’ve gained so much valuable knowledge and detail training under Shihan Daniel O’Brien that I will carry with me for the rest of my life. Very welcoming students that train at this school. Couldn’t ask for better instructors and training partners!

name: Barbie Garner
text: Great instructors for all levels!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🥋🔺️

name: Harlie Moon
text: If you are looking to experience Martial Arts in its purest form you should give Triad a try... One of the best BJJ schools in the world... Everyone is very helpful and knowledgeable...

name: Jordan O'Brien
text: Daniel O'Brien is the best in the state no doubt! I wouldn't take my kids anywhere else! Why would you want training from anyone else, when the best is an option??

name: Christine Lamb
text: I have watched my daughter blossom and gain self confidence over the last 6 months. She never wants to miss a class!

name: kellie kirby
text: My son has been training here over 9 years - excellent instruction, personal development, character, confidence, self defense. Proud of the young man he has become with the leadership from Triad

name: daniel obrien
text: Number 1 school in the state. Most black belts under one school. Trained closely with Wonder Boy.

name: Raptorclan
text: I've been there for four months now.  They train you hard. I am a orange belt now.

name: John O'Brien
text: Best martial arts training and instructos. Period.

name: jonathan baty
text: Triad is an amazing place to train with amazing training partners!!

name: Josette O'Brien
text: Triad Martial Arts treats you like family.They are the most decorated school in Alabama. Daniel O'Brien is the only in the state to win the jiu jitsu world's Gold at brown belt in 2010.Triad was founded by Johnny Lee Smith. Johnny is also the founder of SSGT, combat and self defense training for law enforcement. Triad cares about their students and teaches them how to defend themselves and grow confidence as well as friendships with great honor and loyalty to the dojo and the art. Thank you Triad Martial Arts for being a wonderful powerful beacon for Cullman and the state.

name: Don Prince
text: Top level Jiu-Jitsu. Best Jiu-Jitsu in Alabama bar none.

name: Dan Griffiths
text: This gym lacks respect... There are better places to train.

name: TheBuzzsaw16
text: Great school with the best instructor in the state!

name: Neil Whiticar
text: Had a seminar with him, very approachable, great teacher

name: john m
text: Best place to train, period

name: mary rosenbeck
text: It's a great gym. I love practicing here.

name: Hunter Hendrix
text: Great Gym if your not in a mood just to go to be seen anyways very friendly and non judging gym

name: Lance G
text: These folks are the best. Very knowledgeable, professional and caring. Best physical fitness place around!

name: Sam Sykstus
text: I’ve spent a good amount of time at CrossFit Huntsville throughout the past few years and it is hands down the greatest gym I’ve been to. The coaches, facility, workouts and members are top tier and have set a phenomenal standard for what a gym should be. I cannot recommend Crossfit Huntsville enough.

name: Kevin Lowe
text: Best CF box in Huntsville!  Great coaches.  Very friendly community.

name: Kip McClung
text: Great box, great coaches and great people.

name: Kyle
text: I joined CF HSV to add some variety to my workouts and challenge myself in new ways, and it's easily one of the best decisions I've made! The coaches are great at helping us newbies navigate new movements and lingo and the programming makes for varied and enjoyable workouts. I look forward to getting to this gym every time and highly recommend it!

name: David Crow
text: Great gym for drop-ins. Roomy, good size classes, good coaches. Some of the best programming I've seen, though they're more RX vs RX+ weight than a differentiated life vs sport movements approach. Not much feeling of community: people are more likely to clean up their weights, foam roll, and chat, rather than cheering on the last finishers. Passing through for a month, though, I couldn't ask for better!

name: David Preczewski
text: CFHSV is a top-notch company.  I traveled to Huntsville for work and took their introduction classes as well as 2 months of regular classes.  They are passionate about teaching proper techniques, their coaches are professional, and the people that go there are friendly.  I can't thank them enough for their coaching and I appreciate all they do to support service members and First-Responders.  Hope to be back soon!

name: Carson Wakefield
text: I've been here for over 10 years and truly believe this is the best crossfit box in Huntsville.  The facilities are top notch, the coaches are engaged, and the community just can't be beat.

name: Mark Hurter
text: I started here in January of 2016 after losing my motivation in the daily traditional body-building gym grind.  I have loved it from day one.  There isn't a single day that I have dragged ass into the gym, I always come in ready to challenge myself, and be pushed by the staff and other members at the box.  The facility is top-notch, from the staff, to the equipment, to the members.  Highly recommended.

name: Sergio Antonio
text: Just had my first CrossFit box experience in over a year.  I generally train solo with workouts from posted WOD’s.  I was treated very well by both coaches upon arrival.  I was quickly taken into the office to fill out my waiver, and offered a discount for coming back since I’m visiting.  Just a great experience all around.  This is a huge box!  I’m impressed, and I’ll be back.  I’d recommend this box to anyone, new or experienced.

name: Ryan “Bam Bam” Smith
text: Was in town for a class and CrossFit Huntsville was recommended to me. I will say this Nate and his crew blew me away. They know so much information and different cues your bound to get it. The best gym I've ever been to hands down next time I'm in town I know where I'm going.

name: Doug Esleeck
text: Very nice facility. Not very welcoming. The instructor was awesome! Very helpful and friendly. The 10 other people in the class never spoke, and even when I tried to tell someone "good job" they ignored me. No community experience at all; I will not be back.

name: Jeff Williams
text: Nathaniel and Mande are awesome.  Great staff.  Very accommodating and supportive with us that are new to crossfit.  Very nice gym.

name: the
text: I have been doing crossfit for a few months now. It has been helping me lose weight.

name: Robert Langly
text: Not the right gym for me.

name: Jason Hagemann
text: Just no.  Don't do it.

name: Danny Bulgatz
text:
Highly recommend this gym!

Jon (owner) is so welcoming and kind. The gym is incredibly clean, equipment is well kept, the rig is amazing, and even the barbells are Rogue.

Programming is challenging and fun. You can tell a lot of thought and care went into this setup.

It’s great to see such an awesome CrossFit gym in the Hampton Cove area!

name: Anna Case
text: I came to town from Atlanta was was really excited to train here for a view days. Everyone I met went out of their way to introduce themselves and I felt really welcomed. The thing that stood out to me was the amount and quality of the equipment that the gym had and how great the coaches were. Will definetly be coming back next time I’m in town!

name: Colton Tisch
text: CrossFit Hampton Cove is awesome. Popped in for the weekend while visiting my parents and the workouts were great but the people were better! Great experience 👍

name: Brian Stephens
text: Great box. I dropped in for a month and then 2 weeks later. Was close to the hotel I was at for work and the coaches are great. Equipment is in great shape and very clean.

name: Dustin Nguyen
text: Was in town for a wedding and needed a place to drop-in. John the owner was very welcoming and the people there were very encouraging. Definitely will be coming back whenever I’m back in town.

name: Garnet Jones
text: I was visiting in laws over the Christmas holidays (12/22/20)and stopped in for an 8:30 class.  The gym is super clean with top notch equipment (BONUS: anti chaffing rogue ab mats). The coach was very knowledgeable and helpful (without hovering) and the members were friendly and encouraging.  I am in huntsville frequently and will definitely be coming back to Hampton Cove CrossFit!

name: Chase Blanton
text: I joined HCC as a member for a few months while I was living in Hampton Cove, and I highly recommend them. They have a great faciality with good equipment, a knowledgeable coaching staff, and a friendly environment! Regardless of your fitness level I believe they can accommodate your needs if you're willing to meet them half way! So, whether your just dropping in, or your looking to find a permeant gym, give HCC a shot! I don't think you'll be disappointed!

name: Misty Arabie
text: Dropped in from LOUISIANA yesterday and today! Great community, awesome box, and killer WODs!! Will definitely go back next time I am in town!

name: Ryan Jones
text: The absolute package when it comes to programming, equipment, community, and high quality coaching! I have made the most progress I have ever seen in myself during my time at this gym, and that is all thanks to the amazing coaching staff and programming at HCCF. Every coach is very educated and can help tailor your workout to your specific needs, not to mention the fact I get to use some of the best pieces of equipment on the market. I absolutely love HCCF because everyone there goes above and beyond to make it an environment for all ages, genders, etc to be apart of and experience growth.

name: Dustin Hatten
text: Hampton Cove CrossFit is a great place to be.  Jon genuinely cares about his members and treats all of us like family.  The coaches have a lot of CrossFit knowledge, and they do whatever they can to help you get better.  More importantly, they are a lot of fun to be around!  If you are looking for a hardworking and family oriented atmosphere, this is it!

name: Rob Hallett
text: HCCF is by far the best gym I have had the opportunity to work out in. Not only do they provide exceptional programming they also have some of the best coaches I have been trained by. The owners, Jon and Willa do an amazing job making you feel like family and that encourages friendships and a fun competitive environment.  The gym is always very clean and the equipment is top of the line! Thank you to Jon, Willa, and all the amazing coaches at HCCF!

name: Daniel Bayer
text: Very friendly coaching staff and owner! This gym is dedicated to continuing to upgrade and provide its members with the best possible facility and equipment. Great location for people living in Hampton Cove! If you’re new to CrossFit or an experienced CrossFitter this location has everything you’ll need to be a successful athlete. Great selection of class times and open gym times throughout the week and even on weekends!

name: Emily Schaefer
text: My SO and I were in Huntsville over the weekend for a wedding, and dropped in at Hampton Cove CrossFit to do the Open 20.5 workout. I corresponded with Jon, one of the coaches, ahead of time, and he was great about providing drop-in details and working with us to find a convenient time. Fellow coach Willa was able to open the gym for us and help us get set up for the workout. The facility was great--spacious and clean! Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting the area.

name: Jason Saunders
text: My wife and I dropped in over Thanksgiving.  Coach Brad was fantastic.  Friendly, funny, explained the workout and intent clearly, along with scales/modifications up and down.  Demonstrated the workout well, and led the class through an effective warm up.  The class timeline was spot on, and everyone ended the workout, reaching the intended stimulus, and high giving.  Great friendly, and supportive community!  Keep up the great work guys!

name: Eric Thompson
text: You really can’t go wrong at Hampton Cove CrossFit. There an ever-present positive atmosphere amongst the coaches and members. It truly is a second family.  Most of the equipment is in excellent condition, and there are only a few non-essential items that could be added.  Overall I highly recommend this box!

name: Jazmin Ortega
text: Hampton Cove Crossfit is the gym where I tried Crossfit for the first time, and it was the people there who made me absolutely love Crossfit. This gym has the most friendly, welcoming, helpful and encouraging people!

name: Betty Thomas
text: I dropped in for a few days at this box!! Friendly and welcoming atmosphere! Nice equipment and facility! The coaches were engaged during the WOD and the owner/staff were down to earth but passionate about CrossFit. As a newcomer of less than a year to CrossFit I appreciated all of this! I felt at home here! If you are visiting in the Huntsville, AL area, this box is also conveniently (within 4 mins) located near a hotel. I will be visiting again.

resp.text: We were glad to have you Betty!

name: Alex Tigue
text: HCCF was the first CF gym I joined about 2 years ago. Awesome staff and owners. Very knowledgeable and welcoming to new members and drop ins. Moved away after 6 months, but still come back to drop in from time to time. Facilities are great. Lots of new barbells and a really nice new rig. Great atmosphere from the members. If you are visiting the area and looking to drop in or looking for a new gym in Huntsville, you won’t be disappointed with HCCF.

name: gosia thompson
text: Love this gym. We come every day except weekends and always get a great workout. Coaches are awesome and professionally trained, and the athletes are friendly and welcoming. Everyone will make you feel welcomed from day 1 you show up. I look forward every day to my afternoon workout 😀

name: Amanda Williams
text: My husband and I have been members of this gym since it opened in 2012. Prior to starting CrossFit, I rarely worked out and had never lifted weights. This gym, the owners, coaches, and community have changed my life. You’re never too out of shape to begin. Every movement can be modified. It’s never too late to take charge of your health. I love these people and this place!

name: Meagan Cross
text: Outstanding experience! I am a member at another CrossFit gym in Mississippi and dropped in here. The space was awesome, the workout was great, and the coaches were even better! John really did a great job making me feel welcome and pushing me. Will be back every time I am in Huntsville!

name: Barbie Sumner
text: My first time experiencing CrossFit was at this gym and I’ve been going on four years strong. The HCCF community is so encouraging for newbies. The coaches take the time to help you and always make you feel like you belong. Highly recommend this gym to everyone- check it out!

name: Jessica Hutchinson
text: Dropped in for a class while we were in town. Everyone was really welcoming and encouraging. Even as a veteran crossfitter and walk-in guest, got great coaching and advice from the coach there. Highly recommend this place!

name: Jessica Wolff
text: I had been considering giving CrossFit a try for years. I finally decided that I was going to face my fears and go for it. I am almost four weeks in and my only regret is that I didn't start sooner. Specifically, I am so glad that I chose to start with Hampton Cove CrossFit. I was told when I started, that Hampton Cove CrossFit would be more like a family than just a place I go to work out. I have learned that to be the truth. Every coach and every other athlete (no matter the level of the athlete) has greeted me with open arms and has offered to help me in any way they can. Every coach and every athlete at Hampton Cove CrossFit brings something to the table. I am already doing things that I thought I couldn't do and my new CrossFit family has been there to cheer me on every step of the way. I started out going three times a week and quickly wanted to change my membership so that I could take unlimited classes. This experience has been life changing for me so far and I can't wait to see what Hampton Cove CrossFit can do for me long term.

name: Chris Heckler
text: Great drop in experience! Good coaching, friendly class and all around fun time! This is a nicely equipped gym that even has child care and embodies southern hospitality!

name: Christian Ludlum
text: I was in town for the week, for work, and found Hampton Cove Crossfit to get my workouts in. I am really happy I did.  This gym made me feel like I didn't miss a beat from my home gym.  The workouts were great.  The people and coaches were awesome. If I am ever back in the Huntsville area, this will be the gym I am going to.

name: Brian Bell
text: My wife and I stopped in to an open gym while we were in town visiting family and had an absolutely awesome time. The staff and members at Hampton Cove CF were friendly and welcoming. We felt like we were a part of the family. If you are in the area, you should definitely check this place out.

name: Jose Hector Sandoval
text: Great coaching staff and facilities.  Friendly and welcoming atmosphere. I dropped in for during business travel and will be back next time I'm in town 💪

name: Katherine Burma
text: Hampton Cove Crossfit is a wonderful gym! The community is incredibly welcoming and even the most difficult workouts are fun when you get to workout next to these awesome people! Jon and Willa have put so much work into the gym, and their hard work shows! Even if CrossFit makes you nervous, don't be afraid to give it a try!

name: Amy Herrington
text: Hampton Cove CrossFit is a fantastic gym filled with knowledgeable coaches and friendly members. Jon, the owner, does a great job at seeing and valuing each person that walks through the door. All ages and skills are welcome. If you are considering CrossFit, give HCCF a try!

name: Jessica Banks
text: Hampton Cove CrossFit has been my home gym for a little over a year now. Since day one it has felt like home. The owners, coaches, and members are so supportive and helpful. Due to time constraints, I had to join another box for a month. During that month I missed HCCF so much. The saying “you don’t know what you’ve got until it’s gone” was so true for me. I’m happy to be back “home” at HCCF with incredible coaches + friends. Don’t hesitate to join this box! It’s truly the best.

name: Daniel Guthrie
text: Dropped in from out of town for the week. Everyone was very welcoming and the coaches were very knowledgeable. Great box to go to if you're in the area.

name: Ginger Pratico
text: Excellent and friendly staff and members! My kids enjoy their experience at Hampton Cove CrossFit and we’re able to accomplish things they didn’t know were possible.

name: Andrew Wiley
text:
My fiancé and I were traveling and happened upon Hampton Cove Crossfit and we’re glad we did.  The facility is great with plenty of space and lots of equipment.  But the staff and members really made this a great drop in.  We were welcomed warmly and had they explained quickly how their box warmed up and did the WOD.  The coach Patrick was so great about being instructive without being condescending or judgmental.  John the owner who was working out at the time made a point to come welcome us as well.

We really enjoyed our workout!   Thanks a ton!

name: Ginnie Leahy
text: Such a great box, very encouraging, kind and welcoming. I love walking in there, such great coaches.

name: Freda Bjorkman
text: Hampton Cove Crossfit is the best thing that has happened to me this year. As a woman in her mid-fifties, I knew I needed to be concerned about my bone health. With that in mind, I decided to give Crossfit a try. I was understandably nervous going to my first few classes, but everyone, from my fellow “younger” athletes to all the amazing coaches, were friendly and supportive. At HCCF, I’ve learned that it’s all about “functional mobility,” and now that I’ve become stronger in both body and mind, I am able to do physical activities that I love, such as gardening, with much more strength and ease. If you are someone like me (from a certain older generation, lol) don’t be afraid to come on over to HCCF and give it a try! If I can do it, ANYONE can!

name: JLA4
text: This is a really great gym, I learned so much, everyone here are amazing.

name: Beth Watts
text: Great gym.  Highly recommend!

name: Sara Wood
text: Love the workouts, the people, the coaches and the atmosphere here.

name: HUNTER JOHNSON
text: Love me some Moontown Crossfit... Great community

name: Daniel Cooper
text: Hampton Cove CrossFit = Supportive Family/Community

name: Fred Lurenz
text: Doing it right!

name: Kelly Samples
text: This is the most welcoming and inclusive gym I have ever found. I am so happy to have found Phase.

name: Katie Beckham
text: Phase Gym is the most welcoming and empowering fitness facility for people of all backgrounds!  Not to mention some of the best music and wall murals in Birmingham. The trainers and members are more than a community to me and rather a family. I am amazed at how my life has evolved since joining Phase Gym 3-4 years ago! I am a more confident and strong woman today thanks to the Phase community!

resp.text: We love you, Katie! Thank you for being a part of our family

name: Mariel Parman
text: I'm so glad I made the switch to Phase at the start of this year as an open gym member. It's the perfect size, and I never have to wait to use any weights or equipment. You truly feel like anyone is welcome here, no matter your race, gender, size, etc. They've done a great job keeping things clean and uncrowded during Covid, too. Highly recommend!

resp.text: You kill it day in and day out. A true inspiration on being responsible and healthy. Thank you for the review and for being part of the Phase Family!

name: Kyle McKinley
text: Great gym, great people!

name: Farah Sukkar
text: Great trainers! Empowering people who make workouts fun! Highly recommend!

resp.text: You’re the fun one :)

name: Sean Hiller
text: Kevin is very knowledgeable about movement and is a great motivator. This is a great gym!

name: hd374d
text: So glad that I signed up at Phase Gym. The staff is always friendly, helpful, and stay focused on my goals. A+++

name: Timothy Dorsey
text: Great trainer

name: Darin Damron
text: What a great find. I travel a lot and usually have to use hotel gyms or the larger chain gyms. The Basement gym was walking distance from my hotel. Had two great workouts during my stay. Lots of options on equipment and can accommodate any workout style. Go see Jamie if you live in the area or are just passing through.

name: Erin Lisa Butler Simmons
text: I love this gym! It's serious about helping you reach your goals. No lunk alarms, they don't serve pizza and don't  limit your weights or  exertion noises  like some of the trendy gyms.  Hunter and Jamie are so friendly and welcoming.  I have never felt anything but welcome here as a 53 year old woman training to become a powerlifter. And every man I have come across at gym has been polite and friendly. Great place and a fantastic environment!

name: Matt Leder
text: Even a year after visiting the Basement Gym the owner called me to ask how my visit was and if I'd consider joining. If only I lived in Alabama! One of the best gyms I've been to across the country. Love the subterranean/Basement feeling.

name: Hoyt Middleton
text: Always friendly and great staff I like this place and you should go and check it out

name: Angela Craig
text: Crickets gymnastics is a great start for my 3yr old

name: Cindy Vines
text: Great yoga classes.

name: Tales and Trails
text: Always clean staff is very courteous they have a good variety of machines and free weights

name: Tiffany James
text: Amazing staff and I love it there

name: Michael Hubbert
text: Great atmosphere, the gym is always clean, and the members are friendly. This location is very safe as it has 24 surveillance and a dedicated emergency phone in the main gym area.

name: JT Myers
text: Cancelled membership over 6 months ago just found out they have still been charging me this whole time .I even have mestages from them wanting me to rejoin...to the the tune of 200 +DOLLARS nice way to do business

name: Rich Brooks
text: Great place to work out. Clean and friendly folks.

name: Tracy Tondola
text: Good

name: Rebecca Slowinski
text: Awesome gym! Never crowded, good equipment, and there are members of all fitness levels so it’s not an intimidating environment. Overall an awesome vibe and really cool location. I’ve been training with Matthew and I’ve loved it!

name: John Tally
text: Great location downtown between Paramount and Pizitz. If you work or live downtown it should be a short walk.   I've been training with Matt for just over three months now and to say the results are definitely noticeable would be a huge understatement!

name: Matthew Foster
text: Really cool gym. Fantastic atmosphere, solid equipment, music is always on point, trainers are very skilled and it’s 24 hours. Can’t ask for much more! High recommend!

name: Allen Jones
text: They truly care about their clients! They ask if you have any equipment you’d want and will answer any questions you have. It’s a nice, safe, and friendly place  to work out!

resp.text: Thank you Alex! We’re glad you’re enjoying it!

name: Kelley Stafford
text: I love this gym! One on one attention. Top of the line equipment. Clean and never crowded! The owners have become some of my great friends through training. You will not find a better environment! 🙌🏻

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love having you there and will always strive to be the best! 💪🏼

name: Nash Osborne
text: Sculpt is great! It's full of great energy, quality trainers, solid equipment, and even better people. It's an awesome space with a community built out of people on every different level of the fitness journey and a judgment-FREE place where everyone is there to get a quality workout in and encourage others along the way. You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Community is everything! Thank you for being a part of the fam!

name: Lindsey Seal

name: Eric L
text:
I have to say I have always been skeptical about utilizing a personal trainer for fitness. I have always done well with self directed fitness with a work out buddy. Unfortunately, my workout partner recently moved away and I have found myself making more excuses to not work out. I finally decided to give a personal trainer a chance after running into William at a social event. He immediately struck me as a very approachable, enthusiastic individual. He was happy to answer all my questions and entertain my skepticism. After meeting with him to discuss my goals and past obstacles to success in the gym, he quickly constructed a workout plan that was right for me.

I was impressed from the start with William’s approach to building success in the gym. His workout program is challenging, creative, and efficient. He utilized many unique modalities to help create a perfect whole body workout but also hits the specific muscle groups that need improvement. This guy knows how to get results! I highly recommend him to anyone looking for an excellent coach and motivator in the gym!

resp.text: Eric L thank you for your review and we look forward to helping you reach your fitness goals!

name: Christine Robertson
text: Sculpt is amazing! Locally owned and super laid back. Kris, the owner, is also a certified personal trainer and is so good at what she does. I came into this fitness journey knowing literally nothing. (I had been to the gym maybe twice in my life.) Kris made me feel so comfortable in the gym and helped me with a meal plan also! She busted so many fitness myths for me! I still get to eat things I love and don’t spend crazy amounts of time in the gym and I’m probably in the best shape I’ve ever been in.  Whether you want to lose weight, maintain weight, gain muscle, or just overall be in better shape, Sculpt is where it’s at! Check them out!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your support and continue to spread the word 🙌

name: Ashley Chandler

name: Julie Hass
text: My 88 year old grandfather was experiencing numerous health issues, including muscle weakness and issues with balance which were limiting his mobility. He attended physical therapy sessions in the past, but did not see significant improvement. The lack of improvement was attributed to several reasons, one of which was his lack of commitment and consistency to  the program. The first day he walked into Renew, not only was the staff extremely knowledgeable... but they were engaging! They were friendly and fun and interacted with my grandfather in such a manner that he actually enjoyed going to his visits. In the past, it had been a chore getting him to attend on a regular basis... but after participating in a few sessions with Cary at Renew, he actually looked forward to his visits and wanted to attend. My grandfather had an excellent outcome because of his excellent experience. Cary is a great therapist and not only provides top notch treatment to his patients, but does so in a fun, interactive and engaging manner. My grandfather felt like he was a celebrity each time he walked in to an appointment because Cary and Tara were so engaging! I would highly recommend Renew Therapy. It is a top notch, where patients are treated in a one on one manner and the entire staff is truly invested in the care and treatment plan of the patient and the person as a whole.

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Julie, for taking the time to talk about your experience with us! We really do LOVE what we do!! We are always here for you guys if you need us again.
Please tell "pappy" that we said hello and that we miss him!

Someone is always with you so you don’t do incorrect exercises, & encouraging you all the way!!  This is the place where you go to actually get better!! name: Rickmercs
text:
I like to pick things up and put them down at this place.

It's a great 3 story facility. The cardio machines are on the bottom floor with some boxing bags and a water fountain. The facility is wheelchair accessible.

The middle floor has all the free weights and weigh machines. And there are about 200 different machines on this floor. If you can't find what you need here then you don't belong in a gym.

Teddy Zane is the owner and he is an awesome dude,He is very helpful person if you are a novice lifter. And he doesn't tolerate any bs in his gym such as leaving weights lying around.

They constantly update the machines and move more in. They aren't all brand new but none of them are in bad condition whatsoever.

The top floor is a cardio boxing class that they offer.

10/10 love when I get to come to this gym. It is by far one of the best gyms I have visited in Alabama.

name: Trey Goff
text: Attempted to visit Jan. 17, 2021, and it’s closed—completely out of business and vacant.

name: Chris
text: Very shady and unprofessional business/owner. They change the code with no way to tell people. They say 24/7 gym but turn the AC off at night (even in the summer). Moved to a different town and still charged me for the gym that is no longer even open. Phone number disconnected. Look up the owner on Facebook. He’s a COVID-19 denialist who only cares about his bottom line. They had to do a cease and desist order from a judge to get him to shut down during the city ordinance. He recently posted “fake news” on his fb page claiming the new Crunch fitness gym will charge $100/month.... they will charge $9.95.... so way better equipment for less than 1/3 of his price.

name: The Mini Pig Farrier
text:
We were staying at a local hotel and were told we could utilize a gym down the street to workout at. Being on the road traveling full time for business, we really didn’t feel like driving 20-30 minutes to the nearest Anytime Fitness to use our membership.

Glad we came in. Upon entry, it was slightly confusing so we wandered around wondering where the actual gym equipment was.

You see, the floor level had all the cardio equipment and some machines with punching bags.

Upstairs though, is a whole different world. Level 2 is an old school style gym with as many free weights and racks one can imagine. The equipment is well-used and all the bodybuilding memorabilia makes you feel like you’re in iron heaven. If only a gym like this existed in Gatesville, Texas where we call home. Next trip through Alabama, either later this year or in 2021, this will be a must-visit stop again—even if we don’t have any scheduled clients in Birmingham.  =)

name: Jerimy Boman
text: This is the best gym in the Birmingham area hands down. 3 floors of up to date equipment, plenty of free weights, and it's a clean facility! Training is offered for an extra fee, and the owner is extremely knowledgeable and people friendly.

name: deedee dandridge
text: Please don't join this gym. They won't tell you you're on a 12month contract and when you decide to cancel it you have to pay out your contact or they will put it on your credit. Its so many hidden fees.They use a company named affiliated acceptance. Its not worth it. Its very cold and the carpet is dirty. Some machines doesn't work. Please don't join this gym you will regret it find another gym. And Mic is not my boyfriend and he paid for the hole the next time he got paid. He bought you the $100 remember. You was all cool when you got that $100. And if my review was false you wouldn't have responded. I'm not the only one who wrote a 1 star review on y'all. Even on the BBB website y'all reviews are terrible.

resp.text: Deedee your boyfriend knocked a massive hole in the wall at our facility and we were extremely easy to work with. We've continued to try and work with you both to resolve the property damage but you personally have decided to take measures into your own hands and shut down your payment to our facility. Please tell the truth. Everything written in this review is false. Your anger stems from damage you caused in the facility,  nothing we did. Please see me at the center if you would like to further discuss. Ty

name: Stacey Annestedt
text: Flex fitness has a great program. Stan does a great conditioning and boxing program. I am in the best shape of my life. The equipment is great. I would recommend this gym to anyone that wants a great workout

name: Milton Honeycutt
text: Great place to work out with all kinds of equipment. Been working with Jason, he is an awesome boxing coach he will work with you and help you reach your goals I recommend flex and boxing to everyone,and I have already lost 40 pounds in a month and a half. Teddy Zane is also a real stand up guy always looking to make things better.

name: Michael Walding
text:
I like to pick stuff up and then put it down and Flex had more stuff for me to pick up than any other gym around. The staff is always nice, Teddy the owner is a good guy, and they play real music overhead.
Also their trainers are real trainers, not just gym employees. I would recommend Flex Fitness to anyone looking to change their lifestyle or just get help w diet and general fitness.
I would also recommend putting ur weights up when u finish ur set

name: Chad Davis
text: I live an hour away but it is worth the drive! Teddy knows his stuff and Chris is awesome to talk to. This place is LOADED with plenty of free weights, machines, and cardio equipment! Would HIGHLY recommend.

name: david mason
text: I had a billing issue. But teddy and his staff were helpful in resolving the issue.  All that to say i recommend flex fitness for their professionalism and willingness to help. Thank you.

name: Matt Cook
text: I cancelled my plan. They still charged me two months after the three months you pay to cancel. They said they were going to put the money back in my account and they never did. When I call the phone it either doesn't work or they don't answer. I would give a zero review if I could.

name: Donald Snow
text: One of the best fitness, I've ever been a part.Stan do a Good job with the boxing and cross fit programs. More than enough weights to work with. Refer this gym to anybody.

name: Carl Murray
text: This gym is caters to body builders and power lifters. However, even if that's not what you are looking for you can get a good workout. The gym lacks some amenities other gyms offer such as larger lockers rooms, massage machines, multiple shower stalls. But as far a machines, equipment and actual weights it covers the all the needs and offers rates based on the equipment you want access to ranging from $10.00 to $45.00

name: Sara W.
text: Great and helpful gym. This place meets all of my strength training, boxing, and conditioning needs. The other gym goers are good about offering weight lifting tips without crowding your space. I have learned a lot here! Ask for Stan- he is great and fun to work with.

name: Superior Wrestling
text: I started training at Flex two years ago and it is without a doubt the best gym I’ve ever stepped foot into. The staff is extremely knowledgeable and has help me shatter my fitness goals, and set new ones!

name: Nick Campbell
text: Insane gym!!! Nice equipment and amazing staff!! They know what you need to reach your goals and tell you how to reach them! I would recommend everyone to go the Flex!!

name: Ryan Russell
text: Flex fitness has the best equipment in Birmingham if you are looking to powerlift, bodybuild or just get in shape.

name: Elaina Miller
text: Stan is an amazing trainer! Very easy to work with and I am confident I'll be ready to be the newest avenger by Halloween.

name: Abbie Rae
text: I have been a member on and off here for the past 4 years or so. I cancelled my first membership after my year was up because I moved back home, I had no problems the first time. I then reopened my membership again when I moved back to Irondale in August 2017. I have recently moved back home again and cancelled my membership again because its too far of a drive. I had some issues with my pregnancy, and could not use my membership. A medical hold was put on my account for 2 months which I appreciated while I was in the hospital and back and forth with my daughter in the NICU, so I obviously had no time or need for a gym right now. This was in April. I understood that I was obligated to a year with the membership. My year was up in August 2018. I called and spoke with Chris, cancelled my membership, I was told to send an email explaining why I needed to cancel my membership and what I wanted to do. I thought everything was good and my membership was cancelled because that is what I was told over the phone. I have since been charged numerous times and my account has gone into overdraft because of this. I have tried to contact this place numerous times to talk with them about this, but I can NEVER get an answer. I have called from both my cell, and work phone. I finally gave up and called my bank. Thankfully, they reimbursed my overdraft charges and refunded the money for this. I checked today and there is yet another charge for this, AND another overdraft fee. Thanks to this, I got turned down for a loan that I needed for college due to having overdraft in my account from a membership that I was told was cancelled.  I am not happy at all and I hope this place fixes their communication issues and gets some better customer support, so this does not happen to anyone else. I have always recommended Flex Fitness, because it was one of the nicest, cleanest, well kept gyms that I have been to. I don't know what else to do, maybe one day I can get them on the phone to talk to them about my issues.

name: Stan Reed
text: Flex is by far the best gym in the state,I have worked out at a lot of gyms and never have I been in a gym where there is no egos and everyone has the same goal and helps and motivates you to be your best, if your a body builder, power lifter or just wanting to lose weight and get in shape Flex Fitness is the gym to go to

name: Jason Moss
text: Been a member for some time,best jym in Birmingham, recently joined boxing,my trainer Stan great guy,very motivating and gives each student the personal attention and training to meet their goals.join this jym! Become a flex model💪🥊😎

name: Royce Butler
text: Best gym in Birmingham with the biggest selection of equipment! Thanks Teddy!

name: Jay Suave
text: Sweet gym! Nothing like a classic old school heavy iron gym. Love it!

name: Jason Westbrook
text: Flex is the most versatile and amazing  gyms I have ever worked out in. The name says it all. 3 full levels of flexibility. Level 1 for cardio and iso machines along with tanning beds, level 2 for the serious muscle building experience, and my personal favorite, level 3 - the warrior room for serious body building and USPA powerlifting. Teddy the owner is one of the coolest gym owners I have ever met. He is super knowledgeable and more than willing to help anyone achieve their goals. If you want to seriously change your life then Flex is defiantly the gym for you!!

name: Joe Riner
text: There is so much variety and with three floors of equipment you are sure to have a lot available.

name: Jason Moss
text: Best gym in Birmingham,they changed my health from negative to positive

name: Amanda J Vaughn
text: I've been a member at this gym for years and I still love it.

name: Jarett Ferguson
text: Great place to get the work done!

name: Cameron Scoggins
text: Place started out good. But the "boxing coach" became very flaky and would ask you to loan him money but then forget to pay you back.

resp.text: Hey Cameron. Teddy Zane. You've always come to me whenever you needed anything. I'm shocked to read this. I thought you and Stan had a great friendship. From what I could see it went beyond Flex. Please contact me so I can handle this proper and professionally. Thank you.

name: Nikita Davis
text: If a rugged, tough, hardcore gym is what you're looking for, this is the place

name: joey tureau
text:
Stay away from this gym and for sure do not hire a trainer it is all a scam the trainer I hired screwed me at the start but I was nice to give him another chance and he gave me a deal for 3 months of training well that trainer is not there anymore and I am just screwed
STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS GYM
UPDATE 9/5/18 HAVE NOT BEEN TO THIS GYM IN 1 YEAR AS I WAS TOLD MY MEMBERSHIP WAS TERMINATED DUE TO ALL THE PROBLEMS AND BAD REVIEW I GAVE BUT NOW I HAVE A CHARGE FROM FLEX FITNESS 39.99 ON MY ACCOUNT
AGAIN I URGE YOU TO STAY AWAY FROM THIS GYM NOTHING BUT PROBLEMS AND SCAMS

resp.text: Hi Joey. Yes we had to fire Stan. Stan does not reflect the business we run. He had problems and once we caught onto this we let him go. I did however set you up with a month of free training that you already received and also left us a great review thanking us for. It was my understanding you were very pleased with how you were compensated for Stans miss doing. We have many great trainers to choose from at Flex.  If you'd like to work with Jason (one of our best)  I can set that up for you. This review comes at quite a shock considering your were so pleased with the actual training you received. Feel free to contact me and we'll handle it professionally.

name: Jeremy Battles
text: Great variety of equipment and membership rates.

name: Imad
text:
Edit: Teddy reached out to me and despite my issue I'd like it to be known that I don't harbor any personal ill will towards him. In all my interactions with Teddy he's always been a chill guy. I still hope the front desk issues get resolved; however, now that I have his cell phone number I'll just harangue him personally! :)

I think it's comical that a business never answers their phone and consistently has a full voicemail inbox. I have literally tried calling these people no short of 3 dozen times over a one month period. They must care very little about selling memberships and maintaining customer satisfaction. All I want to know is what my freaking door code is because you guys keep changing it every other month. I'm not available to leisurely swing by during your business hours - not that it matters because no one is ever at the desk!

name: Gus Hill
text: Best gym in Birmingham

name: Paul Coulon
text: Great gym with great personal trainers

name: Cody Siddons
text: Great gym, great people, great time.

name: Jessica Mendoza
text: 3 levels for lots of different workouts

name: official Teddy Zane DOGEWARRIOR
text: Endless equipment 30,000 Square Feet. Similar gyms include Quads Gym Chicago,  Bevs Powerhouse Newark, Golds Gym California

name: Shane Lowe
text: I wouldn’t join, because they don’t answer the phone and are too aggressive about getting you to join!

name: James Hamby
text: Guy at the desk gave me a tour. 3 stories. Lots of equipment. I guess it's an okay deal. No cancel fees is a major major plus

name: Frank Pearson
text: The comorodery

name: Samuel Leps
text: What's not to love at 25 bucks a month for two floors full of weights and treadmills?

name: Talethia Cosby
text: This place is really open 24/7

name: TheGuardianof3
text: Awesome facility

name: Angel Tutton
text: Loved it

name: Candye Hicks
text: Horrible
