name: Lakeidra Mims
text: Reviving

name: Victor Oliver
text: Nice facility for a NAIA school.

name: Michael Hargrove
text: Awesome

name: Jordan Clark
text: Great workout.  Fun classes.  Solid team of instructors.

name: Jennifer Sims
text:
I can't say enough how incredible and unique this place is. If you think 'how different can it be?', trust me, you have never experienced anything like the Gauntlet!  If you're completely new to kickboxing, take the basic lessons first (heck, even if you have some experience, the fundamentals are taught correctly here)
It's for people of all fitness levels and experiences. You want a challenge or just something new?  Go, tell David Jennifer sent you, and let fun begin! You won't regret it.

name: Jama Hanna
text: The best trainers you will ever find! Also, the best workout you’ll ever do! You’re having so much fun you don’t realize how much it’s kicking your butt until afterwards! I cannot say enough positive things about The Gauntlet! It completely changed my life!

name: Alan “Mike Honcho” McKee
text: Best workout place in Homewood explanation point most knowledgeable instructors with the best personal trainers!

name: Marina Stonewall
text: You signed up to go to kickboxing so expect to get your sweat on.  It is kickboxing in HIIT form.  High intensity, strong movements, increased heart rate, different movements over the course of a timed session.   April is great.  The atmosphere is motivating and not intimidating.  Regulars are encouraging. And as a first timer, I'll be back to conquer my footwork.  Good stuff!

name: Samantha Le
text: I’ve been going for almost 2 months now and I love it! The workouts are so unique and adaptable that any fitness level from beginner to advanced could get a good workout in. Everybody has been so friendly & welcoming! It’s really easy to get in touch with the owners/staff. Would highly recommend!

name: Madison Guthrie
text: I’ve never had so much fun in a workout class! It is not only fun though...these are the hardest workouts I’ve ever done! I’ve been to all kinds of fitness classes  and Gauntlet classes are my absolute favorite!!! I’ve been going for a few months now and have seen changes in my body that’d I’ve never been able to achieve on my own! My arms are especially more toned now which has always been a struggle. You get so much attention/encouragement from the trainers (who are all AWESOME and feel like family btw) and you learn self defense moves in the process! I feel stronger mentally and physically every time I complete a class here! Always a challenge and a great sweat!

name: Danette Clifton
text: It’s high-energy fun! After being away from a regular workout routine for far too long, I’m so glad I found the Gauntlet! Each workout is different and never boring. Trainers are caring and encouraging. Classes provide an enjoyable environment to sweat, punch and kick within a supportive community. Every workout I leave feeling stronger than when I walked in that day.

name: Kelton Langford
text:
The Best in town
April and Gwen

name: Marcus
text: TOUGH but FUN Workouts!!!

name: Laken Samford
text: Can’t say enough great things about this gym. I won a giveaway at the beginning of the year and have been addicted ever since!! The diversity of the workouts keeps me coming back for more and makes each class fly by. Gauntlet has found a way to make hard workouts fun which is a win in my book!

name: Angela Ayoub Shunnarah
text: Amazing gym!!! Incredible workout. So fun you forget you're working out! It's also really cool to learn self-defense strategies.

name: Catherine Duncan
text: LOVE this gym! I've been going for 8 months now and I'm in the best shape of my life! The trainers are incredible people who are always pushing you to do your best and lift you up. Never a dull moment!!! :)

name: Emily Wise
text: Love the community I have at gauntlet! Best place to come for a full body workout with encouraging trainers and fellow members!

name: Salter Hydinger
text: Do not have enough good things to say about Gauntlet! The workout, the trainers, and the people are all incredible. Not only have I found a place that keeps me fit, but I have learned how to defend myself and have gained some many friendships! Couldn’t recommend the Gauntlet more!!

name: Miranda Acres
text: The BEST place to be! Love working out here! The atmosphere and trainers are like no other! The workouts are always different and challenging to help you achieve everything you desire in a workout. One of the best ways to relieve your stress from a long day!

name: KIM BEEBE
text: What a great gym!  The trainers are top notch and well educated. They will motivate you and keep you running the Gauntlet!  Highly recommend

name: April Mack
text: Favorite place on earth!

name: Joseph Wilson
text: This Gym  is phenomenal.  Not only are you working out and reaching your goals but you are learning good self defense at the same time. The owner, David Sheram has years of martial arts and military training, as well as great teaching experience which means he works with everyone distinctly on what they need to reach the next step to get a better workout and perfect their movements. You'll work up a sweat, train hard, And learn new things, but with such inviting trainers and supportive members you won't feel out of place, you'll be hooked.

name: Jenny Doolittle
text: This place is amazing! The trainers push you to your maximum and are always available to help or offer advice, even outside class. I recommend this place to any and everyone!!

name: Michael Richards
text: The energy of a crossfit box married with the components of a kickboxing gym. Fun workout, great coach and enthusiastic gym members.

name: Sean Hiller
text: Great workout from some knowledgeable instructors!

name: Jared Brashier
text:
Amped Fitness is hands down the best commercial gym I've ever been to. They really have something for everyone, from standard circuit type machines to Prime Fitness and Arsenal Strength equipment for more advanced lifters looking for specialized stuff. I enjoy being able to use the sauna & there's enough equipment that waiting around is rare. I've personally been through personal training and the staff REALLY does want to see you succeed.

I've been at the gym since about 2 weeks after it opened and have watched it be constantly updated and improved since it's opening state. The only things I'd like to see added would be a wider array of cable attachments and more plates, but with what I've seen out of the staff initiative thus far I have plenty of confidence that great additions will come in those areas.

name: nicholas somers
text: This is BY FAR the greatest gym I’ve ever trained at and I have trained at a ton of gyms all over the U.S. Starting with the weights, they have anything and everything you could possibly need. Whether you’re a  bodybuilder, power lifter, or just want a sweet summer body. The lighting in the gym is absolutely phenomenal. Locker rooms and everything like that are great as well. They also have a sauna and hydro massage beds!!! My ABSOLUTE favorite thing about amped is the atmosphere there. The staff is so friendly and loves to speak to every member. Everyone knows everyone and it’s like a small family. I haven’t ever loved going to a gym to see all my friends there so much before amped. If you are considering signing up, this is your sign to do it NOW. You don’t want to miss out on this amazing place!!!!!!

name: Trevor Gersmehl
text:
There are good and bad things about Amped Fitness, but overall it just wasn't for me. The 24/7 access is awesome and the facility is very nice and always clean. There is plenty of equipment (unless you go from 5-8pm when it is jam-packed) and it is all seemingly brand new. The price is also stellar.

However, there are some really bothersome things as well. They absolutely blare music throughout the building and you can't escape it even with noise cancelling headphones. There is also just a general culture that empowers everything newcomers fear about gyms. Steroid dudes screaming, mirror selfies a-plenty and an empowerment of that type of behavior. That may be more of a turnoff for some than others, but it is worth noting. For me, -- someone who values working out as a cathartic time to spend an hour listening to podcast or music and focusing on achieving goals -- it wasn't a good fit. Aside from the music and culture, it is an awesome gym.

name: Crimsonfreak123
text: It’s a great gym!!! I’ve been going since the day they opened! The staff is very friendly and willing to help with anything if you were to ask. The equipment is super nice and seems to be getting better each time I see new “toy”. I would highly recommend this gym to anyone especially since the prices on a membership are great, no contracts, and 24/7 access.

name: Marcus Ricks
text: The atmosphere was electrifying.. I felt Alive and relevant.. they offer so much for the monthly payment. Its well worth it..

resp.text: Thank you Marcus. Welcome to the Amped family!

name: Ben Gleason
text: It is clear that this gym is a judgement free zone, the staff will always welcome you with an energetic "Hello". This immediate energy gives off the perfect match for a gym that you would want to workout at. If you need anything the front desk staff is always quick to act on whatever you need! They also have a staff of childcare workers for up to a 2 hour time limit while you are working out so it can be a whole family adventure! I would highly recommend!!

name: J G
text: The best gym you will ever visit...period! Great staff, clean floors, awesome equipment and classes, it has everything you need and more. The 1-star reviews on here are quite comical. Visit the gym for yourself!

resp.text: JG, thank you so much for your review!

name: Dylan Wright
text: Amazing gym, and even better employees. They have great customer service and are always there to help with workout tips, nutrition advice and the equipment is always up to date. Best gym I’ve ever seen!

name: kimberley blackman
text:
Why are you defrauding your members? My daughter came into the facility on May 10th to cancel her membership. Liz is the one who did the cancellation. Today is May 30th and Hudson at the front desk is claiming she never cancelled. They told her she can’t cancel over the phone or by email, which is why she came in person TWENTY DAYS AGO. CANCEL HER MEMBERSHIP, NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Both of my daughters left here feeling worse than they came-the opposite of how a gym should make you feel. They should build your confidence and make you feel better. I hate to give them one star because they don’t deserve it.  They are a high pressure con- and for a fitness facility- even while still under a mask mandate did not enforce masks. They are not about making you healthy they only want your money.

resp.text: Hi Kimberley, we're so sorry to hear that your daughters had a negative experience in our gym. We apologize wholeheartedly if our staff came off as unprofessional or demeaning in any way. We were unable to find your daughters in our system but we would love some more information as to what exactly happened on this day so we can rectify the situation.

name: eva seidel
text: Wonderful gym, clean facility and wonderful staff. All of my friends and boyfriend enjoy their work outs! We are grateful they are in Birmingham! My boyfriend loves working out and is happy to have a real gym in town.

resp.text: Thank you so much Eva! Welcome to Amped Fitness!

name: Owen Bradford
text: Ive been to many gyms, and Amped has by far been my favorite. It has tons of amenities similar to larger franchises such as Lifetime fitness, for a tiny fraction of the price. Incredible experience. Not over crowded, plenty of equipment.

resp.text: Thank you Owen! Glad to hear you enjoyed your experience. Welcome to Amped Fitness!

name: Danielle Murphy
text: Amped Fitness has a friendly staff, a great atmosphere and awesome equipment. The trainers really know what they are talking about and are willing to help anyone at any part in their fitness journey!

resp.text: Thank you Danielle! We appreciate your review!

name: Tyler Heath
text: Nice new gym. Very well put together, however, I was told during my walk-through that the Sauna would be open at all times. I made it very clear that was the main reason I was joining. I workout early in the mornings and noticed it was down today. I decided to call and was informed the sauna is now “staff hours only” (9-9) even though it still says on the website as well that it’s at all times. I made it clear to the manager that I was told it would be open at all times and she said there’s nothing I can do unfortunately. Poor communication. Buyer beware.

resp.text: Hey Tyler, we apologize for the miscommunication and if you were told the sauna is open at all times. Our facilities are open 24/7 for all members but the sauna is only open during staffed hours for safety reasons. However, we do not understand how the sauna not being open to fit your personal schedule warrants a 1 star review. We hope our other amenities and equipment can make up for it.

name: Grace C.
text:
I just tried to start my membership here and was ignored by every trainer at the front desk. There were 3 people in front of me who got in, the guy literally looks at me, snorts, and walks on. Needless to say, I’ll be calling to cancel tomorrow.

Update5/15/2021: My friend reached out to the manager about my situation and we had a talk. She was extremely nice and assured me that the issue would be resolved. I kept my membership and worked out the following day. The gym is clean and the rest of the staff is friendly. I’m glad that the manager reached out to me!

resp.text: Hey Grace, we apologize wholeheartedly for the lack of professionalism you experienced at our gym. We hold all of our employees to a higher standard and we will make sure this does not happen again. We hope that you decide to return in the future so we can provide you with a better experience.

name: Robert Clark
text: Great gym with an unbeatable price! However, It is VERY warm upstairs. Please invest in a fan!

name: Christopher D Prevel
text: Clean gym with friendly staff. Shout out to LaDarius Hoskins for his outstanding training.

resp.text: Thank you Christopher! LaDarius is an AWESOME trainer!

name: Grace Barr
text: It’s a good gym in terms of lots of machines, good price, and 24/7 access, but it doesn’t seem very sanitary, they don’t have things like foam rollers, resistance bands, ab rollers, etc. which are really crucial to a good gym. Seems like they really focused on just the machinery, and neglected all the other accessories gyms need to provide a good workout experience every time. I understand some equipment is just something you should buy yourself, but it’s such a pain to pack up 10 different things in your backpack because the gym has minimal equipment.  They realllllly push the personal training and nutrition services on you which can be off putting if you feel uncomfortable being firm with them and declining. I wish they had wipes or paper towels for cleaning instead of towels. The towels are always very dirty when I go and I feel the need to sanitize my hands after I use them because I know 15+ people probably used that towel before me.

resp.text: Grace, thank you for your honest review. All foam rollers, resistance bands, jump ropes, foam rollers etc. are available for check out at the front desk. Because we have come across members taking them home, it's a lot more convenient for us to hand them out this way. We apologize if our team seemed pushy in regards to personal training, we just really care about our member's goals and progress! Unfortunately hand towels are too wasteful for us, but we change out our rags regularly and they are soaked with high-grade disinfectant so they are clean throughout the day.

name: Daniel Briones
text: Outstanding aray of equipment. Sweet gym

name: Colby Dobbins
text: Super nice facility! I'm in there in the middle of the day and it's not very busy but I've seen it super busy around 5pm. Tons of dumb bells and plenty of stations and iso machines. Rarely do I have to wait for a station to open up! That have a dry sauna also!

resp.text: Thank you Colby! We appreciate your review.

name: Trey Caltagirone
text: I have really enjoyed amped!  I love this gym and love the quality of all the equipment!

name: Robert Blackman
text: For this to be the first Amped Fitness outside of Florida, they sure don’t care about customer service or reputation. Word gets around when you treat people poorly.

name: G jones
text: Clean locker rooms, top notch equipment, employees and trainers that actually seem to care about who you are and how good their facility is. Favorite gym in Bham

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Cody Hitson
text: Met with staff member tony yesterday for a tour and signed up on the spot. Great variety of high quality equipment, nice aesthetics, and clean. Beware of rush hour though - worked out in the afternoon and peak hours were between 5-6:30. I was still able to use all the equipment I needed though

resp.text: Thanks Cody! Welcome to Amped!!

name: Thomas Do
text: High class gym! Would highly recommend.

name: Harrison Edwards
text: A fantastic gym! The place is massive and incredibly clean.

resp.text: Thank you Harrison! Welcome to Amped Fitness!

name: John Camp
text: Love amped fitness! Favorite gym in Bham. Great staff and awesome equipment. Kali is awesome too!!

resp.text: Kali is AWESOME! We're so glad you enjoy your experience with us & thank you for your wonderful review!

name: Ciyeva Lafaye
text:
This place is awesome 👏🏽. We walked in, just something to do, and checked the place out due to an ad. We liked the aesthetics. Next thing you know, we’ve been working out 5-6 days a week, even with 40+ hour work weeks. It’s like an escape! You walk in, and everyone is literally amped up, haha. The energy and professionalism is there and they treat everyone nicely. So, from experience since they opened, that friendliness doesn’t go away once you sign up. That’s just how they are! I did end up getting the personalized training set up, and it’s been worth it for me since I was a beginner. I’m noticing big changes. I’ve met most, if not all trainers, so you got great options. They paired me up excellently when they asked about my goals and personality.

Anyways, the basics: They have tons of equipment. The small things like bands, rollers, etc are at the desk- just ask! The smoothies are actually really amazing?! And those ax3 classes are crazzzy good. I noticed most of the <5 star reviews are about the music; it’s a typical gym playlist, just bring headphones if you need to. But if I forget or like if I’m too sweaty, I haven’t had an issue with what they have.

All in all, best money and TIME I’ve spent all 2021. Happy to be here!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your detailed review Ciyeva. Welcome to Amped Fitness! We're so glad to know that you love your experience here.

name: Kevin Grace
text: Polite and courteous staff. Clean and safe facilities. All kind of apparatus' for all.

resp.text: Thank you Kevin! We're so glad you enjoyed your experience.

name: Hdhduch Yus
text: Nice gym but they need to turn the music up! Sounds like a library in there! Need a better playlist tooo

resp.text: Hello, unfortunately everyone has different music tastes and preferences to how loud they like the music in the gym. We ask that members bring in headphones if they prefer something else than what is playing.

name: donnie raco
text: Gym is very nice problem is the music is so loud you can’t even hear your ear buds I’ve asked numerous times to turn it down and they will not.  Everyone in there has buds in not asking to turn it off but I’d like to listen to my music not some blaring music that I don’t like.

resp.text: Donnie, that's absolutely understandable. Thank you for letting us know. We will handle the situation and make sure the music is at more appropriate levels.

name: Anthony Mantello
text: Nice gym with some nice equipment but worried it’s gonna turn into just another commercial gym. Was hoping for more of a hardcore place and it was but now it seems as if it’s turning into just another gym in the bham area.

name: Robin McElrath
text: Very nice equipment and decor upgrades from the previous Gold's Gym. However, the steam room has been removed from the women's locker room😔. The sauna remains.****update a few weeks later****sauna is not working😐

resp.text: Robin, thank you for your review! We hope that our other amenities make up for the steam room. Welcome to Amped Fitness!

name: Dazi “Nobody” Bazi
text: Nice gym especially for the price!

name: Lauren
text: Great spot and lots of equipment and space and for a great price.

resp.text: Thank you Lauren, we're so glad you love it!

name: Zully Montero
text: Honestly one of the best gyms in bhm. You can’t beat the price!

resp.text: Thank you Zully! We appreciate your review.

name: Nick Somers
text: I love this gym but I just really feel out of place with the genre of music being played while going for crazy pr’s

resp.text: Hey Nick, unfortunately we have no control over the exact music that plays. It solely runs off a playlist from a third party. We ask that all members bring in their own headphones to listen to the music that they prefer if this is the case.

name: Marcy Girl
text: The blue lights throughout the gym are amazing. Everyone is Amped!!!

resp.text: Thank you Marcy!

name: Marshall's Home
text: The staff is Amazing!! Make sure you check out the Hydro beds!!

resp.text: Thank you! We love our staff!

name: Jeremiah Blackmon
text: Super busy and great price

name: Jon Bryant
text: Very helpful and friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you Jon!

name: April Giles Mendoza
text: Love this gym.

name: leplane
text: Couldn't show me the gym before I sign up due to a "staff shortage" or some other excuse while the young gentleman attending me was drinking an ice coffee doing nothing before I came in.    The music is too loud and couldn't barely hear the soft spoken desk staff.

name: Ken Shoop
text: CrossFit Chelsea has changed my life. At 50 years old I needed a reset and something new. I tried it then and 2 1/2 years later I am still going strong! The coaches are great! They help you adjust the workouts to fit your ability while challenging you to be better. I recommend this box to everyone who is looking to make a change and grow in every area of your life!

name: Kevin Lowe
text: Coach Dodson and CrossFit Chelsea are excellent.  Very drop-in friendly.  They make use of the entire hour (no standing around).  Great wods with knowledgeable coaches!  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much Kevin! Looking forward to your next drop in!

name: Katie McGeorge
text: You will get so much more than a gym by joining CrossFit Chelsea! From the coaches to the members, every one is super friendly and encouraging. Coach J and Coach Will have worked with me to get stronger and achieve fitness goals I didn’t even know I had. I actually look forward to going to the gym each morning!!!

name: M Adair
text:
This gym is one of a kind! I recommend this gym
To anyone and everyone! I have been going for over 2 years and would go no where else. My teens are even going and love it!!!!! Thank you to everyone at CrossFit Chelsea!

name: bryson hardy
text: Wonderful group of people to workout with. They’ll make you laugh, give you a good workout, and continue to push you to do the best you can. Love the location as well!

name: Jessica Traywick
text: Every time I stay in Birmingham I always make sure to drop in. Jarrod (coach) is so knowledgeable and gives me tips and advise just as if I was one of his regular paying members. The community there is great. Everyone has always been so nice and welcoming. I always look forward to working out here.

name: Taylor Dotson
text: I absolutely love this gym! Everyone from the coaches to the members to the members and coaches kids are wonderful. It is definitely a family friendly gym. Everyone is very welcoming and encouraging. There are senior members all the way down to high school kids who enjoy this gym. Come try a class you will love it!

resp.text: Thanks Taylor!!

name: Jared Fincher
text: WOW these guys are so gracious. Came in from out of town to visit family and these guys welcomed me in as one of their own. Super nice people with great programing and facility. Would definitely be a part of this gym if I lived here. Go check them out!! Highly recommend!

name: Jackie Nolan
text: If you're a 50+ year young person and think you can't do CrossFit, then come workout with me Monday through Friday 5:30PM at CrossFit Chelsea! Our coaches are fantastic and will work around your abilities and goals. Every movement we do can be scaled to a level you are comfortable with. You will get a great workout, meet new folks and learn new things. You got this!

name: Jill Guarnieri
text: Such a great atmosphere. The coaches are very knowledgeable, patient, thorough and make working out fun!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We love having you around year after year!

name: clint glaze
text: Best CrossFit gym in the south. Super affordable

name: Justin Fry
text:
Stopped by from corporate for a workout, unbeknownst to your staff. Very very clean facility with a helpful & attentive front desk, and ample sanitizing stations for wiping your equipment off. Convenient location with a ton of parking. Enjoy the new facility! 🔥🔥🔥

P.S. I LOVE when a gym has new Olympic bars. 🤤🤤🤤

name: Ken Adams
text: Hidden fees. I sign up nearly a year ago and wait almost a year for the gym to open for the first time ever. I got the lowest package and my card was charged through some other company that charged my account for using their service. I was unaware that they were doing that. Then to charge a once a year fee of $50 soon after they open is ridiculous. Very poor customer service.

name: Devin Jeffreys
text: Good gym, spaced out enough, staff is courteous. My only complaint would be they never have wipes to wipe down the equipment. Other than that, one of the better gyms I’ve been to

name: Briana Cook
text: Worst Experience Ever!!!! We came to signup for Membership, I spoke with Logan on yesterday.. So when I came in I immediately asked to speak with him, because he’s who I was working with, in the midst of talking to Darryl who was assisting us at the counter he walks away in mid conversation to assist another guest as if I wasn’t talking! His coworker apologized for him walking away!  He then comes back as if he never walked away and started making side conversation about my husband and I to his coworker and eventually started arguing with my husband after my husband addressed him for disrespecting me and walking away! So then Logan Roberts walks up and starts stating he’s the owner of the gym, never bothered to diffuse the situation or see what the situation was, he just immediately told us to “Get Out of his Gym”!! He then calls the police on us forcing us out of the gym! I told Logan, your employee Darryl, started this and your not even bothering to see what the situation is! He insisted we leave because it’s private property! Eventually Darryl attempted to apologize and stated he was wrong! Even after that Logan insisted we leave and they waive our cancellation, I informed him, we were coming to Sign Up, Logan told us WE WERE NOT WELCOME AND WE NEEDED TO LEAVE!!! JACK(OWNER) if your reading this!!!! I hope this is not protocol on how you treat your customers! WE WONT BE BACK! We will take our business elsewhere! Thanks for a Great Experience at Crunch Alabaster

name: Kirsten Hines
text: This has become my new home gym and it really does feel just like home!! So much new equipment, and it’s very clean!! 1000% recommend.

name: Kyra Marie
text: Very clean with great ventilation. Brand new equipment and good music!

name: Earth & Sky
text: Amenities are great, everything is brand new. Staff is awesome including the childcare area for my kids, and they love to go as well⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Jae Carter
text: This gym is dope! Got a membership the same day I trialed. No regrets.

name: Willian Benitez
text: Crunch its the best gym in alabaster its great to have a fitness center like this in town

name: Scott Pope
text: Great vibe and wonderful place to reach your fitness goals!

name: Kyan Cook
text: Staff is rude... come on crunch I been a member with you guys for years, but this ain’t it, very unprofessional staff, I’ll just continue to drive to Hoover..

name: Vince Elliott
text: Very nice gym- lots of space and equipment

name: Sharon McKnight
text: Love it here! It has everything you can possibly want!!

name: KEITH POPWELL
text: It is a great gym I would recommend it to anybody

name: ambre mills
text: Love the variety of equipment and separate child care

name: Lexi Volann
text: Very clean club with friendly staff! Love the layout!

name: shaquan sanders
text: The manager Logan definitely not suitable to work here, disrespectful and unprofessional...just go to Hoover way better staff and environment is a better.

name: TRAVIS KEIZER
text: Best gym in alabaster.

name: Eme U
text: It's new so it's nice

name: John Galliera
text: Great workout experience.

name: Jakaiya Bryant
text: Nice service and amazing equipment

name: Ruth Searchfield
text: Friendly staff and clean environment with  tons of equipment to use.

name: Zakerius Dukes
text: Awesome Gym

name: Giselle Hollie
text: I’ve been a member at Forge Fitness since 2017! Since the first day I dropped in to check out what CrossFit was all about I’ve been impressed with the professionalism and enthusiasm displayed by the coaches and owners and the sense of community. The owners are awesome and I even got my tire changed by Rich one time! I now have a 13 month old and since he was 6 weeks he’s been going to the gym with me and everyone has been awesome around him! During the pandemic the gym took extra precautions to keep staff and athletes safe. Equipment was cleaned daily, athletes had designated spaces, and when everyone was at home the coaches took videos and sent us At Home WOd’s to keep everyone motivated and moving. I’ve grown so much as an athlete at Forge and I’m stronger and fitter than before I joined. I’m glad to be part of this special community!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Giselle for your dedication to forge. We have always admired how consistent you have been in your training. Keep up the great work and we can’t wait to see what else you accomplish.

name: Emily Ledet
text: I joined Forge about a year ago as a brand new crossfitter. The coaches and more experienced athletes were more than willing to help me out every step of the way. I have never experienced such a supportive community! We truly are a family. I have grown so much as an athlete due to the top notch coaches and programming and I have met some of the best friends I have ever had here. I can't give this gym enough praise!!

resp.text: You are the best and we totally agree about you being our family.

name: Pat O'Brien
text: I have been going to Forge since 2017. It's great. The coaches are knowledgeable and the community is fun to be around. It's a family owned business and you can tell. Rich and Patti do a great job of keeping things fun but also professional. I have seen this gym grow over the last couple of years. We get new equipment all the time and the facility is Grade A. I definitely recommend Forge to anyone looking for a gym. I found it doing an internet search in 2017 when I moved to Birmingham and it's been a wonderful experience.

resp.text: Well thank you Pat O’BRIEN… for the awesome review!

name: Stacie Jackson
text: Forge is a wonderful place that we look forward to every day. The programming is amazing, the staff is kind, caring and encouraging. The facility is amazing. The members are supportive of every fitness level. I also love the recovery room! I would highly recommend Forge Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you Stacie and we deeply appreciate all the support!

name: Hannah Grant
text: If you are looking for a gym that will take you in as you are and motivate you, this is the place. I am going on 8 months with this bunch and its hands down the best choice I could have ever made! The second you walk in the door on day one you are greeted with friendly, helpful, smiling faces. You will quickly NOT be a stranger! The members and coaches of Forge do not care if it is your first day ever in a gym, first time trying Crossfit,  if you are a scaled or  RX+ athlete, new mother getting back on your fitness journey, whether you're in your 20's or 50's, you will always get cheered on, coached, and pushed the same the same every single day in the best, positive way. With some of the best programming around, the coaches make it easy to be a better you.  They meet you where you are based off your bodies needs whether that's doing 1 rep or 15. Your gym friends quickly become your gym FAMILY that you stay after class with, and share laughs and good talks with. It becomes the best part of your everyday routine. Forge Fitness also features recovery shop options, sauna, childcare, cardio room, basketball court, soccer field, and track. There's a place for all members of your family here. I have been a member to multiple gyms across Eastern-Central Alabama, and you won't find another  home gym like this!

resp.text: This is hands down one of the most thoughtful review we have ever received. We truly appreciate you and all the support!!

name: Armando Guell
text: Amazing facility with a lot of culture in it! Atmosphere is great even when there are no classes going. The owner is a top notch guy, very helpful and passionate with what he does. I will definitely come back here as a drop in!

resp.text: Thank you Armando for the awesome review and come see us any time!

name: Nick Quinn
text: Forge Fitness is more than a gym, it’s a family! This is the most professional well kept gym that I have ever been a part of! Their coaches are very knowledgeable and they have top of the line facilities. You cannot go wrong with this gym!

resp.text: Love you Nick and appreciate you and all the support of Forge!!

name: genamueller30
text: From the first day I walked through the doors the Forge family has treated me like I one of them. It is hard to find a more welcoming group of people. This gym is amazing.

resp.text: You are the best Gena and we appreciate you so much!

name: Amanda Wineman
text: Haven’t been active since high school sports and this place is so accepting and excited to help you. Great supportive community

resp.text: Thank you for the support and the great review!!

name: Appachu Palecanda
text: Great gym and people. Amazing facility and super cool and knowledgable coaches.

resp.text: Thank you App!!

name: Harris Reynolds
text: Holt is such a great coach. Rich is ok too! 😀

resp.text: Love the review and thank you!!

name: Pablo Perea
text: Great box, great community, great coaches. I couldn’t be happier with my gym selection!

resp.text: Thank you Pablo for the awesome review!

name: Win Warren
text: The coaches, the community, the workouts. It's all around the best gym in Birmingham!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review and we appreciate you and all the support!

name: ryan peardon
text: Amazing facilities. Amazing coaches. Amazing owners. I’ve been a member for going on 5 months and this place is all around amazing, from the friendly, welcoming, encouraging atmosphere, to the equipment and programming, and everything in between. I’m always glad I joined the Forge family!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan for the awesome review and we appreciate you choosing to being apart of our Forge family.

name: anvesh rocks
text: Great gym with friendly atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Aditya Anchan
text: Great gym! Even better coaches!!

resp.text: Thank you Aditya for the support!!

name: Sophia Hua
text: Was visiting Birmingham from Canada for the weekend and wanted to workout. I'm so glad I got a chance to workout here, great sweaty cardio session! Everyone was super friendly and the gym was very clean. Hope to see you guys again in the future!

resp.text: Thank you Sophia for the 5 star review. How was the Alabama game?

name: Josh Holden
text: Needed to use some equipment to get ready for Comp and they were happy to help. Did wod while I was there and really enjoyed it. Nice people, quality instruction and programming and great environment.

resp.text: Thank you Josh for the review and please come by anytime. Stay strong and stay healthy and good luck with the Comp!

name: TJ Gonser
text: Great culture great equipment great family run business.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Thomas Kopec
text:
I joined last summer (2018) and haven’t been able to be as regular as I would like- but even after not seeing me for a very long time the owner (Rich) recognizes me and stopped what he was doing to have a conversation with me to catch up. Those kinds of experiences really make you feel like you are pet of a family.

The coaches have all been wonderful, as well! They are very personable and interested in your individual fitness goals. They have been helpful with technique and suggesting scale (alternate) exercises when necessary also.

Finally, the other members have all been very welcoming and friendly, which again helps foster an inviting atmosphere.

The facilities are fantastic (they have showers so you can get back to work after a class), and I love being a part of Forge Fitness! No complaints! Come try it out! They let me attend a few classes before deciding if it was a fit for me or not, so come try for yourself!

resp.text: Wow, what an awesome review. It is so good to see you in the gym and we truly appreciate the review. We look forward to helping you meet your goals.

name: Jon Sheets
text: The environment was incredible. The people were really friendly and the staff were so helpful! Definitely going to revisit soon!

resp.text: That’s so much and appreciate the awesome review. Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Shree Bostick
text: Definitely one of the best gyms in the Birmingham area!! I couldn't have pick a better place to call my new crossfit home after moving to Birmingham!! Great atmosphere, people, coaches and owners!! To anyone looking for a great facility to train or get a good workout in at definitely choose Forge Fitness!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Chase Glasgow
text: Just finished up my Basics 101 classes with Paula and it was a blast! Forge is the most welcoming gym I've been a part of. The facility is amazing, spacious, and has everything you could possibly want!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and we love having you in the gym!

name: Mela Donoso
text:
Being new to Alabama and not knowing a lot of people was a bit hard, but since starting at Forge I’ve met some awesome people who have made Birmingham feel like home now!
Even my kids love coming along with me, owners are awesome and so are the coaches and all members!
Truly a family/community feel to this gym!

resp.text: Thank you Mela for the awesome review and we are so glad you are enjoying it! It’s been a pleasure getting to know you and your family. #forgefam

name: Holly Cross
text: I moved to Alabama alone and not knowing anyone. I had never done CrossFit in my life but these people took me under their wing immediately. My home away from home, truly blessed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Holly, I’m glad you feel that way but we believe anyone that is apart of Forge is family. We are lucky to have you and Boomer as part of the family.

name: Chris
text: Was in town visiting family and needed a place to get in a workout. Rich, quickly responded to my inquiry online and openly invited me to the gym. They had a large variety of equipment for a good functional fitness workout, it was clean and in good shape. The staff was very friendly, as well as all the members. I will definitely visit Forge Fitness every time I come back in town.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Chris and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: John Christopherson
text: Couldn't say enough good things about Forge! The coaches are awesome and always trying to help you improve. The gym is huge, has great equipment and alway kept clean. The showers and sauna are a plus. And most importantly the members are very supportive!

resp.text: Thank you John for the Awesome review and we are so blessed to have members like yourself!

name: Hobie Cole
text: Great environment and the staff are very helpful. Great place to workout. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!!

name: Caroline Jenkins
text: Forge is an extremely welcoming gym with great crosssfit programming. The coaches are wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us and being apart of our community. We couldn’t do it without the love and support of people like you.

name: Anne True
text:
Best gym experience in town. Great coaches and fun workouts. Come to get in shape, stay for the community. Getting to Forge after work is the highlight of my day.

Thanks for doing what you do!

resp.text: Thank you True! We appreciate you so much and it’s been awesome to watch you develop into such a great athlete.

name: Leigha McLendon
text:
Family owned and operated, and they make you feel like part of the family.
For me, a great deal of the attraction to CrossFit is the sence community, and none of the other CrossFit boxes I've been to have as great of a community feel as Forge does.
The coaches care, are knowledgeable, and always have advise and recommendations on how to scale any movement.

resp.text: Leigha, thank you for the warm review and kind words. We are so glad that you have enjoyed forge and we appreciate the support over the years.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Family oriented gym with the kindest people around. Talented, qualified, and intelligent coaches and administrators who support you and your fitness goals! This is a unique Crossfit gym.

resp.text: So kind and we truly appreciate the support!!

name: Aaron Wolff
text: Best CrossFit gym in Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and the support!

name: John Gonser
text: Cleanest CrossFit facility I've ever dropped in. Great coaching and a very large gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the review

name: Haleigh Chastain
text: Forge is more than just a gym. It is a community where people come together to workout while forming friendships. I joined Forge 3 years ago when I moved to Birmingham and did not know anyone, now most of my best friends are from the gym. If you are looking for a new gym, I cannot recommend this place enough!

resp.text: You are the best Haleigh and we truly appreciate all your help and support of the years.

name: Grant Scoble
text: Forge Fitness did an excellent job of getting me back in the game. I also was able to learn best practices for recovery by having their recovery center available with my membership. You feel apart of a family as soon as you walk in.

resp.text: Thank you Grant for all the support and encouragement.

name: Kyle Schwab
text: Huge, friendly, affordable, and clean facility.  I highly recommend dropping in for a class and seeing this place.

resp.text: Thank you Kyle and we appreciate all the support!

name: Katie Lucas
text: Forge Fitness is definitely the gym to go to in the Vestavia Hills area. The owners, Patti and Rich, are so personable and friendly. They are always working to help you attain your fitness goals with a refreshing and positive attitude. Great environment, staff, and facilities.

resp.text: We truly appreciate the review and your support!

name: Michael Gonser
text: Extremely friendly staff, I love how big and spacious the place is, soccer field is amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and come see us in Birmingham the next time you are in town.

name: Suzie Spooner
text: Forge is not just a gym, it's a community. A community of athletes with different skill levels. A community where athletes encourage each other to give 100% no matter where you are in your training. Forge offers coaches who are knowledgeable about each movement and who want to help each individual attain the goals they have set for themselves. Forge is a community of  friends. I wouldn't go anywhere else!!

resp.text: You are the best! Thank you for the review and being apart of our community.

name: Lindsay Sport
text: I have been involved in many Crossfit gyms throughout my years in fitness. The quad facility, the forge Crossfit community, and the equipment is the best around!  From the moment I stepped foot in forge I felt nothing but welcomed. If you want to come learn from some of the best at their trade and train in nice, clean, and welcoming environment- then you have found the place.

resp.text: That you Lindsay for all the support and it wouldn’t be Forge with out people like you.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent space and outside area. This is good way to get to know people while working out.  Great sense of community!

resp.text: Thank you Owen for the support!

name: Alanna Smith
text: The facilities are top notch and you'll be hard pressed to find a more warm and welcoming community!

resp.text: Thank you Alanna and we appreciate all the support!

name: Aaron Scroggins
text: I have been going to Forge for many years, so I obviously enjoy it! I’m in sales and travel for work. I get to go into many CrossFit gyms and none of them compare to the facility we have at the Quad. If you are in town visiting or looking for a change please come and drop in for a WOD.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and we love having you as part of the Forge community.

name: Leslie Parrish
text: I went to this gym for over a year, and I'm telling you that there's no better gym in Birmingham. The owners, Rich and Chris, along with all of the other coaches, have a firm commitment to doing things the right and most safe way possible. I left this gym in the best shape of my life and with some of the best friends a person could have. So not only will you get a great workout, you'll also make a ton of great friends. I've since relocated to Tuscaloosa, but try to make it back to Forge as much as possible!

name: Pilar Rodriguez
text: Ive been to many Crossfit gyms before. The level of cleanliness and the resources this gym has is incredible. The staff and members are some of the finest people I have ever met!

resp.text: Thank you Pilar for the review. We appreciate all the support.

name: Jim Gonser
text: Dropping in from Kansas one of the greatest places and the nicest people amazing facility

resp.text: Thank you sir for the awesome review.

name: Shandi White
text:
Most positive gym experience I've ever had!  Forge has a created a family atmosphere with the motivation of your favorite high school coach combined with friendliness of your favorite church.

They care about your progress, and they notice when you're not there.  They're not just interested in your membership, they're interested in your success!

Whether you're new to CrossFit or a regular competitive pro looking for a more positive gym experience, Forge in Vestavia is the perfect fit.

resp.text: Thank you Shandi for the awesome review. Your such a great person and we appreciate your support inside the gym and out.

name: ghk142000
text: Just began working out here 3 weeks ago. Very welcoming and fun atmosphere with a lot of great people. Rich and the rest of trainers have been nothing but helpful. Makes working out fun again.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! I can't wait to see what all you accomplish. Keep up the hard work!

name: ly walthall
text: Really great gym. This is a great CrossFit gym. I've been to several and this one is the best. Great floor plan, tons of equipment so you don't have to wait around for someone to finish to do your WOD. The trainer's are fantastic, they will push you to do your absolute best. Not to mention there are several amenities and concessions; showers, energy drinks, recovery drinks, coffee machine, protein supplements and these killer peanut butter balls that are to die for. If your looking for a place to work out that will actually push you and and has a great community, this is it.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! You didn't forgot one detail. You are the best.

name: Dan Odle
text: Great gym. Great coaches. Great people. While the workouts are solid and will kick your tail (in a good way), it's the community that makes the difference. We literally build our schedule around our workouts and are thankful for our Forge family.

resp.text: Thank you Dan for the awesome review. You and Stephanie have truly brought so much energy to our community. Forge wouldn't be the same without you both.

name: Parker Smith
text: I've been attending Forge for three years and there isn't a better gym in Birmingham! The attentiveness of the staff and the welcoming of its members is second to none! I give all the credit to them for helping me be in the best shape of my life.

resp.text: We love you Parker and you have accomplished so much in 3 years. Keep up the awesome work and let's see what you do over the next 3 years. Thank you for the great review!

name: Chase Meadows
text: Forge is the only Crossfit gym that I've been to, and it has so far been quite a positive experience. Proper technique is emphasized which has helped me stay injury free and improve my overall flexibility. I joined with the hope of regaining some of my previous quickness so that I could perform better in tennis and flag football, and it has certainly helped in that regard... You'll obviously only get out what you put into it, but all of the coaches are very knowledgeable and more than happy to discuss proper form, nutrition, supplements, etc. with you as well as demonstrate the correct technique of the different lifts when asked.

resp.text: Thank you Chase for the awesome review. We truly enjoy having you as a solid member of Forge.

name: Dalton Roberts
text: Friendly place where the people you work out with become your bestfriends. Have felt at home since the first day I walked in. Very encouraging people at Forge to help you be your best self. Classes all day to benefit your availability. Saturday morning Olympic lifting class and Partner WOD. Let Forge be the best part of your day.

resp.text: You are the best Dalton and people like you are the reason while people keep coming back.

name: Jacob W
text: Incredible space with some awesome members, coaches and owners. One workout and you feel like a part of the family!

resp.text: Thank you Jacob for the review and Yes you are part of the fam. Come back anytime and workout with us.

name: Brandon Simmons
text: I just started traveling to Birmingham for business and wanted to find a place in which to work out while I was in town.  I came across Forge Fitness on Google and messaged them to set up a meeting when I got in town.  I will be going here for the next few months while I am in town.  The trainers are knowledgeable, outgoing, and great motivators.  The place is incredibly clean and the equipment brand new.  Great owners and great members.

resp.text: We miss you Brandon and we appreciate all the support!

name: Jack Eisenhut
text:
Great CrossFit experience!  Chris Wade is a co-owner and coach at this gym.  It was obvious that he is an experienced coach with a passion for what he is doing.

They filled the entire hour giving the expected value to each member.  The class started with a group warm-up, moved to strength component, then the workout of the day and finally a nice stretch/cool down.

Finally, I travel for work and drop into many CrossFit gyms around the country.  If you live in Birmingham area, this is a gym you have to look at.

resp.text: Thank you the awesome feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!👊🏽💪💪

name: Lesley Hendon
text: I just started in June of this year with the hopes of loosing the remainder of my baby weight! Chris and Rich are amazing and have made getting back in to shape something I actually enjoy! I have pushed myself so much further than I ever did in a conventional gym and have seen great results. They explain everything in great detail and coach you closely so you learn the correct way of doing things. I was super intimidated of the whole "crossfit" idea but Forge has changed that perception and made it something I truly enjoy!

resp.text: Thank you for your support Lesley!

name: Haleigh Robinson
text: Great gym with awesome members and coaches. I originally chose Forge because of location, but now there's not another gym in Birmingham I'd ever go to! I've accomplished so much more than I ever thought possible with the help of the Forge coaches.

resp.text: Thank you Haleigh for the awesome review and we love having you as part of the Forge family.

name: Jason Maeder
text: Great gym, great people.  Dropped in for a class while traveling and had a great workout.  Rich and Conrad made us feel right at home.  I'll be back next time we're in town.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback!

name: derek schiefer
text:
Great gym!!! Awesome equipment all well maintained. Great lockers and restrooms. We even brought our kids with us and there is a room for them to hang out.

Thanks for the WOD.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed Forge. Thank you for the feedback and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: ryan barkley
text: I've dropped into Boxes all over Alabama, Florida, and Louisiana and these guys might be the friendliest. Really enjoyed the WOD. Great environment to train. Owner is a class act.

resp.text: Hey Ryan!! Thank you for such a great review! We loved having you and you crushed the WOD. Hope you enjoy your volleyball tournament! Come back any time!

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Great CrossFit experience! Great people and great atmosphere. The coaches really know their stuff and are very helpful. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Great review and we truly appreciate your energy at Forge. However, we need a Tyler bicep region for every member.

name: Jessica Lovel
text: Great atmosphere, great owners and coaches! My day isn’t complete until I’ve been to the gym!

resp.text: We love you Jess and thank you for the review!

name: Jason Jaegers
text: Forge is a great place to work out. Not only is the facility clean and convenient but the staff is friendly and professional. The camaraderie between the members is as goods as it gets.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! Come see us soon.

name: Scotty Bostick
text: Awesome experience! Would rate 6 stars

resp.text: Thank you brother!

name: Tyler Landolt
text: Everyone involved in this gym is amazing! The coaches, the members and the owner all come together to make one amazing community.

resp.text: You are awesome Tyler. Thank you for the review.

name: Jake C.
text: I've been coming to this gym for several years now.  Rich and the coaches at the gym are very enthusiastic and have always been incredibly attentive to my needs.  Caleb and Conrad always take the time to pay extra attention to beginners or people that need additional instruction and always do a great job leading class and keeping things fun.  The gym community is very welcoming to beginners and visitors and the atmosphere is very family friendly.  The gym itself is clean, spacious and well-organized.  I was spoiled by the fact that it had Heat when I dropped into a few other gyms last winter and nearly froze to death.  If you are looking for a superb Crossfit gym to join or just visit while in town, Forge is a solid place to do tough workouts with great people.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jake for being such a valuable asset to Forge. It's been impressive watching you meet your Fitness goals since starting CrossFit. You have done a great job and we look forward to watching you dominate the CrossFit Open in 2017.

name: Regan Claire Hibbs
text: Forge has such a strong sense of community and the new facility is so functional!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. Keep them coming.

name: Stephanie Odle
text: Great community. Great coaching. Great workouts. Love this Crossfit  family. I came to Forge wanting to improve and ramp up my training. Forge has helped me do that. If you're looking for a Crossfit community, you'll find it here.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie for the awesome review and we really love having you as part of the Forge family.

name: Alphonso Lewis
text: Amazing workouts with a collection of competitive individuals. You could call everybody there one big competitive and  fit family

resp.text: Thank you Alphonso and we love your energy in the gym. The morning crew is looking forward to seeing you at 5:30am.

name: Justin Lobdell
text: Great facility with exceptional trainers that work one-on-one with you to secure your health/safety as well as push you to enhance your fitness skills/level!

resp.text: Thank you so much Justin for the awesome review. We appreciate you supporting Forge Fitness!

name: Brad Barber
text: Big box and a very friendly welcome when I dropped in. I’d definitely recommend Forge!

resp.text: Thank you Brad for dropping in and please come see us again.

name: Sarah Lawson
text: Great space with clean equipment and helpful, friendly staff. Plenty of parking. I'm not a crossfitter myself but I visited with a friend and was impressed by Forge and the people here!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Bradley Davidson
text: Great experience for a great value. Caleb Dodd is a great coach and motivator. Class times and locations are perfect for anyone, espcially for those who live or work over the mountain.

resp.text: Thank you BRADLEY for the feedback. We look forward to seeing back in the gym this week.

name: Rodney Overstreet
text: I visited this box last Sat for their inaugural WOD. It was really tough and fun. Full disclosure: Rich & Chris are friends of mine. However, they are also enthusiastic, friendly, & knowledgable coaches. The space is large and well designed. I can recommend this box without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you Rodney for all the support!

name: Matt Mogle
text: Great gym with a great community. I've been to other Crossfit gyms around the World and this one is special. It's an incredibly encouraging environment and a wonderful place to watch people continue to get better and excel every day. Really cool to see your seasoned Crossfit veterans working out right next to beginners and encouraging one another throughout.

name: Deborah Pennino
text: Great close-knitted gym with experienced and friendly staff.  It is very clean and has excellent equipment for workouts.

resp.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review!

name: Clarisse Jackson
text: I've never crossFit before and after searching for different gyms, I couldn't be happier to have chosen Forge. The atmosphere, the people and best of all the owners Chris and Rich show true commitment to their members and are able to push you to your limits in the safest way possible. I've tried different classes and exercises but was never constant because I will get bored, well let me tell you; I haven't gotten bored since I started going to Forge, it has been 9 months so far and I don't want to stop. I look forward to my classes and to the people that I've met at the gym. Plus is clean, has A/C and they put great music. So if you are looking into CrossFit in this area, this is the place to be!!!

resp.text: You are awesome and we truly appreciate your support!

name: Stacey Hood
text: Great gym, been to several others, but this place is top level and professional from the moment you walk in. It's everything that anyone could ever want in a CrossFit gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and we appreciate the support!

name: Brooks Gant
text: Cannot say enough good things about Forge Fitness in Vestavia! Coming from a cycling and running background, I was burnt out and looking for something new and challenging. After speaking with several crossfit gyms in the area, something just felt "right" about Forge and so I joined the 101 class. 9 months later I am probably in the best overall shape I have ever been in! From all the coaches who truly care about their athletes, to the positive and encouraging atmosphere, as well as all the great people I have met, if you have ever thought about giving crossfit a try, I highly recommend checking out Forge Fitness.

resp.text: Wow Brooks, thank you for the awesome review and we truly love having you as a solid member of the Forge Family. Keep up the great work!

name: Sharon A. Moskowitz
text: CrossFit Shades / Forge Fitness is awesome.  I travel to the Birmingham area for work once a month and was looking for a gym/box that has hours on Sunday.  I had heard some not-so-great things about a few boxes but I hadn't heard of Forge Fitness/ CF Shades.  Not only is CF Shades the only place with Sunday hours, but they were above and beyond wonderfully welcoming when I showed up unannounced during their open gym period.  Upon first glance, the gym was very clean, which is not very common among CrossFit and Crossfit-inspired facilities.  The owner, Rich, jumped up from a staff meeting and gave me a tour and after learning of my CF history, invited me to use any and all of their space as well as invited me back through my duration of stay while in town.  They have an awesome workout space out back with a platform, squat racks and a rig and the running course around the building is super safe.  I also met coaches Caleb, Josh and Rebecca who were all very accommodating and friendly.  When I returned for a class, Rebecca coached and I really appreciated her attentiveness.  I'm a CrossFit coach in Denver and because I move relatively well, I tend to get left alone - but I love being coached when I drop into new places and Rebecca was great.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND travelers and locals to visit.  If you're a member somewhere else in Hometown or Birmingham, switch now.   I'll be back there for sure when I'm in town next.

resp.text: Hey Sharon, Thank you very much for this amazing review. This has to be the best review anyone could ever receive. We truly appreciate what you are doing and we look forward to seeing you next time you are back in the area.

name: Justin Missanelli
text: Friendly environment for fitness.  Competitive for those serious workout fiends. Don't let the afternoon classes intimidate you though, the people are friendly if you just talk to them.

name: Clay Conner
text: Great gym, great people and great results! Highly recommended.

resp.text: You left out great programming and great workouts. We love you Clay and we appreciate everything you do for Forge.

name: Nicole Dilg Beachum
text: The trainers at Forge are great. If you want to try CrossFit, this is the place to go in Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you for your support!

name: desandra martinez
text: Awesome! Great workouts

resp.text: Thank you for the review and come see us the next time you are in town.

name: Conrad Taylor
text: Great gym. Great athletes. Great community!

resp.text: Thank you for our awesome review.

name: James LeCroy
text: Started working out here over 2 years ago and have regretted one minute of it.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.

name: Garrett Doss
text: Can't go wrong.  Great gym!

resp.text: My man Garret. Thank you for the review and being awesome!

name: Joe Ross Merritt
text: Best Crossfit experience in Birmingham.  Great coaching and community..

resp.text: Thank you Joe Ross and we appreciate your support. We look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Forge Fitness Powered by CrossFit Shades
text: We appreciate our community and want to thank everyone for the support we've received from our members and their families since we've been open. Our members make it all happen.

name: Joey Beachum
text: Great gym. If you want to get in shape, there's no better place in Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you Joey for the support!

name: Ploppy
text: Just awesome place!

resp.text: Thank you Austin for the review!!

name: Kelly Doss
text: Great place! Convenient and accessible.

resp.text: Thank you Kelly for the awesome review!

name: samuel walthall
text: Awesome gym. The best coaches!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback!

name: Todd Hollifield
text: Great trainers and great athletes.

resp.text: Thank you Todd for the review and we greatly appreciate your support of Forge.

name: Nate Mothershed
text: Great place. Treated like FAMILY!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback!

name: Brandon Stewart
text: Great Gym, great people!

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It's been awesome training with you for the last 5 years. Also, it's awesome seeing your passion for fitness and life. Thank you for being apart of the Forge family.

name: Crystal Swann
text: The trainers here are absolutely amazing!  They are constantly cheering you on and always make time for that one on one no matter how large the class is.  If your form is not up to par, they are there to help you correct it. The people that come here are driven and very supportive as well.  It definitely starts my day off right!  And the results???!!!  Absolutely worth it!  Other workout regimens in the past sometimes left me bored or it became too “easy”,  to say the least.  This is always different and challenging each time!  Love being part of this tribe!  #tribe150

name: Kevin Marchant
text:
I enjoy and appreciate all my coaches at ITF150. I feel each one has our best interest in mind and want to help us achieve and reach new goals in our overall fitness.

The workouts are already planned for us, so you’re not wasting time deciding what should I do today. Even thought the workouts are planned, all can be scaled to match the level of each individual.

The ITF150 members are a terrific group that encourage and support one another. Friendships are developed and grown in and outside of the gym walls.

resp.text: Having planned workouts is so nice and makes it easy to keep the consistency. We are so happy to see you in our tribe, Kevin! Keep up the hard work.

name: Laurie Smith
text: I have been very pleased with Iron Tribe. The coaches are beyond fantastic. I have seen great results!

resp.text: That's so great to hear! Thank you for your 5 star review.

name: Laurie Morton
text: Fantastic coaches!!!! They are encouraging, and help no matter what goal or level you are at. Best experience I had at a gym.

resp.text: Laurie, we are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience at our gym! Our coaches are the best!! Thanks for being a part of our tribe!

name: Areli Tarango
text: I can honestly say that this is the best gym out there ! The team is great always looking out for you working with where you are fitness why! Always positive attitudes all around ! I feel In love with this place I even brought along my husband ! A couple who works out together stay together ! 💪

resp.text:
Areli! We're glad you've found a home at Iron Tribe! We're glad to have you with us.

Thanks for your review!

name: Matt Register
text: Irontribe and their coaches not only care about seeing you achieve your goals, they also care about you as an individual. The coaches take time to get to know the people that attend classes, work with you to make sure you are doing the movements correctly and genuinely want to see you succeed. Irontribe creates an environment where anyone, of any fitness level, can feel comfortable coming in daily to improve their fitness.

resp.text: Hi Matt! Thanks for your review. We're glad to have you at the Tribe!

name: Adam Lamb
text: Best gym I have ever set foot in. Coaches are the best  are the best quality you can find!

resp.text: Thanks for your review Adam! We always try to ensure our coaches are top notch to help our members see their goals come to fruition.

name: Mary Blackwell
text: I joined ITF about two years ago with the 6 week challenge.  It has been the best decision I have made.  The staff is super friendly and encouraging.  Each coach is so patient and dedicated to improving our skill set and overall health.  ITF recently added the Prime class and all I can say is it well worth it.  I started Prime about 2 weeks ago and I LOVE it!! Customized workouts and nutrition plans, individual attention and great motivation to improve the areas YOU want to improve.  I love my ITF family and friends!  Thank you ITF!!

name: Living doll Jewels
text: Bait and switch advertising. Offer is for free but it ends up costing 499.00 That's what it costs to invest in yourself

name: Clay Rivenbark
text: Love this place. Luke and Tori are the best. Take their 6 week challenge! Itll change your whole outlook on life.

name: Thomas Picardy
text: Iron Tribe has been one of the best decisions I have ever made and has changed my life. The coaching, the fellow athletes, the facilities are second to none. It has been amazing to see what I have accomplished in just under a year. A healthy and fit body is only the beginning. The effects of this program ripple through every part of my life, as a husband, a dad, an employee, everything. I am seeing at almost 40 years old what I should have been at 20. It is worth every dollar, every minute, ever ounce of effort.

name: Jenna Jenks
text:
There's a lot of good things to say about Iron Tribe, but what I've taken away most was the welcoming atmosphere.

I entered the six week challenge and did not meet my goal. I was close, but even though I failed, I was offered to apply the money I put in towards a membership... The gym even has given me a rain check to apply it in March after I get my tax return, so it's more affordable for me. (so not really a loss when all is said and done!)

The people (coaches and members) I met have been nothing but encouraging. The workouts were well designed to keep you moving to accomplish in less than 30 minutes what many other classes, at other gyms I've attended, it has taken an hour to achieve (which is nice when you are low on time in your day!)

I have a knee injury, and in previous gyms, my disability has made me feel inadequate or ashamed that I could not do what the rest of the class was doing. The coaches knew about my injury (and no matter what class I attended (morning or afternoon) with any coach, they were already well informed of my needs without the embarrassment of having to say as much at every new encounter. They were discreet and quick to tell me alternate exercises I could do, so I didn't feel as if I was the odd man out waiting to be assigned something different or taking away from the class by holding up the rest of the members, so that a coach could assist me.)

Members are at all different fitness levels, and the coaches are very attentive to every one's individual needs, and they are watching you and your progress making sure that you are on point doing the exercises CORRECTLY! (which as long as I've been working out, I hadn't realized how many simple movements I was doing incorrectly!)

I could write a book on all the good experiences I have had just in my six weeks of attending, but I will wrap it up here with a final statement that I highly recommend this gym. It's changed my outlook about what I need for my own fitness journey, and I look forward to returning in March! I actually feel incredibly sad that I have to wait that long to return to my new fit fam!

Special thanks to Matt and Zack for your tireless tutelage and positive attitude/feedback (I know I was all over the place lost on too many occasions! 😂) And thanks to all the members who were so very welcoming to me, I'm truly grateful and am already missing you!

Keep at it! 3,2,1 TRIBE!

name: Sandra Roberts
text:
lifter. Would recommend TCG to anyone.
This gym is great with lots of new equipment. The staff is courteous knowledgeable and very professional.

name: Angie Dunham
text: Love this place! High energy and amaxing staff! Just finished my 6 week challenge! 1 week into it I injured my back. (Doing laundry! ) The coaches did a wonderful job working with me in order to modify my workouts. I am so thankful for all I have learned from them over the last 6 weeks. Very impressed with the staff and happy to have made some new friends! I highly recommend them!

name: Jeremy Hatley
text: These guys are awesome! Fun gym with a knowledgeable staff and great workouts

name: Doug Ferrell
text: 2 years ago I was looking for a fitness program.  This is an experience that you cannot imagine just driving by or reading a post.  This is a family of people with a shared goal.  This is the best investment I have ever made, for myself.  Every morning at ITF we accomplish more than most people do in an entire day.  With the support of this community and exceptional coaches at our side we push ourselves to be better than yesterday or last week.  I have exceeded every goal or expectation that I imagined during the 101 course.

name: Aaron Spigner
text: To say that this place is just a gym would be a lie and an  understatement. More than anything this place is a group of individuals who together form a family. They push and encourage each other to make one another stronger. No one looks down on anyone but rather looks up to each other as they push to be better. I would not be where I am today were it not for this group of athletes and coaches. Thank you Iron Tribe 150! You impact more lives than you know.

name: Tracey Ponder
text: This is by far the best exercise program I've ever participated in......after 6 months of contemplating a membership, in April 2013, I finally dismissed all of the naysayers (you know the type, those folks who had never really tried it, but, had "just heard.......") and I started my first 101 classes.  I was overweight, in terrible shape, and in tremendous pain due to back problems.    Today I am much lighter, stronger, (happier), and my back pain as diminished substantially, and to sweeten the deal,  I have become friends with a great group of folks!  I'm 52 years old and I am in the best shape of my life thanks to Iron Tribe Fitness.  I encourage you to try it.....I promise you'll love it too!

name: Jennifer Kersh
text: Love their push classes, everyone is very friendly the workouts are challenging, would have been 5 stars but class times are limited. Although you do have access to all locations so that's a plus!

name: Stephen Hall
text: If you are reading this you probably have heard something about iron tribe and you're curious.  I heard some negative things before I joined like - "you will get injured, your joints won't last on those crazy crossfit workouts, they are too expensive, iron tribe is snobby overpriced crossfit"  Well - My 3 1/2 month experience has been worth every penny. I'm not where I want to be physically but I am well on my way thanks to these fine people. They are not cheap - but the value and the knowledge you learn is worth it.  They are crazy hard workouts that are intense and sometimes you want to cry and curl into the fetal position - but everyone does the workouts together and finishes every time and it gets easier.....a little. They scale the workouts to prevent injuries - I was really worried about my knees and they work with you so you don't injure yourself. They know their stuff and want to see you make progress not hurt yourself.  They aren't snobby and neither are the people that workout here - just normal friendly people. They are passionate about fitness not just some other gym you pay your monthly dues and get nothing in return. I was 330 pounds 3 1/2 months ago. Ive lost 45 pounds and feel awesome!  I used to pay another gym 25/month and never went for 2 years. I was paying a Fat tax for 2 years - but not anymore! Give them a try - it's worth it!

name: Nilam Patel
text: I would drive by IronTribe 150 and often wonder what went on there. I would see a large open space, not my perception of a typical gym (filled with equipment).  This open space has changed my life. The coaches are wonderful and very attentive to individual needs and capabilities. If you feel your workouts are not challenging and changing your life, ITF 150 will do it for you!

name: Uma Maheswar Yeruva
text: Good Coaches with Decent equipment. Always motivating environment.

name: Timothy Johnson
text: Join this place ASAP! Will change your life

name: Brad Mintun
text: When I first was considering joining IronTribe, I was a bit skeptical.  The coaches and the community won me over.  They are both great and encouraging.  ITF150 has a great community, the gym is clean, the equipment is all in good condition, and the workouts are fun and challenging whether you are just starting or an expert focused on competitions.

name: Josh Firth
text: Worked out at a lot of gyms over the years, including time at several other CrossFit facilities or similar programming.  ITF 150 is hands down the best.  Great coaches who are knowledgeable and personal, and an awesome group of athletes.  It's real community, not just folks you happen to see regularly, but people you want to talk to, get to know, and who push each other to their limits and to be their best.

name: heather dawkins
text: I have completed the iron tribe 6 week challenge. Overall the program itself is really good, and the coaches were wonderful.  I did get excellent results during this time in weightloss, body fat percentage reduction and high lean muscle.  Unfortunately I will not be continuing an affiliation with ITF due to the misrepresentation of this program. I was sold that the 98% of challengers meet their goal, the meal plans are customized and that if for some reason you don't meet your goal you could apply to future classes. What I found is that ITF monthly fees are extremely high even with the so called Challenger discount, There seem to be very few challengers that actually meet the goal and the customized meal plan is merely based on starting weight and goal of weight loss, body fat percentage or muscle gain. There is no consideration of gender or age, which can be a huge factor in weight loss. The only offer is to apply your hefty deposit towards a minimally discounted 12 month commitment, so I am parting ways with ITF. Due to the way I feel they misrepresented this program.  I will be seeking a membership elsewhere, and will never do business with them in the future. I always tell my children nothing is free, and this was a prime example of that.

name: Sacha Skinner
text: I love this place, the coaches and the community! The best thing I have ever done for myself.

name: DMS Color
text: If you are willing to make a commitment - the team at ITF 150 is willing to commit themselves to you. I could not ask for a better group of coaches that truly are dedicated to helping you improve your form, physique, nutrition, and life.

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Absolutely love this place! Great coaches and awesome athletes.

name: Sheila G.
text: I've been a member of Irontribe for a year and a month. I find it the most difficult, challenging, and fun workout I've done in my life.  I'm still on a learning curve, but I can say that I've also made progress!  Before I signed on, I was very worried about re-injuring my rotator cuff.  I let them know about my past injury, Zech and Jon showed me ways to modify my workouts.  As my shoulder got stronger, I've not needed some of the modifications and according to my chiropractor and orthopedic doctor,  my shoulder has fully healed.  I hate weights...really.
