But I'm now swinging the 35 pound kettle ball.   The biggest weight I had lifted prior to Irontribe was a 15 pound dumb bell for bicep curls or deadlifts.  With these guys, I've done a 2 max rep 165 deadlift, and I'm learning to do beginner handstand pull ups!  The group environment is fun.  They keep me going.  We cheer each other on.  I find that when you do something difficult, share a difficult experience, like a WOD lol,  we feel connected to the each other and we want to see one another succeed.  We get excited when someone reaches a PR or finishes a tough workout. I'm a school teacher, so I was initially concerned with the cost.  I've found the monetary, time, and physical investment to be worth it. The coaches are the best, they make me smile because they challenge me, they challenge me to put on more weight or work with me on my nutrition and check up my attendance and progress.  Zechariah and Jon, Jen, Brandon, and Joe really care and they enjoy what they do.  They're not only about the paycheck, they're about making better athletes and building a community.  I don't always "enjoy" the workouts.  But I enjoy and love this community.  We build relationships and athletes here.  Five words I associate with Irontribe: Fun, Challenging, Difficult, Progress, Accomplished!

name: Solmi
text: The best..a HUGE AND INSPIRING  FAMILY!

name: Amparo G. Calmaestra
text: Great place and staff!!! #6weeksITF

name: kori rooney
text: Love the 6 week challenge

name: Jay Brothers
text: Great coaches, challenging workouts, and awesome atmosphere.

name: Dan P
text: Life changing.

name: Joseph Felix
text: Outstanding staff

name: Laura Morales
text: Amazing place

name: Farmer Andrews
text: Not huge but never crowded or expensive come work out and help stand up to the city of Trussville that violated this owners rights and its members by inforcing tyrannical rules of covid not laws! This gym met all requirements set forth by health department yet police were sent to a private business to remove one single member . Dear Trussville pd you swore an.oath to the Constitution how about upholding it. Only the owner can have someone removed from private property.  How would anyone reading this like for their family to be sitting in their own home and tpd show up telling you to get out bc there is to many people in the home. So I'll gladly support any company for standing up against tyrannical government officials using police to abuse its powers. I encourage other Americans to stand together and become members here if you love America and feel the same.

name: Nathan Shiver
text: As other people have stated I filled out a year agreement I went in spoke with the owner and told him I wanted to cancel with about 3-4 months left on my contract. He said fine but that I wouldn’t be getting reimbursed for the time I had left and that my contract would expire in august. That was the last I heard about it. Checking through my bank records I’ve still been getting charged on a monthly basis. The owner told me to my face my contract would expire and that was it. After calling him and asking why I was still being charged he said it’s because I didn’t fill out a 30 day cancellation notice. I was never told about this paperwork I needed to fill out until after he’s already taken about $100 of mine for a gym I’m not even going to. Even if he had told me about the paperwork the first time he’s trying to get you to forget about having to cancel so he can milk you out of as much money as possible.

resp.text:
We are sorry that you are upset. We looked at your account and see that you signed a one year agreement on 11/6/19. Your one year agreement was up on 12/17/20. We froze all account during covid so no one would have to pay for their membership while they could not use the facility. The one year agreement and month to month membership paperwork states “you the buyer may cancel with a 30 day written notice of cancellation once obligation has been met”.
We have one policy for joining the gym and 1 policy for canceling membership. By doing this, this has cut down on miss communication with staff to staff and staff to members.
When members ask about cancellation, the answer is always, “once you met your one year agreement, if you have one, you can fill out the 30 day cancellation notice at the front desk.”

Have a nice day.

name: Andrew Newton
text:
I signed up hoping to love it. But after attending just a few times it was NOT even worth the money. I signed a 30 day cancellation and was told I wouldn’t be charged after I signed. I was lied to. They charged me the next month and refused to give me my money; even after I called and asked.

If your looking for a humid and “jockstrap” environment to lift weights then this is your gym. But if you want your money’s worth then go somewhere else.

resp.text:
Hey Andrew, sorry to hear that you were unhappy. We looked up your account and we saw that you joined on 1/3/21 as a month to month membership which requires a 30 day cancellation notice, per sign up paperwork. When joining our gym, your monthly payment comes out the day you sign up every month afterwards. You filled out the 30 day cancellation notice on 1/21/21, 13 days before your next payment so you would get charged 1 more time, plus you would still have 24 hour access until 3/4/21. If you have anymore question please feel free to call.
P.S. we will personally check to make sure your cancellation notice is processed properly.  Have a nice day

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Great environment with plenty of equipment! Eric is really nice and professional. I look forward to working out here.

name: John smallwood
text: Great gym!! I like their future plans for 24 hour basketball!

name: Stevie Waggoner
text:
DO NOT GIVE THIS GYM YOUR MONEY

This gym has two complaints filed against them with the BBB. One for making a minor sign a contract and pay $80 without the parent's permission or knowledge. We signed a year long contract and called less than a week later asking if we could cancel before the covid-19 shut down and before our contract even started. We were told by the employee that he couldn't do that for us because he didn't know how but that he would put our account on freeze until they reopened and we could call back then to cancel. With the ongoing pandemic, we do not plan to be going to a gym anytime soon because it is NOT ESSENTIAL. This gym has been charging us despite a pandemic and despite us asking to cancel within the legal rescission laws of Alabama. This place is only concerned about the money in their wallets and has no concern for the health of their community whatsoever.

name: Savannah Harper
text: Love working out here. It is good vibes here and the people who work here are very nice as well.

name: Austin Cole
text:
Definitely a 5 Star gym!! Tired of those boring gyms that have the same typical boring equipment? Then join here and transform your dad bod back into a Thor bod. Got a rough time schedule for working out? No problem here, you can come all the time and workout anytime you want!! So stop being apart of the boring gym life and join a real gym! 😉 The gym at Trussville is the gym for everyone and definitely earned its 5 star rating right away from me!! 💪👊

PS this gym has a 24/7 STEAM ROOM!
Yes I will repeat myself, it has a 24/7 STEAM ROOM!!
😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲

name: Nate Miller
text: Great prices, way cheaper than any other gyms in the area. Great equipment, top of the line brand new equipment that is kept in great condition. Great staff, very friendly and honest.  Best gym in trussville for sure.

name: Jennifer Pannell
text: Nice atmosphere and never over crowded. They have childcare available when I need it and everyone is so helpful! I love that they have so many group classes to choose from and they are included!!

name: Carson Treglown
text: Great gym! Great equipment! Awesome employees! Love the steam room! Better than any other gym I’ve been to!

name: Ludwig Francillon, MD
text: Great gym. Owner and staff are Very friendly. Owner tries to go out of his way to help and motivate you. Great atmosphere.

name: Renee Taylor
text: Great gym! I love that the classes are included in membership! Clean gym with quality equipment! Love the steam room and awesome friendly staff!!

name: Carol Overton
text: So great for a quick workout with such easy access and plenty of parking.  Location is awesome!

name: Sam Kiser
text: Provides an inimate family feel as opposed to stressful crowded gym settings. Steam rooms are a huge plus! Affordable memberships and 24 hour access can't be beat. Plus childcare options available.

name: Sawyer Caine
text: Great staff and equipment I would recommend to anyone in the area. I also like the finger scanner it makes it easier than carrying a card around with you all the time.

name: Alex Garcia
text: Nice Atmosphere, with a staff that cares. You won’t find another gym in Trussville that cares about your results like the staff at “The Gym.”

name: Casey Barnes
text: Owner is awesome and gym is very nice. Everyone in the area should check it out!

name: Barrett Willingham
text: I love the finger print scanner! The 24 hour access without a card is pretty cool!

name: Michael Hicks
text: Awesome new  gym in Trussville . Instruction and group training available

name: eric patterson
text: Great equipment and I love the steam room.

name: austin wyatt
text: I love the atmosphere and the rogue equipment!

name: Keita Suminoe
text: Hell yeah

name: James
text:
Great gym, so glad I found this place. They have specialty barbells and a monolift, which were the big things I was after.

They also have some good strongman equipment, such as a loadable log, circus dumbbell, and axle bar.

The equipment is in good condition and the facility is always clean.

name: Manned Crown2
text: Other than it being pretty overpriced for two people at the least, it's an AMAZING gym and I go there everyday!! Worth it!

name: Chris Douglas
text:
I was a member of this gym for 3 years, and only gave up my membership because I moved.  It's a wonderful space to lift in, has a great atmosphere, and is very affordable.  The owner, Charlie, is knowledgeable, friendly, and professional.  The other lifters are supportive and welcoming.  I always had a spotter when I needed one. Some of the machines aren't the newest, but they're kept in good shape and clean.  The powerlifting area is more extensive than average.  Strong, Inc feels like the sort of gym my dad used to lift in in the 80s and 90s.  And I think that's a good thing.

I'm genuinely upset to be leaving.  I know that finding a gym of a similar caliber elsewhere will be difficult.  Strong, Inc is a work of love wrought in iron, chalk and sweat.

resp.text: Can’t thank you enough for this review! We are sad to see you go but so grateful to of had you for 3 years! People like you are what make Strong Inc the gym it is! We look forward to seeing you again one day! Stay Strong!

name: Ty Johnson
text: Some of the equipment needs updating but everyone is super friendly and helpful.

name: King Craig
text: Best 24r gym in town,  always clean, great equipment

name: Chong Xing
text: When you see a monolift and a reverse hyper, you know this place means business. This gym is well organized and sectioned (cardio area, dumbbell-bodybuilding area, and powerlifting area), with all kinds of bars and equipment you can think of. I was visiting Tuscaloosa for a week (hi from Mount Oread) and lucky enough to find this place - bought a week pass and enjoyed every single day training there. If you like lifting weights, heavy or light, look no further – this is the place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review. It was a pleasure having you and we hope to see you again!

name: Rachel
text: Definitely not your sterile, boring gym! Strong has all the equipment you'd want for powerlifting (and other sports, but I'm a powerlifter, so I'm not as familiar with the others): cages, platforms, combo racks, barbells galore, bumper plates, you name it. The gym is well-worn (i.e. people actually use it) but stays nice and clean. Chalk is allowed and stays cleaned up. The owner (Charlie Lyons) is super helpful and the USPA AL state chair. I was a recent newcomer and welcomed by the crowd; the community is excellent. Rates are great. 24/7 access is super convenient. The women's bathroom area has plenty of room to stretch, which I also like; I prefer not to stretch in the middle of the gym. It's fun being in a gym where you see people lifting 500+ lb every time you go in.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Hunter Regan
text: This is the gym for powerlifting in Alabama.

text: It's was nice but not everyone wore a mask

text: Love this place! The classes are fun and challenging, and with three different formats there’s good variety in the workouts. The coaches are energetic and knowledgeable; they really put forth the effort to get to know you and help you reach your heath goals. All of the staff are super friendly, you always feel welcome to be there. They host monthly member socials that let you get to know the people you work out with better, as well as participate in community activities that benefit the Huntsville area. Awesome workouts, great studio - highly recommend!

name: Meghan Darby
text: I love how fun the classes are and how focused the coaches are in a safe, fun environment that pushes everyone! I’m a long time fitness enthusiast—CrossFit, spin, marathon and ultra running. But, you don’t need a huge fitness base to enjoy this. I love the simplicity, variation and data used to push performance in a relaxed environment.

resp.text: We appreciate you Meghan...we find it very satisfying that fitness enthusiasts and novelists can all enjoy our challenging workouts and feel safe while doing it!  #cleanandsafe!

text: I was never more interested in going to gym this much in my life. The best fitness place I’ve ever been in and the coaches there are just awesome and have very deep knowledge about the training. They would make the gym very interesting that you would want to attend more often. They encourage you to go an extra mile in your exercises. I feel great going here😁

name: Hope Seeley
text: Absolutely one of the best workouts you can get! I love having different platforms to choose from so I don’t get stuck in a routine. The coaches are the best in Huntsville. Love them!

text: Always love going to REGYMEN, all of the coaches are amazing everyone one of them encourage your goals and make each work out fun! I usually blink and the time is over, always the best start to my day!

Priscilla,
We are so grateful to have you on our Team and appreciate your loyalty as a Founder!  Its been an eventful first year...we hope you are looking forward to our BIGGER AND BETTER Expanded Studio coming soon!!

name: Kylene Street
text: My first Regymen experience was before they officially opened when they hosted pop up workouts throughout the city.  Even with minimal equipment, I loved the workouts.  More so, I was impressed with how the team leaders and coaches took interest in truly getting to know the people who stopped by for a free workout.  They have officially been open for a few months now and the workouts continue to impress.  The burn, build and box options allow for variety and can be tailored for any fitness level.  The coaches are approachable and motivating.  You can tell they love what they do and care about each member's progress.  They  encourage fun and sportsmanship each workout while pushing each member to be their best.  Regymen's passion for fitness also extends to the local community. They participate in local drives and advocate for members to do the same.  I am excited for Regymen to be in Huntsville and continue to grow!

name: Joel Lackey
text:
Regymen is an investment into your fitness.  Does it cost a bit more than a typical gym membership?  Yes it does, but you get a lot for your money:  A great variety of instructor designed and led workouts; some of the same benefits as having a personal trainer as they will help you towards your personal fitness goals; A great calorie burn and muscle build in an hour...I typically burn 700-900 calories depending on the workout.  The best part is, I don’t have to think about it.  I get there and everything is set up.  It’s not a chore, I look forward to it, and feel great and more productive for the rest of the day.  All of the instructors and support staff are great.  So, is it more than the $30 a month you spend on Planet Fitness?  Yup, but be honest...how well is that membership working out?

Shout out to Bree for getting my heart rate monitor working.

resp.text: Joel! You are THE MAN! Awesome member. Happy to have you as part of the family

name: Michael Lombardo
text: Outstanding workout. Best I have had in a long time. Used to workout at Orange Theory but got tired of the repetitive workouts. Regymen is always different and always fun and exciting. The trainers are outstanding and very helpful if you have physical issues you are dealing with. The owners take pride in their business and don’t be surprised if they are working out next to you. The Team Leads at the rest are always helpful and ready to assist if you have any issues. They are warm and friendly. Overall a fantastic place to loose some pounds and a lot of sweat.

resp.text: Thank you Michael! Much love to you! Happy to have you as part of the Regymen Family. Stay strong and keep getting that get sweat on with us here at Regymen

name: Matthew Self
text: I love how working out at Regymen is an energetic, group workout, at your own pace! It can be great for everyone! You can schedule the workouts with the app, on your own time....making it easy to attend. All of the trainers are easy to talk to, and are really there to help you reach your fullest potential. Regymen Fitness Huntsville is a great workout that I will highly recommend for anyone!

name: Megan Cameron
text: The atmosphere, coaches, staff, and members are all so encouraging and welcoming! The coaches and staff go out of their way to get to know the members on a personal level which has really helped to encourage me as I start on my fitness journey with Regymen. Going to the gym doesn't feel like a chore, and I am finding that I enjoy and look forward to going to my workouts each day as I continue to make friends with the other members and coaches. I have already noticed an improvement in my energy levels and moods and just generally feel better since I started working out at Regymen. Looking forward to continuing my fitness journey!

name: Holly Ralston
text: Regymen, with three different kinds of exercise programs, offers a challenging HIIT workout, which is my favorite kind of workout. By changing up the type of program, as well as incorporating multiple work stations in each of the three programs, I stay engaged while addressing strength, endurance and dexterity. As for me, especially love the BOX classes- great for managing stress!

resp.text: We appreciate you Holly!  It pleases us that you recognize and take full advantage of all 3 platforms we have to offer...#burn, #box, and #build!!!!  # disruptyourroutine!

name: Rob Murphy
text: Great and varied workouts, excellent trainers, great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Rob! We’re so happy you’re part of the family!

name: Kelsey Turner
text: This place is awesome. I love all the different equipment there is. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun, but tough workout!

resp.text: Awesome Jeremy! Very proud to have you as a member. Keep crushing it! 👊

Especially if you want to get fit fast! 🏋🏼

resp.text: Crushing it Susan! You’ve made such great progress! Keep it coming 💪

text: Great gym small town health club feel in the bustling suburbs. Great escape after the workday.

name: Barb DiBurro
text: Great gym. Good selection of classes, machines are well maintained and plentiful, it is clean and the staff is Ah-may-zing. Everyone of them has answered questions or made suggestions to help me. Great atmosphere, staff and gym members are extremely supportive

name: Terri Nicole VO
text: I love this gym! The people are terrific, the workouts are killer, the equipment and free weights and ample and well taken care of! Love spin, the boot camp style synergy and trx, Zumba, power pump, kick boxing. I've got to try the yoga class that everyone raves about next.  The owner and staff and sweet and responsive too any need you have. The trainers are wonderful - shout out to Cedric and Amanda who are truly experts in their field. It won't take you long to feel like one of the family!!

name: Nicole Collier
text:
I highly suggest @helenahealthclub They have $5 enrollments this month. They are 24/7 365 days, have childcare, personal trainers, nutrition consultations, the equipment is always well kept and clean, PLUS amazing classes like HIIT, power pump, spin, zumba and cardio kick.

The biggest thing for us though is how incredibly friendly everyone is. There is zero pretentiousness.

name: Wes Christie
text: Good atmosphere, all the equipment you need. Members and staff are always friendly.

name: Clifton J McMillan Sr
text: Clean, family friendly well stocked with machines and free weights!  Staff friendly and helpful.   Content member since their beginning.

text: Great local workout facility, 24 hour access!

name: Josh Pospy
text: The best CrossFit gym around. Hands down.

name: Jason McCay
text:
Crossfit Sky Soldiers is a solid gym where both beginners and experienced people can come in and quickly get results. The coaches, Chris and Michele, are friendly and approachable. If you need help, they are eager to teach and will increase your confidence to do things you never thought possible.

A safe family atmosphere is promoted. People that attend classes are encouraging, inclusive, and fun to be around. Come see for yourself! :)

name: Brooke Thompson
text: CrossFit Alabaster is a fantastic gym. Management and coaching are beyond superior, and they also care about you and your fitness journey. From the moment I walked in I felted welcomed and like I belonged.

name: Katie Rehner
text: I came to Crossfit Alabaster after having 2 kids in 2 years hoping to get more physically fit.  Not only did I get in the best shape of my life, but I found a group of people who genuinely care about me as both an individual and an athlete.  The coaches are awesome and work very hard to help each person meet their goals.  You are pretty much guaranteed to make a friend at this box!

name: Jason Vandiver
text: Great Gym! Good people, very encouraging.

name: Greg D'Alessio
text: CFA was my wife's and my first experience with Crossfit over 2 years ago.  We had a background of exercising but hadn't recently due to getting burned out with the traditional gym.  The intro 101 classes eased us into the swing of things especially the movements we hadn't used before.  The first month was continuous soreness but we kept showing up every day for more.  This is the most we've ever been challenged which has built not only strength but mental toughness.  The coaches are passionate and creative with scaling to meet everyone's skill level.  It's the best feeling when at the end of the workout, thinking nothing's left, and gym mates are cheering you on to find that last ounce of might to cross the finish line.  We've met lifelong friends and can't imagine being anywhere else.

name: aksnyderiv
text: Crossfit Alabaster is a great Box! It doesn't matter if you have ever finished a WOD or have been doing Crossfit for years, their Coaches are friendly, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. There are multiple classes offered throughout the day, each starts with a thorough warmup, a strength, the WOD (usually a metcon / amrap) finished with some stretching! It is a fun, family friendly atmosphere with usually some pretty good music. The Owner,  Coach Leigh is truly a blessing, you could not ask for a more caring and motivating person! If you live in the area or just passing through you should stop by.

name: Angeline Walker
text: Love this box!!!

name: Laura Ahlqvist
text: Love this place just wish the sauna was open!  owner is very friendly and very reasonably priced

name: Trey Short
text: Good clean Hammer Strength gym with all the equipment a man needs.

name: Judah Hollis
text: Great place to work out. Awesome polices and prices. Communicative staff and a wide variety of work out equipment.

name: Sara Dean
text: Love this gym! Owner is always so nice and the facility is great.

name: Diana & Steve Thompson
text: Great equipment,  great prices, clean well maintained facilities.

name: Jonathan Hatley
text: Great gym. Plenty of free weights, machines and cardio and is always very clean.

name: alex heard
text: 24 hours is as good as it gets. Chucks the most honest man I know.

name: Dalton Simrell
text: I moved across the state with an entire different zip code I told the gym this but still shortly after I got a notice in the mail from an attorney saying that if I didn't pay the due balance of 140 dollars that I would be taken to court. Really... After my loyalty with a membership over 5 years when I move this is what I get. Thank you Chuck. take me to court and sue me because it's the last time you'll ever get any money from me and I'll tell everyone I know not to set foot in your gym

text: I've been a member for 1.5 years and love it. There is enough equipment that most times I'm not having to wait and it is in good condition and we'll maintained.  The owner, Chuck, is super nice and very helpful. Membership price is very reasonable compared to others in the area. The 24 hour accessibility is a huge perk

text: Chuck runs a great place. Clean gym, courteous staff, always able to use what I need for my workouts.

name: Jrew Cooper
text: Horrible business practices of a small country town ran by people with no experience or idea of what it is like to run a business. There is NEVER anyone there as far as staff. If you call no one will ever pick up and the door is always locked. The one time I called the and the own picked up he advised that he was out eating at 1pm. There is no urgency to get your business nor is there to provide and kind of customer service. This place is not a real business it’s just something that exist! Trash

text: Great place to workout.  Has a lot of equipment.

text: The best gym around. The people are always friendly and it's never too crowded

name: Cody Fountain
text: Chuck at shape’n Up Fitness center is not a righteous business person. There is a sign every inch in this gym telling you everything you can’t do. Chuck the owner kicked me out of his gym over the phone, notified me that if I step one foot on shape’n up property that I will be locked for trespassing and he also stole my money that I payed him up front for my membership. I have only had my membership for about three or four months. I payed him over $300.00 cash for the whole year. I did not violate his contract. I did not disrespect anybody. I committed no crime. I posted a video on my personal Instagram page of me making fun of meatheads that I have had encounters with in this very gym. Everybody thought it was funny accept for chuck and a couple so called Christian people at shape’n up Fitness. You cannot be free or have fun at this gym. Chuck has kicked numerous people out for petty reasons with no legit explanation. He marches to the beat of his own drum and I refer everybody in Oneonta, AL to The Gym across the street from Oneonta City School. They have a hot tub and a swimming pool and senior citizen discounts. You can also be free there without judgment from people that talk down to you.

name: Chris Mahan
text: This is a good gym that is open 24/7. The equipment isn't as advanced as the equipment at The Gym, but the fact that it is open 24 hours a day is an advantage for some people.

text: Not nearly enough seats! OR parking spaces! Plus, because it had rained, it was pretty much a MUD hole.  Also couldn't see most of the game cause was low on the sideline and the team moved up and down the field always at the line of scrimmage - so never was able to see much of anything!  - from a frustrated grandparent.

text: Great place, friendly, needs more restrooms.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to say that we have been blessed with the addition of additional women's restrooms thanks to the generosity and hard work of a number of our families. Praise the Lord!

name: Slade
text: When I first visited Crossfit Candor I was skeptical and scared. I was over 300 lbs, in the worst shape of my life, and other gyms and diets did not work for me. Three months in my life is changing. I am becoming healthier, stronger, and most importantly I can move again. The coaches have been top notch. They have monitored my progress, making sure I am able to do each exercise and that I don't injure myself in the process.  The exercise is hard but it will make positive changes in your body and mind. The best part is the community. Everyone  wants to see you win.

resp.text: We are so proud of you, Slade!  Keep up the awesome work!  We are all here cheering you on!

name: Nathan Kenny
text: Excellent sense of camaraderie and everyone pushes you to be the best you in the gym. I wouldn't wanna go anywhere else.

resp.text: We are so glad to have you and so proud of all you’ve accomplished!👏🏻

name: Robin Claybrook
text: I was skeptical to try CrossFit but I’m so glad that I tried CrossFit Candor. After trying five different gyms in town-this gym feels like home. The coaches push you to be your best and the workouts are dynamic and can be modified based on your capabilities. CrossFit Candor is the best gym in town!

resp.text: We are so thankful you tried us out!  Thank you, Robin!

name: Mary Caillouet
text: Candor is here in Tuscaloosa waiting to change your life. From reaching your fitness goals to giving you a community that makes this town feel more like home, Crossfit Candor offers a well-rounded experience. After working out here for about 18 months, I can say that Candor is so much more than just a gym to me. Lance and Jamie work tirelessly to build a place where their members feel welcome and challenged so they are set up to thrive. They have phenomenal coaches, and because of that I have some pretty awesome friends that workout next to me everyday. I could not recommend this place enough!

resp.text: Thank you for being such a big part of us! :)

name: Carrie Cameron
text: My 14yr old son and I joined and it was the best decision ever.  We had been to other crossfit boxes but this one is by far the best.  They work with everyone, no matter your skill level.  Always offering encouragement! My son loves it and looks forward to going everyday!

resp.text: We are so grateful to have you, Carter and Cooper as members!  From the youth to adults, you guys are so important to us!

name: Chris Lee
text:
This is a great CrossFit Box!  The coaching here is excellent, They take time to work with everyone individually no matter your skill level.   The people here are like family and everyone is super encouraging and helpful.

If you are looking for a great group of people and a local box that has lots of class times and 2 open gyms a day come check this place out!

name: Beachful Bliss
text: Absolutely the best Crossfit gym !!! Amazing coaches that really care and so very helpful.  I can't say enough about this gym... you just have to go and witness the hard work and a community that cheers eachother on!!!

name: Dana Williams
text: Candor is full of the most encouraging people, great coaches, and a family atmosphere.

resp.text: We are so thankful for you!  :)

name: thatdisabledude33
text: Amazing staff

name: Season Lane
text: Being new to Iron Tribe brings a learning curve,  no matter the fitness level you are upon entering. The instructors I've had so far have been welcoming,  explanatory, and observant of me during workouts. As an athlete, I appreciate their instruction and know it will set allow me future success and keep me on track to be free of injury as I do!

name: Hampton Dortch
text: I could sing praises about this place all day long! From the community, to the engaging and talented coaches, to the dedicated members... ITF has gotten me into the best shape of my life and has also helped me learn to push myself in other areas. Give Iron Tribe a shot. You won’t regret it.

name: Kelli Burt
text: I am a new member but my experience thus far has been so much fun! The encouragement that I receive from staff and other members is incredibly refreshing.  I love this gym and would highly recommend to come and check it out.

name: Whitney Forrest
text: We love Iron Tribe Fitness! Our family has been involved with the community for the past 5 years and truly enjoy every aspect. I feel challenged by the workouts and encouraged by the team/ athletes every time I come in-- the coaches and staff are wonderful!

name: Keith Roberson
text: The IronTribe experience has completely changed my life. At 62 years old I am more fit than I have ever been! Anyone who sees a before picture can't believe it's me. Plus I have tons of energy I didn't have before. The coaches are always great at making sure you are using proper technique and pushing you to places you never thought you could go! And, I've made a lot of new friends. Working out at IronTribe is something I hope I never have to give up.

name: Alicia Talley
text: I absolutely love this gym! The couches are friendly, well trained, they truly want you to reach your fitness goals. Definitely, a place I'm proud to be a part of!

name: Benji Wilson
text: I love our coaches and how they push me everyday to be better!

name: Cindy Bierman
text: The coaches are so encouraging and work to help you  meet your goals.  The environment is very positive.  I love it.

name: Raley Fountain
text: Peggy is awesome! Jonathan is pretty good too. If you like HIIT workouts and want to get strong quickly, Iron tribe is the way to do it. I also like that they write down the results of your workouts so you can see yourself improving.

name: Thomas G
text: I love my Iron Tribe family! The coaches are incredible! This is a professional and encouraging place to build muscle and health!

name: Philip McDaniel
text:
As my 6 week challenge comes to an end.  Let me reflect on this.  It has been a GREAT ride.  All the coaches at Iron Tribe on 280 are amazing.  They push you to be better and they are there to encourage you on your tough days.  A couple take aways are this.  If you have a question about ANYTHING, ask the coaches, they are there to watch you succeed!!!  They will tell it like it is and what you need to do to stay on track.  They are AWESOME at this.  The second take away is this, STICK,STICK,STICK to the meal plan.  It is there for you to succeed!!!  It’s all laid out and the online community is GREAT, if you have question for them ask about recipes, nutrition items that come up while shopping etc…  The online community is another AWESOME way to stay in touch and stay accountable.

THANK YOU TO THE COACHES AND ATHELETES AT IRON TRIBE 280!!!  IT HAS BEEN AN AWESOME EXPERIENCE!!

Philip

name: Danielle Brown
text: Very pleased with trainers. They observe your techniques and offer constructive direction to ensure you don’t injure yourself during class.

name: Joshua Stateham
text: Great gym with awesome coaches and staff. Mix of cardio and strength workouts with diet plans which will get you in shape in no time. Enjoyable environment, friendly, varied workouts, excellent scheduling app, and just a great fitness program. Highly recommended.

name: Katrina H Chalk
text: I am finishing up my #6weeks ITF challenge with the trainers at Hwy 280 gym. Everyone is so helpful, encouraging and willing to help you learn and reach your goals. This has been the best experience! Thanks guys!!

name: Tomika Lockett
text: Great gym to train, not your usual gym setting.  The trainers are all Great and if you have the will, they are going to help you meet your fitness goals. I’m currently on week 6 of the #6weeksITF training, and I feel Great.

name: Eric Housh
text: I've been working out here for almost four years, and have seen amazing results. The coaches are friendly and knowledgeable, the facility is clean and organized, and of course, the ITF programming works! If you are serious about transforming your life and getting healthier, I highly recommend this place.

name: Mike Metcalf
text: Iron Tribe 101/challenge program: great total fitness coaching, both nutrition and exercise. The HIIT and power workouts in the 6-week challenge are a great kickstart to better fitness habits. Lots of mutual support from other participants at all fitness levels. Highly recommend.

name: Glyna Humm
text: Love this place and everyone that works here!  The coaches really care about each athlete and are dedicated to making sure each person reaches their full potential.

name: ALLAN BARNETT
text: Don't personally work out there but know quite a few people that do and been in there a few times friendly people and serious about working out.

name: Teddy Dover
text: Phenomenal team of coaches dedicated to your training. Great gym!

name: Chris Tidwell
text: Excellent gym. Teddy has some of the nicest and rarest equipment I have ever seen in a gym. Teddy and Stan are excited to answer any questions you might have. Can't say enough about this facility.

name: zach ZACHSON
text: These guys charged me without informing me. I signed up for Flex Fitness in Irondale, and they closed down, opened another gym, in another town, and just decided to keep charging me money without informing me of anything, then had the gall to call me and tell me I couldn't just put a stop pay on it like I did. Shady as hell.

name: Tiffany Oden
text: Very clean, and even more so during this pandemic. Lots of cleaning and disinfecting, and the staff are always wearing protective gear. The equipment is properly spaced out for social distancing. I've been working out at this gym since they've opened and it's my favorite. The environment is always so motivating and keeps me going. This gym definitely meets everyone's individual needs.

name: Tom Jackson
text:
I was a member at when this place was flex fitness in Irondale.
They closed down, changed names, and never contacted me. They did keep charging me until I caught the charges and demanded they stop. They didn't. They have continued to charge me and have even sent a collection agency after me. The place is joke and it starts at the top.

text: Love the old school feel and great equipment

name: Ricky

name: Ben Russell
text: As a gym it has all the equipment you need. The equipment isn't anything new but if you're just looking to get a work out in this will work.

name: Tyler Martin
text: This has been a good gym local right here in Dothan not far from us the people are nice and it's also a 24 hours in I would highly recommend it to anybody looking to better their selves whether it's bodybuilding powerlifting weight training Zumba classes karate they got the whole nine yards and they even Carrie supplements upfront in the refrigerator to purchase

name: Ciera Nitkowski
text: A great gym for the price. All access is the best because I have actually worked out at 1 am before. This is a clean, nice workout place that is never crowded.

name: Jared Grizzle
text: Great price monthly and don't have to sign up for a year at a time. 24 hours with key card access and adequate equipment.  Dumbbells go well above 100 lbs.

name: Second Handed
text: Love this gym, it's quiet and not at all crowded and it's 24 hour, you receive a card that you scan to get in.

name: Devon Daniels
text: I this a convenient 24 hr gym with a reasonable fee. It would be perfect if it had shower facilities.

name: Paul Blankenship
text: A reasonably priced gym.  If you are looking for a place to go in, workout, and take care of business this is the place.  They have machine weights, free weights, and the usual cardio.

name: The Doghouse
text: I have been to many gyms in this country and have devoted my life to fitness. This gym is a high school gym at best. One of all the equipment they have and they was not taken care of. There are holes in benchs, pads missing, weights that are bent, the equipment is old and out dated, ECT. I have worked out here for two months and have gained only fat. The place has no gym vibe, in fact at night it's kinda creepy. There is no saunna, no showers; nothing a real gym would have to help you. The few people that are in there spend more time talking then lifting which wouldn't be a problem if they ain't sitting on the on piece of equipment you need or they distract you from your workout. The only reason many people use this gym is the fact they can go to the gym at midnight.  This is a piss poor gym that the owner should be ashamed of. They could turn this into a great small gym, but they are clearly to cheap to do so.

name: hardluck 1995
text: I canceled my membership. They took my card then billed my account 20.00 Therefore they stole my money. They suck.

name: Barbara Hightower
text: I enjoy working out here. I like the gym hours. It really works for me. There are times when I see person's that don't clean the equipment or remove weight from machines, but I love the gym itself. I'm hoping you'll eventually get into a larger building and add other equipment.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your review about our fitness center! Your 5 stars is confirmation of our daily efforts to serve! We appreciate you! 🥰🏋️‍♂️

It meant a lot to wait up and let me in. Definitely had some of the best equipment I’ve seen in a while! Check em out!🤙🏻💪🏼

text: The gym is great! However, I have school till 3 central time. I then have baseball after which also takes another 2 hours. I go to the gym and I left my hat on the incline bench press bar. I go back the next night and it’s gone. Not on the desk. Not behind the desk. Idk where it is. It’s my school team hat so I need it ASAP. It is a black hat with a gold “B” on the front. I also had white sun glasses on the hat. The sun glasses were “Worth” brand. I would like to see if it’s in the lost and found.

resp.text: Jaxon as an update, we have found your hat and glassed and will keep them with our staff.  Feel free to come in anytime during staffed hours to collect your items or call us directly at (334) 219-0150 to  make alternate arrangements.

text: Very friendly staff! Very CLEAN Gym! Very CLEAN Tanning rooms and beds!! It’s a comfortable gym to come and get your workout in! I’ve had much success here and cannot wait for this corona mess to end so we can all get back to it!!!!!!

text: Very welcoming and nonjudgmental workout facility!  The staff is very nice and they are there to assistant you with whatever you need.  The facility is very clean and it is not overcrowded!!  Great place to workout!  It doesn’t matter if you are inexperienced or if you are a seasoned bodybuilder, you will feel right at home.

bradley,  thanks for the great feedback and for choosing us to be a part of your fitness journey.

name: elizabeth prather
text: The Workout Anytime experience is definitely one to write about!  Not only do we have remarkably clean facilities filled with top of the line, brand new equipment, there are lots of friendly, helpful people.  The leadership, including dedicated and well trained staff and managers, are a team who really care about you reaching your fitness goals in an environment that makes working out fun.

name: IVEY 96
text: Great gym. The only thing I wish the gym had was heavier dumbbells like 120’s and 130’s. Hopefully we can get them one day.

name: Richard Weathers
text: John is friendly & easy to deal with. The members are generally decent though the culture in gyms is different these days - few people unload their weight once they're finished or put plates back in any kind of order. This is common at just about every gym in the area so I don't hold it against any staff. I do 'cleanup' as a matter of habit no matter the condition a station is in when I get there, keeps me warm between sets. There is a competitor in town that has the same hours but I don't see myself switching at any point in the future. Sure, it would be nice if they had more space but this actually works in my case by forcing me to change my routine occasionally and give my body something it wasn't expecting. The crowd is a nice cross section of people & suits me.
