name: Justin Cooper
text: If you want to catch something like athletes foot or get a pube on you while working out then look no further! This place is nasty, nobody cleans (especially the showers) and the equipment it slim to choose from (what's not broken anyway). They are also CROOKED LIARS, when I signed up the woman said there were no hidden fees and of course There was a hidden fee and she told me "oh you'll get that back when you turn in your key card"... nope, just a bad lie from a business. Do yourself a favor and pay a few dollars more from a reputable business and a real gym.

resp.text: Hi Justin, You purchased a one month membership in which you had access during our business hours. If a mth-to-mth member would like 24hr access we require a $5 key tag purchase, which is yours to reuse if you pay for any additional months. At the end of the month you wanted a $5 refund for the key tag you used, but that is not something we offer as the key tag cannot be reused by other customers - everyone gets a new one. I apologize if that was not made clear when you purchased it. At no time during the conversation when you requested the $5 refund or any other time during that month you were a member, did you express concern about cleaning or broken equipment at our facility - so I am unable to understand what those specific issues are or what equipment you think we're lacking. Our cleaning and repair personnel are very thorough and also work out daily at our facility and our members know them by name. When issues are identified we take care of them as quickly as possible. We clean the facility and the showers daily but we do not clean/rinse down the showers after each person using them, so I hope everyone is courteous to the next user after they leave a shower! Some things we can't control, and I'm sorry you're upset that we did not refund you the $5. We've been a "real Gym" in Pell City/Riverside area since 2004 and many of our members have been with us from the beginning, nobody's perfect but we try very hard to make our members happy.

name: Dylan Lee
text: Terrible people they stopped automatically withdrawing my monthly payment without getting in touch with me at all and Said I stopped paying and ruined my credit. They were all nothing but rude and cared nothing about their customers. Would NOT even recommend this place to my worst enemy. Horrible establishment!

resp.text: We are very sorry about the problems with your account. I can give you a summary so you understand everything that was done to help you solve this. Your very 1st draft on 6/1/19 was rejected by your bank because the account # you gave us was not correct. Our billing company tried to contact you by letter, but it was returned undeliverable. On 6/18/19 they called you by phone and your phone service did not allow them to leave a message. You contacted us on 8/13/19 due to a negative credit report filing - that was the first you were aware of the issue as you explained that you don't reconcile your account so you didn't know the payment wasn't being drafted. We immediately put you in touch with the billing company on 8/13/19 and the notes in your file state the following problems were corrected on the very same day. 1) All fees were removed from your account and they received your payment to bring your account current and a correct acct # for future billing. 2) Negative Credit Reporting was removed  3) Your address and phone was verified to ensure it was correct for future contact. I understand your negative feelings about this issue as no one likes to be inconvenienced by mistakes, but I also hope you are satisfied with the end result, as all the problems have been resolved very quickly.

name: Kim Dargan
text: Good facility, great people, safe place to work out 24/7.

name: Alfonso Arias
text: Great facility, nice place.

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Abby West
text: It's a really small and crowded gym but I like the 24/7 access key cards that you receive with the membership. The membership is pricey for the size of the gym but that's probably due to the fact that there are not many gyms around.

name: Bill Cantley
text: My place to workout. Lots of new equipment and Super Friendly Staff.

name: Micheal Beaver
text: Hours are tough for non members.  And little pricey for day or week pass

name: ALECIA JASON ADAMS
text: Great place!!!

name: Sabrina mahan
text: Great place

name: Mister JSL
text: Can't say I love this place or they would get a big head! But I do and always leave satisfied and sore!  At least for the adult classes, can't speak for the kids classes given I am over 40!  Would highly recommend if you are just getting back into exercising!  I love the dynamic warm up routine which is like a workout to me but I love the staff and classes!

name: Karen Banka
text: My son is going there for Physical Therapy...they are great and very accommodating, taking school schedule and other activities into planning for PT.

name: Allison Gregg, ACC
text: If you're an adult athlete, the Boot Camps are the best offering in Huntsville.  You learn form and gain agility.  Strength and weight loss are a given.  D1 Boot Camp is the hardest workout, and the most rewarding.  The groups are supportive, with an edge of competitiveness.  They keep you on your toes and coming back for more.  Thanks to D1, I placed first in my tennis league and have qualified to compete at the State level twice this year.

name: Tyler King
text: I've been through physical therapy and training with D1 Huntsville for just over two years combined now, and it's never been anything but fantastic.  With respect to training, their focus on form/technique is essential to an athlete looking to progress without getting hurt.  Their focus on an full-body athlete instead of strictly "mirror muscles" is a must for any athlete or any person looking to train properly.  There's an even balance of cardio & weight work.  The physical therapists knowledge and focus on helping active people, those wishing to be active, and those just wanting to be able to walk again is fantastic.  Both have helped me focus in on what I need to get better and progress as an active person.

name: Brian Weathers
text: Killer work outs! Really creative workouts that keep you from feeling like your working out and getting bored. They have many different sessions throughout the day to fit almost anyone's schedule.

name: Jarrod Barnes
text: Great place to train and workout. Place for all not just athletes, will make you better and reach that goal.

name: Aileen
text: They make you feel like family!!

name: Gina Terry
text: Fantastic Trainers and a Great facility!

name: Dart Monkey
text: They have a solid rock wall here. There are several top rope routes as well as a few lead climbing spots and a bouldering cave. You do not have to be a member to climb. A day pass is $15 and they even have gear that you can rent.

name: Will Grice
text: ACA is a great club to be part of. Their facilities are top notch and the staff is friendly and professional. The new restaurant has phenomenal food and has the perfect atmosphere for a business lunch. The general manager is so very passionate about the club, the members, and the employees. How many places give out cards with the general manager's personal email and cell phone on it so that any time you have a question or concern you can get in touch with him or her? I highly recommend ACA. They do business the right way and I'm proud to have a membership there.

name: Candice Humphrey
text: I absolutely love this place. Wonderful staff and two beautiful locations. Tennis courts, group fitness class, a spa and so much more!!!

name: Charlie “GoodTime Charlie”
text: I wish they would provide better services for the racquetballers....I guess if you like tennis...its ok.  Beware....they charge your dues an additional $25 per month for a food allowance regardless if you use it or not...if you don't use it...they take it away from you....

resp.text:
Thanks for your review, Charlie. I'm sorry we're not able to provide all of the services and amenities we once were down at the South location. After years of trying to make the facility work for the racquetball, rock climbing, and fitness community, we had to make a choice to either close down the building completely or keep it open ONLY for the racquetball community. We thought we were doing a kindness in keeping it open. I will certainly pass your message across to ownership, and in gathering these opinions they can make a decision for the future of the building.

Please remember - you have 90 days to use your food and beverage points!

name: Nicholas Olson
text: Had an excellent time rock climbing for the very first time. Great instructor and all very nice.

name: Sherrie Dunn
text: I love my gym.  Everything I need in one place.  The staff is wonderful and make you feel welcome.

name: Devin Webb
text: Unfriendly account managers. Poor value and not customer friendly.

name: Jon Sawa
text: Very nice facility.  Clean and many options.  Totally worth the membership!

name: Maria Faulkner
text: The staff is amazing. They take the time to explain the concept, the motions, and proper form. The workouts are tough yet very enjoyable. It's a good way to spend an hour toning muscles and also stretching and relieving tension. I've only been going to classes here for a month and I can see a difference in my body and feel the increase in my strength. I highly recommend.

name: Pearls of Eden
text: I absolutely love going to workout at Pure Barre! I've been working out for years and have tried many, many things but Pure Barre by far is the best I've tried!! I love going to work out each day and it feels as though I'm at a retreat or spa of some sort when I'm there. I can't say enough great things about the instructors and community . They are simply AWESOME! I love the results and the way my body is sculpting out. Great people, Great environment, Amazing workout!

name: Melanie Anderson
text: This is a whole new experience in exercise. They have great classes with a variety of times to choose from. The instructors are genuinely interested in showing you proper technique to get the most benefit. I have back issues and  was worried about my age, but I was shown multiple ways to protect my back and still be getting a good work out.

name: Erika R. Harvell
text: I have been to six classes, so far. I tried out their free week and liked it so much that I signed up so I could keep the momentum going. My first and second class, I was kind of a disaster! There are certain parts of the workout that stay the same, so I had to follow the other girls that knew what they were doing. The exercises were new and pretty interesting. They work some of the smaller muscles that really lift your butt, tone your arms, and tone your abs. I am already seeing a little change in my muscle tone. I normally run and do yoga or some light weight lifting, so I was already in some kind of shape going in, but I don't work out too hard by myself. There's something cool and inspiring about doing it with other people and loud pumping music. It makes me really push myself to my limits, which is what I need. I get the feeling there is a sense of community there, too (I go to the Riverchase location). You don't just walk in and out like an invisible stranger. They learn your name, greet you every time, and tell you you're doing great in class. I'm really happy, so far! I can't wait to the results after a few more weeks.

name: S Miller
text: Challenging yet fun workout! The studio is great and the instructors are helpful. I am in love with this program and look forward to working out. The 55 minutes goes by fast and it focuses on problem areas for women

name: KD Burchfield
text: The Riverchase Studio is amazing! The instructors are all fantastic, welcoming and very helpful! This is the first workout that I have actually stuck with and look forward to going.  If you haven't checked it out, I highly recommend that you do.  You won't be sorry.

name: Beth Wilkinson
text: First time to take the Empowered class and loved it.  Leslie was a great instructor.   This will definitely be a regular Wednesday class for me.

name: Amanda Tabor
text: Tried it for the first time this past weekend! Loved it! The instructor Grace was awesome & the group of ladies there were super nice. Even though I had no idea what I was doing I'll definetly be back.

name: Kelly Jackson
text: So amazing! Only 2 classes in and I can already tell a difference. I have way more energy and feel more confident! Everyone is so welcoming and friendly. I need the accountability, and I have found it at Pure Barre Riverchase!

name: Amanda Morris
text:
I have always had back problems ever since I was in high school, mainly due to poor posture and not performing exercises to strengthen my back. I was in a car accident in 2014 that completely destroyed my back. I could barely get out of bed some mornings. I went to physical therapy for a couple months and that alleviated some of the pain but not all. I hate exercising by myself at a gym because I find it extremely boring. My coworker mentioned that there was a Groupon for Pure Barre for a couple classes at a good price. So I decided to go for it! I have finally found something that will help make me stronger and more toned and will keep my attention and keep challenging me. I have finished my Groupon and have purchased the student package and I can't wait to start going to classes multiple times a week. My back pain is pretty much nonexistent. I can feel those muscles getting tighter and I am extremely happy with my results thus far.

PS. Whitney is my favorite instructor so far. She takes the time to go around to all the ladies in class and help them get the most out of their exercises. Wish she taught more classes!

name: Carol Madden
text: Pure Barre is a great workout. I sleep better and feel better. I am seeing a change in my body. I really enjoy it.

name: Marissa S. Williams
text: Great workout at any level! Staff is very welcoming and engaging during class.

name: Scrub Mcglumpington
text: Ignore the name as my son also uses this account, but Pure Barre was fantastic today!! Can't wait until my next class!

name: Hillary Butterworth
text: So much fun! This location has the BEST customer service :)

name: Penny McCune
text: LOVE PB RIVERCHASE! THE BEST PLACE TO GET A FULL BODY WORK OUT! AWESOME INSTRUCTORS!!!! EVERYONE SHOULD TRY PB RIVERCHASE!!!

name: Rebecca Johnstone
text: My favorite all time workout- I can't say enough positive praise

name: Alicia Bettes
text: 1st time visit. The workout was challenging. I will be back!

name: Katelyn Ann Snyder
text: Great workout and an even better staff!

name: SanityCure
text: Great place!!!!!

name: Allison O'Brien Granger
text: love pure barre!!

name: Alex Ream
text: I have been a Trussville Y member for three years and still believe in the great value the Y membership has to offer. My only wish is extending evening hours for those who want to visit after work. But I understand the pandemic has affected the operations schedule quite a bit.

resp.text: We are pleased you have chosen the YMCA as your partner in Healthy Living and are committed to providing the best possible experience for you and your family.  We have extended our hours Monday-Thursday 5:00am-8:00pm, Friday 5:00am-7:00pm and Saturday 8:00am-5:00pm, Sunday 12:00pm-5:00pm.  Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts with us ! See you at the Y!!!!

name: Steven Baker
text: I love the equipment at the Y! The staff is awesome and helpful. Everyone is really friendly! I highly recommend the YMCA for getting yourself into shape.

name: John Rankin
text:
I've been going to the Trussville YMCA for about ten years.  The staff is consistently cordial, helpful, and very busy, working with a diverse gender-age membership with various needs and preferences for exercise.

I would like to see two or three more smith machines, as they allow typical basic weightlifting exercises without a partner to spot you. Especially helpful when flexibility, balance, and form are not what they used to be.

resp.text:
John,

Thank you for the comment.  We strive to provide excellent customer service at all times and sincerely appreciate you recognizing that effort.  We are also always looking for ways to improve and continue to make our members happy.  Thank you again for taking the time to provide feedback for our staff.

name: Delores Armstrong
text: I Love the Y @Trussville!!!  The staff is great, facility is clean and well managed.  The group classes are the best.  I especially enjoy the community engagement from the blood drives to the scholarships for those less fortunate.  The YMCA is a jewel in the Trussville community.

resp.text: Thank you Delores!  You are so sweet and we have really appreciated the time that you have volunteered to the Trussville Y!

name: George Barnett
text: The Trussville YMCA has foresight when it helps the area wide community with many needs. Families all over the region benefit from coat, food, and blood drives hosted at the Trussville YMCA. After school care for those who may not always be able to afford the cost. Welcoming place to exercise and be more healthy.

resp.text: Hi George!  Thank you for your kind words!  We have been truly blessed to have such wonderful members who have contributed to each of these causes and helped make our community stronger! - Dana

name: Kathleen Langsdale
text:
As an upcoming senior citizen, I love the fact the Trussville Y offers membership scholarships to those who are unable to join because of their income.  Helping seniors is so important to help keep us "wiser adults" active and live longer and healthier.
The Trussville YMCA is a wonderful place for fellowship, exercise and overall fun for all ages.  In today's world, where can you go that is totally a positive atmosphere where you can get all 3 advantages.  And if you are in any sort of need, the Trussville Y is there to help even if it is outside their realm  They are an awesome place to join and enjoy!!!!!
•	Provide a place for fellowship, exercise, and fun

resp.text: Thanks Kathleen!  We are so glad that you've had such great experiences at our branch!  If you want to make sure you have ALL of the most current information about what's going on at the Trussville YMCA, you can follow us on Facebook (Trussville YMCA) or swing by the Welcome Center to update your email address so you get our monthly newsletter!  We look forward to seeing you soon. - Dana

name: Daishaun Morgan
text: Clean facilities and friendly staff. We visit this location the most, I think because of the upkeep, equipment variety, indoor pool, and staff.

name: Vicki Stanford
text: Great place to improve mobility and physical stamina. The staff is friendly and helpful, and there is a program for everyone. I swim laps and am beginning physical training to improve balance and strength. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Vicki!  We are so happy to hear about your personal progress!  Thanks for being one of our AMAZING members!

name: Denise folkerts
text: The Trussville YMCA is an asset to this community.  The staff is friendly and cares about the mission.  Staff is constantly working to support community with education classes and other projects. Good Job!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Denise!  We love supporting the community making a difference in the lives of those around us!

name: Alonzo Taylor
text:
A new member was complaining in the men's locker room today about a smell coming out the steam Room in the  Men's locker ROOM😳😢 is  filthy !!!!!! And stays that way I've been complaining about this for months!!! me and several other members was talking about this problem today and we agree it's no use of complaining about it because nothing will get done. Steam room walls are BROWN with DIRT and BACTERIA !!!!😢 most of the time the hot tub it's not working properly  or it's cold !!!! It's a shame when you have to go other YMCAs to go to a CLEAN facility
for your membership. I never have this problem when I go to the other branches in town!!! Shades Valley, Hoover , Pelham SPOT LESS!! I always see people in Maintenance Cleaning the locker room except for the Trussville location !!😢 I have never in my LIFE been to a GYM so filthy and dirty just hope no one catches a staph infection!!! Very disappointed.

resp.text: Hi Alonzo!  Thank you for your message.  I am so sorry to hear that you have not had a great experience at the Trussville YMCA.  I would love for you to contact me so I can talk to you more about your concerns and to let you know about some of the improvements and updates that are coming!  - Dana Larkin (205) 655-2224

name: juan waggoner
text: Love the gym just wished equipment in child care was cleaned better. My kid ended up catching MRSA from the dirty play equipment.

resp.text: Hi Juan!  I see that you haven't visited our facility in quite some time, so I wanted to reach out and let you know that since your last visit, we have had a few changes in management.  We would love to help you get re-engaged with the facility and make sure that you have a fabulous experience!   We are sorry to hear about any negative experience you've had at the Trussville YMCA, but please feel free to reach out to me anytime with questions or concerns!  - Dana (205) 655-2224

name: Bryan Blackmon
text: The Y is an excellent place to let off some steam or get some steam, in the steam rooms. This is one of the very few locations in the Birmingham Metro area that has a swimming pool that is open year around and that is fantastic.

name: Brent Smith
text: Rude staff, especially the director. If you dont work for a living, they will give memberships away. However, those of us who go to work everyday and pay our bills; they charge out the nose.

resp.text: We apologize for your bad experience. We do offer financial assistance for a reduced rate. We would like to have an opportunity to change your mind about the Y.  Please contact Kim Ryals at KRyals@ymcabham.org

name: Josh Philliy
text: Everything is awesome, especially the staff. But I just wish we had another basketball court or something. Because I hate being kicked off the court for basketball and volleyball practice.

resp.text:
Thank you for the review.  We have the basketball and Volleyball practice schedule posted, sorry for the inconvenience.
YMCA- Trussville

name: Lillian Clemens
text: Love it best place to swim do activities during the summer and a good place to work out

resp.text: We are glad you love the Y!  Thanks, Wendy

name: Jacob Wallace
text: It would be great if they would activities like volleyball in other gym and not kick kids off the basketball court

resp.text: Thank you for your suggestion.

name: venqu v
text: Great place to work out and swim. Wish theyd update the basketball area

resp.text:
Thank you for the review. We are looking into improving the basketball area.  Currently we replacing the floor in the cardio room.
Thank you,
Wendy Newland

name: Scott Crawford
text: As Ys go, the Trussville YMCA is one of the better ones. Large cardio room; free weight room and weight machines; full range of cardio and cross training classes; upstairs track; full sized basketball court; racquetball courts; tennis courts; full size pool with smaller lap pool; and locker rooms with steam room, whirl pool, and showers. The staff is courteous and maintain the gym well.

resp.text: Scott - Thank you for sharing! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your experience being a member of the Y! We look forward to continuing to serve you.

name: Sam A
text: A. Safe place my boys can go to  for workout activities when there's no school or no after school activities

name: Linda Henry-Jones
text: The workers are very helpful and friendly

name: nicole Lockhart
text: It is a amazing place

resp.text: Nicole, thank you for sharing your love for the Trussville Y!

name: Lynn Andrews
text: A great place. I was actually there working a voting precinct, but had the opportunity to see the gym and meet many of the staff. Everyone was so friendly and helpful.

name: Walter Exantus
text: Basketball is played heavily starting after 4

name: Jason Blum
text: Spotless facility with knowledgable employees. They have multiple basketball courts, spin class, weight machines, cardio equipment, and an indoor climbing wall. Specifically, the climbing wall has four auto-belays with numerous routes at varying degrees of skill.

name: Tony Elliott
text: Very clean, staff is very professional and kind. My new home gym

name: Eduardo Ramirez
text: FB-C PFC has a 30 foot climbing wall with 4 auto belays and harnesses for children and adults. Not a lot of rock climbing gyms in Lower Alabama, so something is better than nothing!

name: Bud Morgan
text: Easily in the top 2 public gyms I would go to at fort rucker. Always very clean, and they have a rock wall to climb!! Thank you for putting on the fitness competitions throughout the year!!

name: Brian C.
text:
Has a climbing wall and a basketball court and friendly staff.

Go prior to WOCS and AIT getting out of school so it's not packed.

name: David Coody
text: Good staff and the equipment is up to date.

name: A Cam
text: Not a bad spot to lift, just a small facility but it has everything you need for a good workout

name: Cee Cee Broughton
text: Yoga, rock climbing,  basketball, lockers,  showers , steam room, gym.   smaller than main gym but has everything I need

name: Penny Proctor
text: Wonderful place to work out at.friendly staff.

name: Justin Amos
text: The small gym able to get in good work outs

name: Angie Brown
text: This is a good gym during off hours. People are respectful of the rules and polite with your space. There are a bunch of classes to take and you can use the group fitness room for floorwork between classes. It's hard to find space and machines during lunch and EOB day.

name: Greatus Soldiera
text: Quiet place and great equipment, not like big gym that is always crowed

name: Joelene Govender
text: Fortenberry-Colton Physical Fitness Center offers group fitness classes, intramural volleyball and basketball. There is a rockwall with auto and manual belays for the new climber and advanced climber. The facility offers a locker room with sauna and steamroom as well as showers. Full gym with diverse workout equipment.

name: Marion McCloud
text: Spotless

name: Scott E
text: Never too crowded and has all the essentials for any gym... locker rooms do get hot though

name: Christopher Cannon
text: As far as Army gyms go it's great. Also has an indoor rock wall.

name: Samuel Lynon
text: It's an adequate facility serving a small population of people.

name: RATARSHA ROBINSON
text: This gym is great for working out. No waiting on the exercise equipment, have a rock climbing wall and separate saunas and steam rooms for men and women.

name: Jessie&Tim Loyless
text: Love it...smaller, has everything, way less crowded

name: JHB 2010 (JHB2010)
text: Amazing.

name: Sabrina Muchison
text: This gym is VERY clean, and the staff are nice.

name: Angela Tice
text: Loved this place

name: V Richardson
text: Does this gym has a sauna??

name: Thomas Lane
text: clean and friendly

name: JR Plotts
text: Big gym, lots of equipment.

name: Sugeily Mojica
text: Has rock climbing, Volleyball and Basket Court plus the Gym

name: George Peters
text: Super friendly staff, good equipment.

name: Matt Bynum
text: Really dig this place. Nice staff, good equipment, and everything is well laid out.

name: Micki Peevy
text: New owners are awesome! Great trainers with personalized attention and support. Clean and well maintained gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, and kind words. We are happy to provide a clean facility, and quality training to our members and guests.

name: Kaitlyn Austin
text: Clay and staff were awesome and the facility was very clean. Highly recommend 😁

name: Gifty Ababio
text: This is the only gym I go to and I always recommend people to join. You will not be disappointed. The owners are so awesome. They are professional and they do their best to help with any concerns.

resp.text: Thank you Gifty for your review! We are glad you are enjoying the gym and making progress toward your goals. Stay healthy and strong.

name: John Kaczmar
text: Clay and staff are the best! Kaitlyn and I had a great lift today!

name: Jenna Maury
text: My husband and I visited here while in town for thanksgiving and we loved it! The staff was so nice and accommodating! We will be sure to come back when we are in town visiting!

resp.text:
Thanks Jenna,
We are glad you guys enjoyed the gym! Come see us again next time you are in town.

name: Elena Gallego
text: The manager of this office was very professional and welcoming being that I’m from another location and showed me the layout and greeted me from the jump.  This location is very well kept and clean ! I’m so impressed! Will definitely be using this location every time we are back home!

resp.text: Thanks for working out with us Elena. You guys are welcome here anytime.

name: Sonja Pierce
text: Great gym! I very rarely, if ever, have to wait on equipment . They provide disinfectant wipes so can sanitize before and after each use. The key fob issued is super convenient for entry at anytime ,day or night, with security cameras so feel very safe ! People of all ages and fitness levels are members. I am 58 and feel extremely comfortable working out there... not intimidated in the least. Very well run and the owner is so friendly and personable. I highly recommend you check it out!

resp.text: Thank you Sonja for the kind words! We appreciate your business.

name: Michael Pukish
text: After trying for a year, the place is just too small to work for me.  One shower stall (maybe two by now?), so if you're planning on getting a morning workout before work, you're mostly going to have to go home to change and shower.  It definitely works for some, because the place has it's crowded times. But at those times, the stretching/straps/floor area is just about unusable and first come first serve. But why did I give it a two instead of a three?  Because if you have to terminate your contract, they will add several fees that are not in your original terms.  When you call their billing department, they will refer you back and tell you you have to get your answers from the gym. Most annoying part -- when I went in in person to close my contract, the guy didn't offer a receipt.  I actually had to ask for email confirmation, or he wasn't going to show me anything.  When he agreed to the email confirmation, I asked to see the final tabulation of charges.  He printed something out and literally whisked it on front of me and kept moving it back away from me in one motion such that I couldn't even examine it.  He was otherwise very polite, and I didn't want to think the worst, so I just told myself I'd settle for that email receipt. So if your monthly is 'x', you will end up additionally paying about three times that when you try to leave.

resp.text:
Michael,
We wanted to respond and clarify serval misrepresentation in your review that are just not accurate.
Currently our facility has 3 bathrooms, and 2 showers… but maybe you were confused with another Anytime Fitness location? Your last key fob swipe also was from July of 2018, prior to our new owners taking over as well as prior to the club remodel and equipment upgrades. Since your last workout we have made many updates and equipment upgrades and class time changes.
We would have appreciated if your review were based on the club presently under it’s current owners. It is unfortunate that your review does not reflect the club’s current owners, culture, equipment or amenities…. Writing a negative review from an experience from over a year ago just doesn’t seem very reliable or fair.
We are not a big box gym nor do we try to be. We treat our members like family and try our best to provide a private upscale training environment for members looking for more of a relaxed and convenient environment away from the masses.
Regarding your words about our cancelation policy, we provided to you a very specific cancelation request form that outlined the charges you would be assessed prior to your account being closed out. We offered to provide to you a copy in the club which you also declined. It is apparent that your review here, does not reflect our conversation when you came in to cancel, which is a misrepresentation to the public and very unfair.
Before any new member signs up for a membership agreement we make sure to cover every aspect of the contract including our club cancelation policy. Because you signed up under the previous owner, we were regrettably not afforded that opportunity in advance.
Had we been the individuals to sign you up for membership we would have very clearly covered each aspect of your membership as well as our cancelation policy, and if there was anything you didn’t understand we would have urged you to ask questions or not sign up.
We understand that it is also not possible to satisfy every demand of every person who comes through our doors, even if we try our best to do so.
Overall we wish you well in your health and fitness journey.

name: jayson altman
text: Great club! I’d recommend this gym to anybody. It has amazing staff and wonderful equipment. It’s very clean and everyone was friendly when I visited. I look forward to being back in town and grabbing a workout.

resp.text: Thanks Jayson!

name: J D
text: Great gym. Has everything one would need to get a great workout. Gym offers classes taught by owners. Gym owners have a connection with local hotel so be sure to ask about the special. Thanks for drop ins!!

resp.text: Thanks JD. Glad we were able to get you taken care of.

name: Paul (Paulie)
text: My girlfriend and I work out here and we absolutely love it. We looked into working out at UAH but the quality of the equipment there and the crowded environment is not worth it at all. We’re very glad that we found this Anytime Fitness instead. I’m an ex powerlifter and wrestler and lift pretty heavy on deadlifts and squats and never have an issue with either (or with any other hard exercise). The gym is on the smaller side but it has everything you need for a good workout. There’s cardio machines, three squat racks, an area just for deadlifts, isolation machines, tires to flip (or a sledgehammer to punish them), and even a heavy bag for some bag work. Clay the owner is a great guy and all the people we’ve come across that work out at the location are professional and kind. So far, I haven’t run into “that guy” or “that girl” here. Just adults looking out for their health or putting in serious effort to get stronger.

resp.text: Thanks Paul, you guys are always so focused and committed to your work outs. We are glad you love the gym. Stay healthy and strong!

name: Adriana Coleman
text: Husband and wife duo who work well together. I love it. And Stephanie is an amazing trainer. She is helping me out with my dream of doing bikini bodybuilding. I just love working out with her. ❤❤❤

resp.text: Thank you so much Adriana!  We appreciate you!!!

name: Jord Williams
text: This facility is very clean, has a lot of different equipment options, and is staffed. A bonus was most everyone was using the equipment, instead of sitting on while goofing with their phones. We are in town visiting family. I have been to anytime fitness facilities all over the country. This one, the one just south of Nashville, and the one in Skokie IL, so far, are the nicest.

resp.text: Thanks Jord! we are glad you had a great experience.

name: Kevin Crowe
text: This is one of the nicest gyms I have ever been to and I have been to several anytime fitness and planet fitness locations across several states(MO/VA/KY/AL) and several locations within those states! I was so excited to see the sleds, tires, sledgehammers as well as the marble sinks in the bathrooms that I had to let all of my friends know

resp.text: Thanks Kevin!

name: Deborah F
text: When I travel  I’m always very happy when I can find an Anytime Fitness to get my workout in (hotel gyms are meh)  but when I find a super nice club like this one it’s always such a pleasure. Gym was well equipped, clean and felt like home. Clay the owner/manager was super friendly and was happy to help me with anything I needed. I will definitely come back on my next visit to Huntsville!!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Debby! You are welcome here Anytime*.... ( you see what we did there lol?) best of luck with your work travels, come back and see us next time you are in town.

name: Monty Lovelady
text: Went to Huntsville for a week on business from Fort Worth and was able to visit this gym all week. I was impressed with the staff and cleanliness of the gym.  Others in the gym were all friendly polite and courteous too. I’d recommend this gym if you live in the area.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Please come back and see us next time you are in the Huntsville / Madison area.

name: J K
text: Very clean and well-maintained. I love how the owners are a married couple who take pride and care for their 'Anytime Fitness' customers, like their own family.

resp.text: Josh, Thank you for showing us some love! We value your friendship and membership here with Anytime Fitness Madison, keep working hard toward your goal we  are here to support you every step.

name: Fernando Alejandro
text: I recently moved to the area and was skeptical about joining this gym after being at another Anytime Fitness for a long time. However, after my workout on the second day coming to this facility, I introduced myself to Clay, the owner and I instantly made a friend. He was so welcoming and intentional in our conversation. He has been so informing and has showed so much interest in my weight training and weight loss journey, which as made my transition to the area much easier. Clay and his wife have put countless hours updating the facility, ensuring cleanliness, and decorating the gym to make it comfortable for all current and future members. I can’t wait to hit all of my goals and much more while cultivating a relationship with this phenomenal couple and other members.

resp.text: Fernando, thank you for the kind review! We appreciate both your business and your friendship and look forward to helping you on your journey. Please don't ever hesitate to reach out if you need something.

name: William Taylor
text:
Fantastic staff
Facility is cleaned regularly
Variety of equipment, from free weights to cardio
Trainers available
Overall pleasant environment from staff and members alike

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review Will. We take pride in our surprisingly personable club culture and always keep a clean gym a high priority for our members and their immune systems. Be Healthy and Strong. Let us know if you need any 1 on 1 training or diet coaching as you get closer to your bodybuilding show.

name: Daniel Duran
text: Awesome gym you will not regret signing up here!

resp.text: Thanks Daniel, we think so too :) , we gladly welcome you to the family.

name: The Meiers
text: Great location and equipment. The staff is friendly and very helpful.

resp.text: We pride ourselves in being the best kept secret in Madison. Quiet, and convenient too. Thanks for the kind words, our coaches are here to support you every step of your journey.

name: Peter Simon
text: Was visiting from out of town. Nice that you can use all the clubs. The clubs in the metro areas are better equipt, newer, and cleaner but this is avg for smaller town clubs.

resp.text: Thanks for the 4 star review Peter, come see us next time you are in town.

name: Karen Foxx
text: The owner was supper nice, great equipment, very nice and clean place to work out.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Karen, come see again next time you are in town.

name: Chelsey Sandlin
text: Super clean and diverse facility, they will really work to help you with any problems and needs you have.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback Chelsey, stay healthy and strong.

name: GOLDBULLIONTREASURES
text: I'm not sure if they are good or bad. Why pay to work out in one place when you can go to the free park down the road and get a great workout there and enjoy nature and the fresh air.

resp.text:
Hi,
Thanks for the feedback. We love the great outdoors as well but every now and then there are rainy days. During the summer months we regularly do group workout in the park days with our members.

Four good reasons to use a gym instead of the park alone:

1.) Access to top of the line machines and free weights
.
2.) Tiered group classes based on fitness levels and goals. “Base, Build and Burn”, something for everyone at every fitness level.

3.) 24/7 gym Access rain or shine to 4K plus Anytime Fitness locations world wide. If you are a member at one location you have access to all the others, no questions asked.

4.) Camaraderie and Coaching. We at Anytime Fitness Madison offer 1 on 1 coaching to help you create a strategy to crush your goals. Our family friendly team  vibe gives you accountability and support to keep you going through the hard times.

You should come check us out! we Would love to talk to you more about the fitness lifestyle.

name: Scott Cechovic
text: I've been a member since 2007 and have experienced at least 2 owner changes but this last owner change resulted in me and my wife leaving.  Relations with both of our trainers were terminated and communication by owners to us about trainers was non existent.  Agreements were not kept and in my opinion a general "don't care" attitude was exhibited.  At the end of our 30 day notice, my wife was billed for training and we were also billed for our next month membership.  We were refunded our training fee as "a courtesy".  Not sure how this was a courtesy since she had not trained for a month nor do I recall anywhere that we were on the hook for 30 days of training after the notice.  The membership was not refunded because it was billed during the period of our 30 day notice ... really??  Membership fees are for the next month ... it should have been prorated based on when our notice was given.  It's too bad because in general I really liked this gym and it's convenience to work.  We are at another gym now with more equipment, free classes and lower membership fees.

resp.text:
Dear Scott, we wanted to provide a detailed reply to your review of our business.
While we understand that you and your wife were members of Anytime Fitness for several years, we also understand that change is required for any business that is seeking to remain relevant.

We do not apologize for making needed changes to our staff, team, and facility to pursue a more tenable and sustainable business model. We understand that you are upset with the changes made to our team that impacted you, however we have not broken or misrepresented any written agreement we had with you regarding your personal training sessions or membership.

We are also under no obligation to disclose the reasons for terminating past team members. Such disclosure regardless of the potential validity thereof, would be unprofessional. When we assigned another trainer to service your remaining sessions you and your wife regrettably declined to have them serviced and willfully forfeited your remaining sessions.

Our membership agreements and club policy requires a thirty-day cancellation clause that is a necessary step in our cancellation process. This a standard practice for most franchise & big box gyms. Dissatisfaction with a particular clause in a membership agreement does not make for an invalid process or invalid agreement. It is standard practice that membership dues and or additional managed services that fall within a thirty-day time frame also remain billable.

Membership dues are billed monthly and are not prorated because they are not billed according the amount of days in a month, rather they are based on a flat rate.  We find it interesting that you complained about a refund for personal training dues. This refund was issued as a courtesy since you decided to cancel your membership and personal training the same day. When we became aware that your membership and personal training would expire and thus no longer provide you a gym to use your remaining sessions in, we issued a prompt refund the same day.

Although we retained the right to bill your account for the remaining sessions that fell within the thirty day notice window, we considered your circumstances and issued a refund. Although it was not our prerogative to look out for your personal financial obligations, we did so in order to prevent a customer service issue. It is unfortunate that the value for your refund was not appreciated in the same tone in your review as it was when you expressed appreciation over the phone.

We do however wish you well and hope that your new discount gym will be able to meet the demands that your require.

name: Zachary Green
text: I initially checked this place out on the recommendation of another member, and I'm loving it so far. All of the staff have been super helpful and friendly from the moment I walked in the door. The atmosphere feels like a real fitness community rather than just a place to work out. They stress the importance of goal-based individualized fitness programs and can provide guidance on pretty much any aspect of what you need. For a complete novice like me, this is an invaluable service. Much of the equipment is brand new and the gym is not packed out even during peak times. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking to make the move toward a fitter lifestyle. If you're willing to put in the work, Anytime has got your back.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Arieal Anderson
text: I have been a member for almost a month. They are doing awesome remodeling. The previous owner may have not cared, but Josh DOES. I HIGHLY recommend this gym 100%. Josh says hey to me and my man EVERY time we walk in the gym. He cares about his members and goes way above and beyond to make us happy! Thank you Josh! You're awesome!

resp.text: Thank you!!!!!

name: Nick Carter
text: Recently moved to the area and was looking for a gym membership that would go with work schedule. I work long hours and can only work out really early or pretty late so I tried Anytime Fitness out with a 7 day trial. It's been excellent. Great equipment, friendly/helpful staff, always clean. Plus I can go work out whenever my schedule allows. I will definitely be getting the membership here.

resp.text: Awesome, thank you Nick!

name: Brandon Pepper
text: Most gyms are either hardcore or health spa, Anytime manages to cater to both clientele, something that's not easily accomplished. The facility is kept clean, but you also don't feel as though you can't hit a hard workout for fear of messing something up. Anytime let's you make it what you want it to be; if you want to come in and hit your workout and leave without speaking you can, if you want make friends and train with people you can. They have group training, and top notch personal trainers, the big bald guy running the front is pretty nice too. You can tell the owners actually care and aim to provide more than just a place to run on a treadmill.

resp.text: Brandon, I feel like we need a nice big hug after this one.  I can smell the warm friendly musk of your cologne and wonderful aroma of your beard through the thoughts of this message.  It's intoxicating.  I truly appreciate your loyalty, kindness and expertise you've brought into the club.  We all are just a little bit better off in this world since we've met you.  Keep on being awesome.  And thanks for the review;)

name: Derek Smith
text: Legitimately the #1 Anytime Fitness I have ever been to. Huge selection of equipment and a great vibe. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks so much Derek!!!

name: Tim Chitty
text:
I have been using this gym for a couple months and am very pleased. The staff is very friendly and offer regular fitness competitions as an added incentive for those with or without prior fitness goals. I've rarely had to wait for a machine or bench, and there are plenty of cardio machines in the back. The weekly boot camp classes on Saturdays will destroy you in the best way possible.

Also, they offer a meal plan with carefully crafted options that meet your specific dietary needs, be it bulking or cutting. I highly recommend this location!

resp.text: Tim, we really appreciate it!  Thank you!

name: Robert Swinea
text: Best gym I have been to, staff and trainers are polite and friendly and Care about why you are there. complete family type atmosphere from the staff and the other clients alike. Don't think I would ever go to another gym.

resp.text: Thank you so much Robert!  We are so honored to have you as a client and thank you for your continued service with us!  Your results have been nothing short of amazing!  Great job and let's make 2018 an even better year!

name: Matthew Garrison
text: Great staff. Lots of equipment. Other members are friendly. I've really enjoyed being a member here for two years.

resp.text: Thank you so much Matthew!!  We really appreciate it!!!  Let us know anything we can do for you!

name: Adam Thomas
text: Been coming here for years. Perry is a fantastic trainer. I'm down 40+ pounds in a year.

resp.text: Thanks Adam, we appreciate your feedback and your 5 star rating! Way to go on crushing your fitness goals, we are glad to see you are getting the value from your sessions with Perry!

name: Chris Eanes
text: I've been a member for over 7 years.  Over the last 8 months I've seen many changes to they gym as well as myself.  After 15+ years of working out I've never been this strong, have this much endurance, or been under 9% BF.    I owe my results to the atmosphere, the trainers, and fellow members.  If you want a challenge it can be met at AF.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Lance Fletcher
text: Great staff, awesome machines and great organization. I would rank this gym on a scale of 1 to 10 a Ten! Definitely worth a visit!

resp.text: Lance, thank you sir!  You are too kind and we appreciate it!

name: Stephen Trumbull
text: I've been regularly coming here since February 2009. The past ownership was awful, it was obvious they were only interested in making money. The new owner, Josh, has put substantial resources into improvement, however. There's still some room to better the gym, the TVs are leftover from the past administration and are in rough shape, but there's not another gym in Huntsville so interested in helping you.

resp.text: Stephen, you're the man and a valued customer!  Always a pleasure to see you!

name: martin holland
text: Destiny is real cool. Everybody at anytime is awesome. I love that I can show up at really any time and get a sweet workout.

resp.text: Thank you Martin, we appreciate it!

name: Daniel Syptak
text: Love this gym! Clean, great equipment selection, amazing staff.

resp.text: Thanks Daniel, we appreciate your business and your friendship. Keep grinding brother.

name: Michael Conniff
text: Looks like a good place.  Only thing I didn't like was there was only one shower changing room

resp.text: Thanks for giving a solid 4/5 star rating Michael. We wanted to let you know we have two private showers each with toilets, then one other toilet only restroom , and lastly an additional changing room only area. We apologize if this was confusing or not clearly marked. Please come see us again next time you are in town.

name: Rusty Anderson
text: Great Staff.  Amazing Owner.  Great Clients who are encouraging and helpful.  Truly a gym for anyone and everyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much Rusty!  VIP Status for member of the year award goes to you sir!

name: naveen vetcha
text: Please note that I haven't used the gym. My review is purely based on my communication on phone with the staff. I moved from Los Angeles recently and was looking at various options of fitness centers in Huntsville. Before I decide, I thought of calling each center and find out the details like membership fee, enrollment fee etc. To my surprise, the staff at this gym told me that they don't provide these details to customers on phone. They asked me to personally come to discuss these details. I explicitly asked "Don't you provide these details to prospective customers?" the reply was "I am sorry." This reminded me of talking to staff from Govt. office, who makes it must for the customer to come to the office for any menial service. I don't understand what is the problem with that. Staff from other fitness centers were happy to provide all these details. So I wrote this review just based on my first impression and comparing the staff with the staff from other fitness centers.

resp.text: We have 100% new staff and ownership!  We'd love to have you check us out again!  Lots of new things and more to come!

name: Alura Garrison
text:
Awesome gym. Small, so everyone ends up having a recognizable face.
Personal trainers for individual workouts, and one for group workouts M-R for a GREAT deal!
Rowing machines, free weights, a sled, ellipticals, weight machines, a cycle, treadmills, a stair master, and two rowing machines to name the most common options available here. I'm sad they sold the Jacob's ladder though :(
Saturday boot camp that's FREE, and you can bring a friend!
Very secure with locked doors and alarms and cameras.
Sirius XM radio is also a commodity there that can be changed by anyone. :)
Healthy recipes posted each month to take home, and a leader board on who comes the most often.
It's a great social place to get involved in to stay healthy and motivated!

resp.text: thanks so much Alura!  so happy we have you!

name: David Breitstein
text:
Clean and well equipped, great workout!
Friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks David ! We are glad you enjoyed your workout, come see us again next time your are in town.

name: Misty Herring
text: Anytime fitness has a very helpful and friendly staff. I am very pleased with the cleanliness of all the equipment and facilitys. I highly recommend this gym.

resp.text: Thank you misty!

name: Alura Young
text: Smaller gym, so we have a good group of members and everyone is a familiar face. It's very secure, too, and they have great rates for personal trainers- you can do it in groups, too!

resp.text: Alura thank you so much for an amazing review!  We are glad to have to you and are so happy you're enjoying the club.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help you!

name: Vanessa Syptak
text: I love this gym so much! Wouldn’t want to work out anywhere else!

resp.text: Thanks Vanessa! So glad you are part of the Anytime family !

name: Anthony Keith
text: Been going here about a 2 months now, and I can't complain. The facility is clean and I don't have to fight for equipment. *thumbs up *

resp.text: Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Aris! We appreciate your 5 star review and your hard worth ethic at Saturday bootcamps. Keep up the good work.

resp.text: Colin my man!  Thank you so much!  We really appreciate a great review!  Let us know if you ever need anything from us.  Thank you!

name: Paul Miller
text: It's cheap and convenient, but nothing ever gets fixed beyond the barely functional level and machines are often broken.

resp.text:
Hi Paul, as of August 2018 we are now under new ownership. We are currently scheduling club renovations so if you become aware of a piece of a equipment that is not operational please notify the office management team and we will work quickly to resolve the issue. We hope you will enjoy the changes and updates coming to your club later this year.
Kind Regards
-Anytime Fitness Madison Team.

name: Mac Thompson
text: I've worked out at plenty of gyms but you won't find a staff like you do at Anytime Fitness-Madison.  You really get to know everybody who works there and is a member and it's just a great gym to be a part of.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mac!  Respect!

name: Destiny Drane
text: By far the BEST gym around! Been here for a year and will NEVER go anywhere else! :)

resp.text: Thank you!!!!!

name: Justin Masotti
text: Great Place to workout. Staff is friendly and helpful. The place is clean and tidey. Everyone is more than happy to assit you if you ask nicely. Tried other gyms in the area, this is by far the best! Highly recommand it.

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Pamela Hideko
text: Miss this gym. It was pretty good and never overly crowded

resp.text: We miss you too Pamela!  Come on back!  Thanks for the great review though!

text: Great staff!  High energy, very friendly and very helpful!!  Love this place!!

resp.text: Why thank you Tony!  We appreciate you my man!

text: Hands down best gym in Madison/Huntsville area!  Great staff, always clean, open 24/7, plenty of cardio, stair master, rower, multiple squat racks, barbells, dumbells go to 110, private bathrooms, the other members are super friendly!  They also just put in a functional room with sleds, turf, TRX, tires, and ropes!   Love this place!

resp.text: Oh why thank you!

name: Cosmo Anderson
text: Awesome gym. Amazing Staffeta and owner

resp.text: Thank you thank you thank you!

name: Anna Burwell

resp.text: Congrats!!  Thank you!!!

name: Jessica Quillen

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica!  always great to see a great review!  Please let us know how we can help you in and out of the club!

resp.text: Thank you!!!!

name: Brandon Marley

name: jeff crosby
text: Small facility and equipment in disrepair.

resp.text: Hey Jeff so sorry to hear this.  We are 5,000 square feet which is large for an Anytime Fitness.  We are not meant to be a large club for many reasons.  In regards to fitness repair we do our maintence ever 3 months and are actually scheduled for it this week.  They come in and repair anything needed as well as order parts etc.  I'm very sorry something wasn't in tact for you.  We are purchasing new machines regulalry and are going to be making some great updates in 2018!  Hopefully you'll stick around to see them!

name: Tom Saloom
text: Only if you must

resp.text: Hi Tom, we are now under new ownership as of August 2018. We are doing a lot of updates and rennovations, we hope if your ever in the area again you will have a better experaince.

name: Will Walsh

resp.text: Thank you so much Will!  Let us know if we can ever help!

text: I called to find out if they did “super slow” training and Matthew could not tell me anything and said there was no manager or trainer there to help me out. No help at all!

name: Ben King
text: Best one in Athens!! The pool and sauna is the BEST!!! Check times of when it's not so busy but it's a big gym with nice ;clean and professional staff!

text: I go every week but their machines need updated and their roof needs major repair. It's always leaking.

text: Sports Fit is a great place to workout.  I had trouble finding the right gym for myself and this place has everything that I was looking for.   I was looking for a clean facility, great group fitness instructors and staff, a variety of nice updated equipment, and the members are great!  Everyone is encouraging and helpful.  I gave it 5 stars because 6 wasn’t an option.

resp.text: Thanks, Z M! We appreciate your review! Congratulations on meeting your fitness goals!

name: L Sims
text: Machine were not cleaned by staff and supplies are not kept readily available for customers. The group fitness room is way too small. Machines with individual remotes or tv screens do not work. General upkeep is lacking to say the least.

name: Rebecca Bartholomew
text: Erin, Phil, and all of the staff are so friendly and they really want you to meet your goals!   Love it here!

resp.text: Thanks, Rebecca! Keep going with your fitness goals!

name: Brian Presson
text: This gym has a variety of exercise equipment, an indoor pool, and an aerobics class. The non-membership fee is $5 per day, which isn't bad for someone like myself who goes here once a week. Otherwise, you might want to consider membership if you plan on going here frequently.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Brian! We offer different fitness membership plans to accommodate everyone! We are glad you use our gym!

name: Alyssa Clement
text: I have never had a gym membership before but this one is great! They have a large selection of equipment and childcare on site. It makes it so much easier for me and my daughter loves the childcare. She never wants to leave.

name: Krystal Robinson {Stratton}
text: Love the group fitness classes

name: J P

resp.text: Thank, J P. We are pleased you like our facility and feel comfortable here.

name: Jill Marie McKinney
text: Great place to work out.

resp.text: Thanks, Jill! We appreciate your support!

name: Robin Green
text:
I'm sooo thankful that encore fitness still allows you to bring the little ones in to swim... so if it's where you can't go to the park & spend a few hours (cause of severe allergies like I suffer from) or cause it's cold outside... it's just great cause the wellness center no longer allows you to do this.... as far as a comment I read on here about the bathrooms not always being clean... they aren't staffed to constantly run in behind each person to be sure they didn't leave a mess... some folks are straight up messy don't flush toilets if their toilet paper falls in the floor they leave it for the workers... so seriously if EVERYONE would clean up behind yourself it would help tremendously...
From all the workers in the rehabilitation side to those who work the desk on the fitness side are all so friendly & kind.... such pleasant individuals to greet you or work with you etc.... Again I can't say "Thank you" enough for allowing me to bring my grand babies & have a blast with them on days I just can't be out in all the pollen or when it's just simply cold outside.
If there's ONE thing I like to see  encore get it would be one of this things that wrings your swim suit towels etc out for you so you don't have to leave with soaked swim wear towels or wash clothes etc... but hey I still give them a 5 star simply for allowing the little ones & for being so caring & friendly!! Thanks Encore!!

name: Bridgett Trusty
text: Very very disappointed to hear that this facility does not support nursing mothers, and does not follow the law. In the state of Alabama, it is written in the law that a mother can breastfeed anytime, anywhere without being asked to stop, move or cover up. I will be contacting the appropriate outlets to make sure the worker at this location, and all workers are up to date on the law so they aren't breaking it and humiliating PAYING members.

text: Great gym, friendly staff & only place in town with sauna, hot tub and indoor swimming pool

text: It's a good gym. It is clean and had staff on duty until 8 at night. It is still open after that, but the pool and hot tub are closed then.

text: I really get worn out at this gym I love how they have great equipment  and you can go whenever you wanna

text: Ok gym. Pool is tiney, and not the best selection of equipment. They are also pricey for what they are... my wife enjoyed the classes they offer though.

text: Clean, friendly staff, could use more variety in their stationary machines.

name: Anthony Allen
text:
So, I work out in the facility because it is close to my home. That's the only thing it has going for it. The place is never very clean and the bathrooms are usually dirty. This morning, I was washing my hands in the restroom and the "Director" of the facility comes in and uses the urinal. He just walks out and didn't wash his hands!! Very disgusting!

This is supposed to be the person in charge of the place...now I understand why it's always dirty.

name: Lindsay King
text: This is a great place to workout they are nice and very welcoming.

name: Austin Thomas Casteel
text: They're great they have Ton's of equipment their.

name: Josh Dendy
text: It's ok; not particularly awesome or bad. That's only my experience, though, exercising with weights. They also offer tanning,  a spa, a pool, and childcare, all during staffed hours. I think they also offer aerobic classes. I don't think the place is particularly nasty as one reviewer pointed out. Everyone can improve, though. But that costs labor hours which translates into more $$$ on membership costs. Seems safe enough with a decently lit parking lot. They offer a lot of equipment. For those interested in weight-lifting, they have a power-cage, a smith machine, and numerous weight benches, along with a full (and I mean full) set of dumbells. For those interested in cardio, they have a row of nice treadmills (with in-unit television) and a row of elipticals. Membership runs about $45 a month with a 60 day cancellation period (meaning you pay 2 more months, monthly, even if you stop going). Nice gym, though. Definitely better than Riviera and the Lion's Den across town

name: Spencer Ready
text: Amazing place for any sort of shape your in

name: Alan Hamby
text: Help you get better after surgery

text: I do not support businesses that ask mothers to use the bathroom while breastfeeding.  The request to do so is illegal.

text: Friendliest staff around! Every time I walk in they greet me with a smile. I would choose Workout Anytime Fitness over any other commercial gym. text: For a commercial gym, it's pretty nice. Good selection of equipment, fairly friendly staff, convenient hours and location. The only negative points are that there is no space for doing pre-workout stretches or yoga, nor mats available for those activities, and there aren't doors on the entrances to the locker rooms (which i prefer for privacy purposes). Aside from that, it's a pretty quality place.

resp.text: David, thank you for your review. Because we strive to get better daily, feel free to stop by the front desk and let us know what we can do to earn your five star rating! 🙂

The staff is always friendly and helpful  and recently a slight re-arrangement of equipment opened up the free weight area and just made it flow better. Little things like that tell me that the staff is watching the members and trying to make things better and make their workouts better, good on them and good for us. Coming from a member since day one in Jacksonville, Thanks

name: Bryanna Hurtado
text: I went there to do the free 14 day trial to see how I liked it. Well first of all the guy that was there took forever because he was new. That's okay but why have the new guy by himself? And he didn't know anything about the 14 day trial, but said I could do the 7 day. Unfortunately if you do these trials, I was told I can only come during operating hours and also only 3 times during the 7 days and only 7 times during the 14 days after I had to go online and fill in the information myself. I wanted to go to this place because of the overnight hours and if i can't go then, then what's the point? The associate wasn't really the problem, it's the company and their policy that makes no sense.

name: James Harris
text: The gym was good got my membership in December and signed the 12 month contract  but unfortunately I had to move in May I still paid for the 12 months but continue receiving invoices after the 12 months but just recently I had a family member die which has put my family in hard times so I called the offices to discuss why I was still being charged and they told me that I had signed the contract in April which is false so I tried to talk with them and they wouldn’t help told me I had to pay 100$ Even though my contract should have expired and email there manager so I did and I still haven’t received a reply so if your decide to workout here don’t sign anything they will scam you!!

name: Kaitlyn Hernandez
text: You would think for a “24-hour” gym they would be able to accommodate 24 hours a day. Well here I am outside the locked door with no one at the counter and no one answered the phone number printed on the door.

resp.text: Kaitlyn, Thank you for  bringing these items to our attention. We strive to maintain a club of excellence and high standards and will use this information to make some improvements and hopefully bring some resolution and satisfaction to valued members, such as yourself. We appreciate your input.

name: Kenneth Fagan
text: Anytime Fitness in Jacksonville, Alabama is a sorry business. Recently, I cancelled my contract with them. My cancellation date was through 11 June 2019. On 2 June, I went to get in to workout and I couldn't get in. Today (7 June), I called them about coming in to workout and the representative said I can only workout when the staff is there. I said what? I am supposed to be able to workout anytime until at least 11 June. So, they don't stand behind their advertisement of workout anytime. That is false advertisement. They do not care about their customers. They are only there for the almighty dollar. This is a horrible business. Do yourself a favor and don't use them. They will take your money and provide sorry service. This was a terrible experience.

name: Robyne Turner-Butler
text: They charge you thing one day and then charge you something else days later. The management is rude and unprofessional.

name: Cody Auman
text: Great place to get a pump. I go early in the mornings and hardly anyone there. I can use what machines or free weights I need to. Got the membership. Definitely will be at this gym from here out.

name: Michael Choron
text: This company is all about making their money..    Way to many people and memberships versus workout equipment.. you have to go super late or super early to get your workout in.. Their not convenient in anyway.. staff doesn't enforce main rule of staying of your cell phone while working out.. I sat for 30 mins while other customer was talking on their phone while sitting on a machine.. I couldnt finish my workout due to this.. they have camera's and see this.. like I said, their just worried about their money..i would suggest going to a different gym..

name: Sydney Burt
text: This is the gym I went to before I moved 5 hours away and when I went in to cancel the membership they said I'd be charged 1 more time because of the 30 day cancelling policy. Which was fine because I understood so I went a few more times before I actually moved && it was never cancelled they currently owe me $120 in fees because they keep charging to my debit card that I only use for emergencies so it keeps going in the negatives and have yet to return my calls. "The money will be returned it 5-7 business days" and it's been 3 weeks and I still have nothing. So everyone pay close attention when you cancel your membership here. The manager Patrick is absolutely NO help. & I'm calling their corporate tomorrow.

name: Carlos Barlow
text:
Nice to see the employee's taking care of the gym & it makes the members willing to help.

Ok update on the gym.. machines are worn out and the last couple of managers have been notified but it's up to the owner to get it done!

Our locations are individually owned and operated, but certainly  the owner of this location does value all his members, and would want to know about anything negative attached to his gym. We will forward this review to the location owner right away. Thank you,   Workout Anytime Corporate Headquarters.
