name: Dru Rymer
text: Andy and his staff know their craft. Fun motivating atmosphere. Smart training for any amateur to professional athlete and anything in between. Really appreciate all they do.

name: David Wilder
text: Very informative visit can't wait to start working with the Company!

name: Thomas Newman
text: Joining BCI is one of the smartest things I've done for myself in a long time.  This is a top-notch operation in every way.  The facility is well maintained, they have an outstanding array of weights and other physical training equipment, and best of all, the staff is as good as it gets.  The BCI instructors are extremely knowledgeable, very friendly, and genuinely concerned with every member's well being and wellness. The variety of workout options offered is also extensive, so the sessions are always challenging and interesting as well.  If you're looking for a great workout option which also offers coaching on nutrition, sleep, and overall wellness - with great people included - then BCI is the place to go!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your words!

name: Heather Howard
text: BCI! Where do I even begin? It is a place that I want to keep to myself because I don’t want to share... I am an only child so that is just natural... Andy, Chris, and Dell truly have a passsion for their work. I look forward to every workout! I have been going for  3 weeks and have noticed a huge difference physically and mentally. If you’re looking for a positive, safe environment look no further. I am so beyond proud of all they stand for and would recommend them 10 fold!

name: Maleigh McCloy
text:
I’m a little bias because the owner is my husband, but anyone who knows me knows I won’t back something if I don’t one million percent believe in it.

When we first got together, Andy kept trying to get me in his facility and working with his trainers.

As a female, and knowing he trained a lot of male athletes, I was kind of shy about jumping in the new environment.

But when I did... GAME CHANGED.

I have worked out a lot in my life, in spurts like most people, but for many years. Most of what I did was self-taught from online research or previous things I had done with past trainers. My body responded well so I thought I was winning.

The first day I showed up to BCI, I learned things I had never known about my body.

For instance, I’m extremely hyper-mobile (which I deemed as “I’m just flexible—no need for concern”) BUT it really means certain exercises are a higher injury risk than others due to my body’s lack of natural stability, plus a lot of other things I won’t bore you with.

I also learned proper form which changed my workout “return” completely. I was doing half the workload (repetition wise) of my previous workout sessions and getting twice the results— all because I was using TRUE proper form.

Trust me, if you go here with an open mind... you will not be disappointed. You will leave enlightened, and with all the tools to become the healthiest version of yourself.

name: Taylor Casals
text: My experience at BCI has been nothing but amazing. The atmosphere there is just like home. The energy is unbelievable and the love that the trainers have for their jobs are crazy!! It makes me want to come to workouts!! The trainers are always there to make sure your technique is good and guide you when needed. Going here has really helped with my self confidence and I cannot thank Andy and his staff enough. They treat me like family. #BCIFAMILY

resp.text: You're the best Taylor!! Thank you!!

name: Knight Clay
text: I've been going to BCI for over two years.  I have a great appreciation for the staff there.  They make sure you have proper form, which has kept me safe and on track for my goals.  The BCI family is BCI strong. I'm 56 and I have never been healthier in my life.  BCI is the Best investment in being healthy one can make.

resp.text: You're the man Clay!! Thank you!

name: Scott
text: BCI is family. This is not just another "workout" place. You get real trainers that take the time to treat you as an individual and focus on your goals. Group training taken to a new level whether it be Performance Coaching or the dreaded hurricane. I've not only lost weight and gained muscle I've gained a family. They truly have my best interest and health in mind. The trainers are A1 and there are non better in the Huntsville, Madison area. If your not BCI your not working to your greatest potential.

resp.text: Thank you scott!  This is awesome, and I sincerely appreciate it!

name: Brian Mayfield
text: Andy McCloy & the BCI team are the real deal. They care for & assess every athlete, obsess over form & function, & challenge you on every level. You can throw money away at a cookie cutter gym, or invest in your health, fitness, & life. If you live in Madison or Huntsville, don't wait another day or waste another dollar. Come try BCI!

resp.text: Thank you Brian!  Greatly appreciate your thoughts and support!

name: Aaron Sanchez
text: Working out with guidance of knowledgeable trainers has been great for me. The investment in time has been more than worth it

name: Gabby Grimes
text: I am a COPD Patient and have been in and out of the hospital due to this chronic illness BUT thanks to Andy and the BCI team I am back on the elliptical machine - a milestone for me since I haven't wanted to even look at one for years. My breathing has improved 100% - my quality of life has improved - heart rate recovery has improved 100% - have not been to the hospital since starting at BCI. The best step I ever made was the step through the door at BCI - I cannot say enough so I will just say "Thanks Again Everyone".

resp.text: Love u momma ❤️

name: Core Strength & Performance (Deven & Heidi Dehnel)
text: Awesome knowledgeable coaches who truly care.

name: Matt Curtis
text: BCI is not only a game changer for the local athletes who aspire to make it to play Division 1 Athletics, the NFL, and NBA, but they are also a game change for the corporate athletes. I personally was in and out of physical therapy, chiropractor, and constant pain or discomfort with my back. BCI has eliminated my back pain, helped me gain muscle, and has helped me continue to compete at a high level in the business world. I am extremely grateful to the BCI team  - Andy, Dale, Misty, Kevin, and Jackie have been amazing to work with! In a town full of engineers that value knowledge, there is no one else like BCI in terms of fitness IQ.

name: Mark Berryman
text: BCI and Owner Andy McCloy  has been the Standard which all  Training Facilitates  in North Alabama are measure against for all level of athletes from youth, High School, Collegiate and Professional. Andy and his staff have developed a training program for adults at all fitness levels, and his professional certified staff are the best in North Alabama to get adults into a overall healthier life style. Be sure to give them a call before you go anywhere else. Mark Berryman

resp.text: You're the man Mark!  Thank you!

name: Sarah The Closer Parvin
text: Hands down- BCI has been the best place for me! I wouldnt just call it a Gym. It's a group of the most highly educated, genuine Coaches around. They care about helping you meet or exceed your life goals. I have learned more about myself in the 3 years that I have been going here than anywhere else. It's so much more than learning how to move properly- although they will teach you how to do that too- its learning how to be the best YOU for your family and how to create long lasting habits that keep you at your best all the time! The workouts are fun and effective! I wish I could give them a 10 star rating! Dont waste another day- call them and get started NOW!

name: Andrea Simpson
text: LOVE this place!  It's funny because when I first started I was use to bootcamps and trainers that would push you past the point of exhaustion and that was the way it is suppose to be in order to get fit.  The pace and methodologies are quite different here and I didn't think I was "working out".  Well never in my life after 2 months of those bootcamps and trainers was I able to do a pull up.  After 2 months in this place I was able to accomplish that goal.  I have learned so much about movement, body fat in a way that I have never heard of it before.  Do yourself a favor and try it!  At first you may seem like wait, I'm not doing anything but trust me you are! Oh! not to mention in 2 months I was down 2% body fat :-)

resp.text: Andrea, thank you so much for your words!  We sincerely appreciate it and all your hard work and efforts! You are the hero of this journey, we just help guide you in the right direction!

name: Timothy Fisk
text: BCI owner Andy McCloy knows his stuff! He is the real "transformer" - of individuals that is.

resp.text: You're the man Tim!  Your support is a large part of my personal success and I can't thank u enough!  You've been a great friend and mentor in my life!

name: Paul Stoneking
text: Complete total body workout equipment.  Nothing is lacking.  If you are serious about training it’s the only gym around worth going to.

name: Jonah Drake (JEDi)
text: This is an excellent gym. I have worked out here for six years and have had a great experience with every visit. Kramer is very knowledgeable and always willing to share his knowledge about fitness. It is a very inviting place with a friendly atmosphere, plus it is a great gym for people with back injuries because he has a belt squat machine and other machines that allow you to work out without putting all of the strain on your back. Overall, this is an awesome gym that i would recommend to anybody!

name: Michael Kirkland
text: Where to start...?  I have been in and out of Kramer's since I was 15 and trying to get right for football. Then rediscovering it as a 23 year-old college grad, and once again as a 31 year-old returning from the military. No matter your fitness or experience level, or your training goals- you will have questions. Kramer will have answers. If Kramer doesn't, one of his patrons will. Between Kramer and wife, Kim, you will find a depth of Champion-level knowledge in powerlifting and bodybuilding, as well as D1 athletic preparation. Across the spectrum of patrons- Ironman competitors, triathletes, college athletes, special operations military, law enforcement, et al. Bring your ego. Let someone there crush it- and then they will help you build it back up. You will be humbled, and become humble- and if you stay long enough, you will do the same for someone else. You will find that Kramer's Gym is very much a community within the community. If you are looking to train for the first time- I implore you to start here, and ask any question. Someone will have your answer- guaranteed. There is a reason Kramer's has stood the test of time- it is not a corporate-chain gym. Kramer and his patrons take genuine, personal interest in each other. It is home. I will never belong to another gym.

name: Anna
text: Horrible experience. I just graduated and wanted a nice, quiet place to workout. When I tried to walk in, someone tried to shut the door on me and said I needed a card... how am I supposed to sign up if I can’t get in?? When I talked to the manager, she was very rude about a college student using her gym. Even though I just graduated, I can’t use the gym because I’ll be a graduate student. I wanted a gym that I could go to while I would be a resident here in Auburn. Unpleasant experience.

resp.text: I’m sorry that you felt like you had a bad experience at Anytime Fitness Opelika. We strive to always do our best making our members and our guests our top priority. We do have a guest door that is open for guests during staffed hours. Yesterday when you came through the member door behind a member they told you that you would have to wait for someone to greet you at the door. That is our policy for safety and security of our members. We do offer a three day pass for local residents to try out the club to make sure that we are the perfect fit for their fitness journey however we do not do passes for college students two weeks before and two weeks after school starts or the school year ends. I spoke with a young man who said he was a grad student. He did explain they needed somewhere until he could use the Rec. They were not looking for a permanent gym. Unfortunately, it overcrowds our gym which is not fair to our members or potential members. I love college students I have plenty of them as members of our gym, but I don’t want  the gym to be used as a Free place to work out until school starts. I don’t believe that there is a place in town that’s going to allow someone to work out just until they can get back into their own gym for free. I hope you have a better experience if you choose to come back another time. Have a wonderful weekend. We do offer $15 day passes for someone that just needs a gym for the day.

resp.text: Thanks so much on the positive feedback!

name: Jorge Gomez
text: Corey the attendant is rude. Lack of friendliness and professionalism when talking to me. Gets argumentative almost aggressive. I was using the sliders when got rudely interrupted by Corey. The place is filthy and the equipment is worn broken. Some.

name: David Reed
text: Not to crowded, my wife and I can workout comfortable together

resp.text:
Hi David! Thanks so much for the positive feedback and also for being part of the Anytime family!

Thanks, Management

name: anna ruth
text: GREAT WORK OUT.

resp.text: Thanks for your positive feedback!

name: Kevin Godwin
text: This place is a joke the staff of rude the equipment is nasty and old and the place stinks like fat people

resp.text:
Hi Kevin! Thanks for your feedback! I apologize for your bad experience with our club. And also for the delayed response but would love to let you know that we have the friendliest staff at this time and we love a clean gym! Clean is the only smell anymore! We hope to change your opinion when given the chance.

Thanks, Management

name: Arthur “Fire” Ball
text: Not worth the amount they charge in monthly dues. The place is not only small, but also lacks both good cardio and free weight equipment.

name: Erik O'Neal
text: Great Staff!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We take pride in our club and definitely love our members!

name: Remi
text: Great place for a workout at an affordable price!

name: Jean Coronado
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a small place has some machines a bit old some of the banks are cracked but, but the main thing is to fix the sign of anytime fitness has the e and the ss melted

(Original)
Es un local pequeño  tiene algunas maquinas un poco viejas   algunos de los bancos estan rajados pero , pero lo principal es arreglar el sign de anytime fitness tiene la e y las ss fundidas

resp.text:
Hi Jean! Thanks for your feedback. We actually had to go check our signs to be sure they weren't melted and seems they aren't. We have also worked on updating some our equipment as well as doing a refresh on the club. Even the wi-fi is faster now! We hope that your next experience with us is a pleasurable one and please let us know of anything else to further improve our club.

Thanks, Management

name: Stephen Morrison
text: Great location, descent price, and clean gym. Depending on your goals this may not be the gym for you. No dropping weights with dead lifts, semi strict about people without a membership being in the gym (like just to spot for bench). Otherwise has been a great experience and the staff and management are awesome!

name: Matt W.
text: They are doing a great job with the space they have. But it is cramped and feels like working out in a library. Plus side: it's clean, friendly, and I enjoy spending my lunch break here. I just wish they had room for a deadlift platform.

name: Tommy Robinson
text: Very clean gym. Well equipped with top of the line equipment. Clean private showers and restrooms.

name: Misty Rudolph
text: Great place to workout it's everything people say it is and more I love this place ☺️👍🎉🎉🎊😇😇😇

name: C J
text: Nice, clean, and basic fitness center.

name: Heather Dial Teems
text: Great gym!  Always clean and the staff is available for any questions.  Top of the line equipment!

name: Daniel Thompson
text: I joined Anytime Fitness in MN and transferred to this club when I moved here. They are a wonderful staff and they offer great group training classes. It's a place where the staff make sure you're getting all you want out of a workout and they also care when you're not there. I have had some health issues recently and they are so kind to check in and see how I'm doing. This is a great place to work out!

name: Brittany Williams
text: I went in to anytime today absolutely irrationally irate over a situation where there was confusion with billing and communications with the account holder. Tabitha was a rock star. She was so kind, she diffused me and dealt with the situation in minutes. I am so grateful at how understanding she was with me when I didn't deserve her kindness. I wont go anywhere else.

name: Carolyn Perry
text: Open 24 hrs.

name: Donna Vice
text: Love this place!

name: Nicholas Hirras
text: Clean and well organized gym, will be back!

name: Jean Coronado
text:
(Translated by Google) It is in a large shopping center with lots of parking lots, two bathrooms and some machines in perfect condition

(Original)
Esta en un shopping center grande con bastantes parqueos tiene dos baños y algunas maquinas en perfecto estado

name: Jessica Sena (Communications Consultant)
text:
CrossFit done right!
I fell in love with the constantly varied, high intensity workouts over 10 years ago when I first discovered CrossFit (in my early twenties). Eventually, I got out of the everyday routine and before I knew it, 8 years had gone by. Last February (2019) I got up the nerve to get back into CrossFit and found Oddity (formerly Nomad). I could not have chosen a better gym! No longer in my twenties and several pounds heavier than during my initial CrossFit days, I was intimidated to "start all over". But the coaching and camaraderie are second to none at CrossFit Oddity! A year later, I am stronger than I have ever been. The progress has been phenomenal.
CrossFit is not for everybody. But if you want the best workout (and community) of your life, can humble yourself enough to be coached (and love loud music) ...you'll fit right in at Oddity. My hour in the gym is my favorite hour of every day!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!  We love having you (and your dog)!

name: Mike Giles
text: Great gym and a great community.  Coaches are great a tailoring the workouts to fit my skill levels.  Everyone can do CrossFit and Oddity makes sure that everyone can be successful.

name: Lindsay Badiuk
text: Very welcoming and catering to modifications

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you in the future!!!

name: Lauren Sharif
text: I was a novice starting CrossFit and the coaches there scale to EVERY fitness level and are heavily focused on form. David does an incredible job coaching while maintaining a relaxed and fun atmosphere to learn and workout. The community this place has cultivated is a blessing to anyone that enters. Come drop in and try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We strive to make sure everyone gets a good workout and has fun while doing so!!!

name: Andrea Brooks
text: My husband and I joined Oddity a few months ago as complete beginners to CrossFit. We were intimidated by what we knew about CrossFit, but Oddity provides an atmosphere that is truly accommodating of all skill levels. The coaching is great, we always get a great workout, and we never feel ashamed of our beginner status! If you’re on the fence about trying CrossFit, come give Oddity a try.

resp.text: Thank you! We want everyone to get a great workout and feel welcome regardless of their fitness level.

name: Alex Kijowski
text:
Came for the CrossFit workouts, stayed for the workout story time.

Whether you’re looking for a box to call home, or a place to drop in to, you won’t find better than Crossfit Oddity.  They’ve got the best coaches around, and they emphasize proper technique to make sure nobody gets hurt, making us all better athletes as a result.  And they have YOGA!

THANKS ODDITY YOU'RE THE BEST

name: Dominic Zelenak
text: I've been a member of this gym for several months and it was a great choice. I would recommend this gym to anyone who wants to start or continue doing CrossFit, or who wants to practice their Olympic lifts. Class times are very flexible and there are open-gym time slots regularly. The staff is knowledgeable, welcoming, and receptive to your goals.

name: Sean Rheams
text:
I used to travel the country for work and have had the pleasure of dropping into some amazing boxes across the country. I moved to Madison at the start of 2019 and joined Crossfit Oddity from the start. They are one of the top gyms in my books. The coaching staff is top notch, the community is better, and the atmosphere is so much fun!

if you have not had the pleasure of stopping in, then maybe you should! The people are friendly and very welcoming!

name: John Alexander
text: Great CrossFit gym without the ego. Will tailor a plan for anyone.

name: Aimee Doubleday
text: Whether you are new to the area or just need a drop in gym while you're in town for work - CrossFit Oddity is the place for you. I've been a member for almost 3 years now and couldn't be happier. Friendly people and the coaches are top notch. Don't take my word for it - drop in for a visit to see for yourself!

name: Tim Hurley
text: I moved to Madison in early 2019 and Oddity (then Nomad) was the 2nd Crossfit box I tried in the area. This was a mistake it should of been the first one I tried but boy I am glad I did. From the moment I cam to the day breakers class everyone has been so welcoming and helpful. This is by far the best box in Madison and Huntsville area. Amazing coaches, programming and great member . If you're in the area and need a box come by Oddity

name: JayJay
text: The coaches and other members (#fitfam) are what keep me motivated and returning to Crossfit Oddity. Even after an injury, the coaches worked with me to modify every single workout so I would not have to quit. Being a part of this gym and family is what helps me stay focused to be a stronger, better person in all areas of my life.

resp.text: Glad you are sticking with it and we love having you working out with us!

name: Brad Henley
text: I have been part of Crossfit Oddity (then Nomad) for the past 7 years. My fitness wouldn’t be where it is today without my CrossFit Oddity community to push me and keep me accountable! If you are on the fence about trying Crossfit, I recommend giving Oddity a try. You will be welcomed by great coaches who care about impacting your fitness journey!

resp.text: We are happy to have you as a member of our community and as a coach!

name: Jessica Teach
text: This is an awesome gym and awesome community! The workouts are always great and there is additional programming geared at building strength and for RX+ . The owner and head coach is super knowledgable and spicy and strives for you to get the best workout for your capabilities!

name: Bonnie Beddingfield
text: Highly recommend! I love the personalized coaching we are given during workouts.

resp.text: Thank you! We do our best to make sure everyone gets some personal attention!

name: Chad Fowler
text: Great atmosphere of people. Class time to fit any schedule. All fitness levels are welcome.

resp.text: We are glad you found the gym to be welcoming.  We strive to make everyone feel at home.  Loud music, kinda sweaty home, but home.

name: Laura Alexander
text: Great vibe, great community, great programming. And they have YOGA!

resp.text: Glad you like the yoga, we are happy to offer it!

name: janelle cordova
text: Dropped in for a tough and fun workout with a great and welcoming group.

resp.text: We glad you liked the workout!  Come back anytime!

name: Charles Dean
text: Best Coaches around! This is my happy place.

resp.text: We are happy to have you!

name: Chris Lindsey
text: Great Gym and even better people that push me to get better everyday!!!  Come check us out.  You’ll be glad you did!!!

name: Jamie Russell
text: I joined CrossFit Nomad about a month ago and I absolutely love it! I am a beginner. CrossFit was extremely intimidating to think about even starting for me, but I knew I wanted to at least try it.  All of the coaches have been so awesome. They walk me through every step of each workout. I have been to several different class times and everyone has the same supportive and upbeat attitude. I couldn't have picked a better place to start this new journey!

name: Trey Stinson
text: You won’t find a better atmosphere to come hangout, get fit and make some friends along the way.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Dale Anton
text: The staff at CrossFit Nomad is amazing - they are knowledgeable and helpful. They teach and encourage the clients to do things properly and because they are so upbeat they get the best performance out of me. The "box" is well set up, it is clean and the equipment is well cared for. This is the most un-gym like experience I've ever had at a gym. There is no posing and the vibe is cooperation not competition. That's not to say that we aren't encouraged to do our best. In fact the way the staff models being good people who are very fit does in fact encourage me to do my best and a bit more. #nomadforlife #crossfitnomad

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Huge concentration on form here, which is the main knock on crossfit. Won't be dissapointed.

name: Heather Cole
text: I moved from Nashville almost 2 years ago and immediately looked for a hot yoga studio. This studio far exceeded my expectations! I’ve enjoyed every class I’ve been to.  I appreciate the variety they offer and the knowledge of each instructor I’ve practiced with. From kickboxing and barre to traditional yoga classes, I’ve been challenged from each one. The facilities are clean and welcoming! You won’t be disappointed trying out a class!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: This place is great.  I have been doing hot yoga for 15 years.  This has become my favorite place.  One thing I love is the variety of styles and classes.  I send people here all the time because you can easily start as a beginner or be just as easily be challenged if you have been practicing hot yoga for years.

name: Whitney Painter
text: I love this place! I cannot say enough about how knowledgeable the instructors are and willing to help. They are very skilled and masters of their trade. I have recommended this place to my friends, who love it too! Great place:)

name: Tarun Gupta
text: I have been going to HYOH since 2013. This studio is amazing! It provides a perfect ambience for Hot Yoga. The instructors are genuinely there to help you. They have classes for all levels. Great place to make life long friends. With new ownership, sky is the limit! I wholeheartedly recommend this studio. Give it a try, you will be glad you did!

name: Teri Hasemeyer
text: I am loving all the amazing positive changes going on here at HYOH. I have come here since the studio opened in 2010 or so, and the teachers and staff and ownership are just getting higher quality and kinder and even better customer service. I highly recommend hot yoga and highly recommend this studio!

name: Beth Guthrie
text:
I recently had my first experience with Hot Yoga at this studio, and walked in not knowing what to expect. I have a couple of co-workers who were very enthusiastic about practicing hot yoga and said that this was the place to go - I was not disappointed.

The owner of the studio was in conversation with another student when I came in, but made sure to greet me and make me feel welcome. There was a very brief form that I had to fill out with basic information to help the staff make sure you're prepared for your experience, and then after a brief tour I entered for my first hot yoga class.

The class itself was awesome, and was a challenge - but I noticed that because of the room being heated I didn't experience as much tension in my muscles as we worked through the poses. The instructor was very willing to help accommodate those of us who couldn't enter certain poses, and she was also quite helpful in adjusting form or making suggestions on how to modify your pose to get the most out of it.

Between the welcoming staff/instructors, pleasant atmosphere, and variety of yoga classes offered, I will DEFINITELY be back again!

name: Chung-thuy Pham
text:
I loved my experience at this studio!! I think the $20 introductory month is such an incredible value. I took advantage of this and went to as many as 4 classes in one week!

Seek out the classes with Neal or Megan if you can. The classes with these instructors are tough, but Neal and Megan will help you get into the correct form and alignment. They will also help talk you through how to get into and improve on the more difficult poses. They're both very kind and encouraging =)

Unfortunately, I live 30 mins away from the studio and with my college student budget I won't be able to continue classes here. Once my budget allows it, I would love to come back and take classes here again!

name: Ciara Holmes
text: Just moved to the area back in June and have been trying to find a hot yoga studio. Did a lot of scouring in the area and come to find out there aren’t a whole lot of options. Decided to give this studio a try. Took a Yin class with Kris. The class was ok. She talked a lot during the class which I thought was slightly frustrating, her instructions could have been better, and she was on her phone for the most part. The studio was nice, the space however I don’t think is meant for a hot yoga studio persay. The hot aspect is where I felt like the studio fell short. Granted it was just a warm class, the warmth wasn’t consistent, and that may be due to the fact it’s forced heat. I was wanting to sweat and do yoga, I barely broke a sweat. I couldn’t find anywhere on the website or mind and body where they specify what type of heat they have going on.

name: Alex Cross
text: I'm confused. Is this a dog kennel or yoga studio. I came here to do yoga and the first few times were fine. Then last night there were dogs everywhere. I dont want to put my bare feet on dog urine.I shouldn't have to take my shoes off and walk on the same floor that dogs use the bathroom on. Leave the dogs at home.

name: Bailee Barrilleaux
text: I have done regular yoga before and  was curious about this 'Hot Yoga' place. One of my friends convinced a group of us to go and I loved it! I thought I would be uncomfortable in the heat, but I adapted to it and barely noticed by the end! After my class, I felt refreshed and not as tired and/or worn out as I expected, but i still felt like i had a good work out. Also, the teachers were very patient and kind to beginners, such as myself, so do not worry if you have never done yoga before! I  recommend taking a class to everyone!

name: Elizabeth Duling
text: Love this place!  They are encouraging and every time I go I love it more!  Plus sometimes you get to see cute puppies too!

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: The manager was rude and condescending to me when I went to try my first class, so much so that I wanted to leave and drive back the 20 minute drive that I made out there to enjoy a workday evening yoga class. I arrived to the studio ten minutes before class, and the manager proceeded to lecture me for almost ten minutes about "being late" and "interrupting others in their practice," when, if she had let me go into the room, I would not have been late at all. She insisted that I fill out forms that I had just previously filled out online when I signed up for the class online earlier in the day. The forms asked for all of the exact information (emergency contact, address, experience with yoga...) that had been filled out extensively on the online form, but she made it out to be that I was neglecting a step and trying to casually sidle in late. There were only six or so people in the class, and the manager's lecturing brought me into class about 1 minute late. She reminded me as I went in that "this is Huntsville; it's different." My address lists that I am from Chattanooga, and I don't know if she was trying to make some comment about the caliber and status of clientele attending Huntsville studios as opposed to Chattanoooga ones, or not... but I can say that I am much more impressed with every Chattanooga studio I've been to than this one, which just left a bad taste in my mouth with its snobbery :/ The class was completely unremarkable, sadly. I'd had high hopes for it, especially after the huge deal that the manager made about entering late.

name: Ria Ghosh
text: Best yoga studio in town! Clean studio! Lovely & knowledgeable teachers!

name: Kathryn Story
text:
Clean, Innovative, Inspiring, Enlightening...

What a wonderful addition to Huntsville! <3

name: Streeter Michael
text: I have been doing yoga for many years and I have been practicing Ashtanga, bikram, vinaysa flow, and yoga nidra ect. Robyn and here staff provide a very strong practice and challenging atmosphere. Just like anything else you get out of it what you put in. This place is yoga I know this because I come from a studio in Hilton Head South Carolina at the Jiva yoga center where they teach yoga and the philosophy of yoga. Yoga saved my life and it started in Hilton Head and now I can continue it at the hot yoga center. In closing I just want you to know I start yoga at almost 300 lbs and over a three year period I lost 86 lbs. At the age of 44 I am in the best shape of my life and better then when I was in Special operations with the US Army Rangers.

name: Brad G
text: Great studio with heat and humidity. Instructors work with you (I'm a newbie) and keep the class moving along and enjoyable.

name: Whitney Sirten
text: Love them!!!

name: Nikki Sisk
text: I won 3 jackpots in a 12 hour period so of course I think it is worthy of 5 stars!  But it was very nice and clean with a large variety of machines to play.

name: Ashley Daw
text: I received a 50 minute relief massage from the spa this evening. I’m pretty sure the Tyesha. This was the best massage I have ever received. She was very thorough and professional! She deserves a bonus and a raise! I will definitely be requesting her next time.

name: david mosley
text: Looks like it would be great choicd for the ladies and shawn

name: kimberly brooks byrd
text: My hubby and I went on our Honeymoon a few days ago. It was the best experience. We really enjoyed ourselves. The staff, the massage therapists, the atmosphere, all were over 5 stars! Hand downs a wonderful experience all around. Definitely recommend!

name: Becky Hatch
text:
I had the same experience as “Blossom Baby”, my masseur stayed on her phone the whole time and I received a one handed massage...I don’t recommend it, so please make sure Marcy/Marcie is not providing your service before you go.
However, my sister received her facial from Jonathan and he was fantastic! I just cannot rate them higher than one star as long as I know there are unsuspecting clients who may be receiving one handed massages from Marcy. I have received 3 other massages from other masseurs there over the years and they were great, but Marcy was enough to make me not want to try again.

name: Nancy Owen
text: My daughter and I spent an entire day at the spa. We both had renewal facials and relaxation massages. Everyone that worked there was very friendly and helpful.

name: Lisa Peacock
text: Nice place to unwind,with a soak in the hot or cold tubs, sauna,steamroom and outside wave pool. Nice showers with sugar scrubs are available and the message staff are awesome too. Everyone is always so nice and helpful

name: April Hamrac
text: Had a facial done today and Jonathon Bethune was great. I would definitely recommend requesting him when booking a facial.

name: Kathy Skipper Buckhault
text: Kaci was absolutely the best massage therapist I have ever had.....bar none!!!!   She was fabulous, I had a pain in my shoulder when I got there she massaged the pain right out.   Thanks Kaci!!!

resp.text: Awesome! We're glad you enjoyed the massage! Please come again soon.

name: Diam0nd Sakura
text: I have been to the Spa a few times and its different every time. I actually had a someone fall asleep while massaging me, I also had one that kept stopping to text on her phone. I should have reported them when I had the chance, but I hope they are gone. I had facial for the first time and it was awesome.

name: Eric Hendrix
text:
$25 for a day pass.  The guy who checked me in was useless.  Collected my money and said ok, you can go back.  No tour, no explaining where everything was...nothing.  It’s rather small so I was able to figure out the lockers and get into my robe rather quickly and head straight for the steam room.

Surprise, the steam room is broken down.  That sucks, but I could still do the sauna and whirlpool.  Wrong, sauna is broken too.  So all you get for your $25 is a whirlpool, and a lounge that has cartoons blasting loudly on the TV for some reason.

I am usually one to just write off a bad experience and say lesson learned but I did go back out front and talk to the girl at the desk.  She was very apologetic and said they should have told me about the steam room, and she had no idea that the sauna was broken.  She refunded my money and I left.

It has potential but this place is terrible right now.

name: Roger Prodacter
text: There needs to be signs posted in the spa that say that swimsuits must be worn at all times in the spa area. It's not sanitary to have naked people using the whirlpool or sauna/steam room.

name: Jo Kincaid
text: Massage so so. Spa water nasty. Naked woman in it too.yuck

name: Ashley Burton
text: they wont take card payments over the phone. How do they expect people to book appointments when traveling out of town?

name: Crystal Stokes
text: Set an early appointment and spend all day in luxury. Worth the drive from Pensacola.

name: pam howard
text: I love the spa everyone is so helpful and friendly I can't stop going

name: Kay Archer
text: What a great experience.  Price is great also.

name: Suzette Wilson
text: It was so much fun & the food was great!

name: Anjanette Moore
text: Sooooo relaxing

name: Carrissa Lee
text: I totally in love with Escape Spa at Windcreek Resort in Atmore AL.

name: Kaylee Padgett
text: If you don't book 2 months in advance you'll never get an appointment. Especially if you want a Friday or Saturday appointment which in my case are my only days off.

name: Becky Boutwell
text: Woke up the next day with bruises everywhere and hurting so badly in my hip. I don’t think this is normal after a  massage. Painful experience for me , don’t think I will be returning.

name: Christy Johnson
text: Great location

name: Albernya Tucker
text: Awesome did nast

name: Joan Chiver
text: I was great but the food was awful but we had so much fun

name: Janice Kluge
text:
I have been a client at “Chambers Total Body” for a decade and have recommended Mr. Chambers many times. During the time of Covoid he invested in safety precautions above and beyond. He continues to keep sterile environment and his individual attention for personal training is outstanding! There is 30 minutes between clients- for complete turnover.

I was in the studio when the two men came in that gave the ONE star review. They walked right in and did not say anything to the owner. They had materials in their arms that made them look like SALES PEOPLE. And that happens a lot! A LARGE SIGN IS ONTHE DOOR to wear a MASK! Anyone who would give a review like that- after just walking in without calling ahead and already breaking rules- is not really the type of person who comes to workout in this location. I have met many clients over the years. That review was just completely UNFAIR and should be deleted.

name: Meaux La Soule
text: extremely rude when me and a friend walked in just to ask about his services. immediately shoo’d us out of the door like we didn’t belong there. it ruined my day and i won’t be going back.

resp.text: I'm sorry your interpretation of our interaction was that you don't belong here and that you were treated rudely. Our business has clear signage stating, face coverings required. The health and well-being of our clients are extremely important and it's our responsibility to keep the space in which we work as safe as possible for them.  While, It's unfortunate that this rating is reflective of your experience it is in no way reflective of our services.

name: Gary Roubin
text:
Marlon Chambers is the consummate professional trainer. Whether you are 40 or 70y., physical activity is the key to longevity and quality of life. Marlon is able to formulate a circuit of exercises to tune up your core, strengthen your lower extremities and for men," keep you shoulders wider than your waist". And he mixes it up! The workouts match your increasing fitness, your mood on the day and the inevitable appearance of irritated joints and muscles. If consistency is you goal, you will enjoy the experience and be disappointed when you have to miss a session.
As an Interventional Cardiologist, I have a professional interest in fitness and health. I have been working with personal trainers for 30 years. Marlon is the best!

name: Val Walton
text: I am very thankful I have Marlon Chambers as a personal trainer. He is a great motivator and a testament that you do not have to have a hard, drill sergeant attitude to get fitness results. Chambers Total Body, LLC has one-on-one regimens that are designed to do what its name says work your "total body." You will see results, provided you do the work.

name: Anna Schmidt
text: I've been training with Marlon for 3 years now.   Along the way, I've had some major health challenges that Marlon has been instrumental in helping me through.   I'm now strong, agile, slim, and most importantly able to do all those things in life that I really love.  I really appreciate the one on one focus and the way he has individualized a very core-focused program for me.  He even puts my favorite music on and has it ready for me when I walk in.  The facility is immaculately clean and well kept.  The atmosphere is professional and comfortable.  I highly recommend Chambers to anyone considering personal training.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Jimmy Adams
text: Marlon Chambers is a great trainer, working to style the workouts to the client's needs. I have been working out with him Marlon for almost two years and enjoy it. Marlon is also very friendly, and funny frankly. I highly recommend him.

name: john nixon
text: I loss 20 pounds in the first month and the training has improved my energy level.  Marlon is a well trained professional . I highly recommend Chambers Total Body.

name: Paige Daniel
text: My husband and I are long-term clients of Chambers Total Body.  The customized programs and one on one attention is great in helping you meet your goals.

name: Zharia Hosea
text: Cool

name: Jared Flach
text: Jacked athletics is a very high quality high intensity tough exercise and goal oriented gym with courteous and professional coaches who are well equipped to teach anyone of any fitness level. The atmosphere is one that you will find no where around, the workouts are in a group setting that are easy to follow and the people who attend are the most chill individuals that you will click with instantly and support and push you to try hard when you are at your breaking point, the owner Joe Peek will personally coach you during the work outs to correct your form, ensure that you’re within your means and capabilities, and make you better . You will see extreme results from the workouts relatively quick, i personally was able to drop over 20lbs in my first 2 months. Jacked is a great place for anyone to start, learn, and grow with.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Jared!  You've come a long way since Day 1.  Specifically, we've seen your coordination and mobility improve tremendously.  Keep after it and congrats on making the fitness level leaderboard last month!

name: Eric Green
text: Amazing trainers, full of motivation and excitement throughout each workout. Highly recommended

name: Chelsey Smith
text: “Love this place! All the coaches make you feel welcomed from day 1.  I never picked up a barbell before then but the coaches have helped me every step of the way.  If your looking for a workout that will push you everyday this is the gym!  I can't say enough great things about Joe and his team."

name: Joseph Willis
text: Ive been at Jacked Athletics and Nutrition for a few months now. Coming in to this I had zero experience and a bit intimidated. Joe and his coaching staff really invest the time to teach proper technique. The atmosphere is wonderful, the gym members are a delight and the experience is very family-like.

name: Samuel Adams
text: Jacked is the best gym I’ve ever been a part of! The coaches are very knowledgeable and really keep you motivated. The programming is challenging but still offers something g for every fitness level.

resp.text: Love having you part of the gym and enjoy seeing the determination you have in climbing the fitness level leaderboard.  Keep up the great work!

name: Roxy Simmons
text: "I love the motivation and support you get from everyone! You are encouraged to step outside your comfort zone but not pushed beyond your capacity!"

name: Jessica Traywick
text: This is my favorite place. The workouts are challenging, the coaches are knowledgeable and the people are so supportive. My fitness has improved so much since I’ve been here.

name: TRACI COTTRELL
text: Love my gym, my family!!  This place isn’t just a gym it’s a home. Everyone makes you feel welcomed.

resp.text: Thanks, Traci!  You're our most consistent athlete at Jacked.  You truly live #nevermissaworkout.  We love you for it.

name: Donna Ridings
text: More than just a workout, a community. Love the support from all the people there!

resp.text: Thanks, Donna!  We enjoy seeing you each week in our morning classes.

name: Rachael Gordon
text: You won’t find a better gym! Amazing staff and gym members that cheer you on and become family!

resp.text: Thanks, Rachael!  It's been fun to watch your transformation and see such a huge strength increase.  Fantastic!

name: Michael C
text: Great atmosphere with awesome coaches and workouts.

name: Ashley Hamm
text: If your looking for more than just a gym then crossfit jacked is the place for you. Great atmosphere, with skilled coaches and great people who become family. You won’t regret joining!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ashley!  We love having you as a part of our community.

name: Beka Dollar
text: Great place to take your fitness and health to the next level. The workouts are insanely challenging but you will instantly feel stronger after just one workout. Come give it a try and meet some awesome new people and staff! Love CF Jacked!!

name: Donald Murrill
text: I've been with Crossfit Jacked for nearly three months and I not only lost 24lb but gained muscle. I have a six-pack that was buried beneath all that potential and hard work. It's not a walk in the park..., or maybe it is, it depends on how you look at it. Hold 35-50lb weight in each hand above your shoulders and then go walk in the park. However, you will meet good friend you never thaught you had. Its all worth it.

name: lynn Miller
text: IF YOU WANT A POSITIVE CHANGE WITH A GREAT TEAM OF COACHES THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO. I HAVE ONLY GREAT THINGS TO SAY ABOUT  CROSSFIT JACKED. THEY REALLY CARE ABOUT YOU!! THEY MAKE SURE TO GIVE YOU HEALTHY EATING RECIPES THAT TASTE GREAT. THEY MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE DOING YOUR WORKOUT CORRECTLY. YOU DO NOT FEEL LIKE  ANOTHER NUMBER. THE TEAM ACTUALLY KNOWS YOUR NAME. TO ME THIS IS IMPORTANT. YOU WILL SEE RESULTS. THEY KEEP YOU MOTIVATED!!!!!!

name: Alisha Stoecker
text: I am on my third week, and everyday I feel stronger. It is such a great atmosphere and everyone is so friendly. All the coaches are amazing. They push you to do better.

name: Kane Foster
text: Best gym in Alabama hands down!! Great coaching staff and a great group of people to be there and push you towards your goals everyday!! Come try them out.

resp.text: Appreciate the kid words, Kane!  You're a pleasure to work with.

name: Daniel Bridgman
text: If you are interested in improving your health this is the place for you. The coaches are knowledgeable and ready to adapt any workout to your current ability. Don't plan on staying at that level for long though. The results are fast and long lasting. Come in this week!

name: Wilson Bryant
text: We've had a great experience with Crossfit Jacked for almost a year. We have meet great people that are now considered friends. I would recommend them if you are looking for somewhere for the whole family to workout or if you are a individual. Good people!

name: Latasha Bryant
text: One of my favorite places to go! This place makes me want to see how far I can push myself! Staff is extremely helpful, and members are very encouraging! Great place to get fit, have fun, and make life long friends!

name: Melissa Jones
text: Super great coaches that really put in the time to teach proper technique. Quality workouts that challenge beginners to experts! Highly recommend Crossfit Jacked!

name: Joseph Blaise III
text: I have lost so much much weight and gained more muscle and confidence in myself! Great staff and every memeber wants everyone to get better. Perfect place for anyone who is ready to make a change for better health!

name: CLB draws
text: I've been doing crossfit for 3 months now and I'm down 2 full pants sizes! I am stronger than I have ever been! Joe and Kelly are amazing owners!

name: Tonya Read
text: When I started I could only back squat 40lbs.  On August 10th, my 4-month anniversary, I did 10 sets of 2 reps at 160lbs. I think that is a pretty good improvement for me, along with losing 20lbs.  Thank you CrossFit Jacked!   Stay tuned for more improvements & weight loss results :-)

name: Libbi Cottrell
text: This gym has been the best decision of my life. I come from a back ground of all-star cheerleading and recently had to quit due to medical issues  I couldn't exercise for 6 months after quitting and since I've started crossfit I'm in the best of shape I've ever been! They have amazing coaches and such a great positive atmosphere!

name: Shemika Brown
text: Crossfit Jacked is a great place to take your workouts to the next level. You will be challenged but have fun at the same time.

name: Bo Crowe
text: Super nice people that just want to help you get in better shape!

name: Erica Bridgman
text: If your looking to start with CrossFit or continue with CrossFit this is the place for you! Very attentive staff! Crossfit Jacked is definitely a place to call your CrossFit home!

name: Keith johnson
text: Crossfit is something I’ve never done before, until I tried it this past summer.  The trainers at Crossfit Jacked are truly dedicated to helping ME as well as everyone else improve. I have never felt like I was asking a dumb question. I am so glad I’ve gotten stronger and feel great. Thank you Crossfit Jacked!  See you tomorrow!!  Shauna Johnson

name: Amber Chavis
text: I never thought I would be able to start crossfit at 40...but crossfit jacked help me see that 40 is just a number. Crossfit gives me such a feeling of great accomplishment every time I finish a session. The staff is great and help you feel like you belong.

name: Ethan Jordan
text: Great gym and staff, couldnt ask for a better environment to workout in. Coaches are very supportive and encouraging.💪🏻 #JackedAndStrong

name: Rian Melchiorre
text: I was always skeptical about crossfit, however, that all changed when I stepped foot into Crossfit Jacked. Joe and his staff are awesome. Not to mention the great people you meet at the gym that become like family. It's not like the "gym", it challenges you everyday. Thankful for my crossfit family. I am now a firm believer, I love it!!

resp.text: Thank you, Rian!  We're so grateful to have you part of our community.  Keep getting stronger.  You're doing fantastic! - Joe

name: Aaron Godwin
text: Crossfit Jacked is an awesome community of people trying to get healthier together.  Other places boast "the judgment free zone", but what's the point of working out and not seeing results. Crossfit Jacked is all about helping you get from where you are, to where you want to be.  The staff and members are so helpful to everyone of all fitness levels.  I hadn't lifted weights in 15 years when I started here, and I was in extremely poor condition.  Owner Joe Peek and staff helped me lose 53 pounds of straight up fat, in my first 5 months.  With their continued support, the sky is the limit for me!  Whether you are a seasoned gym rat, a couch potatoe, or somewhere in between, you won't be disappointed for giving Jacked a try.

name: Travis Chaos
text: Friendly and knowledgeable coaching staff.  Best programming in Mobile.

name: Lauren Read
text: Crossfit Jacked is amazing, I love it so much and it helps!!!

name: Destiny McCoo
text: Best place

name: Jay Elliott
text: Way to go Joe on your new box. I want to grab a drop in visit sometime soon.

resp.text: Come on in, Jay!  We'd love to have you!

name: Reagan Giles
text: Without a doubt the best gym in Chelsea. Extremely clean and staff is always so sweet! As a student they are always willing to work work with me. I have been a member for 3-4 years now and it is my favorite gym of all time! Owners are extremely nice and friendly and will do anything to help you reach your goals. Seriously cannot brag about this place enough!!! Not to mention child care for those who need it + classes with your membership.

name: Jessica Haywald
text: Love this little hometown gym! Great equipment, great resources, clean, love everyone here! Such a sweet little community and life long friendships are made here! One on one training, fun classes, awesome childcare area! I can not say enough good things about Chelsea Family Fitness!

name: Jessica Isabella Mazzei Protz
text: I LOVE CCF! After having my son it was hard to find the time and motivation to workout. But when I heard CCF has childcare and fitness classes, I instantly checked it out!!!!!! I’ve been a gym lover since I was 16 and I missed that part of my life so bad. I’m so happy CFF is here. Everyone there is awesome. Wes and Sabrina are so down to earth, knowledgeable, and treat you like family as soon as you walk through the door! They’re full of great tips and pointers to help you maximize your fitness goals! I’ve already lost 8lbs of fat since signing up 2 months ago. Best of all, my 10 month old son loves going to the childcare and I love getting a break and doing the classes! If you’re someone who wants to work out at a gym with people who genuinely care and will help you reach your goals, this is the place for you! HIGHLY RECOMMEND 👍🏼

resp.text: Wow!  This makes me smile big!  Thank you!

name: Jayme Moore
text: I've been a member for over a year. I joined because they truly mean family Fitness here. Everyone is down to earth and super friendly. The staff is willing to help and they're are personal trainers available to hire as well as an assortment of free classes. The best part is, there are no huge muscle heads trying to intimidate everyone like other places I've been. It is truly judgment free here.

name: Ryan Bradley
text: Great family owned gym that makes you feel like family. Clean, well-equipped. Great class schedule. Fun competitions. Highly recommend!

name: Samuel Knopf
text: Love This place ,a solid 10!I have been a member to all the fitness places in Chelsea ,Chelsea Family Fitness is by far better simply because of the  Cleanliness , Large area to work out,machines and lots of free weights And you will never  Meet a more    Caring staff that   is Involved and cares about you. Great prices to! unlike all the others +free daycare for your child while you work out!You will have no excuses to miss the gym.

name: Mitchell Beck
text: Best place to workout in Chelsea! Wesley’s the man! Sabrina’s the woman! If you need help with anything look no further 💪🏼

resp.text: Thank you Mitchell! You have done a fantastic job transforming your body! Keep up the good work! 💪👊

name: Michael Durham
text: Love CFF! It’s a very family oriented gym. Good clean music always playing, equipment clean & well maintained, always seems to have a class going that people love. Wesley & Sabrina (owners) are fun to be around. Wesley has been training me for over a year & I have never stayed as consistent as I have with Wesley. It’s the kind of place that everyone takes their workout serious but everyone is having fun & has a smile on their face. They are always improving. For example, I love the new color coded Polar system that lets you know when you are in optimal fat burning range. You have to check it out!

name: Hali Smith
text: I love this gym! I never thought I would join a gym because I was always intimidated by the “gym atmosphere” but every one here is wonderful, nice and extremely helpful. They offer a wide range of classes to suit everyone. Plus the childcare is awesome!

name: cassie farris
text: This gym is great! They have childcare available which is a definite for me and my kids love it. Very affordable for our family. They offer so many great classes!

name: Jamie Goza
text: The best gym I have been a part of.  I love the variety of challenging classes and encouraging instructors and owners.  Being a working mom with two elementary kids, the child care is something I have been looking for, for years.  Without it I couldn't work out!!!  Love. This. Place.

name: karlee slaughter
text: Jennifer’s spin class was intense and so much fun! I had a great time at my first class at CFF. She made you feel very welcome. I will definitely be going back!

name: Brad Garrard
text: The best atmosphere for family friendly exercise around Shelby County. Literally a class or group training option for everyone in my family. Great training options for youth sports and fitness. CHILDCARE TOO!!

name: Cruz Blanton
text: CFF has a friendly staff, good equipment, and a wide variety of classes for the whole family.

resp.text: Thank you Cruz! We have enjoyed teaching your daughter gymnastics!

name: Devin Taylor
text: So far this place is awesome! The gym is clean and all the equipment is in good working order. The owners are super nice and very involved in the gym. If your looking for a good place to get a good work out done, this is the place.

name: Magali S
text: Best place to shred those extra pounds. Excellent instructors and the classes are so much fun. I really enjoy working out with them.

name: Koby Dunnam
text: Nice clean gym and the equipment is clean. Good music. Offer childcare. Lots of great classes. The best gym around.

name: Phyllis Mayfield
text: Great gym!   Family friendly and CLEAN!  Lots of classes in addition to weights, equipment, personal trainers, nutrition planning available, smoothies, vitamins, supplements, and much more.  A "one stop shop" for your healthy lifestyle.  Great instructors who are willing to adapt for older people, yet still meet the needs of the younger adults. During the COVID 19 closures CFF offered a wide range of virtual classes, actually several choices everyday.  Check them out!❤️❤️❤️❤️

name: Greystone Greene
text: This gym has been such a fun blessing in my life this year! The classes are awesome- everyone is challenged. I am so thankful for the White family and their awesome staff!

name: Gracie Minor
text: This gym has the best people and classes and there is such a motivational atmosphere!  Everyone there is amazing and I promise you will not regret signing up for this gym!  Definitely worth every single penny!

name: Amanda Slaughter
text: We had a wonderful time in Jennifer's spin class! She had great music and it was a great workout!

name: Stacy Giovinco
text: The facility is amazing. The staff is UNMATCHED! I've been a member for a month and continue to be blown away at the genuine care the people at CFF continue to show. There's a saying 'the church is the people, not the building', well, at CFF, you get both! Very blessed to be a part of such an awesome place!

name: Aaron Kelley
text: Awesome Gym!  Great trainers and staff.

name: Ashley Clements
text: Great local gym with all the equipment you need, classes you could want and some for the best trainers around!

name: Tina Wiles
text: Don't judge a book by it's cover - this place is awesome!  Great owners, family oriented, and VERY FRIENDLY people.  They offer a wide variety of classes - ZUMBA, ZUMBA Strong, ZUMBA Step, Pound, Cycling, Buns & Guns, and more - something for everyone.  I have loved every class I have tried so far.  If you are looking for a gym, come and check it out!

name: Ashley Collins
text: Love this gym!  The staff goes above and beyond to meet your needs, excellent child care, and you're guarenteed an amazing workout- whether you chose a group setting, or your own personal workout. Cardio and weights- they have it all!  The group classes are super motivational and it's nice to meet new people with the same aspiring goals!

name: Amanda Larson
text: Joined last week and love it so far.

resp.text: Great!  Glad to have you on board!

name: Andrew Traffica
text: Awesome place to exercise!! Fun family atmosphere!

name: Trevor Ross
text: Great gym, people and atmosphere!

name: Stephanie Irvin
text: Friendly, nonjudgmental, and excellent!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie! You have been with us since the beginning and got to watch us grow and we also got to watch you grow in your fitness journey!

name: Chelsey Standridge
text: Nice people!!

name: Amanda Taylor
text: Awesome staff!!!! Love the group and personal classes!

name: Jeff king
text: Great atmosphere friendly staff

name: Sabrina Stanga
text: The classes won't leave you wondering if you had a workout!!!

name: Cheryl O'quinn
text: Pleasant people they have the machine set I like to work on clean place has convenient hours that is suitable with me

name: Clint Grantham
text: Fantastic gym for the price.

name: Danny Williams
text: Man oh man I can’t begin to tell you how great Sean and his staff are at the path gym. They really care about you and your goals. Great structured workout by top notch instructor that really care about your well being.  I personally don’t think you could find a better gym.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Williams! It is a pleasure to train people like you. We appreciate you!

name: Remy Helu
text: Looking out for the little guy

name: Jessica Wilkes
text: This gym is great! Best combination of challenging workouts and patient/ skilled coaching, the best crossfit gym around!

name: S F
text: The best gym in town with the most knowledgeable coaches to get you in the best shape possible!

name: Harrison Horton
text: As a 5-year Crossfit athlete that is a certified coach and has visited countless Crossfit gyms across the country, I will tell you that ALL IN Crossfit is a great community of like-minded individuals looking to improve their level of fitness along with the confidence they have in themselves. On top of the great workouts and coaching that you will get on a daily basis they offer many out of the gym events that help build camaraderie within the gym. Before making my decision on which gym to join, I visited each Crossfit gym in the area. I ended up choosing ALL IN because they were the ONLY gym that bothered to return my phone call and offered to show me around the gym before I made my decision. ***ALSO, ignore the unjustified 1-star reviews from people who obviously have no supporting evidence to back their claims.***

name: Mike Cahill
text: This is an AWESOME gym!  Great coaches.  Great folks.  A real feeling of community.  Athletes that encourage and push one another and have fun doing it!  Don't waste your time looking anywhere else...come join us at ALL IN Crossfit and get "Better Than Yesterday!"

name: Bert Schulingkamp
text: Started going here when I started college and would come home for the breaks. When I moved back home to auburn I was in search of a gym to get me back in shape and that offered a sense of community. All In has done an amazing job of getting me back on track with my fitness and offered not only a community but a family. I am thankful for the amazing coaches and members at All In and wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Kyle Donaghey
text: Exceptional place, people, and experience.  I started going in April 2013 when I was new to Auburn and I can say 4 years later that was one of the best decisions I've ever made.  All In has given me much more than just a fitness experience (although they are great at that too); I've found friends through the coaches and members and made connections that have helped me both personally and professionally.  The business model is pretty unique in the fitness industry; you can pay as you go (which is how I started) so you are not bound to any long term contracts.  As far as the actual workouts go, All In changed working out for me from a chore to something I look forward to and enjoy, and is often the highlight of my day.

name: Anthony Dean
text: Outstanding! Great people! Amazing workouts. Absolutely top notch

name: Kanesha Blake
text: I could not say more great things about All In!! All In has the BEST community in Auburn, hands down. All of the coaches and members are awesome and make the atmosphere SO welcoming & enjoyable!! Great workout. Great people. Knowledgeable coaches.  All In is the way!!! #BETTERThanYesterday

name: Katherine Israel
text: Great gym! The coaches are fun and knowledgable and the members are supportive no matter what your level of fitness is at that time.  Walking in the door helps you be "better than yesterday"!

name: Brent Miller
text: I have been a member of All In CF for 3 years and could not picture going anywhere else. Chris Harris and Shelby Levy, along with the other coaches will teach you and push you to be a better you. Love my All In family!!

name: Ken Natori
text: Well established coaches that cater to all levels of athletes and makes everyone feel at home and comfortable. Truly tight community that will make you fall in love with All In CrossFit!

name: Christy Garner
text: It is a place that you can call home!  The coaches are wonderful the environment is friendly and welcoming.  No other place I would want to be....

name: catherine Lowder
text: I LOVE this gym, the coaches and the members.  It's truly like a family.  You will find yourself looking forward to the dreaded burpees!

name: S Kirkland
text: I love the coaches here. They are very helpful and experienced. I highly recommend ALL IN with no hesitations.

name: Robin Roberts
text: If you are looking at trying crossfit, look no further.  I have been a member of a All In since it opened and couldn't imagine being anywhere else.  Stop by for a great workout and the opportunity be a part of an amazing community of athletes!!

name: Stephanie Huff
text: I love All In Crossfit! The coaches are the best!Whatever your fitness level is, they will help you and encourage you to be better than yesterday!

name: Libba Brannon Harris
text: I love ALL IN! It's a welcoming and friendly environment. The coaches are super friendly and very knowledgeable.

name: Maddie G.
text: Unknowingly was put on the "auto pay" system when I specifically asked to be charged to go for ONE month. I even double checked to make sure I wasn't on auto pay, because a friend told me that is how it works. A worker went online to my account and said, "thank you for telling me you don't want to be on auto pay, because you were. I will take you off." They DID NOT take me off. When I called and asked for a refund, they said that it was my fault and did not give me my money back!! Poor customer service. Put themselves before the customer first. Was really surprised and frustrated that they did not give me my money back and acted like everything was my problem.

resp.text: We pride ourselves in treating our customers like we want to be treated and will gladly cancel anyone's membership if we receive written notification within 7 days of their bill date. Our policy is clearly stated on the waiver our customers sign when they become a member. This customer was on our auto-pay system for six months before she contacted us asking for a refund. Out of courtesy, we refunded her one month of membership fees. We regret that she thinks she was treated unfairly, but we were only enforcing the policies we have in place and that were agreed to by her when she signed up.

name: Kathryn Gullatte
text: Great coaches, fantastic get pumped music, And people who have a passion for fitness!

name: Tracy Young
text: Knowledgeable coaches, clean gym, super people! I highly recommend!

name: Taylor Cooper
text: The coaches are fantastic and the atmosphere is very welcoming! The best box in Auburn.

name: john Israel
text: Great Gym for all ages.

name: Jeff Brittain
text: Dalton is great.  Well equipped box.   Friendly members.

name: Joshua Anderson
text: This is by far the best CrossFit box I have ever been to! The staff is ALWAYS in a great mood and the people are like family. I have NEVER had a bad day at this box. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who is looking to start or continue their fitness journey!

name: jonathan arrington
text: Professional Coaching. Friendly atmosphere. Great facility. This gym is the premier CrossFit gym in the Auburn Opelika area.

name: Kayla Casper
text: I am a traveling crossfiter and have been to many gyms across the states. CrossFit on the Plains is one of the best gyms I have had the opportunity to drop into. Programming is great, coaches are knowledge, and the community is very welcoming! If you are in the Auburn area and need a good quick work out stop by here!

name: Ryan Michael
text: I walked into this Box while visiting family in Auburn. I was/am new to Crossfit having only been working out for 2 months and I walked into The Filthy Fifty the day after Thanksgiving. The staff and owner were extremely nice and helpful with some of the movements that I was not familiar with. I spent a little over an hour here and had a great time, I will continue to attend this Box when I am visiting family. I would strongly recommend this Box to anyone that is thinking of giving Crossfit a try. As a side note The Filthy Fifty is horrible, but I would do it again.

name: Grant Middleton
text:
So my 3 stars isn’t based on the WOD. It’s simply based on how it started. I was dropping in since I was out of town from my regular gym and brought my friend who’d never done Crossfit before. As we walked in, we were told by a member to go talk to two guys in the corner away from the class. They then direct us to go talk to the coaches to get us checked in. As we’re walking away, Dalton (owner) asks if we’ve done Crossfit before and my friend says “no” as Dalton then kinda puts his hand in his face and says “Oh my goodness.” I was pretty shocked...as an owner of a box, you have the opportunity to gain maybe two members but after that first impression, definitely not.

With that said, the workout was great! The coaches were super helpful to my friend and we definitely got a good WOD in for the day. Potentially would go back, but definitely not for who owns the place. Afterwards, I heard a few other people say not the greatest things about the owner, so hopefully he learns some people skills and grow his gym more in the future.

name: David Heigl
text: Great staff, great community, owner puts his heart into the gym.

name: Brandon Rowland
text: Fantastic box. Knowledgeable coaches and strong community.

name: David Eckman
text: I travel, and pay extra for a nation wide membership.   I’ve been in 15-20 ymca’s in the last year and they have all been gracious and accommodating.  This one must be special, because they will not accept my membership, and will not give me any option to use their facility.

resp.text: We regret that you were unable to visit our YMCA facility during the pandemic.  In order to protect our staff and our members, we are currently welcoming guests from Baldwin and Mobile Counties of Alabama only.  We will continue to monitor updated CDC guidelines as more people are vaccinated, as rates of COVID-19 change and as additional scientific evidence becomes available.

name: Recep Kuru
text: Good and friendly employees but they need to check some disgusting customers. The guy spit at floor in sauna like an animal when he did chewing a gum , I already reported him and they known him . I believe they kicked him out .

name: Ernest Kelly
text: Love Gina's Total Body Challenges classes at Bounds Family YMCA. I've been taking her classes for over a year now and am happy to say I look forward to them every week. It's always fun, high energy and you get a great workout! Gina's the best!

name: Karim Harzallaoui
text: Great gym, but if they would open at least at 14:30 would be awesome

name: Cody White
text: Clean facility, lots of options, and Karen is the absolute best up front!!

name: Wesley Williams
text: Really nice gym but it has the worst hours of any gym I've been to.

name: Local Guide
text: Great customer service and welcome desk. 2 pools one indoor and heated another outdoors. Exercise equipment. Several Stories. Family environment and safe. Child Care. Excellent facility.

name: A Boyd
text: I came in as a guest with my sister who is a member. Wanted to get a membership but wanted to try a class out first. We called the day before and asked what all we needed to bring for me to do a class with her. Was told all we needed was $10. I get there with $10 in cash and then I’m told “oh we don’t accept cash” which of course was not told to me on the phone. But it was fine my sister asked if she could just charge it to the card on file. Then she asks for my drivers license that I don’t have with me because I was never told that I needed to have it. All the while I’m trying to remain calm even though this is very annoying because I did everything right and called the night before and asked what I needed to have and NONE of this was mentioned. The woman at the front desk was extremely rude and said “well your sister is a member and should have known what you needed to have.” My sister has never brought a guest before and again WE CALLED AND ASKED and were not told any of this. It was very disgusting and embarrassing the way the woman was talking to us. Needless to say, I’m not getting a membership there anymore. This was very disappointing.

name: Rachel Tucker
text: The group fitness instructors are an exceptional team. They’re all phenomenal teachers and community builders. For me, they’ve made the difference in my experience at this YMCA. Otherwise, it’s a beautifully maintained facility. The mission of the organization and the way it’s run make membership well worth it.

name: The Connor and Jacob Channel
text: Pretty decent gym. Friendly atmosphere most of the time.  Lots of machines although it seems many of the treadmills have glitchy TVs. Wish the pool was open later on weekends and cleaner...especially the outside pool. Pool staff has been unwelcoming in the past. I know they are mostly kids but they should probably have some training in how to treat the kids they are watching. We've always liked the private swimming lessons experience and those instructors have always been excellent. We used to love the Kids Night Out program, but they've made it less conducive for our child who is not into socializing. I wish they had some kind of classes for beginners especially yoga. Administrative people are nice but don't seem to be on the same page with information. Cleaning attendants are friendly and always hard at work. Now that my children are 8 and 11 they do not feel comfortable going in the ladies dressing room which I totally agree with but I do not feel comfortable letting them go in the men's area because there is no privacy for them. I'm not comfortable with them being exposed to naked men or having to expose themselves. Probably a lot to ask for a kids dressing area or family room. There is a changing room/storage room by the pool but I think it's really just meant for storage. It would be great if they would post the status of the pool on Facebook or via text. It's kind of inconvenient to get there only to discover it is closed because of a distant rumble.

name: Yosef Aborady
text: They have horrible hours of operation. Wi-Fi coverage is so spotty and when you do have a connection it’s super slow there’s no cellular signal because it is a metal building. Staff are clueless and who doesn’t open until one on Sunday it’s absolutely ridiculous. My advice to anyone would be to go to planet fitness for the same type of atmosphere half the price only thing you’re missing out on is a pool.

name: James Spivey
text: Probably the best overall fitness facility in Baldwin county. I’ve tried several other gyms and nothing really compares to the selection of equipment. The staff is also very friendly and helpful! I thoroughly enjoy lifting and swimming here.

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Love the staff and instructors!

name: Erin Adkinson
text: Great selection of classes. Large and clean facility!

name: Ash ton
text: Very military friendly! If you're active military visiting the area, they will give you a free pass for the time you're here. I'd recommend this facility to anyone.

name: Adam Manning
text: Great facility and friendly staff.

name: CHARLES Harris
text: Awesome place to work out . stay fit. I love it , family fitness center.

name: Jessica Redditt
text: I use this gym as a visitor and have been very pleased with my experience. Both the staff and other patrons were friendly and helpful to this out-of-towner. I follow a pretty extensive powerlifting and body building program and this gym had almost everything I needed, including a weightlifting platform! I highly recommend!

name: Virtual KRMZEN
text: Amazing place to go and work out or just relax in the hottub or swim in the pool! Amazing staff members that are very nice! It's very clean! It's very big and has a lot of room! They have very clean equipment!

name: Jim g
text: Great place, much better than downtown. I wish they would post a sign at the entrance and then enforce 10 minutes maximum per machine, no checking emails and texting while lounging on the equipment, chatting and socializing, rather than actually using the weights. The weights are for everyone's use, and using them is what they should be doing. Check your emails, text, and take calls in the lobby area. Thanks for a great place to work out. More fans would be a plus.

name: Zachary Dinkins
text: One of the better gyms I've ever lifted at. Nice people there too. I never had a problem with them

name: Robert Holyfield
text: Seen worse. Very crowded

name: Troy White
text: Probably the dirtiest most disgusting gym I have ever been to. My high school locker room smelled better. I don’t think the men’s restrooms have ever been mopped or disinfected.
