text: Personalized trainer. Right to the point for me!

name: Jack Stevens
text: Great gym with weight and cardio machines that will fit anyone's routine.  Open 24/7 for easy access.  It's never been too crowded when I have been there.  Mike and Mitch are great guys and fun to work with.  If you need that bit of motivation you've been missing they can provide it.

name: Jennifer Tsantes
text: Love getting back in shape

name: Avis Thompson
text: Never crowded when I go...Can really Social Distance😊

name: Adam Haas
text: Absolutely the best gym in town. Morgan is great and if you need a personal trainer Mitch is one of the best. I left anytime fitness to join Planet Fitness to save $10 a month and I quickly returned back to Anytime Fitness because it is well worth the little extra a month. They have great equipment and help me daily with my personal fitness goals. Do yourself a favor and join

name: Branden Pierson
text: I visited this anytime fitness location while on vacation and absolutely loved the layout, equipment, and cleanliness. I wish my local anytime had some of the equipment this one had. Anytime Fitness is great because you as a member can access any location anytime of the day which is perfect for me.

resp.text: Thanks for visiting Branden, we enjoyed having you! Stop by anytime and workout!

name: Kurtis Halliwell
text: Owners are putting a lot of money into this gym, it's unlike any other anytime fitness. It may be a little more expensive than other gyms, but you definitely get what you pay for. I highly recommend it.

name: Jason Moore
text: Great staff, very nice gym. Clean. Highly recommend. Will return if in the area again.

name: Carlyle Galloway
text: It's an alright gym. It's usually pretty quiet and not crowded. My only complaints are some of the equipment is very worn out/outdated and needs replacing, and the manager of the location is pretty much never there.

name: Steven Files
text: Very convenient & never packed, i enjoy the privacy of no visitors/non member access

name: Alan Bredemann
text: Good location, and friendly service. Treadmills could use some maintenance.

name: Ben Davis
text: They charged me 40 dollars for a mistake that they made and wouldn't reimburse me. Seemed a little ridiculous

name: Patrick Bryant
text: $30/month for a 24 hour gym this clean can't be beat.

name: Christopher Wilbanks
text: Great gym.

name: Sarah Beams
text:
The coaches- they are amazing and get to know you on a personal level and care about your progress.
The people you meet in the classes- that ultimately you bond with and become friends with.
I’ve gained muscle and my endurance is up! I love my Tribe Family. We work hard and play hard together!
All good things!

name: Kevin Coleman
text: I enjoy Iron Tribe due to the friendly atmosphere, cleanliness of facility, up-to-date equipment that is maintained, reliability of staff to start/end on time, life-long friendships made by attending, professional/business contacts and networking, positive attitude of staff, and workouts that are progressive and promote improved fitness.

name: Angelia Sprott
text: Where do I start?!?! My experience at Iron Tribe Fitness has been nothing short of amazing. I just completed the 6 week challenge, and it was one of the most challenging yet rewarding experiences I have ever been through. The coaches helped me find the confidence to keep pushing even when I wanted to give up! Some of the members would step in to encourage me to keep going when I wanted to quit. For the first time I KNOW that I have what it takes to live a fit and healthy life. Anyone at any fitness level and be great at Iron Tribe. If you can’t do something, the coaches will work with you to find something you can do. If you are thinking about giving them a try please do, you will not regret it!!

name: Taja Dotson
text: I started the 6 week challenge at Iron Tribe and not only was I surrounded by a motivating group of individuals the coaches played a HUGE role in it too! Every single coach there was beyond supportive and really made sure to help as much as they could! I joined right after the challenge because I fell in love with the energy that I got from going to a class. I would 110% recommend at least trying it, it is a great, positive,  and warming environment!

name: Michelle Davis
text:
I did the ITF 6 week challenge. It was amazing, and I would recommend others to try it!!

The coaches are very knowledgeable, helpful, and pushed me to be the best version of me I could be! They want you to succeed.

This gym (meaning coaches and members) are amazing! There is such a great atmosphere here!!

name: Hannah Garrison
text: Love this place! I'm stronger than I've ever been. The coaches constantly push you to do your best and you get great results because of it! Also, the community that you gain just by being a member is amazing. Iron Tribe has brought me so many close friends! Basically, I love Iron Tribe.

name: Sarah (Sarah Kathryn) Bonds
text: Iron Tribe Fitness is fantastic! The coaches are wonderful, the workouts are challenging, and you always leave feeling better than when you came. ITF is a family and they care about their athletes. Their 6 weeks challenge was hard, but one of the most rewarding things I've ever done. Extremely worth it and I miss them already!

name: Barry Darden
text: Iron Tribe has exceeded my expectations! In less than 4 months I have lost 35 pounds and am well on my way to being in the best shape of my adult life. I have a higher energy level with the ability to be more productive throughout all aspects of my life.  The atmosphere is completely supportive and includes caring accountability. The coaches at Iron Tribe make each session time efficient and tailored to my individual ability to provide a safe, effective pathway to fitness. There have been numerous friendships made with the other athletes.  I look forward to attaining my life fitness goals in the next couple of months at Iron Tribe. Iron Tribe-come get you some-

name: Hunter James
text: Great people, great results. I absolutely recommend Iron Tribe Fitness for anyone looking to kickstart a fitness program or to bring their fitness to the next level. The coaches push you to your limits and help support a holistic approach to healthy living. The ITF community will be there to support you throughout your time there. Go Tribe!

name: mohammad ahmad
text:
I’m so excited to try this place... when the time is right I’m coming there for sure!
And the reason I’m giving 5 stars is because of its concept, to me it is like an army concept sort of.

name: Iesha Chess
text: In 6 weeks, I lost a little over 20 lbs and over 3% body fat. My results speak for this place. The coaches and environment are awesome!

name: Hannah Morgan
text: I've been going to ITF Tuscaloosa since September 2014 and LOVE IT! This place is more than a gym. It's morphed into friends and family. The coaches really care about you - and not just your fitness level. They want to improve your life. Drop by or give them a call!

name: Kelly McDonald
text: I love it! I would not be in a gym if had not been for ITF Tuscaloosa.  They have been so supportive and encouraging.  The coaches are awesome.  Making drastic changes in people's lives.  Love you guys!

name: T Cicatiello
text: Very motivating, inviting atmosphere.  Also pushes you to extremes.  The staff genuinely wants to get to know you and what your goals are, not just your $$$.  Life changer.

name: Keelin McNamara
text: Iron Tribe Tuscaloosa is fantastic.  The coaches, facility, and community are like nothing else.  One of the best decisions I have ever made! Everyone needs to join this family!

name: Mitch Hansen
text: ITF Tuscaloosa is First Class!  This a top-shelf results oriented organization.  The coaches are highly professional and always positive.  I have seen them, first hand,  transform lives - both body and mind.  Regardless of age or shape, they come along side and help you. Kanon Burt, and the rest of the coaches, understand the importance of meeting you where you are at in your journey to bring about a sustainable change. You will love the culture!

name: Tim Skinner
text: Great place to get a quick workout in. Great coaches.

name: Rebekah Gaines
text: I've really enjoyed being a part of Iron Tribe and working out with everyone is awesome. Have definitely seen results and can't wait to see more.

name: William Hudson
text: A little crowded with cardio equipment but not people. Pleasant place to workout.

name: Rodney Beasley
text: I utilize this gym when I come to visit my mom. They offer a daily or weekly fee. It’s an old school setup and I love it. Owner is very accommodating and the 24 hr access is great.

name: J Allen
text:
First off...The best thing, they require NO CONTRACT!
It has a small gym feel to it but is actually larger than it appears. There are 2 levels. Upstairs has about 90% of the workout equipment. Downstairs has a few machines and plenty of space for classes, yoga etc. Great for men and women!

name: Kimberly Dunn
text: I stumbled on the Downtown Gym while visiting the Guntersville area. The owner is very responsive and accommodating. I enjoyed the yoga classes. The yogis were friendly and made me feel very welcome.  The instructors were supportive and taught yoga styles that were appropriate for all skill levels. I didn’t use the other parts of the gym, but there is a wide variety of equipment options. I look forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Enjoyed having you at Downtown Gym, Kim!!!

name: Stephen Ellis
text: Plenty of weights and good machines. Great price.

name: Matthew Hart
text: Opened 24/7.  Not crowded.  Good machines.

name: Judy Spurlock
text: I love it here because not a lot of pll there

name: Latasha Coleman
text: The owners are extremely nice, helpful, and caring. The gym is clean. Variety of equipment and very big space. The people are very inviting and helpful. Crossfit can be intimidating when first walk in. Everyone is inviting and make you feel less anxious. I highly recommend slinging weights here.

name: D R
text: I love this place!   The people are awesome and the facility is well-equipped.  They even include free child care during your work out.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, David!  We are so happy you are enjoying your experience with us!

name: Jana Russell Nails
text: This place is great!  The coaches are awesome and have endless ideas for modifications to help me achieve my best self. Thank you!

name: Edward Lewter
text: Great for my son to have some place to play and get little workout

resp.text: Thanks Edward! We love having your son. He really helps make the class fun!

name: Katie Key
text: Staff and members are like a second family that likes to workout together and see results!

resp.text: Thanks, Katie, for the super review!  We are so happy you are a part of our team!

name: John Adams
text: Welcoming, friendly, gym with competent coaches and competitive rates.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, John!

name: Unkle Zeebizcut
text: Lotz of painz and gainz

resp.text: Thanks for the review, John!

name: ben floor
text: Great friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Ben!

name: Tim Crosson
text:
As of 01/17/2019 this is the current condition of thos gym(pictures I submitted).I joined this gym franchise due to frequent job travel. It's slowly becoming obsolete. Tuscaloosa recently closed without warning. Oxford, AL is in poor condition as well. Find another gym. I'm looking for other options.

Note: I didn't leave these notes in the Gym. However,  I fully support whomever did write these notes.

name: Jessica Rogers
text:
I really used to love this quaint little gym.  It's easy to get to and not super crowded and the equipment does what I need it to do.....BUT ever since the new owners bought it last year, it's gone downhill quickly.  Repairs are never made to equipment, unless one of the trainers takes it upon themselves to do it.

Two elliptical machines have had "Maintenance has been called" for over 9 months now.  Their idea of repairing pads from normal wear and tear is to use matching duct tape to cover the rips.  AC is constantly going out and the latest insult to injury is that the power has been out in the cardio and classroom for at least 4 days now.  One treadmill and a couple of bikes work.

I really love the convenience of the gym and most of the people that go there are nice and friendly and the two ladies that I've seen working there are always nice.  I keep hoping that one day enough will be enough and they'll put some money back into the gym, but..........

name: Frank Fowler
text: I am a Snap Member out of town and have been 1 for over 8 years. Drove 20 minutes to this gym just for the door NOT to unlock. This unacceptable! If you are out of town, I would not waist time coming this. This is the 2nd time I have tried a Birmingham area Snap and for some reason the card just doesn’t work. One of the benefits of Snap is having access to other SNAPS!

name: Jeremy
text: Do not under any circumstances join this gym. First off, you won't be able to do it in person because no one works there. If you choose to join online, you will get a access card in the mail that doesn't work because there is no one there to activate. Snap Fitness has the worst customer service of any corporation I've encountered. Just go somewhere else.

name: Joseph
text: I love the 24/7 accessibility and Tom and Chelaine do a great job!  Snap Fitness also offers exercise and yoga classes and it's a really convenient location.

name: Sam Clemons
text: Manager is never there. Some Cardio equipment has been out of order for over 6 months. They can’t afford batteries for the remotes for the television.

name: John Randall
text: I enjoy Karen is a sweet helper at the gym.

name: Tim Gobel
text: I worked here for six years. And it's the first time that I've been back in about five or six years. The equipment is still the same equipment. Half the lights were out in the ceilings and the equipment was very dirty. Was very disappointing to see this become this way.

name: Morris Flurry
text: A good place to workout.

name: Jim Brown
text: Best place to work out!

name: christa lodico
text: Convenient

name: Des2BFit
text: I’m curious the only reason I’m putting a one star currently is because they haven’t left any information of why the gym is currently close. They didn’t let me know in advance so I can stop my membership. I actually like this gym but I am wondering what is going on and why they haven’t open the gym back up ??? Anyone has an answer???

name: Copper Scales
text:
Its a decent gym. Havent had any issues with management and its always been decently clean. Fix the temperature/humidity problem and it'd be 5 stars.

You cannot however use this gym as they refuse to put in proper AC and insist on using sparsely placed floor fans instead. This just doesn't cut it in a climate where I've seen 80° in december, let alone when it hits 100° in the summer with crazy high humidity year round.

name: janay chatmon
text: This is by far my favorite gym in town and I've been to them all. Staff is amazing and the overall environment is very welcoming. I love the sauna and recently they have updated most of their equipment. Happy member of Team Alpha keep up the great work guys.

name: Brian Rosenthal
text: They just shut down ..no notice no nothing..stole all our money...owner is a theif. New owners good luck.

name: Jeff Brunje
text:
My daughter is extremely competitive in BJJ,and was not getting what she needed at another gym she was at,so she tried it here and from day 1 knew it offered more than just "a belt".
Coach Kevin has a ton drive,knowledge,and definitely instills that in his students.She is now a full time student,and we are 100% confident in her training.In 5 years and 3 gyms she has found a main.

name: Mindy Joyner
text: Very nice workout equipment  . Staff are very helpful and friendly. They also have a really wonderful daycare.  I would totally recommend this center for Adults and kids .

name: Windy Joyner
text: This gym has come a long way and keeps getting better. Constantly upgrading equipment and lots of great classes and instructors. I love it.

name: Tiffany Garcia
text: I love this gym,everyone is so nice . Coaches /Trainers  are so helpful. I definitely recommend this gym!💪👊

name: Cassie Farr
text: Great personal trainers, phenomenal jiujitsu/Muay Thai/ MMA classes with a great coach. Great atmosphere. There is something for everyone, from Zumba to kids classes.

name: Jacob Katzev
text: Great place to train MMA and Jiu-Jitsu or overall just getting in shape the equipment is great.

name: Adam R
text: My boys and I train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Muay Thai here and love it!

name: Darkseid
text: Great place to get in shape with plenty of options. You have Jiu-Jitsu classes, Muay Thai, Boxing, Zumba and a daycare to watch your Rugrats to give you time to get in shape. Those are just a few that I know of off the top of my head. Can't beat the price with all of those options with a nice gym with a wide verity of machines and free weights to choose from. My only complaint is the bathrooms could be cleaner and restocked more other then that I'd put it at 5 stars! Love the place!

name: Ashley Floreno
text: Tried to cancel my membership numerous times and was getting told different information by different employees. Nobody has a clue what’s going on. I got emails daily about failed attempts to pull my membership fee for about 2 weeks. Now got an email of confirmation of payments. Waiting for it to clear my account so I can go in and raise hell. Gym is trashy and childcare is horrible. Every time I went to pick up my kids the workers were on their phones, not paying attention to the kids.

name: aresvp12
text: Best jujitsu gym near Fort Rucker.

name: Angela Murphy
text: Very clean! Friendly, helpful staff and instructors that are very patient and kid friendly!

name: H Buckits
text: Only been a member for a week and my experience has been nothing but positive. Gym is always clean and neat. Nice variety of equipment. Very helpful staff.

name: Arrow
text: The gym itself is a nice place to workout and there is a variety of machines you can use for workouts. The staff and management on the other hand is a joke. They simply do not care about solving a problem they caused and they will also lie to you about fixing it.

name: Russell Shimunek
text: I have been going here for nine years, since it was gold’s. This place has gone downhill under the new management. Not very clean, especially bathrooms. When they do clean the bathroom, it is during the day, so you have to pee and they have it closed. Out of the 8-10 treadmills, 2 no joke, 2 actually work properly. Rates just went up again. They are charging premium rates for a mid-level product.

name: JINJOO BOK
text: If you want to train bjj or mma, this place is for you.

name: Brittany Mullins
text: Worst gym around. I would not recommend this facility to anyone. Save your money and time.Management is a joke and staff is just as bad. Lying to  members about head lice in nursery and threatening employees jobs if they tell the truth. Taking the old employees out slowly and bringing in their "Pack". Please go anywhere but there. Planet Fitness is way cheaper and much better.

name: Brian Lee
text: The worst gym in enterprise and surrounding area.  People check your accounts they double charge you and will not refund your money.  They raise the membership and do not inform you.  Since it was gold gym and then enterprise fitness.  The gym has went down hill fast.  The staff has no clue on how a gym should be run.  Terrible place I would not recommend this place to anyone.

name: C J
text:
-people that are leaving nasty comments were not the greatest of people to deal with.
The gym has come a long way and so much money has been put into bringing this place back to life. No one truly knows the behind the scenes events and how hard we try to accommodate to everyone’s needs. However, the previous management was awful. I will agree with that. Too busy with personal life and not enough focus on the gym. That has changed and it’s only up from here. We have brought back the 7 day FREE trial so come on in and get your own expierence to share with the community! Merry Chrismas y’all! 🎄🍭🖤

name: Sharonica Daniels
text: Worst gym experience ever.  Manager was higher than a kite when checking me in.  Staff had no clue about what classes were being held and when.  Absolutely a waste of your money.  Go to Planet Fitness and save your time and money!

name: Taylor Morris
text: Worst place to work. So unprofessional. Staff is rude and has no idea what they are talking about, doing or even selling. Staff leaves front desk unattended. Managers harass they're  subordinates as well as customers. The managers are spoiled children of the co-owners who are being given a huge freebie in life.

name: RiShawn Foster
text: Great place and friendly staff

name: Faith Dream
text: Team Alpha has an amazing crew, amazing classes, and amazing equipment I couldn't imagine going to a different gym

name: Cam W
text: New equipment and always open, only real gym in the area for lifting.

name: Clemson Voorheis
text: Place is disgusting. Canceled membership within a week

name: Kadeem Thomas
text:
its the best gym best boxing coaches best
zumba classes clean gym

name: Ryan Su
text: Friendly Staff

name: Hailey Johnson
text: Wonderful place!!

name: Lisa Willis
text: Love it here!!!

text: I really enjoy going!!!!!
