Boa!

name: Mike Larsen
text: This gym is like family!  The leadership is truly concerned with helping us be healthy in all aspects and truly expresses caring. I would highly recommend joining and being a part of this family!

resp.text: Mike you’re the best!!

name: Christopher Dewaal
text: I've been a member for about 3 months and it has been great! The owner and coaches are there to teach, encourage and challenge you to be the best you can be. The gym has a great culture of building up and helping members of all fitness level grow in there overall health and well-being.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!! Always crushing it with the 5 A.M. fam!!

name: Jennifer Castleberry
text: Great facility, sweet people and encouraging environment. Love it!

resp.text: You’re awesome Jennifer! We are so blessed to have you!!

name: Stephanie Sandoval
text: Great coaching and athletes. Dropped in last year and made a point to come back when in the area!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie!! You have been such an amazing guest!

name: Andrew Estes
text: The overall atmosphere that the members and staff put out is amazing, there is no comparison to any other gym that I’ve ever been to. Everyone is always friendly and smiling. The support system is awesome. This is a great place to be!

resp.text: Andy, you are the MAN!! You make the 6 P.M. such a fun class to be apart of! Keep up the good work bro!

name: Rayandra Seville
text: This is by far the most welcoming gym I have been a part of. The coaching staff and athletes are equally helpful with my fitness goals. If you’re looking for a gym to fit right in, this is the right place for you. Come ready to have fun!

resp.text: You are the BOMB.COM Ray!! Your light has shined bright here at CFPC! Thank you for being so encouraging to everyone who walks through these doors!

name: kaycee cornelius
text: I love CFPC! The coaches and community are wonderful. I have enjoyed going here for 2 years and counting.

resp.text: Kaycee, you are amazing!! We are so thankful for you!!

name: Steven Shannon
text: Awesome place!!! Best group of people I’ve ever had the pleasure of knowing. Top of the line coaches that take time to work on weaknesses and give you that push you need to overcome your limitations.

resp.text: BRROOOO!!! We miss you and can not wait to have you back!! You are ALWAYS striving to better yourself inside and outside of the gym! Keep that grind up and we will see you oh so soon!

name: Seth Glow
text:
Awesome coaches and owner of this gym!
They can push you to your true potential! I enjoy every class that I attend.

resp.text: Thank you Seth!! Its always fun having you at the 4 P.M. class!! We love having you here at CFPC!!

name: Kelsey Bain
text: Such a great gym! Great with beginners, knowledgeable coaches, and always clean!

resp.text: Thank you Kelsey!!

name: Travis C
text: This place is AMAZING! The coaches are the best around and everyone there treats you like family.

resp.text: Thank you Travis!! The 5 A.M. crew is blessed to have you bright and early!!

name: Brandon Tate
text: Couldn’t have found a better place to call my home gym! They’ve taken working out, made it less about my own transformation, and more about watching your new friends achieve what they never thought possible. If you are looking for a place to call home, this is it.

resp.text: Best around! Thank you Tate!! Definitely check out Brandon Tate Farm for all of your insurance needs!

name: Diana Gunn
text: 5 stars isn't enough ! Love everything about this place!

resp.text: We love you Diana!!

name: Courtney Cook
text: I love the family-friendly atmosphere and the wonderful coaches at CFPC. Hands down the best gym ever!

resp.text: Thank you Courtney! We love seeing your smiling face everyday in our Reboot program!! Thank you for everything and keep up the good work!

name: Bryan D
text: It's a friendly place with great coaches who are happy to help you improve your workout goals!

resp.text: Thank you Bryan! We always appreciate the hard work you put in after a long days work!

name: Morgan Goin
text: Love this place. Great coaching and great atmosphere. They are great for beginners and veteran athletes. Coaches take care of their members and look out for their wellbeing. Definitely not a cookie cutter gym. One of a kind!

resp.text: Best PTA in Pell City!! Thank you Morgan!

name: Alaina Huey
text: Very encouraging coaches! Wonderful people here at CFPC!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Alaina! We are blessed to have you apart of our Reboot program!

name: Holly Hunter
text: Best decision ever!! I lost body fat and gained a new family! This box is very organized and professional. If you like getting serious about getting fit and strong CrossFit Pell City is for you! I highly recommend! One workout and you will be hooked!

resp.text: Holly you are incredible and are such a light to our happy family!!

name: Tori Brunson
text: CrossFit Pell City is AWESOME!!! I highly recommend them! The coaches are caring and always there for you! Everyone is so welcoming and always willing to help you!!

resp.text: Tori you rock!! Good luck with your new job!!

name: Melanie Housh
text: Great box, highly recommend.  The gym is clean and organized with ample equipment.  Coaches Braden and Andrew have created an inviting and fun atmosphere for athletes at all levels. Most importantly, I see results. I feel stronger and healthier than ever.

resp.text: You rock Mel!! Thank you for everything that you have done for CFPC!

name: Christy McGowan
text: Great atmosphere. The owner Braden is simply awesome. He really cares and you can tell he is passionate about what he does. From new members to older ones, he makes sure everyone gets the move right. I haven't joined yet, but plan too! Great location, great workout, and everyone is super friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Christy!  We truly do love what we do! We enjoyed the opportunity to train with you and look forward to working out again with you more in the future!  Thanks again Christy!

name: Logan Gaither
text: Great place to workout

resp.text: Thank you Logan!! You rock bro!!

name: Katie Boteler
text: I LOVE MY CROSSFIT! amazing coaching with daily work out that cater from head to toe! These people will quickly become your family that actually want to help you reach new goals with functional fitness for your everyday life.  No need to be scared they have basics training every Saturday and people from ALL ages and fitness levels! No contract or joining fee! Personal training and nutritional coaching. THIS PLACE WILL FEED YOUR SOUL!

resp.text: Thanks coach!! You are a rockstar!!

name: Spiffy Tiffy
text: I absolutely love this gym! We are a big family and would love for you to join us!! The coaches do a fantastic job breaking down all the movements in a way that doesn't feel intimidating at all. We have a wide variety of people from military to pregnant... from high school to great grandparent status... from college athletes to stay-at-home mom's. We all do the same workout. The coaches help us modify specifically for our individual ability and needs. With time and consistency, we all grow that ability!! Hope to see you here!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

resp.text: Thanks Tiff!!

name: daniel cochran
text: What an amazing box!  I've been in town for several months from out of state and have tried several boxes since my arrival.  Gotta say this is the BEST by far.  The athletes are amazing and the coaches are top notch!  The crossfit community is truly amazing!

resp.text: We miss you guys!! Hope all is going well in New Jersey!!

name: Christina Schiefer
text: My husband and I dropped in for a week while visiting my parents from Seattle. Braden was amazing to work with from the phone call to assess our fitness level, to coaching us each day and making us feel welcome. We’ve dropped in to a lot of CrossFit gyms across the country (and one in Italy) and have never received such instruction from a coach. Most of the time the coaches don’t spend time helping out technique because we aren’t members, but that just wasn’t the case with Braden. Can’t wait to be back! Sad this will only be a once a year drop in experience but will look forward to it each time!

resp.text: We are so thankful to have your sister with us now!! Thank you Christiana!

name: Tomi Carter
text:
My personal experience at CFPC has been AMAZING! Coach B is very knowledgeable. CrossFit may seem like an intimidating sport, that is until you walk through the door and become part of a CrossFit family.
Warning: CrossFit becomes addicting or at least it has for me! Vacations after joining CF include finding a box to drop into =)

resp.text: Thank you Tomi!  We couldn't be more proud of you and all of your hard work!  It shows!!

name: Java Squad
text: Great coaching. I knew nothing about working out before I started coming here. I learn something new with every class. I love this place!

resp.text: Thank you very much Jami!!

name: chase griffin
text: Have been at CFPC for about a month. Really loving the coaches and the community. Coaches are very helpful and encouraging. They really meet you where you at, don't leave you behind and are patient with helping you grow from a solid foundation.

resp.text: Thanks Chase!!

name: Aryn Enzor
text: I have always been the type of person to say I need to lose some weight before I go to the gym. I had seen so many fantastic things about CrossFit Pell City, a friend convinced me to try it. And since then we go 5 days a week! It is seriously the best workout I’ve had in years! Everyone makes you feel so welcome and pushes you to do your best everyday! If you’ve ever considered going, do it! Take the leap of faith, you won’t regret it! Love my crossfit family!

resp.text: Thanks Aryn!!

name: derek schiefer
text: Big thanks to this CF community. Awesome people who make you feel welcomed. We visited for a week got both an great workout and some incredible coaching.

resp.text: Thanks Derek! You guys are a blessing every time you drop in!!

name: Suzanne Price
text: Cross Fit Pell City provides amazing coaching for all levels of fitness.  Our coach is very encouraging and the environment  is not intimidating. CFPC is very welcoming to all and we have built some great friendships all while pursuing our fitness goals together. CFPC is the whole package! Come visit- you will love it!

resp.text: You’re so awesome Suzanne!! Thank you!!

name: Tech Guy
text: Braden and the team he has assembled are awesome!  I have two bulging discs in my back and afib and my back is actually starting to feel better after working out at CrossFit Pell City.  I still have to be careful and Braden and team help me with that - if they think I should not be doing something, or lifting as much weight, they let me know and/or give me a substitute option so that it will have less impact on my back.  If you live in Pell City and are looking for a great place to work out - that will push and challenge you - give CrossFit Pell City a try.  Or, if you live in, or around, Trussville - give CrossFit Trussville a chance.  The people are awesome - the workouts are awesome - and the trainers are awesome!

resp.text: Bro you rock Grant! Hope all is well!

name: Kaleb Burks
text: It’s a great place with great people who all feel like family. I love CrossFit Pell City!

resp.text: Thanks Coach!!

name: diceson duck
text: Great coach and very friendly atmosphere! Would recommend this gym to anyone pursuing better health.

resp.text: Thanks Diceson!!

name: Jennifer Burks
text: Best gym around! Great coaches and great people.

resp.text: Thanks Jen!! So thankful to have you Coaching our reboot program

name: Briana Sawyer
text: I’ve been at CFPC for a few months now and have never felt more at home. I love this gym and the coaches. It truly is a family.

resp.text: Wow!! So Cool to see how far you have come Bri!!

name: Feras Alkishawi
text: Love this place, best thing I've ever done

resp.text: Thank you Feras! Your commitment is inspiring!

name: Jason Rogers
text: Before joining Crossfit Pell City in August 2017, I had not worked out seriously for at least 6 years. I never in my life had been into weight training or what I considered before Crossfit to be "complicated movements". With the extremely helpful coaching from Braden Rayburn,  my body now has muscles visible where I didn't even know a muscle was previously. Along with the great coaching, there is an impressive atmosphere of encouragement among the other gym members, which have become like family in the last few months. This really is a place where ANYBODY can participate, be challenged, and have fun at the same time.

resp.text: Bro we miss you!!! Thanks Jason!

name: Mila Bell
text: This is the absolute best Crossfit gym ever! And, our trainer, Braden, is fantastic. The owners are followers of Christ, who are encouraging, uplifting, and loving. I’m so thankful to be apart of such an amazing Crossfit community.

resp.text: Thanks Mila!! 🤗

name: Lisa Secor
text:
Review update: Still loving CFPC!! In one year here, thanks to amazing coaching and nutrition counseling I've lost 30 lbs and gained an awesome gym family! I'm convinced anyone can do this if I can! Crossfit Pell City genuinely cares about people and helping them be better, whatever their goals are! They are also helping my teenage son get stronger as a young athlete and his results in just a few months are amazing!

I love this place! I'm having more fun than I've ever had working out before and I'm learning how to eat to fuel my body the right way for the first time in my life! If you are wondering if you can do Crossfit, you can!!! I'm already reaching goals in my first few months that I thought would take me a year at least. They are incredibly patient and will help and encourage you here to reach your goals, whatever they are. The support and encouragement you get from the people you workout with awesome as well! Come check it out!!! CrossFit Pell City!!

resp.text: Your journey has been amazing Lisa!! Keep it up!

name: Andrew Otterson
text: The environment and community of CFPC is like no other I have ever experienced.  Braden has done an incredible job advancing this culture.   The coaches I have had, Braden, Alex and Warren, spend time guiding you through all of the workouts.  Regardless of your skill level the attention they show you and motivation to improve is addictive.  They drive success into the environment of CFPC.  Everyone wants to see everyone succeed.  I knew from day one of the hand shake introductions from everyone, the first invitation for a partner WOD from a stranger to the sweaty fist bumps as everyone peeled from the floor after a WOD, I was home!  I look forward to every day with the family at CFPC!

resp.text: One of the greatest dudes on the planet!! Thank you Andy!!

name: James King
text: Crossfit has changed my life for the better in so many ways.  First, the coaches are awesome!  As a beginner, I initially felt intimidated coming in, but in no time,  I learned that Crossfit Pell City is one of the best decisions I would make in life.  The gym feels like a community.  People coming together with the same goals in mind.  The coaches help you start out at your level, and at the same time encourage and push you to meet the goals you want.  Secondly, not only does this gym help you with your workout and exercise, but they incorporate your diet into it as well.  The eight-week nutrition challenge, that started in January, gave me so much insight and knowledge surrounding my diet. The challenge has shown me the best way to manage my diet and food in-take without being controlled by food.  I would encourage anyone out there, no matter where you are in life, to give CrossFit shot.  It is the best decision you will make in life.

resp.text: Thanks Landon!! You are a beast!!

name: Niki Guin
text:
Review update: It has been a year since joining. Still the best decision I have made.

I was a member of Crossfit Trussville several years ago. I absolutely loved it but I moved and changed jobs and just could not make myself drive out of the way. Since then I have tried other gyms, working out at home, and nothing was working for me. I could not stay motivated. I was about to force myself to drive out of the way to go back to Trussville. Then the greatest thing happened, Andrew and Braden decided to open Crossfit Pell City. Working out is fun again. I see results again. This place turns into your home away from home. The members turn into family. The coaching and programming are top notch. It doesn't get any better. You will not regret dropping in for a class. There are all ages and fitness levels in every class. Don't let the name  crossfit scare you away.

resp.text: Thank you Niki!! You rock!!

name: Nancy Brewer
text: I can’t say enough good things about CFPC. I had never done crossfit before coming to CFPC and immediately fell in love with it!!  Braden is a wonderful trainer, always encouraging and motivating. There is a family-like atmosphere at CFPC that makes you look forward to working out, which is rewarded with results!!  Love my CFPC family!!

resp.text: Thank you Nancy!! We miss you!

name: stephanie martin
text: Granddaughters love it there

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie!!

name: Warren Bowman
text: Awesome atmosphere and even better coaching!!

resp.text: Thanks Warren! Always looking to improve our athletes!!

name: bobby evans
text: Great Coach, Great people, Great gym!!

resp.text: You the BEST Bobby!! Miss you!!

name: Lori Morgan
text: Love Brayden

resp.text: Aww thank you Lori!!

name: The Book Of Abby
text: The gym is super clean and the staff are amazing.

resp.text: Thank you! We really appreciate hearing that!!!

name: Juan Hernandez
text: Really good place for exercise,very clean,good service,7/24  the best my favorite gym.

name: B G
text: I like the month to month option and free training session .staff super helpful especially Heaven at gardendale loc she was great w/ my elderly dad and myself .Clean gym good equipment.

name: Benjamin Dover
text: Great gym, great people and great equipment! If you are looking for a local gym, this is it. Sign up, you won’t be sorry.

name: Cris Galang
text: This place is a joke. My husband cancelled his membership due to the pandemic and had to call his credit card company to stop this place from taking any more money disguised as "penalties". A few months later they are still sending us letters asking for more money since they can't debit his card anymore. Be careful when you cancel your membership cause this place will not make it easy for you, at all.

resp.text: Hi Cris! This doesn't sound quite right, in what you are describing. We would love to look into this further but are having troubles finding your husband in our database. Please reach out to us at customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com and we will gladly review this matter. Customer service is no joking matter to us and if he is/was a member, we would like to turn any negative experience into a positive. Thank you!

name: Nathan Luster
text: Not a bad place to work out. It's clean and open 24/7 which is great. Only negative drawback is that a lot of times people come in and and sit on work out equipment for long amounts of time while they check their phone without actually working out. Everyone's allowed to work out however they choose obviously. However, it gets a little frustrating when you want to be in and out of the gym in less than an hour but people are taking up pieces of equipment for over 15-20 minutes while they play on their phone.

resp.text: Thanks Nathan! If there's anything we can do to earn five stars, let us know! We are always striving to improve and learn how we might better serve our members.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Best gym in the Birmingham area hands down!

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! Great to hear!!

name: Tyler Tumlin
text: Clean, good selection of equipment, and awesome staff.  24 hr access so you can choose anytime you need to go

resp.text: Thanks Tyler! We greatly value having you as a member here!

name: Clay Sorensen
text: Absolutely amazing environment! The people are always so inviting. Gerard Younger is an asset to 24e! He is always excited to help! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Clay!! We are grateful to have Gerard on the 24e team!!

name: Justin Long
text: Great gym

resp.text: Thanks Justin! So glad to have you at 24e and knowing you are enjoying it! If we can earn five stars let us know! Customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: Curtis Schultz
text: Very well kept and clean. Staff is awesome and not pushy at all. Great assortment of equipment and free weights, and KBs and machines. Dumbbell go up to 150. Gym for all

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Curtis! Glad to have you at 24e!!

name: josh baty
text:
I have been a member here now for a little over 3 years and I am in there during peak hours about 4 to 5 times a week.  This place is great!! It is clean, weights and machines are well-maintained and the staff are friendly and always willing to help and to answer questions.  This place is not as intimidating as other gyms I have been to. Also they offer free classes and tanning. All in all I would say check it out if you haven't already.  Great place to
work out!!!

resp.text: Thanks Josh! We are so thankful for our wonderful members. Its a pleasure to serve you!

name: steven goodall
text: Nice facility great staff. But the place is kind of small for the amount of people that go there. Gets difficult to use equipment during peak hours and after hours you run into issues with some of the members acting like the place belongs to them only. But you can’t blame 24e for that. All in all I like the place and the staff just could be bigger.

resp.text: Hi Steven! Thanks for the review! We greatly value you as a member and appreciate this feedback.

name: David Dabbs
text: I have been a member for about 2 years. I love this gym. The staff is super helpful and extremely knowledgeable. They truly offer something for everyone. The members themselves set the gym apart from other gyms. Everybody there is so nice and courteous. I traveled a lot for work and have visited other gyms across the southeast, and this is the best...by far. Do yourself a favor and try this gym.

name: Laura Wood
text: Love it! It's clean and has friendly knowledgeable staff. Great place to go

resp.text: Thanks Laura! We're glad to have you at 24e!!

name: Gray Randall
text: Very knowledgeable staff and 24 hour availability. Cleanliness and great equipment. If you're looking for Fitness classes they have the best available and schedule to fit your busy day.

resp.text: Thank you, Gary!!

name: Jessica Lavies
text: I love 24e it has been my gym family since they opened. The staff is great and they have options for everyone! They have great group fitness classes to motivate even the newest member. My favorite gym by far.

resp.text: Hi Jessica! You are such an awesome member and we are grateful for you  -- Thank you!!

name: Cam Scott
text: Great equipment to keep you fit, good atmosphere

resp.text: Thanks Cam! So glad you are enjoying it!

name: charity hardiman
text: Up to date equipment and cardio machines.  Well maintained and clean.  Staff is Great!  I give it a big thumbs Up! 👍

name: Kris Wesley
text: The new facility is fabulous.  The staff members are very nice and helpful.  I love all the equipment and love how its all new and up to date!  The workout classes are wonderful and the teachers that teach them are so nice.  They really have a passion for their class they are teaching! If your looking for a great gym to join at a really good price this is the gym for you if you live near the Gardendale area

name: Jacob Sides
text: 24e in Gardendale is a great place to workout. They offer many different classes throughout the day that targets any type of workout from high cardio to yoga. They’ve utilized their space very well to where the gym doesn’t seemed to be cramped. The staff is always very friendly and helpful when you walk in the door. I’ve been a very happy member!

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob!! Honored to have you as a member!

name: Meredith Carter
text: I’ve been a member since 24e Gardendale  opened and it’s great! Nice staff, always clean and the machines are kept up well.

resp.text: Thanks Meredith! We are so incredibly thankful for our members and look forward to continuing to serve you on your fitness journey!!

name: Christopher Mckinney
text: Should be higher 🌟 but you suck and limited me.  Good guys operate the gym Gerard and Brent are awesome dudes.  Clean gym well operated.

resp.text: Thanks Chris! Very honored to be serving such fantastic members like you!!

name: Chuck Jaeger
text: The renovation to the building looks really good. The hard work and the wait shows the attention paid to details. All new equipment and helpful staff are much appreciated. Having a facebook presence and actually answering customer questions and emails shows the willingness of keeping the customer happy. I will  be glad to come back and give 5 stars once they demonstrate that they can continue to provide great services for the length of an annual membership!

name: Tyrus Johnson
text: Great gym the employees are very nice

name: Kurt Lange
text: Great gym. Nice equipment. Clean. Good environment. Nice staff.

name: Luke Wood
text:
Luke Wood

24e is legit. Great equipment, great well trained staff, clean and plenty of space to get a great work out. Plenty of machines, free weights and cardio equipment. I am very pleased with the service I have received. I would highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a great 24 hour work out facility.

name: N Lashes
text: All I can say is that 24e Fitness Gardendale was worth the wait! I LOVE this place! The staff is always extremely nice and helpful! Super clean and they have anything that you could possibly need in a workout facility!

name: Traci S. Rugged
text: Instagram @sorugged

name: Ashley Anderson
text: Awesome facility and the staff is great. Brett has been a huge help pointing me in the right direction to meet my firness goals

name: Lyndsey Ragland
text: As a participate and instructor I can't say enough good things about 24e. From the managers and staff, to equipment, classes and instructors it truly is a great place to workout!

name: Nick Thompson
text: Really clean and plenty of equipment to use even when it's crowded. 24/7 access is a huge plus too. I probably won't attend any of the classes, but they have a huge selection at various times to try to accommodate everyone.

name: Erica Ashford
text: State of the art equipment, really nice facility!  It would be five star, if guests were greeted with a smile and energy.

name: Gail McWilliams
text: Really enjoying the new gym and the Group Fitness classes!  The staff has been very friendly and the place looks awesome!

name: Keyton Hull
text: My favorite place to work out;  very clean and friendly

resp.text: Thanks Keyton!! Its our pleasure, and we are thankful for our members!!

name: Manny Lopez
text: Great facility, plenty of equipment and a variety of group excercise classes are available. Only complaint/suggestion would be to have sanitize stations for wiping off equipment after use.

name: Maxine Wade
text: Always clean.  Great staff.

name: Jared Lankford
text: This place is super nice, very clean, and the staff is very professional. Actually about to head there right now!

name: Jared Lankford
text: This place is super nice, very clean, and the staff is very professional. Actually about to head there right now!

name: Owen Finley
text:
I have been with the Group Fitness Staff for 2 years and when I found out they were going to the new gym 24e, I went and signed up that day. The new staff plus all the Group Fitness Staff are all amazing. I love that gym. It is the best thing that could ever happen in Gardendale. iF YOU HAVENT JOINED, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING ON? I have a free pass if you want to try it out. Everyday is exciting at 24e Gardendale.

Thank you to everyone that had a part in making 24e happen!!

Jeff Finley

name: Roy Jones
text: Great gym great staff and clean

name: Sonya Franklin
text: Clean, nice staff and great equipment

name: Austin
text: Scamming people is immoral and fraudulent.

resp.text: Hi Austin! We see where you were a member back in 2016, but ran into an issue with your account. We'd love to work with you, get you back into the club, and help you reach your fitness goals. If we can be of assistance, please email us at customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: Lauren Faustmann
text: The don't have wifi when the manager is not working so unless you like staring at black walls don't join!

name: Gary Grimes
text: Doing a great job and service for the community

name: Sheena that girl Howard
text: My family reunion  was there enjoyed it

name: John Venegoni
text: This is a locally owned and operated gym. The staff is first class  and looks out for their members. You will quickly become family here and learn a great martial art/ self defense system. Great for parents and children.

resp.text: Thank you John.  We are glad to have you as part of the family.

name: Logan Mays
text: January 2019, I entered BJJ as a gift from my parents. Through my time here, I have acquired life changing confidence about myself and have met a lot of great people and formed friendships for many years to come. Coming to the gym each week is equally as fun as it is skill building for a sport I have come to love.

resp.text: Thank you Logan.  It has been our pleasure to see you grow into a strong young man.  Keep up the hard work.

name: Mike Y
text: Great place to train and get a good workout.  The instructors here really know what they are doing, and they provide a fun comfortable enviroment to learn.  I would highly suggest giving it a chance if you are interested!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Tracy Thomas
text: A welcoming, professional environment, a great program for kids!   They do a great job of making them work hard without them knowing they are working.  It’s a fun, controlled environment for them to learn Jiu Jitsu and discipline.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are so glad to have you as part of our family here at GB Greystone. We look forward to all that the future has for you as you embark on your jiujitsu journey!

name: M R
text: I cannot say enough good things about this gym. Everything about it is very positive; from the staff to the facility itself. The mats, bathrooms, changing rooms are very clean and I have no qualms about either me or my children rolling around. The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable without any egos or aloofness. My family and I felt welcomed from the moment we walked in. This gym is great for everyone. Got young kids? It's for you. Are you a woman worried about rolling with men? There are plenty of women there and they also hold women only nights. Are you older and out of shape? There are plenty of older folks and you can go at your own pace. Whether your goal is exercise, self-defence, or you just want to have fun, this gym is for you. I'd give it more than five stars if that was an option.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really appreciate all of the kind words.

name: sheridan park
text: Great place for your whole family!! We are a family of four and our kids love the Professors and Coaches!! Very encouraging atmosphere! You just feel at home!! The support you receive from the staff and fellow practitioners is enough to make you never want to leave! Could not say enough great things about this place! Highly highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Sheridan. It really means a lot to us. We are so happy to have you guys as a part of our gym family!

name: Zac Ronk
text: Fantastic gym for BJJ of all levels. Quality professors who are flexible enough to teach at different speeds and understand your goals. Everyone is incredibly friendly, so expect to be welcomed by a lot of people. If you're considering it, do yourself a favor and come in.

resp.text: Thanks so much Zac! Keep up the good work!

name: charles hayden
text: Joining Gracie Barra has changed my life. Way better than a gym membership. I’ve lost over 40 lbs and my wife loves the transformation, both physical and emotional. If you’re looking to get your life and health back I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and thank you for all of the medals you have won for Gracie Barra over the last year.  Keep it up.  With your work ethic you will go far.

name: Jeremiah Davis
text: I’ve tried different workout systems and big box gyms over the years but NOTHING compares to GBBJJ. The one on one coaching (or professoring?) is my favorite part and what makes Gracie Barra stand out for me. From the second you walk in the door it feels like a big family.  I came in with 0 experience but every class is structured with all skill levels in mind and not once have I felt intimidated or out of place.  I strongly urge anyone who is hesitant to just take one class, you’ll be hooked before it ends.

resp.text: Thank you Jeremiah!

name: Dennis Healy
text: If you’ve ever wanted to study martial arts Gracie Barra is the place for you. Immaculately clean facility with a family atmosphere and top notch instruction.

resp.text: Thanks so much Dennis! We try our best to make our gym as welcoming as possible. However, it's the friendships and family that create the positive atmosphere we have today.

name: Colby Dobbins
text: Great staff! Great instruction! Great for kids and adults!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Sam Riley
text: This is one of the best places to teach your kids, or adults confidence, strength, and flexibility with Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. Professor Frank, Coach Juliana, and Coach Kim, among others, are some of the best leaders in the industry. You cannot go wrong with Gracie Barra Alabama and the Greystone location.  I highly recommend this group!

resp.text: Thank you Sam.  We are super proud of you for losing 23 lbs in your first two months.  I'm glad you finally took the leap and moved from watching your daughter train, to training with her.  We enjoy having both of you in class.

name: Lisa Marie
text: I LOVE my Gracie Barra Greystone  jiujitsu gym! I’ve learned so much from the focused attention. After a hard day, I know that training jiujitsu will relax me. We have more females training jiujitsu than ever before and women’s training class is filled with laughter and great training partners. Professor Frank and Coaches Kim and Juliana have built a family here at the gym and I’m thankful to be part of this growing crew!

resp.text: Thanks so much Lisa! You're doing a fantastic job, it's great to see how much you've progressed.

name: Kirk Knudsen
text: Very clean gym,  with a welcoming atmosphere,  very skilled and professional staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are so glad you enjoyed our facility!

name: Void Boido
text: Great place right now i'm doing a sample class but I already love it

resp.text: Great to hear! Thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Amie Rivera
text: My son plays football here.

name: Larry Hensley
text: Nice Baseball Fields. Plenty of Batting Cages. No pitching machines though. Took my son out to practice before his tryout and the fields were in good shape even during the week.

name: Jaime Sallis
text: Very nice ball field.  We were a visiting team.

name: hendriks family
text: Awesome place for kids! Good concession, clean bathroom, adequate seating, parking, etc. We go to alot of sports type places. This one is one of the better

name: tsm rodney Edwards
text:
(Translated by Google) Go Hazel No Trojans

(Original)
Go Hazel Geen Trojans

name: Jonathan Staples
text: As a full time student at JSU, I have come to enjoy the rec center! Ever since I started going I have found more to do every time. Between the rock climbing wall, the game center , the workout rooms , the treadmill and fitness equipment, and the pool there so so much more to do. Overall, everyone here is friendly and the people working here will motivate you to achieve your goals!

name: Art Of Valor
text: Very nice state of the art facility!

name: Joe Wingard
text:
Here's the pros and cons. I'll start with pros:
Very beautiful inside. Spacious. Huge rock climbing wall about 3 stories tall. Barista. Friendly staff.
Very clean facility. No start up fees. Nice indoor walking track. Basketball courts. Exercise classes classes such as zumba, spin, and others. Tons of cardio things treadmills, etc.

Cons: The workout equipment is spread out all over in various nooks and crannies and different rooms causing you to have to search for equipment to work different muscle groups. Would be great if machines were more centrally located. Perhaps it's done this way because of covid 19? Also this place is very expensive compared to comparable gyms. $47 per month. Ouch! If you're alumni the price drops to $42. Still too high. I guess that's why there's no start up fee. Also, hours of operation are a bit strange to me. If you want to work out on Saturday morning, you have to wait till 10 a.m. when they open.

name: Robert Amberson
text: Nice place.

name: Avery Whitecotton
text: State-of-the-art facility. If you are eligible for a membership, I highly recommend this place.

name: General Chaos
text: Well done facility

name: Trips Riley
text: Amazing Staff!!

name: Bird Mooney
text: The times are wonky

name: Shannon Magers McNamee
text:
I attended the Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp For Women several years ago and loved every minute of it. I stopped attending because of a move to Birmingham. (I’m hoping one day Joe and his family will relocate! :0) ) I never found a great boot camp in Birmingham and ended up joining a gym, but never felt the support and accountability I did while attending HABC. After the pandemic hit, I didn’t feel comfortable going back to the gym and still don’t. Luckily I saw one of Joe’s posts about his online workouts and I signed up right away. I love these online workouts! They are 30 minutes, 4 times a week and so thorough. I feel like I get a great overall workout. Joe takes the time to explain each exercise to make sure you are doing it correctly and gives options for all fitness levels. He also checks in with you to offer support and answer any questions you may have.
If you are looking for a fresh, healthy start - contact Joe today. He’s got a program that will be able to help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Shannon! I'm very grateful to have the opportunity to work with you again.

name: Claire Aiello
text:
I love Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women. I've been going for several years, and it's given me a whole new outlook on life, health, and exercise. Joe Martin is positive, upbeat, and has a daily joke for us (we sometimes laugh) - but the important part is, he keeps us motivated and we motivate each other.

If you don't have your health, you don't have anything. Really! You have to take time for yourself and keep fit.  Or you can't take care of anyone else. Take this time out for yourself -- you are worth it!

Also, if you're hesitant to join because you might think the class is like a "military-style" boot camp, it's not. It is doable and fun.  Every day is different. You'll make some of the best friends, too.  We all support each other -- come join us!

resp.text: Thank you so much Claire! I am now going to hire you to do my marketing :) Because you nailed it! Lift each other up, offer encouragement, and move forward together.

name: Hillary Dunham
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is absolutely a breath of fresh air for workout plans. If you want to be surrounding with people who are real, funny, encouraging and kind, this is the best place for you! Joe will always  bring relentless positivity and constantly offer different ways to keep your body moving. No crazy diets, no fads, just simple and effective ways to keep moving without feeling bad about whatever place you are currently in. You will not regret any time spend at Boot Camp with friends and with Joe. It's a great investment in yourself and I'm so glad I made it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary! When gingers combine forces amazing things happen :)

name: Kari Fox
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is the best! It’s is well suited for any age woman of any fitness level. Joe offers many convenient times, he is great at keeping me motivated and he is loads of fun! I’ve been participating for a year and can definitely tell a difference in my muscle tone and energy level. I highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kari, I appreciate you!

name: Elizabeth Riggle
text: I came across information on Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp & Joe Martin at a time when I was frustrated and stressed with changes that Covid had created in my life.  I was eating my way through it & not exercising.  I decided to give the program a try.  Great decision!  Joe offers virtual workouts which is great.  He does them live, but also sends you a link, so you can do them at a time that is convenient for you.  You have no excuse not to do the workout.  He designs workouts for all fitness levels.  He demonstrates options for the exercises for beginners to those wanting a challenge.  In the past I would get bored exercising & end up quitting, especially at holiday time until this year.  I started in June & have stuck with it.  Joe is a wonderful coach who truly cares & wants to help you become a healthier & happier you.  He sends several emails a week filled with encouragement & motivation.  If you are struggling let him know & he will work with you.  He is always willing to answer questions about nutrition & exercise.

resp.text: What an awesome review Elizabeth, I am blown away! Thank you so much

name: Magen Sanders
text: In the past have been guilty of never sticking with a program or workout. However, with Joe's boot camp I have stayed inspired! Everyday is a different workout that keeps my body from getting too fatigued and my mind alert. The ladies at the classes should also be noted as welcoming and great proof that this is an uplifting community of people who care about health and well being. Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you so much Magen! And you nailed it. The ladies in the class are what separates us from other gyms. Stronger together, all are welcome!

name: Annie Phillips
text: I have been attending HABC for about a year and a half, and it is one of the best things I have ever done, both for my physical and my mental health. Joe Martin leads us through our exercise with warmth and fun and fellowship. If you can't do a certain exercise the traditional way, he offers alternatives for your needs. I have met so many wonderful women who I call friends, and Joe is a dear friend now too. Do something life-giving for yourself in 2021 and join us!

resp.text: The gift that keeps on giving! Like the Jelly of the Month Club :) Thank you so much for the kinds words Annie, it is definitely more than just an exercise class.

name: Amy Slamp
text: If you are woman looking for a great place to work out with other women and a fun and inspiring leader, this is the place for you.  Joe Martin makes  doing a workout at 5:30 am something you want to get up for.  I have developed some great friends I would not have gotten to know otherwise, and every day Joe shares a funny "Dad" joke so what better way to start your day.

resp.text: So grateful you are a part of the HABC Family Amy!

name: Patti Blacklock
text: Joe Martin's Huntsville Adventure Book Camp for Women is a great option for women of all fitness levels to get in shape physically and nutritionally. The boot camps are fun and challenging, and Joe, along with my fellow boot camps, offer encouragement and motivation that keeps me working toward my fitness and nutrition goals so that I am as healthy as I can be.

resp.text: Thank you, Patti it has been awesome having the opportunity to work with you for so long. Here's to many more years together!

name: Donna Van Berkom
text: Joe is an excellent trainer.  He gives various options depending on your workout level.  Exercises are geared towards total body workouts, balance and cardio.   Joe helps you set your goals and meet them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for being a part of the Adventure Boot Camp family DVB! I'm so glad I get to work with you again even if we can't meet face to face.

name: Joy Wiseman
text: Changing lives one burpee at a time! Seriously the most fun workouts I have ever done! Joe is motivating and the other ladies very supportive. You will not regret joining, even with squats and burpees... 5 more seconds and funny dad jokes!

resp.text: Thank you so much Joy! Burpees have been banned by the CDC, so we should be ok going forward :)

name: Chelsea Bell
text: I’ve lost 50lbs in 7 months following Joe’s program! Huntsville Adventure Bootcamp provides me an effective program, tips/tricks for changing my bad habits and I actually look forward to working out every day.

resp.text: So proud you Chelsea! You have done amazing and you continue to get better. Keep up the great work!

name: amy burnette
text: I have been going to Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp, for over a year now and by far the best place to workout for women. The atmosphere is so welcoming, supportive, encouraging, motivating, and positive. The workouts are always different, so you never get bored and have something to look forward to each time. Your fitness level doesn't matter, Joe incorporates a way for all to benefit whether your just beginning your journey or needing a challenge. I drive over thirty minutes one way to attend and love every minute of Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp. HABC is not like other gyms, in that it gives you a sense of family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! I'm so proud of how far you've come since you started. You are a rock star!

name: Kristine Maness
text: It’s more than a great workout. It’s a great support system. I’ve met some of my closest friends here. Joe is the BEST cheerleader/trainer. He encourages and supports us in everything, both inside and outside of class. Can’t imagine not having HABC as part of my life.

resp.text: You just pretty much wrote out my mission statement for me! Thank you so much, I can't imagine HABC without you.

name: Wendy Smythe
text: HABC is a great place to workout and make life long friends.  Joe always has a positive and encouraging attitude and philosophy and gladly welcomes all who strive to get healthy and feel better.  Exercises and programs can be adapted to meet individual needs that provide results for everyone who participates.  I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wendy, I really appreciate the kind words! All are welcome at the house of awesome :)

name: Gay Schill
text: Joe got me moving again!   Great workouts understands limitations and works with you.  I could barely get up off the floor now i am getting stronger day by day and was able to get up today after only a week without so much pain.  So thankful I have found him!

resp.text: I'm so thankful you started too! Stronger every day :)

name: Claudinette Purifoy-Fears
text: One of the best decisions I ever made. The workouts can be modified to accommodate fitness level. Love working out in the company of positive and uplifting women. Going on year 9!

resp.text: Thank you Claudinette! I really appreciate your loyalty and commitment after all these years. You are awesome!

name: Laura Lynn Hardy
text: Very welcoming atmosphere! Structured workouts that can be varied to your ability and strength level. Joe is a great coach and motivator. I've kicked things up for myself in a way that I would not do on my own at a gym.

resp.text: Thank you so much Laura Lynn! Keep up the great work.

name: Jess R
text: Just beginning but so far HABC has been great. Great workouts that aren’t daunting, no high pressure to be perfect or already in great shape, customizes each exercise to benefit ladies at all fitness levels, friendly environment. I can feel it working already. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jess, so glad you started coming!

name: Leigh Holeman
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women is awesome! Joe is a good leader who really cares about you. The workouts are excellent, and are always new and different - you won't get bored here! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much No E! So glad you are part of the HABC family.

name: Tory Green
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women has been a real game changer for me.  Joe is a patient and kind trainer who actually makes exercise fun.  I have made life-long friends in this class as well.  Sign up!  You won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tory! Life-long friends and buffness. What more could you ask for? :)

name: Cairenn Martin
text: Women of all ages can benefit from Adventure Boot Camp.  Joe makes exercising fun! He is also very knowledgeable about physical fitness so his sessions are well balanced for strength and cardio. I highly recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I hear the owner's mom is the BEST.

name: Ashley Gray
text: HABC is the only exercise program I have stuck with and actually look forward to going to! Joe is the best coach! He offers a variety workouts for all fitness levels, and believe it or not makes the workout FUN! If you enjoy hanging out with a group of women (and one man) who are getting up before the sun or showing up after a long day because they are motivated to just be better, HABC is where you belong!

resp.text: You guys make it fun for me! I take it as a huge honor that people take an hour out of their day to spend at HABC. And I hear people there wear the coolest shirts.

name: Deborah Holt
text: I absolutely love this exercise program. Joe Martin is an incredible person who truly enjoys helping others with exercise and making the healthier food choices; and his daily jokes are hysterical.

resp.text: I am blessed to be able to do what I do for a living. I love it! And thank you for recognizing the hilarity of the jokes, I work really hard on them :)

name: Laurali Hollister
text: I am a big fan of Joe's bootcamp.  His knowledge keeps you exercising no matter what kind of issue you might have.  You control how strenuous you want to work out and there's lots of laughter, fun and encouragement from your fellow bootcampers.  When I can be consistent I'm in great physical shape.

resp.text: So glad to have you back Laurali! You're a big part of making that laughter happen. And not just because you talk to yourself :)

name: Ashley DeHaye
text: Joe works hard to keep fitness accessible and make workouts not boring. He also genuinely cares about the people he works with and will always go the extra mile to make sure they are successful.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! I really appreciate you being part of the HABC family.

name: Wendy Hnetynka
text: Coach Joe Martin is truly committed to the overall fitness and well-being of his boot campers. The atmosphere is always fun, friendly and encouraging. The workout routines are never repetitive. They are designed to encourage consistent participation by keeping you entertained and motivated. Great music, friendships and even a joke of the day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Wendy, you are awesome!

name: Elena Aiello
text: Fantastic program! I've been doing this for a year and it's changed my life for the better. It's changed my view on exercise/fitness - which should be fun, not something you dread. Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is fun - I look forward to going every day. Joe Martin makes it different and challenging. No day is ever the same. He's the best -- and the ladies are wonderful. We all support each other and you do things at your level. If you feel like challenging yourself, go for it. Joe will give you different levels to try for each exercise. He's awesome and very supportive. You will be supported by everyone there.

resp.text: Thank you so much! You nailed a lot of the things I hold near and dear to my heart about boot camp. We are family!

name: Susan Presley
text: Joe is a great motivator and even starts each class off with a joke. He keeps the classes fun.

resp.text: Thank you so much Susan! And the joke is ALWAYS hilarious.

name: Mary Ottman - Leadership Speaker & Certified Coach
text: Joe is a fantastic trainer.  I couldn't do one ONE push-up when I started, and he never made me feel like I was "behind" the rest of the class.  He is always super supportive and has a wealth of knowledge and ways to modify exercises to your skill level.  Newbies train next to serious exercisers, and everybody feels like they are part of his tribe.  His wife and his mom both come to some of the classes too, and that makes it a cool family vibe.  He plays great music and he is always super positive.  In addition, he lets us know about local exercise events and we have the opportunity to be part of his team, helping the community, i.e. the Liz Hurley 5K.  Everyone is welcome to join in.  Another huge plus is that the ladies in the classes are SO friendly and supportive!! It truly is a tribe of supportive women (and Joe!) who want to be the best versions of themselves! I couldn't recommend this boot camp any higher! It is awesome!!! 💗💕💖💗💕💖

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary! It was your hard work that made it happen. Proud to call you my friend!

name: Donna Baughn
text: I didn’t know what to expect when I signed up for a month of boot camp. After not exercising for years I was not in any shape to flip tires or push a sled. But that wasn’t what it was like at all. Joe gives me modified versions of the exercise when I need it based on my fitness level. I never feel like I can’t do something but I am amazed daily at how much more I can do since starting boot camp. Best part is that exercise is now part of my daily life and I look forward to boot camp each and every day because each day is different.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Donna! I can't imagine having class without you now, you rock star you.

name: Marie Ferguson
text: Don't let the words "Boot Camp" scare you.  It's fun, challenging, inspiring and just an all around good time.  You will meet an amazing group of women who will do anything to keep you and each other motivated.  They make me laugh every day.  Joe scales the work outs for every level of fitness.  When I first started I couldn't imagine how everyone was doing the exercises and carrying on a conversation, now I'm cutting up as much as anyone.  Probably the most fun you can legally have at 5:30 in the morning.  Give a try, you might just love it!!

resp.text: You are a big part of why it is fun and inspirational Marie, so glad you are a part of the boot camp family!

name: Erina at Work
text: You will not find a nicer, more dedicated fitness coach than Joe Martin and these boot camp sessions are not only very effective but they are a lot of fun. Joe is truly committed to helping women meet their health and fitness goals but he understands it's important to do it with humor and humility.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina! It is always fun to work with you.

name: Heather Thacker
text: If you want to get stronger, leaner, feel better AND laugh your head off, this boot camp is for you.  Joe Martin is the leader of this crew and is the best in his field.  All ages and sizes were in my classes and everyone loved it!

resp.text: Thank you Heather, that is very kind of you!

name: Jessica Burton
text: Joe is amazing! He genuinely cares about everyone! His workouts are always different and creative. His jokes are great too!! I definitely would recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica, so glad you are a part of the HABC family!

name: Crystal Hanson
text: I began hoping to complete a month. 18 months later I'm still at it! I've been encouraged, cheered for, welcomed at whatever fitness level I am at. If I'm absent, I'm missed. I've never had more fun getting healthy! I love this program! And Joe is one of a kind!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! It has been awesome seeing you continue to improve, actually enjoy exercise, and learn more about music from you :) Keep up the great work!

name: Kimberly Widner
text: Best health decision I have ever made! Joe has created an environment that is welcoming, supportive and challenging. I have never enjoyed exercising but Joe makes it fun!

resp.text: I'm so thankful for your review Kim! That is my goal in life, to get people enjoying exercise. Thank you for being a part of the HABC family!

name: Becky Phillips
text: Best decision Ive made regarding my health! Its a go at your own pace class in a group setting.  Everyone is so encouraging and fun to be around.  Joe Martin is a great instructor, always switching things up and keeps it fresh and always good for a laugh.  Thank you Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! You have done and continue to do amazing. Grateful to have you as a client!

name: Joanne Long
text: Fun, fabulous and uplifting. Getting healthy and making friends at the same time, completely non threatening since it's all women of different ages shapes and sizes, except Joe of course, but he came to the dark side a long time ago and can easily manage to not lose his cool when talking about sweaty female parts!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Joanne! I think...

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Joe is the best!  Very motivating and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you so much Patty, you are awesome!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: If you are looking for a great fitness option, then Joe Martin and his team at Adventure Bootcamp is the right place to go.  I have been involved in several of his workouts and know that they are not only effective and fun, but also easy to jump into at every level.  Highly recommend you check out his website or call Joe Martin to get signed up.

resp.text: Thank you Dr. Porter, really appreciate the kind words!

name: Leigh Anne McMahon
text: HABC offers up an inclusive and safe environment for women on all fitness levels and ages to get up, get moving, get stronger, get results.  Joe's program has made all the difference for me, helping me get leaner and making me a much stronger runner.  He is relentlessly positive and does an excellent job of keeping things fresh and interesting.  You won't meet a better group of women to exercise with and get support from either.  Five stars, without a doubt!

resp.text: Thank you so much LA! You're the bee's knees :)

name: Marie Held
text: Wonderful way to get your daily exercise in.

resp.text: Thank you Marie, so glad you are a part of that daily exercise!

name: Erina Galloway
text: If you don't like going to the gym (me) and really enjoy being outside (me) this is the boot camp for you. It's fun without losing the challenge of getting in shape. You are driven and pushed but through laughter and motivation, not just from the fearless leader (Joe) but the many amazing people you will encounter.  Do yourself a favor and try it out, you won't regret it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina, you are awesome!

name: Brianne Oleson
text: Fun and great place to get your workout on!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brianne, so glad you are a part of the boot camp fam!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Want to change your way of working out? Come to HABC with Joe Martin! It is a fun and effective workout - just show up, do what Joe says (if you can hear him over the gossip and giggling - LOL) and give it all you got. Wonderful group of ladies and Joe's got jokes!

resp.text: The jokes are so hilarious! I can't stress enough how hilarious they are. Thank you so much Nancy, you are a rock star.

name: Monica Sanford
text: Joe is amazing!  His classes are fun but you still get a great workout.  If you're sitting in the fence and wonder if you should try HABC...wonder no more.  Just do it!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 start review Monica! And that is great advice for getting started with HABC.

name: Vickie Blacklock
text: Get to exercise with old friends and new. Diverse and challenging workouts that are different everyday. Great for mind, body and soul! Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Vickie!

name: Aquita Wherry
text: Great motivator! Work outs are fun whether indoors or out.  Great knowledge and great fun

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Aquita!

name: Kellie Andrews
text: Joe Martin creates a challenging workout experience with fun and encouragement and new friends. If anything is holding you back from getting healthy, you should give Boot Camp a try. It's a party with friends where you get fit!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kellie! I really like your description of our classes  too :)

name: Jade Gann
text: Joe is awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jade! Takes awesome to know awesome.

name: Sherri Stroud
text: Joining an exercise program can be daunting, joining a "Boot Camp" is terrifying...until you find Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!  Joe Martin is more than a boot camp instructor, he is a personal trainer, nutritionist and a friend to all his clients. He offers a program that suits all fitness levels and all age ranges and somehow manages to be crazy fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherri! Exercise doesn't have to be misersable to be effective. Looking forward to more awesome with you in the future!

name: Eula Pugh
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is a great place to get into shape, loose weight and be around encouraging women while you are on your healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: So proud of how far you have come Eula, you are doing awesome!

name: Vicky Mathis
text: Fun and exciting workout that doesn't feel like work at all - until you feel the burn later!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Vicky!

name: Rena Strange
text: Awesome Boot Camp!  Great atmosphere, professional support, fun way to get in shape.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Rena!

name: Marcie Lewis
text: I have been doing boot camp for 10 years and I cannot say enough about how much I love it!

resp.text: Boot Camp OG! So glad you are still coming after all these years :)

name: Amanda Pope
text: Such a great way to workout - it is FUN, not work!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amanda! Exercise doesn't have to be miserable, so glad you enjoyed the workouts.

name: Jeramie Battle
text: I aim for health, stability, & progress. Let's Work💪🏾❗

name: Jerry Hopkins
text: Best gym in Huntsville always make it really clean well maintained great equipment and staff I've been going there for 3 years love you the whole time

resp.text: Thank you Jerry! We love having you train with us!

name: Javier Mayorga
text: The gym is aight. Close enough to home I can make it work. Equipment is not top notch but they definitely get the job done.

name: Shawn Haseltine
text: Cindy at the front desk is a delight. The gym  is very bright and comfortable to work out in.

name: Michael Albright
text: Great gym everything u need for a good workout and not to crowded ever

name: Dusty Wade
text: If anyone is looking for a new gym - This is a great place! Clean. Great staff. And the members there are nice and considerate. The owner is very understanding when it comes to any issues regarding your contract. For an example, I expect to have surgery in the next few weeks, I reached out to the owner and he gladly froze my account until I am fully rehabilitated. I couldn't say enough about this gym and how awesome it is! It offers training and supplements, and any questions you have about the equipment is quickly answered by one of the employees on schedule. It is not for the Planet Fitness BooHoos! So, get in there and throw some weight around!

name: John Stallions
text: Best gym around and their prices can't be better.  Always looks brand new and the staff is like family.  I would give an extra star if i could. 6 stars!

resp.text: Thank for the review John! Always good to know we’re doing good! See you in the gym!

name: jessica rodriguez
text: Super friendly staff! 24/7 access! Has everything I need and more!

name: Phillip Henderson
text: Great equipment! Never overcrowded. Needs to work harder at their cleaning of the place and equipment though. But overall a great gym... especially for the price

resp.text: Phillip, it's great you're enjoying our equipment and have plenty of space to work out. We want our members to exercise in a clean, comfortable environment though, so I appreciate your feedback on that. Thanks for leaving us the review! -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: A Ziak
text: Benders is not just a gym, it’s a place where you can connect with people, feel comfortable, and be held accountable. It’s friendly and caring staff as well as their reasonable price makes going to the gym fun and affordable.The staff knows it’s members by name and are always willing to help. The equipment is always ready to use and works properly. The equipment, tanning beds, restrooms, and facility are always extremely clean. They have a wonderful selection of work out equipment and tanning beds as well as a newly added hydro massage chair. I am so thankful to be a part of the Bender’s gym family and would highly recommend this gym to everyone.

name: Alexa Perez
text: The owners are great people and the gym is always clean and never too crowded to do what I want!

name: Shanida Bernal
text: I have never been to a gym that has such a friendly staff that were so knowledgeable.  I cannot wait until they reopen.

name: O. Friedman
text:
OCD - Germaphobe’s Best Choice for Anderson Hills Community - Huntsville, AL. Thanks for a clean, friendly, work out experience.

Doc Olivia P. Friedman - American Business Woman/Philanthropist, Court Mediator

resp.text: Thanks Doc! We strive to keep our facilities as clean as possible! We’re glad to offer a place you don’t have to worry about germs and can focus on your workout!

name: Brian Stephens
text: Reasonable prices, especially if you are traveling. It has all equipment and a turf needed for functional fitness training and platforms forms for oly lifts. Used this place over the last 60+ days and will use it again when I return.

resp.text: Brian, it's awesome to have your support! I'm happy to hear you're a fan of everything we have to offer. We look forward to the next time you make it our way. Safe travels! -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: Eva Koeper
text: Cindy  (on the front desk) always keeps the gym at a temp that is older people can tolerate.  She also changes the music when she comes in to accommodate those of us who don't enjoy today's style. Very friendly sweet person. And Whitney keeps everything so clean, no matter what the overnight crew did. Great morning crew!!

name: Aaron Guise
text: Great atmosphere!! I really love this place. Two thumbs up!

resp.text: Aaron, I'm glad you are enjoying the atmosphere, we want this to be a place you can always enjoy and feel welcome so its nice to hear we're doing a good job! We If there's anything you need, don't hesitate to let us know. -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: Scott Silcox
text: Benders has been and continues to be a great gym! I made a New Years decision 3yrs ago and I’m still with it. I’ve met some great people along the way,  I have the staff and ease of location to thank.

name: Austin Williams
text: Great Staff!!! Weights a plenty! No lunk alarms!

name: Chuck Reid
text: I used to be a member at powerhouse but that place was too crowded and I had to cut across three lanes getting off the highway to hope I got there without sideswiping someone.This is by far the cleanest gym I've ever been to. The staff is very nice and down to earth. They also have a pretty awesome selection of supplements and a place to go tan. It's a one stop shop!

name: Austin Williams
text: Great Staff!!! Weights a plenty! No lunk alarms!

name: Colby Stewart
text: Benders has great equipment and the staff is amazing. All of their equipment is practically brand new and many different selections. Great gym!!

name: Edwin Reyes
text: Amazing experience and awesome people! The equipment is in great shape and I can always get a great workout in!! And the management is the best!!!

name: Cynthia O'Connor
text: There is rules posted on the wall in the gym about clothing being on, but yet there is a guy that is constantly working out without his shirt on and the owner says nothing to him about it.

name: Dawn Cangelosi
text: They are easy to use,  it was nice when phil worked the front desk but he has since move on to a different job.  Newly remodeled and clean.

name: DiajaBee
text: facility is great , but the way they handle things ( which they dont ) is horrible.  I have never had to deal with anything like this especially for a "gym" ..The people they go through for automatic payments HORRIBLE and LIARS. 5 months and i promise you its been a problem each month because of different things being said and turning into something different later. The last issue i was so angry i wanted to cry because no one listens and fake like they will take care of everything for you and dont.

name: Robert Grissim
text: Pretty decent gym. They keep it a little cool for my liking but that's the only bad thing I can say about it

name: Imani Jones
text: Very clean. The members and staff are super nice and helpful! Nobody judges either!!

name: Terence Houchin
text: Friendly staff, clean gym, excellent hours. What more could a gym rat want...

resp.text: Terence, we are proud to provide what "gym rats" care about most: friendly staff, cleanliness, and 24/7 open doors for our members. Thanks for letting us know we're hitting the mark! -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: Terence Houchin
text: Friendly staff, clean gym, excellent hours. What more could a gym rat want...

resp.text: Terence, we are proud to provide what "gym rats" care about most: friendly staff, cleanliness, and 24/7 open doors for our members. Thanks for letting us know we're hitting the mark! -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: Kenny Hollingsworth

name: Dustin Morell
