name: Courtney Walker
text: Horrible

resp.text: I'm surprised to see you didn't enjoy your visit to my gym, Courtney. We take pride in our clean, updated, and friendly atmosphere. If you'd like to reach out with more feedback on what happened, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: newlaty72
text: Just staying in shape

resp.text: Staying in shape is a good way to be! Feel free to reach out if there's anything you need. -Phillip R., Business Owner

name: Brian Hairston
text: This gym staffs great people!

name: Scott Moss
text: Great gym, members and staff are really friendly.

name: Junior Pruitt
text: Since Jesse has taken charge,  things have greatly improved and I'm looking forward to seeing great things at this location.

name: Corey Johnson
text: Joined this gym a few months ago and it's very convenient,  clean, and it's not a hassle to get in touch with management if I need to. Would def recommend to anyone who is looking for a more so small gym that's not too noisy and with friendly members!!

name: Sherri Wallace
text: The new manager Rodney has FIXED all of my billing issues! After trying to cancel my membership for a whole two months, the new manager has totally fixed everything, reassured me that it will never happen again & gave me a complimentary 2 free months

name: McKenzie Bates
text: One of the best gyms that's close to my house

name: Michelle Constance
text: I had a membership at Calera Snap Fitness for probably about a year. Management is very poor at communicating, taking care of equipment, and canceling your membership when requested. I canceled my membership in May of 2020 and still got billed for June, July, and August. I had to put a stop payment on my account and they changed their merchant name so they could start billing me again. I am not the only one this was done to. Since my email in May I was also contacted two other times about my membership and needing payment. I reiterated that my account should already be canceled and they proceeded to tell me it is now canceled but do not mention a word about my refund.

name: Kristina Stephens
text: This gym is horrible. If I could give it negative stars I would. Initially I had to drop by several times for someone to be there for me to join. I should have known then that this was a terrible establishment.  I've been trying to cancel my membership since March and yet I can't get in contact with anyone to do that. I've called and left voicemails and even emailed with no response. I'm simply fed up. On top of that half the machines didn't work and the cable was off half the time. Don't waste your time or money here.

name: Fabio Alnaham
text: The WORST membership you will EVER subscribe to . This is highway robbery and for many reason . The employees were rude on the first day I went to get my membership. Also I've been stuck with a membership that I've been trying to cancel for more than a year now. I have attempted EVERYTHING to try and get in contact with them to cancel it. I have left countless voicemails with all my contact information and I have not been contacted at all. I have went in person and no one was even there. The point is they take your money and avoid you at ALL costs from trying to get it cancelled. Its not just me that had this issue but two other friends as well. I highly do not recommend this gym at all . Any other gym is wayyyyy better then this. Save your money and save yourself some headaches and look somewhere else.

name: Joey Thomason
text: Purchased membership online. Have not been able to get into the gym once. Door is locked. Apparently the water has been cut off, the staff has all quit, the  phone doesn’t work, and the owner has been AWOL for months. I’ve paid for a membership and am literally unable to use it or cancel it. Going to charge back the original payment and block any future payments.

name: Anna Hopson
text: For a “24-7” gym... THEYRE NEVER OPEN!!!

name: joe cox
text: The new manager Pamela has turned this place around. We stopped going to this location while ago because it was filthy and dark. Now she has cleaned everything spotless and much brighter. She also enforces that everyone entering must be a member. Really like the new atmosphere. From 1 star to 5 star. Recommend

name: NaturalBornSpartans
text: Mis-managed hot garbage

name: janny leson
text: They will not fix broken equipment. Manager has a BAD attitude problem (a lot of people talk about this all the time). She has smart attitude with employees and its sad to act that way in front of customers. We all see it regularly. How do you even have a job lady?

name: karen tortorigi
text:
Can not recommend this location as long as the manager (Karen) is still there.
I called and spoke with her to cancel membership in May said she would.
DID NOT HAPPEN. My bank acct was charged 30.00. Called back left VM and email. NO RESPONSE. I have had issues before I cancelled of her not responding to my emails or VM said she was having trouble with emails what about VM pretty sad if cant get to the MANAGER.
I have another 30.00 charged for July so I'm trying to get my money back .
Called CORPORATE

name: Alison Boothe
text: I have only been a member since February 2018 and out of all the gyms I've been apart of I've never been treated so special as I am at this Snap Fitness.  Miss Pamela, Snap Fitness Calera, AL gym manager always says hello and makes me feel special! I have met so many nice people!  A huge thank you and appreciation to Rick Anderson, Snap Fitness Calera, AL Personal Trainer for without his guidance, positive enthusiasm, and extensive knowledge and experience i couldn't have lost the so far 40 lbs since I joined the gym in February.  The members and staff make this gym by far the best gym I've ever had the pleasure to be a part of!

name: Lindsey Davis
text:
The facility it's self is nice enough not exactly clean but its a gym....  the staff is awful, other members of the gym showed me equipment, how to use the key pass, and tanning bed.
the hours they have posted of the website mean nothing I had to call 3 times between 9 - 11 before I could get someone to answer. The women there, pamela could not answer any of my questions without asking "the guys" I assume she meant management or perhaps an owner and when I requested to cancel my membership she insisted that I come to the location. When I made her aware that it wasn't possible for me to get there or even leave my home she was persistent in finding out why as if it was any of her business and still refused to cancel my membership after calling 5 times in a month I eventually had to cancel my credit card to keep them from charging me.

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: I live it except for the darn music they play. Great selection of workout equipment, kept clean, nice employees,   and quiey. Just horrible music

name: James Jackson
text: Friendliest staff and cleanest gym you will ever visit with lots of cardio and strength training options!

name: Danny Barbee
text: I have called several times to inguire about joining. Voicemail says someone will return call within 24 hours. Never happened! Went there yesterday and only one person was there and he wouldn’t even come to the door. I guess they don’t need any more members. My guess is this place will not be in business much longer.

name: Gary Johnston
text: Nice and quiet place to work out.

name: Tommy Harris
text: Never really crowded. The work out equipment may have problems from time to time, but they do their best to fix them.

name: Melissa Martin
text: The place has went down since we join alot of stuff needs to be fixed. Ask for another key and been waiting  a month and also the workout  room has not work for a year

name: C S
text: I have been trying to cancel my membership for the past month and a half. I do not live in the area anymore and was not able to come to the location. After countless phone calls and leaving voicemail after voicemail (which prompts I will be called back within 24 hours) I finally called during the magic time to reach an employee to cancel. If you want to cancel your membership and you cannot visit the location be prepared to be charged 2 months worth of membership fees before you actually reach someone.

name: Nathan French
text: Can not get my membership cancel I have tried three times to Cancel my membership every time I go to cancel the tell me my membership is at another branch. Poor customer service all they want to do is overcharge people.  I would never recommend gym.

name: Mohamed Elnaham
text: I haven't been in calera for more than 2 months, I try to call them to cancel my member ship, or do something about it, because I'm been charged while I'm not even there, this the second month I'm been charged by this gym, every time I call they won't answer, I went there the other day to talk to someone, and there was no body at all around 11am, now I'm calling around 3pm and still no body to talk too! I need help

name: Luke Moore
text: I’ve tried multiple times to cancel my membership, each month continuously charged.

name: Nia Marie
text:
Horrible customer service they are only open about 3 hours during the day and do not answer the phone when it is business hours
I have tried to cancel my membership in October the woman I spoke to told me it was cancelled and I didn’t have to sign anything just gave her my information 3 months later and I’m still being charged and no one answers the phone I’ve contacted customer service and they haven’t answered me either

name: Dan Compton
text: One day at a time

text: Great place to workout

name: Destiny Fitch

name: Bernadette Stanley
text: Love this Gym I’m working with a Personal Trainer Evan H. He’s great give him a try... Very Professional...

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are very glad to hear you're enjoying the gym and getting great workouts with Evan!

name: Justin Ware
text:
I really appreciate how easy it is to join, but I’m also glad how easy it is to cancel..

The cardio equipment is run down along with the machines. I went twice and ended up canceling because of how old and run down the equipment is.

Equipment seemed to be clean, but there’s no way to get in a routine when there’s only one machine per muscle group.

resp.text:
I hate to lose any customers but I think you might have overlooked some equipment.
●Chest

I have 20 pieces of cardio equipment including 4 recumbent bikes, 6 treadmills, 5 ellipticals, 2 arc trainers, 1 step mill, 1 stair climber and 1 row machine. 1 treadmill is currently out of order due to a bad speed sensor which is already scheduled to be repaired.

name: AHA 1987
text: Quick Fit gym has always been my preferred gym. You absolutely can’t beat the rate, there’s plenty of equipment for all muscle groups, and Daniel, the owner, is very passionate in what he does.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. Great members make the gym and we have many of those!

name: Lara Polk
text: Nice location, really enjoying having a place close to home to work out

name: Lasandra Hall
text: Paid for personal training session it went great!

resp.text: Thanks for your review. Looking forward to helping you reach your goals!

name: Robert Holcomb
text: My to stress relief nice set up clean also

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad you're enjoying the gym!

name: Robert Howard
text: Loved the idea of being able to go whenever it was convenient for me. The facility was very clean and welcoming, and there was a lot of different equipment to choose from. The owner and trainer was onsite, very friendly, and answered all of my questions. I felt very comfortable and my first time there made for the best workout ever!

name: Mrs. Israelite Pride
text: I’ve had renown trainers in the past, but Daniel by far is the best. The fact that he incorporates cardio along with weight training is the key for my weight loss success! He’s professional and knowledgeable; he’s easygoing. I love going and throughly enjoy the workouts each time!!

resp.text: Thank you! It's a pleasure working with you. Your effort and attitude make all the difference.

name: Benita Brown
text: Truly a great place to get in shape. Atmosphere is great. The owner Daniel is a great guy. Makes himself available to his clients. My wife and love it here.

resp.text: Thank you! Very thankful for loyal members like you!

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback. Glad you're enjoying the gym!

name: Kristie Jackson
text: I love Quick Fit and Daniel! Great environment and best value!

name: Gayle Roberts
text: Quick Fit Gym is awesome! Perfect for the needs of all age groups looking to improve overall fitness. The atmosphere is family oriented, the equipment is top notch, the facility itself is clean and well maintained. The parking lot is well lit at night and there's security cameras to add to the feeling of being safe, very much a concern for a woman. If you're interested in having a personal trainer, Daniel is your man. 24 hr access 365 days a year. A great deal at $19.00 per month! I highly recommend Quick Fit Gym!

name: Alison
text: Excellent gym with excellent assortment of equipment!   Very affordable!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback! We appreciate your business!

name: Gerald crosby
text: Love it.

name: Anthony Smothers
text: I couldn't imagine working out at another gym. Daniel makes this place feel like a home away from home. I have made more personal gains in the last 4 months than I have ever had in my life at any other gym. Great people great equipment great results.. 5 stars ...

name: Tammy Phillips
text: Clean well set up

name: Tami Roper
text: I have been going to Quick fit for almost a year. Daniel has made my "getting in shape" more enjoyable. He's very knowledgeable,helpful and not to mention friendly. I look forward to working out on a daily basis at this gym. It's clean and a very friendly gym check it out! Oh and they're open 24/7/365!

name: Jonathan cook
text: Been a member at this gym for 7yrs. It has everything you need to reach your fitness goals. Always kept clean with excellent management and great personal training available.Open 24/7 So you can get your training done on any schedule. The monthly membership is the lowest around and in turn has the highest quality of equipment on the market.  Best gym in the area by far....

name: Maggie Hughes
text: Quick fit & Daniel are the best! I look forward to going to the gym because I love it so much! Daniel is the best personal trainer ever! Definitely recommend Quick Fit to anybody looking for a local, cheap, awesome gym! Can't beat $19 a month! Check it out!

name: Jacob Crocker
text: Been a member for around 4 years. Have never had a problem. If you're looking for a gym that will do all the work for you this isn't the place. Has all the equipment you need no matter where you are in your fitness journey. Free weights, cables, cardio. Clean environment, good music, security cameras, and a well lit parking lot. Professional management. 19$ a month with no long term contract. Come give it a try!

name: Anthony Burke
text: My stress reliever.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. Working out is definitely great for stress relief!

name: Jason Harris
text: Great gym! Easy to access any time of day or night. Owner is very professional and knowledgeable about how to use equipment and will help you with any questions on any machine you don't exactly know how to use. Clean gym and nice environment. Glad I found this Gym!

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text: I have been a member here now for over a year. We chose this location for the price, hands down it wins in that regard especially with no contract. But you do need to give a months warning if you are going to quit. Yes there are several broken tread mills, but over all most machines work. We usually go at night and you see the same regulars no one seems to look down on anyone else. Most of the users of this gym are friendly just what you need in a gym.

name: Jacob Wilson
text: Best gym I've been involved with in years. Daniel is a great guy and makes every gym trip feel like coming home to friends. If you are looking for a spot to get into better shape and make new friends this is definitely the place for you!  #ProudMember

name: slim sneak and things
text: 6 year member. Best gym I've ever trained at. Family environment with a professional knowledgeable owner. Equipment kept in good condition with clean restrooms. 24 hours, perfect for anybody needs.

name: Allan Higginbotham
text: Has everything I need. Never crowded. Very good price.

name: tre keahey
text: Quick Fit is a great place to come and get your sweat on! Great and personable owner, excellent equipment, and the clientele are hardworking, respectful individuals. I love this place! 💪

name: George Keyes
text: Awesome gym and great owner. Daniel is always willing to help people and answer questions. Very real guy and great environment to lift. I Always recommend quickfit

name: Allan Higginbotham
text: Has everything I need. Never crowded. Very good price.

name: Pat Coleman
text: Great workout environment, equipment well maintained and perfect location. The owner is very knowledgeable and keeps Gym very clean would recommend anyone to join this gym.

name: Jerry Parsons
text: Love working out at Quick fit gym. Daniel is there to help you in anyway.  Most 24 hr gyms you cannot find the owner but he is there to help.

name: James Fredd
text: This is the best gym I have been to, the staff is professional and helpful. They have the right equipment  and the know how to reach your goals. HIGHLY recommend.

name: Danielle Hicks
text: I love this place! There's no bells and whistles just a great place to work out whenever you want!

name: Kendra Frontine
text: The only reason why this place is even getting one star is because its the only way to write a review! DO NOT go to this gym! The equipment is broken, nothing works! The people are rude and if you try to cancel your membership you have to give them a written 30 day notice. Also you have to pay off your Balance if you have one so in other words if you don't have the finances at the moment they keep charging your card until you pay it off with a 30 day notice! Its a joke! Go to Planet fitness its cheaper, equipment actually works, and all you have to do is call to cancer membership!

name: Roxana Rothe
text: Great gym and very clean! The owner is very professional and helpful. I highly recomend this gym.

name: kevin Mcentyre
text:
I have never been to a better gym  than quick fit. Number 1 reason knowledge and respect for others.
Most others gyms have this idea that they have to cater to everyone. There is a difference in catering to people me getting them to their goals. If you want a gym where you will reach your goals this is the place to go.

One other thing is respecting the gym you go to also. It is not your personal room where you leave a mess or disrespect others by throwing weights on the floor and damaging the equipment. It's pretty hard to get thrown outbid a serious gym nowadays but these reasons are some of the most common reasons so respect the property for everyone to use

name: Noah Morgan
text:
Great gym with a variety of equipment that is open 24/7 and has excellent rates
Great place to chase some gainz

name: Charlene Gilliam
text: Clean gym and friendly atmosphere. Awesome new personal trainer Apryl coming soon.

name: Crystal Ray
text: I love the experience that I’ve had at this gym. The owner, Phillip Moody, is a delightful human being, and exceptional when it comes to his job! The customer service that you receive is the best of the best. The establishment is always CLEAN, even the bathrooms🙌🏻 When I first signed up, the owner took the time to show me around the gym, and how to use all of the equipment, etc;. He even wrote me a personalized workout regimen to help me reach my goals. Also, as a woman, I’ve always felt comfortable working out when I am there. It’s nice to feel like you don’t have people gawking over you. Anyways, I can’t say enough good things about it. All in all, it’s a win, win!💯

name: Chuck Cheatham
text: Good atmosphere.. Better Equipment! Recommended! 24Hr

name: David Nault
text: This gym has been under new ownership for a year or so now and they have done a lot of nice upgrades. It's rarely crowded and has what I need for a well rounded workout. It's also nice having the ability to use every other location when I travel.

name: Janet Watson holcomb (Jan)
text: Great place work out love it

name: Tony Kendall
text: This is a great gym! I knew nothing about the equipment or even where to begin a real work out program. I look like it too. However, in a real no judgment fashion, the owner Phillip, walked me through the equipment and put together a real personalized program for me.  I’ve been going to the gym for 8 weeks and I have increased in size and strength.  The gym is clean and well maintained, provides a variety of equipment, has friendly patrons, and the owner looks out for the interests of the members.  What more could you ask for?  You will be glad you joined this gym. I know I am!

text: let me start off with saying I don't normally write reviews but for this place I will. The gym is well kept and clean. Philip the owner of this location is awesome. text: I was home for the holidays and dropped in with this gym and the owner Phillip. The place was super clean, had everything you needed (free weights, squat racks, smith machine, cardio, small turf), and was really well priced. I asked Planet Fitness how much it would cost for me to workout for 5 days and it would've been 70 bucks. Phillip gave me a deal for 28. Great guy and great gym, it'll be my go-to whenever I'm in town

name: Trenton Fox
text: I have been heavily involved in fitness for about five years now. I have been in all styles of gyms, from resort-like college recreation centers to sub-par hotel-style gyms. Of all the gyms I've been to, Anytime Fitness-West Mobile is at the top of my list of gyms I would recommend to a complete stranger wanting to make a change in their lifestyle. Don't let the size fool you! Anytime Fitness has everything you need, from cardio equipment to free weights, kettlebells, resistance bands and more! I love the new renovations they just made in the past few weeks. The owner is one of the best in town. Of all the gyms I've been to, I have never seen a owner that is so dedicated to his consumers. From my experience, the guy is always ready to both assist and encourage other people, evidence being the fact that he spends a lot of time outside of his office. The gym is well-structured, clean, always accessible for members, and has a unique family atmosphere above any gym I have been to. In a town full of gyms, my recommendation will always be Anytime Fitness-West Mobile. 10/10 for sure!

name: April McLeod
text: What a cool gym! The staff was knowledgeable and courteous.  The facility and equipment were clean. The flexibility of hours is excellent for anyone with a busy schedule,  shift work,  etc.! Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Tim. We are glad to help our customers anytime they need us! Please let us know if there is anything we can do to keep your experience with our gym a five star! Have a great day!

name: Jason Parmer
text: After I’ve been there for 7 years this place was sold and the new owners said that they aren’t going to honor my membership price, get ready for a price increase! Sure glad there’s plenty of gyms out there!

resp.text: Jason, we are sorry we could not accommodate you, but we feel it is necessary   to explain this situation for others who might read this post. We have never, will never, and legally can not increase rates on contracted members. In this case, you paid cash up front for a 12 month membership. The only contract you signed was for the term of 12 months. A while after your membership expired, your wife contacted us in order to buy another year in cash. When we informed her of our current cash price for a 12 month membership, she decided not to purchase the membership. If a member signs a standard contract with us, their membership will draft at the original rate until that member decides to terminate their membership. We, however can not promise that our paid in full cash memberships will remain the same price as they were seven years ago. We hope that you continue on your fitness journey and wish you success in achieving your health goals in the future.

When I arrived I was only offered a single workout as opposed to the week. I was told about.

resp.text: I apologize for the experience you had at our club. This is inconsistent with our club culture. Please send me an email at mobileal@anytimefitness.com so we can get this resolved for you.

text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well. He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

name: IrixGuy's Adventure Channel
text: This is the best gym in the area.  It even trumps the old Gold’s Gym in Sheffield, that closed many years ago.  The staff are friendly and care about members and equipment.  A bolt broke on a machine and they had it repaired about five minutes later.  Access is 24x7 but it’s not like most “open all of the time” gyms where they never staff it and let the place go downhill.  The selection of machines, free weights and cardio equipment is all great and high-end.  They have TVs in the cardio area and all TVs work!  They also have an adjacent building where they host a variety of group classes.  I’m becoming less fat, as I type this review on the treadmill.  Oh, they have a free towel service too!  I hope that they keep up the great work and I don’t have to shop for a new gym again.  The monthly rate is reasonable and they don’t “lock you in.”  I could cancel at the end of any month, if I wanted to become fatter again!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Edward Melendez
text:
Iron Tribe Fitness (ITF) is a holistic CrossFit high impact cardio strength wellness gym. They have a keen Focus on their customers with Coaches that take time with each person. They dedicate themselves to learning their craft and ensure a total body workout.  They also peach a total body wellness from breakfast to snacks to dinner.  As stated today it's what you put in at the gym and kitchen that makes a healthy body.

The biggest compliment I must give is from the owner to the coaching staff they are all sincere and willing to work with you.  No matter your personal level of health or gym knowledge they will guide you.

What won me over was there Core Values. See the photos to read them. Specifically, " We connect God's blessings with Purpose."

Although they have 5 stars there are still areas for improvement.  The men's shower area could be improved.  Storage for personal belongings could also be updated. I must agree with others on the $500 deposit. If it wasn't that I already had friends going here I wouldn't have known about it until I got there. However, I see the point that they are giving up time to work with you and need some kind of guarantee that you'll be back and not wasting their time. With so many people with gym memberships that never go I get it.

Multiple photos uploaded to see the gym itself.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Edward! We appreciate it!

text: I love how supportive and encouraging everyone is!

name: Steph Wilkins
text: Iron Tribe is truly a life changing experience. From the time I was a teenager until the age of 30, I have obsessed over my weight on a scale. Iron Tribe not only taught me how to live a healthy life style, but they also coached me on how to have a healthy relationship with food. All coaches are so  encouraging and motivating. This has been a life changing experience and I am so thrilled to continue this healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: We're so thrilled by your consistent efforts and improvement! Thank you for your beautiful testimonial!

name: Kendra Creamer
text: Iron Tribe has been an awesome experience for me. I completed the 6 week challenge and am very pleased with the results that I have gotten thus far. I have lost 10% of my body fat within that 6 weeks. The meal plan and workouts are challenging but worth it. You have 2 coaches at each class helping you work on the fundamentals and encouraging you to push yourself.  They encourage you to ask questions if you are unsure of the movements and make you feel comfortable. Very welcoming staff, gym and fellow athletes.

resp.text: We're so proud of you! Thank you for the review, Kendra!

name: Carrie Cowperthwait
text: I joined Iron Tribe Madison for the 6 week challenge and had THE BEST experience! I was provided a detailed meal plan with lots of options, created specifically for me and my fitness goals. The challenge also included at least 3 workouts per week. The trainers were amazing! They were very helpful, as I had never done this type of workout before, and very encouraging/motivating. As a triathlete, I found this be to be a great off-season training opportunity. Overall, I highly recommend Iron Tribe. They more than exceeded my expectations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Carrie! We're so glad you've enjoyed your experience!

name: Cockatoo Lover AJPW
text: I have ran marathons, and done a lot of different workouts; but nothing can come close to comparing to Iron Tribe. This is more than a gym. This is tailored to your fitness goals and health needs. Nothing has ever worked better or as quickly as the six week challenge! If you want real results, this is a game changer! The meal plan, personal coaching, and accountability cannot be beat. I am hooked!

resp.text: So glad we hooked you! Thank you for the review, Jaclyn!

name: Ashley Barnes
text: Iron Tribe Fitness is a great place to workout. I recently took on a 6 week challenge for the first time. All of the coaches are awesome and very supportive. The workouts are insane, the meal plan was challenging, but it was all worth it. I got great results. It was just the right place to kickstart my fitness journey.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Ash!

name: Firuza Sidhwa
text: I had participated in the ITF 6week fitness challenge. My goal was to lose a certain % body fat during that period. I reached my goal and I feel great after this experience. I was given a meal plan and was trained to eat healthy and workout. The coaches here are awesome and always available for you. My experience with Iron Tribe has been great and I would recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Firuza!

name: Carolyn Myers
text: I'm almost through the 6 week challenge, and I couldn't be happier with the whole experience! All of the coaches are so patient and friendly; they are going to challenge you, but they will make sure you are taking care of your body, too. The accountability, the team spirit, the workouts, the meal plan- I've never been to a place like this before, and I am definitely seeing results. Definitely give it a try!

resp.text: Thanks Carolyn! We appreciate your testimonial!

name: Brett Rogers
text: Don't be fooled by any advertisement you see offering a free six week challenge. They bring you in for a consultation, ask about you and your life, your fitness goals, and then hit you with a sales pitch. Intensity, accountability, and nutrition. Then they ask you to pay 500 dollars in installments of 250 dollars. A deposit they called it, in which you get back at the end of the program, where they then probably pressure you into spending that to join the gym. I've seen the results, I know these guys mean business. Just seemed like false advertising to lure people in.

name: Melissa McCutcheon
text: Best gym. Coaches are caring and motivating. Lots a flexibility with classes to attend throughout the day. Owner truly treats you like family.

resp.text: You ARE family! Thank you for the review, Melissa!

name: Marc Labansky
text: Currently unemployed. They scammed me into coming to a 42 day free "trial" but expected a $500 deposit up front. I'm barely getting by on unemployment and they had the audacity to request payment for a "free 42 day trial". Then it's $199.99 a month afterwards to become a member. I don't appreciate being deceived like that. Even when I do find a job I'll join literally any other gym because at least I'll be able to afford food, membership, car and house expenses, etc. Plus it's not even a 24/7 gym for that much money you should be able to go whenever you want!

name: Stephen Miller
text:
Great atmosphere for success, great staff and coaches that are engaged and invested in our success.  Totally recommend giving the 6 week challenge a shot for beginners.

#6weeksITF.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stephen!

name: Bobbie Powell
text: Iron Tribe Madison has been a life changing experience.  Never in my wildest dreams would I have believed what I could accomplish in a relatively short time.  I led a very sedentary life prior to joining the Tribe but now my energy and productivity have increased exponentially.  I have belonged to other gyms and at one point many years ago had my own personal trainer.  Never did I receive the expert coaching and encouragement that I now enjoy at Iron Tribe Madison.  I can't imagine ever going back to my previous lifestyle and thank God (and my daughter) for leading me to the Tribe!!

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Bobbie!

name: Jeff Gale
text: I just had one of the best workouts of my life. Other crossfit-style gyms I've been to have been kind of shabby. This gym is clean and well organized, and the people were friendly and welcoming. The class started on time. The coaches knew their stuff and made sure I was using good form the whole time, all while pushing me just the right amount. I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Xavier Deleveaux
text: With so much information out there on fitness/ meal planning, it's difficult to find something that's right for you. I shared this challenge with Blair at the start of my six week Iron Tribe fitness journey. I went to the orientation, got my questions answered and got set up to start the program... I took the first fit test on day one... I failed the test (I didn't complete the test within the allotted timeframe). The coaches (yeah, there're coaches there every step of the way) told the class that this is a benchmark test. We will take MINUETS off our time by week three. My pride was hurt (so was my lungs, legs, and everything else), but I kept going to class. They taught me moves (they corrected some of what I thought I knew, and introduced me to a lot of new ones), encouraged me, motivated me, and kept me accountable to every rep. I took the fit test again at the end of week three and completed it in 11:42 sec (down from 17:19)! After that, denying the program was out the window. I signed up and attended classes everyday they were offered (unless I was on travel - I still completed my workouts while TDY - they have travel workouts for you). By the end of the six week trail, I lost 6% of my body fat and gained 5 lbs of muscle! The program is legit, and well worth the efforts.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Xavier! So proud of your dedication and commitment!

name: Chansamone Siharath
text: I’ve never loss this much weight in any 6 week workout/ meal plan. (20lbs)! I could have done a lot better but the work travel threw me off.  Blair, Channing and the ITF crew know their stuff.  From how to eat to the workouts- they got me fit in no time.  They will show you how to workout correctly.  I’ve learned a lot about my body during the corse of the challenge and I would recommend this for everyone looking to change their health and lifestyle.  Thanks ITF fam!

resp.text: Thank YOU for your dedication and testimonial!

name: Mason Hall
text: This is a wonderful environment to work out in. Great classes and trainers. The owner, Blair, is fantastic. They do great nutritional advice too!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Mason!

name: Eric Housh
text: The coaches are very knowledgeable and super cool. The gym is very clean and accommodating. I was particularly impressed with the individual attention and focus on safety. Would highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Myrna Littlewolf
text: Irontribe 6 week challenge is a very tough challenge for anyone that is willing to put forth the effort on making a change in their lifestyle.  The meal plan shows you can still eat great foods, just less carbs so that helped me this challenge. Also, in the plan they give you suggested recipes and most of ones I tried turned out amazing!  With Irontribe, they give two options for the workouts Power and Push (45min classes) and the coaches in each class demonstrates how to correctly perform the moves and alters you if you are doing something wrong to prevent injury. They take the time and effort to help everyone in the class and wants everyone to push themselves but safely and streches beginning and end of the class!  Had a wonderful time with the 6 week challenge, I lost about 15lbs and 7.8% body fat! I remember start of challenge some folks thought I looked like I did not have much to lose, but I feel so much better now and will continue to keep these lifestyles changes and minimal cheat meals:P If you need something different in your life and want to feel and look better personally then Irontribe is meant for you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Myrna!

name: Doug Robley
text: The coaches and athletes are extremely motivating and encouraging.  This is not an intimidating environment, all levels of fitness attend.  My personal fitness and strength has improved and my body and mind are feeling great, thanks to ITF!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kevin Richardson
text: BLAIR AND HIS TEAM ARE GREAT TRAINERS AND THIS GYM WILL HELP YOU HIT ALL YOUR FITNESS GOALS

resp.text: Thank you so much Kevin!

name: Natasha Tucker
text: I had always been intimidated with even the thought of this type of gym! It wasn't until I got fed up with my physical self, desperate for a real change, and had seen a major change in a friend who attends Iron Tribe that I decided to try Iron Tribe. Only a few months in and I am blown away!!! The coaches and fellow Tribe members are incredible! I have grown personally, have a LOT more self confidence, and can look at myself in the mirror again! If you are looking for a positive change THIS is the gym for you!

resp.text: So glad you gained more confidence, Natasha! Thank you for the review!

name: M D
text: Great coaches and well-structured training. They also do a great job of accommodating all ages and levels of fitness (from folks in their 20's to folks in their 70's). All the coaches are encouraging and motivating. It's like CrossFit without the crazy :)

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate the review!

name: Kevin Richardson
text: BLAIR AND HIS TEAM ARE GREAT TRAINERS AND THIS GYM WILL HELP YOU HIT ALL YOUR FITNESS GOALS

resp.text: Thank you so much Kevin!

name: Reggie Bell
text: Enthusiast coaching staff, different and challenging workouts everyday.  They can scale to any fitness level.  Really, any fitness level.

resp.text: Thank you Reggie! We appreciate your review!

name: Scott Weber
text: Great workout in a small group setting. Excellent coaches that can modify any workout to match an individual's fitness level.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Scott!

name: Whitney Meade
text: Great experience!  Going to continue the journey!

resp.text: So glad you did, Whitney! Thank you!

name: April Stevenson
text: I love IronTribe Madison!  Unlike some gyms in the city where it seems as if you're just another dollar sign walking in the door, the staff here REALLY cares!  They are just as invested in your fitness goals as you are, if not more so.  I had stopped being consistent with my workouts and one of the coaches stayed in contact, gave me encouragement,  and motivated me back into the gym.  The workouts are intense, but scalable to your fitness level, you learn each move in the 101 class as well as nutruition guidelines to support your new way of life.  I can't say enough about how awesome the facilities, the staff, and the IronTribe Family are and how important each component has been to my journey.  You will not regret joining the Tribe!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, April!

name: Dawson Norton
text: This Gym is Awesome !! Friendly people and awesome coaches 💪

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jenna Taylor
text: Please read review on the huntsville location.

name: Joshua Sohn
text: Excellent coaches! They are always willing to help adjust workouts for you and your own capabilities.The Madison location has made me feel like I belong, and no one, including the other members, have made me feel out of place or unwanted.

resp.text: Thank you Josh for review!  We really appreciate you entrusting us with your health and wellness needs.

name: Erin Nicholas
text: This is my favorite gym ever, it has everything I love! I've been coming here for years! Everyone is so friendly! I feel so welcome coming here! And I'm always motivated because their is lots to do! I have all the motivation I need! Patrick is a really great leader to talk to! Brock has the best group training workouts!

name: Sharise G
text: I was a member there before I moved. I made my cousin and two of my friends join because of how much I liked it.  Patrick and Mike were amazing. Patrick always spoke and asked me about my day and how things were going and would even call and check up on me. Mike's training helped me figure out how to keep things fresh. I would recommend this gym to anyone seriously looking for results and new friends.

name: Eric Ekholm
text:
Amazing facility with even better staff. I would like to thank Andrew Philen for personally guiding my fitness goals. Andrew not only helps me with the physical part but he also helps me nutritionally and is the most motivating person I think I've ever met.
Patrick Johnson made the sign up process incredibly easy and really took his time with me. I felt like he was more interested in what he could do for me than what he could get out of me for Gold's.
This place is awesome. I never thought I would be a "gym guy", but the staff really makes you feel at home and couldn't be any more accommodating.
Thanks again.

name: Victor Corder
text: Wonderful Gym. I enjoy the gym because it has everything a person need to accomplished his health goals. The Staff is very nice and polite. I like the new weights that replace the old one. The bathroom are clean also.

name: Jamie Stahler
text: This was a great location. It was spacious with plenty of machines, free weights, cardio, a spin area, baseball court and a pool. It's set back off the road a bit so you may need a map to help find it. It was clean and seemed to be on the newer side.

name: michael smith
text: Been attending this gym since it opened...great place with nice equipment, a variety of classes, and courteous & helpful staff...always nice to see Christian and Daniel.  There's a diverse group of members ranging from high school kids to the elderly, and people just getting in a quick 20 minutes to some pretty devoted fitness fanatics.  Many local individuals, couples and a few families, most of whom are regulars and friendly.  Just recently (mid-2014) got in 8 new Hammer Strength machines to compliment an excellent weight room.

name: Greg Ludwig
text: Basketball court is cool and the gym equipment is top notch. The bathrooms are really gross. Pretty good other than that.

name: Jenny Smith
text: Went here a few times with a friend. The first time was horrible, as the sales guy was very rude and stern. The second time was the complete opposite. The gym is very nice and the staff was really welcoming. The lady's locker room was well kept. The women in the daycare were great with my kids and the sales rep I met with the second time was very kind and informative and didn't hound me about joining and kept up with me for weeks after. Be sure to speak with Patrick or Daniel if you ever go to this establishment, they really seemed to care about what I wanted.

name: A Goodyear
text: Facilities are amazing.  Often too crowded, but late night is the best time to go.

name: Daniel Reinman
text: I've been to many gyms and this Gold's gym location is really good. It has a lot of the amenities I like and need. Suana, pool, indoor track, machines (relatively new), free weights, group studio, cardio machines - it has something for everyone.  It is also less crowded than many gyms I have been to, and all at a relatively good price. If something breaks, it doesn't stay that way for long and the staff are friendly and responsive. I highly recommend giving it a look if you are in the market for a gym membership.

name: Matt Elder
text: Great gym. Plenty of weights and equipment. Always clean. Managed well, and new staff is very friendly. Highly recommend this gym to anyone looking to better themselves physically.

name: Clifford Hill
text: Christian and Patrick are the best!! Great place and cool atmosphere to work out. The staff is extremely nice.

name: paul neafie
text: Listen I have had MORE than my fair share of trouble with golds gyms over the years but this one IS the exception.  The staff is courteous, professional, and very helpful. From the manager to sales staff to the trainers and anything in between.  These guys are top notch. Had some problems with my card due to that target thing and it took weeks to work out because I bank out of state. But they were patient and helped me get it all worked out. Can't speak for the rest of the golds but this one should be their business model

name: Chris McLaren
text: Christian and the entire welcoming and pleasant. This health club is very enjoyable and puts a smile on my face.

name: Christopher Peters
text: This is the biggest gym of the three. With your membership you can go to the one in Vestavia, Pelham or 280. I will never get rid of my membership, this gym has it all, the free weights, machines, pool, saunas and steam room. Vestavia has an indoor basketball court! Best value by far for the money!

name: Kristin Avis
text:
Second time this week I get up at 430 and am sitting in the parking lot bc the gym hasn’t opened. The most responsible and regular person here that usually opens doesn’t have a key, and the instructor doesnt have a key and there are issues with locks. Be smart- give them one. We realize you’re selling the building but at least follow through on what we pay for. You put your amazing instructors in a bad position to apologize and listen to members frustrations when it’s jot their fault- it’s an upper ADMINISTRATIVE failure and lack of practical thinking. The staff are wonderful, the instructors are tremendously dedicated and have the highest energy and quality and expertise-
As administrators you need figure it out and give better service- and not put your staff in bad positions to catch he brunt of complaints because of your lack of dedication and poor attention to detail. at least let someone have a key to open the gym for a class or if they are supposed to open the gym. They’re dedicated and responsible adults and they are what keeps the regular early morning members coming.

name: Norse Archaelogist Does Things
text: Tried to cancel my membership over the phone in April and they said they just charged my account( it was a day earlier than what it should have been). Then I took my credit card off the website so they couldn't use it. They still somehow charged me. I called and they said you have to come in. I do the paper work and request a refund of just may and they say I'm trapped with them till September. After I'll be moved away to the other side of the country.

name: ram5K5 K
text: BEWARE! I was a member for over a year and decided to cancel when relocating. I asked the front desk how to cancel and was given an email address to send in my request. I was told I would have to give a 30 day notice. After doing EVERYTHING I was told to do to cancel....THEY ARE STILL BILLING MY CREDIT CARD AND I CAN'T MAKE THEM STOP! I have talked with the corporate office and they practically accused me of lying! After disputing the charges with my credit card company...Gold's Gym continues to try and charge me! It has been a nightmare....how can they get away with this?

name: Heather Gustafson
text:
The gym is nice, and the staff is friendly.

The contracts are awful, and best of luck to you trying to get out of yours. I was put through the ringer trying to cancel a membership (even after it expired). Honestly dealing with corporate was the worst part- condescending emails and bad customer service!

Oh and there is a high turnover of staff at this location, so don't get attached to anyone.

name: Joe Overman
text: Great gym! Helpful staff. Facility is all you could ask for in a gym.

name: Joseph Duran
text: Great gym, just need to add tanning and they will have everything.

name: Mister Moore
text: Great environment and cool staff. Patrick johnson's very helpful when I go in.

name: Keith Pilston
text: I joined Gold's due to there not being people at my previous gym to help motivate me. The team at Gold's has been great so far and I see improvement in myself because of it.

name: Ben Brannon
text: If you like being jerked around and lied to repeatedly, do yourself a favor and join Gold's Gym Vestavia - the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I canceled my membership on July 25 and continue to be billed every month. I have left messages at the gym as well as with the corporate office. Not one returned phone call. Found out yesterday morning that they failed to send in my cancellation. Asked for the GM to call me back ASAP. Didn't happen. Had to call them back this morning. We shall see if they actually follow through this time.

name: Mysterious Woman
text: Great place to work out friendly staff grit equipment

name: Samantha Williams
text: Love this gym and love the people! Everyone is very friendly and has a wide variety members!

name: Natesha Speight
text: Love it! Been a member for over 5 yrs.

name: Kirk Gamblin
text: After sum confusion Jamie was able to explain what was up with my cancellation. Workouts were good when I was able to do so.

name: Sophia Warner
text: Love Golds- especially my trainer Christian, he rocks!

name: Ben Christiansen
text: I have been going to this Gold's location for 7 years and it is great.

name: James Pak
text: Thief's work there!!  Beware!!! Always use a padlock. They go into the lockers and steal your wallet and cards and then run out and use it while you're working out.

name: Craig List
text: The best gym in BHam for sure. Very clean and with new modern equipment from Precor, TechnoGym and FreeMotion. The track is really cool for running instead of boring treadmills. I did a few "sessions" with trainer Kyle White and he definitely knows how to give you a good work out, you won't be disappointed. The two of us have a pretty regular thing going on now. The location is convenient but it can get pretty busy after work. I would suggest if you can try and go later in the evening to avoid the crowds and get an appointment with Kyle then hit the sauna afterwards for some small talk and hot relaxation. There's no juice bar or anything like that but Mugshots is right up 31 and a great midway point to loosen up little bit before just going home and straight to bed. Kyle is also very skilled in deep tissue massage due to his strong grip and thick forearms, so if you are sore afterwards it's a good way jumpstart the recovery process and get you in the right mood. Highly recommended!

name: Kendall Scott
text: Staff is very friendly!!! Overall it is very clean and well equipped with pool, free and machine weights, cardio equipment, theatre cardio room, and basketball court.

name: Abranette Jackson
text: They have everything I like in a gym. Plus a cinema room. This really helps me to get my workout done when I'm not motivated.  😉

name: Noah T
text:
Apart from my horrible experience with this place, know this:  There are a lot of gyms, depending on what you are looking for with nicer people (both trainers and clientale), better prices and value, and much nicer customer service and more knowlegeable personal trainers than Gold's, and specifically this Gold's.

Gold's is really struggling as their gyms get larger and more empty.  No surprise as soon as you walk in the door and they find out you aren't a member they try and get you to sign a contract.  The are commission based and are forced to get a lot of memberships but could care less about you as a person.  I go to a gym now where the exact opposite is true.  Why do you think they make you sign a long contract.  Yeah their facilities are nice, but it won't take long to regret their overpriced rudeness and inexperienced sometimes ignorant physical trainers.  Physical trainers start out at Gold's and the good ones leave because Golds takes a large cut of the top of their fees( not trainers fault)  BE WARNED!

My own story?

I moved down to B'ham about 2 years ago then had to return to Missouri when I canceled my membership in person with this location's manager, Mike Bick.  I came in and he assured me everything was good.  (Memberships can only be canceled if there's not a Gold's Gym location within a certain proximity of where you are moving, must show proof of move)  When I arrived in Missouri I faxed Bick a copy of my utility bill and called him to verify he got it.

Months later I moved back to B'ham and considered re-enrolling when I was shocked to find out they were still auto-billing my card and refused to refund me after I called several times and went to their accounting department.  Google search for similar stories,  this gym only wants your $$$$.

name: Justin J
text: Friendly staffs. Neat and clean facilities.

name: Logan Adams
text: Great gym for the price. Also, second largest Gold's Gym in the country.

name: Anthony Agee
text:
I am in town on business for a few weeks and inquired about guest passes.  Was told it was $99 for one month or $15 per day. Yes, $100 a month!!

The gym itself is clean but full of second-rate, off-brand equipment. For a gym passing itself off as "premium" I find it pretty laughable that there is only one cable machine, no LifeFitness or Hammer Strength brand equipment ANYWHERE.  Their free-weight section is tiny and cramped and put off to the side.

Front desk people I have encountered for each of the last 3 days I have visited (that's $45 so far....) have been less than friendly and seem inconvenienced by my presence.

name: 1kymaniakbar
text: Awesome gym to sculpture your body

name: Charlie Graham
text: Nasty gym. They have not cleaned this place in long time and there were dead bugs on the floor. Plus the staff was not very friendly and did not talk to customers.

name: Kavi D
text: The staff that works in the evenings is extremely rude and does not value their members at all! Will never go back to this location in the evening. It makes me want to cancel my membership because it was so bad.

name: Fernando Smith
text: Good place to work out

name: Bethany Cusimano
text: Clean, kind staff, only 1 DL platform

name: Marc Taylor

name: michelle landers
text: Just starting but this place has loads of equipment, a ladies only area and several tanning areas. If you're looking for a place to get a good workout in at great rates check them out.

name: Sarah Cotham
text: Super great. There's tons of options and so many different machines to use. The employees there are super helpful and nice too.

name: Ashley Figueroa Cifuentes
text:
Good equipment but could enforce the cleaning after each use.
Very rust prone equipment.

name: Casey Akins
text: I love this gym. It has saved my life and I look forward to keep going as much as I can

name: oliver leith
text: Fantastic equipment and friendly ownership.  Fair pricing & a friendly staff make this gym the best choice in russellville!

name: Jennifer Scott

text: Awesome

name: Jimmy Baker
text: Clean and courteous

name: Katie Hardy
text: American Health and Fitness is a good gym. It’s usually clean but overcrowding at busy times can be overwhelming. There could be more classes and more variety. I do appreciate the women only section.

name: James Bolton
text: I'm a member enjoy going there to exercise

name: Georgia Vernon
text: I go there and.tan but it has all the latest exercise equipment

name: Annittie Keeton
text: The tanning beds are Super

name: Christian Stults
text: Great service just not 5 stars

name: Elizabeth Gonzalez
text: My favorite gym thus far. Has designated women's area, men's sauna, several tanning beds including a standing bed. Has cardiovascular room and offers classes with membership as well as designated child care times.

name: Tiffany Sides
text: Love this place and the staff is very friendly.

name: Danica Graham
text:
Needed to cancel membership due to active military service and would no longer be in town   They told me I had to pay for 6 months up front!   $180 I had to pay because I am gone to fort Jackson active military and cannot use the gym!
I will not use this gym

name: beth mays
text: I love it because they have a woman room and they have all kinds of class you can take

name: Nicholas Handran
text:
This is a great gym.  It's got everything you need as far as free weights/machines/cardio, is clean and the staff was friendly.

For out of towners a day-pass is 10$ with the first trial day being free.

name: Edward Leathers
text: Equipment is great but the place is always a mess. Weights are rarely put up. There are new signs saying they are watching but are they inforcing?  On top of that the aerobic/cardio classes fill up. The only reason I am still a member is the other locations I use when I am not close to home.

name: Danielle McDill
text: The classes are great and the gym mangers are helpful and friendly.

name: Dwayne Murphy
text: Great value for the money. Best gym in Russellville.

name: Kyle Duke
text: Very good place to work out

name: Regina Borden
text: I love the machines and the tanning beds are really good

name: LeAnn Murray
text: Love that I can go anytime.

name: Ginny Key
text: N I ce fitness center with tanning booths. Inexpensive.

name: Robbie Richardson
text: Friendly staff and great gym.

name: Heath Isom
text: Except help from the staff, and friendly service.

name: Eddie Puckett
text: Friendly staff, clean and well maintained

name: Alejandra Caballero
text: Good!!!

name: Misty Merilien
text: It's not the gym for me. Nothing wrong with it if you know what you're doing. It is very clean and most machines do work. I feel like the staff could use more training. I do think PF could benefit their customers if they had childcare. But nothing wrong with the place. Many people do like it there.

resp.text: Your fitness is essential™ to us and so is your experience at our Planet! We appreciate your feedback and would love to know more! Call or stop by our gym to speak with a staff member at the front desk, so we may assist you with any of your needs!

name: Brandon Keener
text: This place is great for beginners. Plenty of variety in equipment, friendly employees and great amenities for Black Card members. Try to go as often as I can with my busy schedule. Bring a friend and enjoy your experience that much more.

resp.text: Hey there, Brandon! We're so glad to hear that you've had an amazing time on our Planet. We love providing all the tools and resources anyone could need to get started on (or continue pursuing) their fitness journey! We're glad the amenities in our facility have been treating you so well. We can't wait to have you back again soon!

name: LaSena mence
text: It is a really great gym personal trainer is great. Would strongly recommend. Staff very friendly and helpful

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience at our friendly and helpful workout environment, LaSena! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Duston Warnack
text: I had a great workout today, the gym was pretty clean and as always it is a judgment free place.

resp.text: That's our Planet! You can always count on a clean, comfortable, and judgement-free workout environment here with us, Duston. Thanks for being a part of the PF family! 👍

name: Jennifer Taylor
text: Love love love this gym! Really clean, super friendly staff, and lots of equipment to choose from.

name: Jessica Dykes
text: Great place to work out and not feel ashamed of how you look and they know you are trying. They are so encouraging to you.

resp.text: That's our Judgement Free Zone® for you! We're always dedicated to providing a friendly, motivating, and non-judgemental workout environment for our PF family. Thank you for your feedback and for making us a part of your fitness journey, Jessica! 👍

name: Samantha Parks
text: amazing gym... Moat comfortable... Highly advanced.. Up to date most modern technology

name: James Cole
text: Great gym and atmosphere. It would be really nice if they would go back to 24 hr status

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, James! We're glad to hear that you're enjoying your PF experience, and we appreciate your feedback as we continue to find the best ways to serve our members in a clean and safe environment. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Richard Splitt
text: Great place to workout. 10.00 a month, you can't beat it. Great atmosphere and staff.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that you're enjoying our affordable and friendly gym. Thanks for being a member of our pf family!

name: Tim Klassen
text: Really clean and well equipped gym ... a great  place to workout !

name: Lee Ann Michelle
text: Love the angel and hydro beds

resp.text: We're glad our amenities are treating you well! The satisfaction of our PF family always takes top priority here at our Planet. We hope to see you stop by again soon! 👍

name: renee bynum
text: Friendly staff and Clean environment... very nice tanning beds too

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you are enjoying the club, Renee! It's our pleasure creating a clean, friendly, and efficient fitness environment for our members and guests. Thanks for leaving a review and for being part of the PF family!

name: Luis Sandoval
text: Always with the friendly staff always clean always calm

name: Ellie Childress
text:
Love working out here. Very clean and not crowded during the day when I go.
Really friendly.

resp.text: We're very happy to hear that, Ellie! It's our pleasure to be keeping our club safe, clean, and comfortable for our PF family. Thank you very much for your feedback! 👍

name: Lee Saxton
text: Had to recant I can't lie for this company any longer. This franchise is bull. Need to know anything about this particular gym and it's franchise siblings just ask. I'll freely give

name: Angel Roden
text: Great staff and a great place to workout

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Angel! We are always committed to providing our members with a welcoming and friendly fitness experience, in addition to a safe and clean environment. Thanks for letting us know how satisfied you are with our team, it means a lot! We hope to see you at our gym again soon!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Great place for a gym. Brand new with plenty of choices for machines to work out on. Also their beds that give massages that feel incredibly good. Tanning beds are big and you can choose between laying down or standing up to get a nice bronze tan. Staff is helpful and friendly when I visit.

resp.text: Hi Dawn. We appreciate the five-star review and your feedback. Feedback like this inspires us to continue creating an even better experience for our members. Thanks.

name: michelle Cranford
text:
I enjoy going to this gym. The employees are very nice and the facility is clean.
I noticed over the months that  a certain channel has been taken off certain TV's  and it is still on other  ones.   I enjoy watching that channel while I walk on the tredmill. I thought PF is a judgement free zone.

resp.text: Hi there Michelle. Thank you for letting us know about your experience. We recommend reaching out to our club manager to provide any suggestions or concerns you may have to create an amazing environment for our members.

name: Kim Morton
text: So clean love this place

name: stinky ch33s3
text: Its nice, friendly, clean, bathrooms are clean, lots of cardio, cheap. People talk too much in there phone when there working out, that's annoying,  the ceilling leaks a bit but not bad. I like it, the wife likes it.

resp.text: Keep up the great work and thanks for sharing. We do it all for you! We are just glad that we could help.

name: Don Beasley
text:
This place is very large for the area. But for me I need a recumbent bike, like many people here. There are only 6, and they're very busy.

Later

I got a reply from Mgr to look for less busy hours. Guess when those are. When no one wants to go to the gym!!

Thanks for listening Planet Fitness. . The equipment has been spaced out.

resp.text: Hi, Don! Thank you for being a member. We of course want you to make full use of the equipment at our clubs. Feel free to ask a staff member when non-peak hours are. We'd be happy to let you know so that you can come at less busy times. Also, know that you can bring up any equipment suggestions up to the club manager. We'd love to hear them as we constantly want to improve all that we offer our members 👍

name: Jacky Cannon
text: My family went to check it out

resp.text:
And how did you guys love it, Jacky! We hope to see you and the family back on our Planet as members!

resp.text: Hi Stephen. It’s truly been an honor to help you reach your fitness goals. Thanks for the phenomenal feedback.

name: Stephen Wyman
text: Super clean place

resp.text: We're proud to serve you in a clean environment, Stephen. Thank you for being a member of our Planet!

name: Bob Hamilton
text: Great new gym! The staff is super friendly, helpful and they keep the gym very clean. Tons of cardio equipment, free weight and strength machines. The PF360 and TRX equipment is awesome. The tanning beds are very nice and the hydromassage beds are a great way finish your workout and relax.

name: Brandon Kelley (Branstarr)
text: Worked out, got hard.

name: Destiny Cortez
text: At planet fitness they provide a judgment free zone. All of the staff and costumes are very nice. It’s very clean and open 24/7 it’s definitely my go to gym.

resp.text: We're happy to be part of your fitness journey, Destiny! Thanks for sharing your experience at our clean Judgement Free Zone.

text:
I came to the Albertville Alabama new planet fitness gym and I still love this place.
My friend and I plan to go together soon.
It just opened up at the end of January this year.
I spoke with one of the staff members and she's awesome.
I'll be back soon to transfer to this gym.
I'm also exploring more of Albertville and I'm new to the State and so I'm looking forward to awesome experiences.

name: Robert Colvin
text: Fun and friendly staff. Well kept and maintained. Everything needed to achieve fitness goals.

We hope to see you at our Planet in Albertville again soon 💜

text: I like planet fitness, but the roof leaks in over 20 places throughout the gym. I am not sure who's fault that is, but it needs fixed.

resp.text: Hi Kyle. We appreciate your feedback. Feedback like this allows us to continue creating a better experience for our members. We recommend speaking to a club manager about any issues concerning maintenance at our Planet. Thanks.

resp.text: Hey Jason, we're glad you are enjoying our low-key environment! Thank you for taking advantage of our Black Card Membership, and have a great day!

name: Brent Helms
text: I've never exercised in a cleaner, better kept gym in my life. Not only are there free weights, machines, and cardio equipment, there is a lot of other exercise equipment as well, including equipment out back. The environment is friendly. People of all shapes, sizes, and ages work out.

name: Terry Nixon
text: Clean no pressure gym.  This family run business really cares about each individual member.  Top of the line equipment that is always working as expected.  Smoothie Bar and supplements are in house as well. Can't say enough about how great these gyms are! Prices are extremely competitive.

name: Stephanie James
text: Nice clean facilities. Need more squat racks but other than that I love it.
